tika-vin02t:6_4: Bahubhāvato imāni khuddakāni nāma jātānī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:6_8: Rūpaṃ aniccanti paṭijānitvā tattha kāraṇaṃ vadanto “jānitabbato”ti āha.
tika-vin02t:6_9: “Yadi evaṃ nibbānassapi aniccatā āpajjatī”ti parena vutto taṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicchādetuṃ puna “jātidhammato”ti aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ vadati.
tika-vin02t:7_0: “Sampajānaṃ musā bhāsatī”ti vattabbe sampajāna musā bhāsatīti anunāsikalopena niddesoti āha “jānanto musā bhāsatī”ti.
tika-vin02t:8_1: Jānitvā jānantassa ca musā bhaṇaneti pubbabhāgepi jānitvā vacanakkhaṇepi jānantassa musā bhaṇane.
tika-vin02t:8_2: Bhaṇanañca nāma idha abhūtassa vā bhūtataṃ bhūtassa vā abhūtataṃ katvā kāyena vā vācāya vā viññāpanapayogo.
tika-vin02t:8_5: tassa taṃnimittaṃ taṃhetu tappaccayā pācittiyaṃ hotīti evamettha aññesu ca īdisesu attho veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:9_11: suddhacetanā vā suddhasaddo vā suddhaviññatti vā musāvādo nāma na hoti,
tika-vin02t:9_12: viññattiyā saddena ca sahitā taṃsamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā musāvādoti.
tika-vin02t:9_14: Ghānādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ indriyānaṃ sampattavisayaggāhakattā vuttaṃ “tīhi indriyehi ekābaddhaṃ viya katvā”ti.
tika-vin02t:9_15: “Dhanunā vijjhatī”tiādīsu viya “cakkhunā diṭṭha”nti ayaṃ vohāro loke pākaṭoti āha “oḷārikeneva nayenā”ti.
tika-vin02t:10_4: Dārusakaṭaṃ yojetvā gatoti dārusakaṭaṃ yojetvā tattha nisīditvā gatoti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:10_5: Gato bhavissatīti tatheva sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā vuttattā musāvādo jāto.
tika-vin02t:10_6: Keci pana “keḷiṃ kurumānoti vuttattā evaṃ vadanto dubbhāsitaṃ āpajjatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin02t:10_8: Jātiādīhiyeva hi dasahi akkosavatthūhi davakamyatāya vadantassa dubbhāsitaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:13_0: Cittena thokatarabhāvaṃyeva aggahetvā bahubhāvaṃyeva gahetvā vuttattā “gāmo ekatelo”tiādināpi musāvādo jāto.
tika-vin02t:13_4: tassa puggalassa viññāpanapayogo cāti imānettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:13_9: “yo te vihāre vasatī”tiādipariyāyena uttarimanussadhammārocanatthaṃ paṭivijānantassa musā bhaṇite thullaccayaṃ,
tika-vin02t:13_11: kevalaṃ musā bhaṇantassa idha pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:16_1: Dutiye kaṇṇakaṭukatāya amanāpaṃ vadantā kaṇṇesu vijjhantā viya hontīti āha “omasantīti ovijjhantī”ti.
tika-vin02t:17_1: Bodhisatto tena samayena hotīti tena samayena bodhisatto nandivisālo nāma ahosīti attho.
tika-vin02t:17_3: kiriyākālavacanicchāya vā vattamānappayogo saddantarasannidhānena bhūtatāvagamo siyāti.
tika-vin02t:17_6: Pubbe patiṭṭhitārappadesaṃ puna are patteti pubbe ujukaṃ heṭṭhāmukhaṃ patiṭṭhitaarassa bhūmippadesaṃ
tika-vin02t:17_7: puna tasmiṃyeva are parivattetvā heṭṭhāmukhabhāvena sampatte,
tika-vin02t:17_8: paṭhamaṃ bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhitanemippadese parivattetvā puna bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhiteti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:18_5: Pādasikamilakkhakādayo viya navantavasena gaṇanā acchiddakagaṇanā. Ādi-
tika-vin02t:18_8: so rukkhampi disvā “ettakāni ettha paṇṇānī”ti jānāti.
tika-vin02t:18_9: Yabha methuneti vacanato ya- kāra bha-
tika-vin02t:19_1: Āpattiyā kāretabboti pācittiyena kāretabbo upasaggādimattavisiṭṭhānaṃ aticaṇḍālādipadānaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgatesuyeva saṅgahitattā.
tika-vin02t:19_2: Corosītiādīnaṃ pana kenaci pariyāyena pāḷiyaṃ anāgatattā dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:19_4: Pāḷiyaṃ avuttepi “jātiādīhi akkosavatthūhi parammukhā akkosantassa vatthūnaṃ anaññabhāvato yathā dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin02t:19_5: tathā davakamyatāya parammukhā vadantassapi dubbhāsitamevā”ti ācariyā vadanti.
tika-vin02t:20_1: Anusāsanipurekkhāratāya ṭhatvā vadantassa cittassa lahuparivattibhāvato antarā kope uppannepi anāpatti.
tika-vin02t:23_3: Hatthaparāmāsādivasena matthakaṃ patto kalaho jāto etesanti kalahajātā.
tika-vin02t:23_7: samagge satte avayavabhūte vagge bhinne karotīti attho.
tika-vin02t:23_11: Piyabhāvassa suññakaraṇavācanti iminā pana “piyasuññakaraṇato pisuṇā”ti niruttinayena atthaṃ vadati.
tika-vin02t:24_0: Idhāpi “dasahākārehi pesuññaṃ upasaṃharatī”ti vacanato dasavidhaakkosavatthuvaseneva pesuññaṃ upasaṃharantassa pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin02t:24_1: Pāḷimuttakānaṃ corotiādīnaṃ vasena pana dukkaṭamevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:24_2: “Anakkosavatthubhūtaṃ pana pesuññakaraṃ tassa kiriyaṃ vacanaṃ vā piyakamyatāya upasaṃharantassa kiñcāpi iminā sikkhāpadena āpatti na dissati,
tika-vin02t:24_4: Jātiādīhi anaññāpadesena akkosantassa bhikkhuno sutvā bhikkhussa upasaṃharaṇaṃ,
tika-vin02t:27_2: Purimabyañjanena sadisaṃ pacchābyañjananti “rūpaṃ anicca”nti ettha anicca-
tika-vin02t:28_3: Runti opātetīti ettha anunāsiko āgamavasena vutto,
tika-vin02t:28_7: Ettha ca “rūpaṃ aniccanti bhaṇa sāmaṇerā”ti vuccamāno sace rū-
tika-vin02t:29_4: Aṭṭhakathānissitoti pubbe magadhabhāsāya vuttaṃ dhammasaṅgahāruḷhaṃ aṭṭhakathaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin02t:29_6: nilīyitvā gaṇhate mige”ti evamādikaṃ saṅgahāruḷhaṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ gahetabbanti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:30_1: Anupasampannena saddhiṃ gaṇhantassa anāpattīti anupasampannena saha nisīditvā uddesaṃ gaṇhantassa anāpatti vuttā.
tika-vin02t:30_3: bhaṇato anāpattīti ettha dvīsupi ṭhitesu nisinnesu vā upasampannassa bhaṇāmīti bhaṇantassa anāpattiyeva.
tika-vin02t:30_5: “Nisinne vācemī”ti bhaṇantassapi upacāraṃ muñcitvā nisinnattā anāpatti.
tika-vin02t:30_6: Sace pana dūre nisinnampi vācemīti visuṃ sallakkhetvā bhaṇati,
tika-vin02t:30_8: Eko pādo na āgacchatīti pubbe paguṇoyeva pacchā asarantassa na āgacchati,
tika-vin02t:33_4: Tena nu kho pātitanti pucchāvasena kathitattā natthi musāvādo.
tika-vin02t:33_5: Keci pana “sandehavasena vacanaṃ musā nāma na hoti,
tika-vin02t:33_8: taṃ tesampi na kappatī”ti adhippāyena agantvā.
tika-vin02t:34_3: Tirattañhi sahavāse labbhamāne diratte vattabbameva natthīti dirattaggahaṇaṃ visuṃ na yojeti.
tika-vin02t:34_4: Tenevāha “uttaridirattatirattanti bhagavā sāmaṇerānaṃ saṅgahakaraṇatthāya tirattaparihāraṃ adāsī”ti.
tika-vin02t:34_6: Kevalañhi tirattanti vutte aññattha vāsena antarikampi tirattaṃ gaṇheyya,
tika-vin02t:34_7: dirattavisiṭṭhaṃ pana tirattaṃ vuccamānaṃ tena anantarikameva tirattaṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin02t:34_15: Satagabbhaṃ vā catussālaṃ ekūpacāraṃ hotīti sambandho.
tika-vin02t:35_0: Uparimatalena saddhiṃ asambaddhabhittikassāti idaṃ tulāya abbhantare sayitvā puna teneva susirena nikkhamitvā
tika-vin02t:35_1: bhittiantarena heṭṭhimatalaṃ pavisituṃ yoggepi uparimatalena asambaddhabhittike senāsane anāpattiyā vuttāya
tika-vin02t:35_2: tathā pavisituṃ asakkuṇeyye sambaddhabhittike vattabbameva natthīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:35_3: na pana sambaddhabhittike āpattīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:35_4: Heṭṭhāpāsāde sayitabhikkhussa anāpattīti idampi tādise senāsane heṭṭhimatale sayitasseva āpattippasaṅkā siyāti taṃnivāraṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:35_5: na pana uparimatale sayitassa āpattīti dassanatthaṃ.
tika-vin02t:35_6: Nānūpacāreti yattha bahi nisseṇiṃ katvā uparimatalaṃ ārohanti,
tika-vin02t:35_8: Uparimatalepi ākāsaṅgaṇe nipajjantassa āpattiyā abhāvato “chadanabbhantare”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:36_1: Aḍḍhakuṭṭake senāsaneti ettha “aḍḍhakuṭṭakaṃ nāma yattha ekaṃ passaṃ muñcitvā tīsu passesu bhittiyo baddhā honti,
tika-vin02t:36_2: yattha vā ekasmiṃ passe bhittiṃ uṭṭhāpetvā ubhosu passesu upaḍḍhaṃ upaḍḍhaṃ katvā bhittiyo uṭṭhāpenti,
tika-vin02t:36_4: Gaṇṭhipade pana “aḍḍhakuṭṭaketi chadanaṃ aḍḍhena asampattakuṭṭake”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:36_6: “Vāḷasaṅghāṭo nāma thambhānaṃ upari vāḷarūpehi katasaṅghāṭo vuccatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:36_7: Parikkhepassa bahigateti ettha yasmiṃ passe parikkhepo natthi,
tika-vin02t:36_9: Aparicchinnagabbhūpacāreti ettha majjhe vivaṭaṅgaṇavantāsu pamukhamahācatussālāsu yathā ākāsaṅgaṇaṃ anotaritvā
tika-vin02t:36_10: pamukheneva gantvā sabbagabbhe pavisituṃ na sakkā hoti,
tika-vin02t:36_11: evaṃ ekekagabbhassa dvīsu passesu kuṭṭaṃ nīharitvā kataṃ paricchinnagabbhūpacāraṃ nāma,
tika-vin02t:36_12: idaṃ pana tādisaṃ na hotīti “aparicchinnagabbhūpacāre”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:36_13: Sabbagabbhe pavisantīti gabbhūpacārassa aparicchinnattā ākāsaṅgaṇaṃ anotaritvā pamukheneva gantvā taṃ taṃ gabbhaṃ pavisanti.
tika-vin02t:36_14: Atha kuto tassa parikkhepoyeva sabbaparicchannattāti vuttanti āha “gabbhaparikkhepoyeva hissa parikkhepo”ti.
tika-vin02t:36_16: Catussālavasena sanniviṭṭhepi senāsane gabbhapamukhaṃ visuṃ aparikkhittampi samantā ṭhitagabbhabhittīnaṃ vasena parikkhittaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin02t:37_0: “Nanu ca ‘aparikkhitte pamukhe anāpattī’ti andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ avisesena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:37_1: tasmā catussālavasena sanniviṭṭhepi senāsane visuṃ aparikkhitte pamukhe anāpattiyevā”ti yo vadeyya,
tika-vin02t:37_6: taṃ na catussālavasena sanniviṭṭhā gabbhapāḷiyo sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:37_7: kiñcarahi visuṃ sanniviṭṭhaṃ ekameva gabbhapāḷiṃ sandhāya.
tika-vin02t:37_8: Tādisāya hi gabbhapāḷiyā aparikkhitte pamukhe anāpatti,
tika-vin02t:37_10: Ekāya ca gabbhapāḷiyā tassa tassa gabbhassa upacāraṃ paricchinditvā antamaso ubhosu passesu khuddakabhittīnaṃ
tika-vin02t:37_12: catussālavasena sanniviṭṭhāsu pana gabbhapāḷīsu ubhosu passesu gabbhabhittīnaṃ vasenapi pamukhaṃ parikkhittaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin02t:37_13: Tasmā yaṃ iminā lakkhaṇena parikkhittaṃ pamukhaṃ,
tika-vin02t:38_0: Idāni “aparikkhitte pamukhe anāpattī”ti vatvā tasseva vacanassa adhippāyaṃ pakāsentena yaṃ vuttaṃ “bhūmiyaṃ
tika-vin02t:38_3: Bhūmiyaṃ vinā jagatiyā pamukhaṃ sandhāya kathitanti hi imassa vacanassa ayamadhippāyo –
tika-vin02t:38_5: taṃ vinā vatthuṃ bhūmiyaṃ katagehassa pamukhaṃ sandhāya kathitaṃ.
tika-vin02t:38_8: Tenevāha “dasahatthubbedhāpi hi jagati parikkhepasaṅkhyaṃ na gacchatī”ti.
tika-vin02t:38_9: Heṭṭhāpi idameva manasi sannidhāya vuttaṃ “uccavatthukaṃ cepi hoti,
tika-vin02t:38_10: pamukhe sayito gabbhe sayitānaṃ āpattiṃ na karotī”ti.
tika-vin02t:38_12: Jagatiyā pamāṇaṃ vatvāti “sace jagatiyā otaritvā bhūmiyaṃ sayito,
tika-vin02t:38_13: jagatiyā upari sayitaṃ na passatī”ti evaṃ jagatiyā ubbedhena pamāṇaṃ vatvā.
tika-vin02t:38_14: Ekasālādīsu ujukameva dīghaṃ katvā sannivesito pāsādo ekasālasanniveso.
tika-vin02t:39_0: Majjhepākāraṃ karontīti etthāpi parikkhepassa heṭṭhimaparicchedena diyaḍḍhahatthubbedhattā diyaḍḍhahatthaṃ cepi majjhe pākāraṃ karonti,
tika-vin02t:39_2: Na hi chiddena gehaṃ ekūpacāraṃ nāma hotīti ettha sace ubbedhena diyaḍḍhahatthabbhantare manussānaṃ sañcārappahonakaṃ chiddaṃ hoti,
tika-vin02t:39_4: Kiṃ parikkhepoviddhastoti pamukhassa parikkhepaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin02t:39_5: Sabbattha pañcannaṃyeva chadanānaṃ āgatattā vadati “pañcannaṃ aññatarena chadanena channā”ti.
tika-vin02t:40_1: Pāḷiyaṃ “seyyā nāma sabbacchannā sabbaparicchannā yebhuyyenacchannā yebhuyyenaparicchannā”ti vadantena
tika-vin02t:40_3: “upaḍḍhacchanne upaḍḍhaparicchanne āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vadantena ca upaḍḍhacchannaupaḍḍhaparicchannasenāsanaṃ dukkaṭassa ādiṃ katvā dassitaṃ,
tika-vin02t:40_6: Lokavajjasikkhāpadasseva anavasesaṃ katvā paññāpanato imassa ca paṇṇattivajjattā yebhuyyenacchannayebhuyyenaparicchannassa
tika-vin02t:40_8: tasmā vinayavinicchaye ca garukeyeva ṭhātabbattā aṭṭhakathāyampi pācittiyameva dassitaṃ.
tika-vin02t:40_9: Satta pācittiyānīti pāḷiyaṃ vuttapācittiyaṃ sāmaññato ekattena gahetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:40_11: yebhuyyenacchanne yebhuyyenaparicchanne pācittiya”nti aṭṭheva pācittiyāni honti.
tika-vin02t:41_0: Senambamaṇḍapavaṇṇaṃ hotīti sīhaḷadīpe kira uccavatthuko sabbacchanno sabbaaparicchanno evaṃnāmako sannipātamaṇḍapo atthi,
tika-vin02t:41_3: uccavatthukattā maṇḍapassa sabbaaparicchannatā na yujjatīti āha “imināpetaṃ veditabba”ntiādi.
tika-vin02t:44_1: Chaṭṭhe “paṭhamasikkhāpade ‘bhikkhuṃ ṭhapetvā avaseso anupasampanno nāmā’ti vuttattā ‘mātugāmopi anupasampannaggahaṇena
tika-vin02t:44_2: gahitoyevā’ti catutthadivase mātugāmena saddhiṃ sayantassa dvīhi sikkhāpadehi dve pācittiyāni hontī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:44_3: Gaṇṭhipadesu pana tīsupi “imasmiṃ sikkhāpade mātugāmassa visuṃ vuccamānattā paṭhamasikkhāpade ‘bhikkhuṃ
tika-vin02t:44_4: ṭhapetvā avaseso anupasampanno nāmā’ti purisasseva gahaṇaṃ anucchavika”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:45_1: saddena catutthadivasepīti vuttaṃ hotī”ti kāraṇaṃ vadanti,
tika-vin02t:45_3: saddo sampiṇḍanatthoyevāti niyamābhāvato avadhāraṇatthassa ca sambhavato.
tika-vin02t:45_9: sadde gayhamāne imināva sikkhāpadena āpajjitabbāpattiyā aññasmimpi divase āpajjanaṃ dīpeti,
tika-vin02t:45_10: na paṭhamasikkhāpadena āpajjitabbāpattiyāti akāraṇameva tanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:45_11: “Matitthī pārājikavatthubhūtāpi anupādinnapakkhe ṭhitattā sahaseyyāpattiṃ na janetī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:45_12: “Atthaṅgate sūriye mātugāme nipanne bhikkhu nipajjatī”ti vacanato divā sayantassa sahaseyyāpatti na hotiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:48_6: Purisaviggahaṃ gahetvā ṭhitena yakkhena vā petena vā tiracchānena vā saddhiṃ ṭhitāyapi desetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:48_7: Akkharāya desetīti ettha “chappañcavācato uttari ‘imaṃ padaṃ bhāsissāmī’ti ekampi akkharaṃ vatvā tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin02t:49_3: “Aṭṭhakathaṃ dhammapadaṃ jātakādivatthuṃ vāti imināpi porāṇaṃ saṅgītiāruḷhameva aṭṭhakathādi vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:49_4: Aṭṭhakathādipāṭhaṃ ṭhapetvā damiḷādibhāsantarena yathāruci kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:49_5: Padasodhamme vuttappabhedoti iminā aññattha anāpattīti dīpeti.
tika-vin02t:49_6: Uṭṭhahitvā puna nisīditvāti iriyāpathaparivattananayena nānāiriyāpathenapi anāpattīti dīpeti.
tika-vin02t:49_7: Sabbaṃ cepi dīghanikāyaṃ kathetīti yāva na niṭṭhāti,
tika-vin02t:50_1: Mātugāmena saddhiṃ ṭhitassa ca viññūpurisassa ca upacāro aniyatesu vuttanayeneva gahetabbo.
tika-vin02t:50_3: Vuttalakkhaṇassa dhammassa channaṃ vācānaṃ upari desanā,
tika-vin02t:53_4: Anatikaḍḍhiyamānenapi pucchite vā apucchite vā tathārūpe kāraṇe sati ārocetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin02t:53_5: Teneva aññatarena daharabhikkhunā upavadito aññataro thero “āvuso,
tika-vin02t:53_9: imasmiṃ sāsane patiṭṭhā”ti vutto daharabhikkhu “āma, bhante,
tika-vin02t:53_11: “Kārako aya”nti ñatvāpi paṭipattiyā amoghabhāvadassanena samuttejanāya sampahaṃsanāya ca ariyā attānaṃ pakāsentiyeva.
tika-vin02t:53_13: Ummattakassa idha avacane kāraṇaṃ vadantena khittacittavedanaṭṭānampi avacane kāraṇaṃ vuttamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Iti-
tika-vin02t:53_18: Jhānalābhino pana tasmiṃ sati jhānā parihāyanti,
tika-vin02t:54_2: Ariyā cettha paṇṇattiṃ jānantā vītikkamaṃ na karonti,
tika-vin02t:54_3: puthujjanā pana paṇṇattiṃ jānitvāpi vītikkamaṃ karonti,
tika-vin02t:54_4: te ca satthuno āṇāvītikkamacetanāya balavaakusalabhāvato jhānā parihāyantīti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-vin02t:54_5: ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena ariyapuggale eva sandhāya “kusalābyākatacittehi dvicitta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:54_6: Paṇṇattiṃ ajānantā pana jhānalābhī puthujjanā vatthumhi lobhavasena akusalacittenapi na ārocentīti natthi.
tika-vin02t:54_7: Idha dukkhavedanāya abhāvato “dvivedana”nti imassa anurūpaṃ katvā dvicittanti idaṃ vuttanti evaṃ vā ettha adhippāyo gahetabbo.
tika-vin02t:57_2: Atthe hi dassite saddopi “ayaṃ etesu atthesu vattatī”ti dassitoyeva hoti.
tika-vin02t:57_4: taṃ sabbaṃ dassetuṃ pārājikāni vuttānī”ti ayañhettha adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:57_5: Tatrāyaṃ vicāraṇāti tatra pāḷiyaṃ ayaṃ vicāraṇā,
tika-vin02t:57_7: Tattha bhaveyyāti tattha kassaci vimati evaṃ bhaveyya.
tika-vin02t:57_8: Anupasampannassa duṭṭhullārocane viya dukkaṭena bhavitabbanti āha “dukkaṭaṃ āpajjatī”ti.
tika-vin02t:57_9: Akkosantopi dukkaṭaṃ āpajjeyyāti omasavādena dukkaṭaṃ āpajjeyya.
tika-vin02t:57_10: Adhippāyaṃ ajānantenapi aṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ vacaneyeva ṭhātabbanti dīpanatthaṃ “aṭṭhakathācariyāva ettha pamāṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:57_11: Punapi aṭṭhakathāvacanameva upapattito daḷhaṃ katvā patiṭṭhapento “imināpi ceta”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin02t:58_0: 80. “Aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā”ti vuttattā sammuti atthīti gahetabbāti āha “idha vuttattāyevā”tiādi.
tika-vin02t:59_1: Ādito pañca sikkhāpadānīti pāṇātipātādīni pañca sikkhāpadāni.
tika-vin02t:59_3: Keci pana “ādito paṭṭhāya pañca sikkhāpadānīti sukkavissaṭṭhiādīni pañcā”ti vadanti,
tika-vin02t:59_5: Pāṇātipātādīni hi daseva sikkhāpadāni sāmaṇerānaṃ paññattāni.
tika-vin02t:60_0: “Atha kho sāmaṇerānaṃ etadahosi ‘kati nu kho amhākaṃ sikkhāpadāni,
tika-vin02t:61_1: na ca sukkavissaṭṭhiādīni visuṃ tesaṃ paññattāni atthīti.
tika-vin02t:61_2: Atha bhikkhuno duṭṭhullasaṅkhātāni sukkavissaṭṭhiādīni anupasampannassa kiṃ nāma hontīti āha “sukkavissaṭṭhi…pe…
tika-vin02t:61_4: Imināpi cetaṃ siddhaṃ “anupasampannassa sukkavissaṭṭhiādi duṭṭhullaṃ nāma na hotī”ti.
tika-vin02t:61_5: Ajjhācāro nāmāti hi vadanto anupasampannassa sukkavissaṭṭhiādi kevalaṃ ajjhācāro nāma hoti,
tika-vin02t:61_6: na pana duṭṭhullo nāma ajjhācāroti dīpeti.
tika-vin02t:61_7: “Ajjhācāro nāmāti ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā akattabbarūpattā ca anupasampannassa sukkavissaṭṭhiādīni daṇḍakammavatthupakkhaṃ bhajanti,
tika-vin02t:61_8: tāni ca aññassa anupasampannassa avaṇṇakāmatāya ārocento bhikkhu dukkaṭaṃ āpajjatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:61_9: Idha pana anupasampannaggahaṇena sāmaṇerasāmaṇerīsikkhamānānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:61_13: bhikkhusammutiyā abhāvoti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:64_3: Ettha kiñcāpi yebhuyyapaṃsuṃ appapaṃsuñca pathaviṃ vatvā upaḍḍhapaṃsukā pathavī na vuttā,
tika-vin02t:64_4: tathāpi paṇṇattivajjasikkhāpadesu sāvasesapaññattiyāpi sambhavato upaḍḍhapaṃsukāyapi pathaviyā pācittiyamevāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:64_5: Keci pana “sabbacchannādīsu upaḍḍhe dukkaṭassa vuttattā idhāpi dukkaṭaṃ yutta”nti vadanti,
tika-vin02t:64_6: taṃ na yuttaṃ pācittiyavatthukañca anāpattivatthukañca duvidhaṃ pathaviṃ ṭhapetvā aññissā dukkaṭavatthukāya tatiyāya pathaviyā abhāvato.
tika-vin02t:64_7: Dveyeva hi pathaviyo vuttā “jātā ca pathavī ajātā ca pathavī”ti.
tika-vin02t:64_9: vinayavinicchaye ca sampatte garukeyeva ṭhātabbattā na sakkā ettha anāpattiyā bhavituṃ.
tika-vin02t:64_10: Sabbacchannādīsu pana upaḍḍhe dukkaṭaṃ yuttaṃ tattha tādisassa dukkaṭavatthuno sabbhāvā.
tika-vin02t:65_2: “Imaṃ valliṃ khaṇā”ti vuttepi pathavīkhaṇanaṃ sandhāya pavattavohārattā imināva sikkhāpadena āpatti,
tika-vin02t:65_11: Mūsikukkuraṃ nāma mūsikāhi khaṇitvā bahi katapaṃsurāsi.
tika-vin02t:66_0: Ekadivasampi na vaṭṭatīti ovaṭṭhaekadivasātikkantopi vikopetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:66_1: “Heṭṭhābhūmisambandhepi ca gokaṇṭake bhūmito chinditvā uddhaṃ ṭhitattā accuggatamatthakato chinditvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:66_2: Sakaṭṭhāne atiṭṭhamānaṃ katvā pādehi madditvā chinditvā āloḷitakaddamampi gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:66_6: “Sace pana aññattha paharitvā patitena udakena temitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin02t:67_1: Avisayattā anāpattīti ettha sacepi nibbāpetuṃ sakkā hoti,
tika-vin02t:67_2: paṭhamaṃ suddhacittena dinnattā “dahatū”ti sallakkhetvāpi tiṭṭhati, anāpatti.
tika-vin02t:67_3: Ovaṭṭhaṃ channanti paṭhamaṃ ovaṭṭhaṃ pacchā channaṃ.
tika-vin02t:67_7: khaṇanakhaṇāpanānaṃ aññataranti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:72_1: Senāsanavaggassa paṭhame niggahetuṃ asakkontoti sandhāretuṃ asakkonto.
tika-vin02t:72_2: Iminā pana vacanena dārakassa tattha upanītabhāvo tena ca diṭṭhabhāvo vuttoyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:72_3: Tena hi bhikkhunā taṃ rukkhaṃ chindituṃ āraddhe tattha nibbattā ekā taruṇaputtā devadhītā puttaṃ aṅkenādāya
tika-vin02t:72_4: ṭhitā taṃ yāci “mā me sāmi vimānaṃ chindi,
tika-vin02t:72_5: na sakkhissāmi puttakaṃ ādāya anāvāsā vicaritu”nti.
tika-vin02t:72_6: So “ahaṃ aññattha īdisaṃ rukkhaṃ na labhissāmī”ti tassā vacanaṃ nādiyi.
tika-vin02t:72_7: Sā “imampi tāva dārakaṃ oloketvā oramissatī”ti puttaṃ rukkhasākhāya ṭhapesi.
tika-vin02t:72_8: So bhikkhu ukkhittaṃ pharasuṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkonto dārakassa bāhaṃ chindi.
tika-vin02t:72_9: Evañca sayito vimāne sayito nāma hotīti katvā vuttaṃ “rukkhaṭṭhakadibbavimāne nipannassā”ti.
tika-vin02t:73_1: Rukkhassa upari nibbattañhi vimānaṃ rukkhapaṭibaddhattā “rukkhaṭṭhakavimāna”nti vuccati.
tika-vin02t:73_6: Sākhaṭṭhakavimānaṃ pana sākhāsu bhijjamānāsu tattha tattheva bhijjitvā sabbasākhāsu bhinnāsu sabbaṃ bhijjati,
tika-vin02t:73_8: tasmā rukkhe chinne taṃ vimānaṃ sabbaso vinaṭṭhaṃ,
tika-vin02t:73_9: teneva sā devatā bhagavato santikā laddhe aññasmiṃ vimāne vasi.
tika-vin02t:73_10: Bāhuṃ thanamūleyeva chindīti aṃsena saddhiṃ bāhaṃ chindi.
tika-vin02t:73_15: Rukkhānaṃ viya chedanādīsu akuppanañhi rukkhadhammo nāma.
tika-vin02t:74_4: yathā nāma cheko sārathi ativegena dhāvantaṃ rathaṃ niggahetvā yathicchakaṃ peseti,
tika-vin02t:74_5: evaṃ yo puggalo uppannaṃ kodhaṃ vāraye niggaṇhituṃ sakkoti,
tika-vin02t:74_7: Itaro pana rājauparājādīnaṃ rathasārathijano rasmiggāho nāma hoti,
tika-vin02t:75_1: yoti yo yādiso khattiyakulā vā pabbajito brāhmaṇakulā vā pabbajito navo vā majjhimo vā thero vā.
tika-vin02t:75_5: Kodhanti “anatthaṃ me caratīti āghāto jāyatī”tiādinā nayena sutte vuttānaṃ navannaṃ,
tika-vin02t:75_6: “atthaṃ me na caratī”tiādīnañca tappaṭipakkhato siddhānaṃ navannamevāti aṭṭhārasannaṃ khāṇukaṇṭakādinā
tika-vin02t:75_7: aṭṭhānena saddhiṃ ekūnavīsatiyā āghātavatthūnaṃ aññatarāghātavatthusambhavaṃ āghātaṃ.
tika-vin02t:75_15: yathā visatikicchako vejjo sappena daṭṭho sabbaṃ kāyaṃ pharitvā ṭhitaṃ visaṭaṃ sappavisaṃ mūlakhandhatacapattapupphādīnaṃ aññatarehi,
tika-vin02t:75_16: nānābhesajjehi payojetvā katehi vā osadhehi khippameva vineyya,
tika-vin02t:75_17: evameva yo yathāvuttena āghātavatthunā uppatitaṃ cittasantānaṃ byāpetvā ṭhitaṃ kodhaṃ vinayanupāyesu
tika-vin02t:75_18: tadaṅgavinayādīsu yena kenaci upāyena vineti nādhivāseti pajahati vinodeti byantiṃ karoti,
tika-vin02t:75_20: So evaṃ kodhaṃ vinento bhikkhu yasmā kodho tatiyamaggena sabbaso pahīyati,
tika-vin02t:75_23: tasmā orāni ca tāni saṃsārasāgarassa pārabhūtāni cāti katvā “orapāra”nti vuccati.
tika-vin02t:76_0: Atha vā yo uppatitaṃ vineti kodhaṃ visaṭaṃ sappavisaṃva osadhehi,
tika-vin02t:76_1: so tatiyamaggena sabbaso kodhaṃ vinetvā anāgāmiphale ṭhito bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ.
tika-vin02t:76_14: Evametasmiṃ orapāre catutthamaggena chandarāgaṃ pajahanto “jahāti orapāra”nti vuccati.
tika-vin02t:76_15: Ettha ca kiñcāpi anāgāmino kāmarāgassa pahīnattā idhattabhāvādīsu chandarāgo eva natthi,
tika-vin02t:76_16: apica kho panassa vaṇṇappakāsanatthaṃ sabbametaṃ orapārabhedaṃ saṅgahetvā tattha chandarāgappahānena “jahāti orapāra”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:77_0: Idāni tassatthassa vibhāvanatthāya upamaṃ āha “urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇa”nti.
tika-vin02t:77_3: So duvidho kāmarūpī ca akāmarūpī ca.
tika-vin02t:77_9: cirakālatāya purāṇañcāti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ tacaṃ jahanto catubbidhena jahati sajātiyaṃ ṭhito jigucchanto nissāya thāmenāti.
tika-vin02t:77_11: Uragā hi pañcasu ṭhānesu sajātiṃ nātivattanti upapattiyaṃ cutiyaṃ vissaṭṭhaniddokkamane sajātiyā methunapaṭisevane jiṇṇatacāpanayane cāti.
tika-vin02t:77_15: Jigucchanto nāma yadā upaḍḍhaṭṭhāne mutto hoti,
tika-vin02t:77_18: evaṃ jigucchantopi ca daṇḍantaraṃ vā mūlantaraṃ vā pāsāṇantaraṃ vā nissāya jahati.
tika-vin02t:77_19: Nissāya jahantopi ca thāmaṃ janetvā ussāhaṃ karitvā vīriyena vaṅkaṃ naṅguṭṭhaṃ katvā passasantova phaṇaṃ karitvā jahati.
tika-vin02t:78_0: Evameva ayampi bhikkhu orapāraṃ jahitukāmo catubbidhena jahati sajātiyaṃ ṭhito jigucchanto nissāya thāmenāti.
tika-vin02t:78_1: Sajāti nāma bhikkhuno “ariyāya jātiyā jāto”ti vacanato sīlaṃ.
tika-vin02t:78_3: Evametissaṃ sajātiyaṃ ṭhito bhikkhu taṃ sakattabhāvādibhedaṃ orapāraṃ jiṇṇapurāṇattacamiva taṃ dukkhaṃ
tika-vin02t:78_4: janentaṃ tattha tattha ādīnavadassanena jigucchanto kalyāṇamitte nissāya adhimattasammāvāyāmasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin02t:78_5: thāmaṃ janetvā “divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodhetī”ti vuttanayena rattindivaṃ
tika-vin02t:78_6: chadhā vibhajitvā ghaṭento vāyamanto urago viya vaṅkaṃ naṅguṭṭhaṃ pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā urago viya passasanto
tika-vin02t:78_7: ayampi asithilaparakkamatāya vāyamanto uragova phaṇaṃ karitvā ayampi ñāṇavipphāraṃ janetvā uragova tacaṃ
tika-vin02t:78_9: jahitvā ca urago viya ohitataco yenakāmaṃ pakkamati,
tika-vin02t:79_1: Bhavantīti iminā viruḷhamūle nīlabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā vaḍḍhamānake taruṇagacche dasseti.
tika-vin02t:79_2: Ahuvunti iminā pana vaḍḍhitvā ṭhite mahante rukkhagacchādike dasseti.
tika-vin02t:79_7: “Bhūtānaṃ gāmo”ti vuttepi avayavavinimuttassa samudāyassa abhāvato bhūtasaññitā teyeva tiṇarukkhalatādayo gayhanti.
tika-vin02t:79_9: tasmā bhūtānaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānatāya bhūtānaṃ gāmo”tipi vadanti.
tika-vin02t:80_0: Nanu ca rukkhādayo cittarahitatāya na jīvā,
tika-vin02t:80_1: cittarahitatā ca paripphandābhāvato chinnepi ruhanato visadisajātikabhāvato catuyoniapariyāpannato ca veditabbā,
tika-vin02t:80_2: vuḍḍhi pana pavāḷasilālavaṇānampi vijjatīti na tesaṃ jīvabhāve kāraṇaṃ,
tika-vin02t:80_3: visayaggahaṇañca nesaṃ parikappanāmattaṃ supanaṃ viya ciñcādīnaṃ,
tika-vin02t:80_5: tattha kasmā bhūtagāmassa chedanādipaccayā pācittiyaṃ vuttanti?
tika-vin02t:81_1: “Mūle jāyantī”tiādīsu attho upari attanā vuccamānappakārena sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttoti āha “evaṃ santepi…pe…
tika-vin02t:81_5: saddo ca “vijātā itthī”tiādīsu viya pasūtavacanoti āha “pasūtānī”ti.
tika-vin02t:81_7: Iminā imaṃ dīpeti “nibbattapaṇṇamūlāni bījāni bhūtagāmasaṅkhameva gacchanti,
tika-vin02t:81_10: Purimasmiṃ atthavikappe pana bījehi jātānaṃ rukkhalatādīnaṃyeva bhūtagāmatā vuttā.
tika-vin02t:82_4: Paccayantarasamavāye sadisaphaluppattiyā visesakāraṇabhāvato viruhanasamatthe sāraphale niruḷho bīja- saddo.
tika-vin02t:82_5: Tadatthasaṃsiddhiyā mūlādīsupi kesuci pavattatīti mūlādito nivattanatthaṃ ekena bījasaddena visesetvā vuttaṃ “bījabīja”nti “rūparūpaṃ,
tika-vin02t:82_7: Bījato nibbattena bījaṃ dassitanti kāriyopacārena kāraṇaṃ dassitanti dīpeti.
tika-vin02t:83_1: Bīje bījasaññīti ettha kāraṇūpacārena kāriyaṃ vuttanti dassento “tattha yathā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin02t:83_4: Yaṃ bījaṃ bhūtagāmo nāma hotīti bījāni ca tāni jātāni cāti vuttamatthaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin02t:83_5: Tattha yaṃ bījanti yaṃ nibbattapaṇṇamūlaṃ bījaṃ.
tika-vin02t:84_0: Yattha katthacīti mūle agge majjhe vā.
tika-vin02t:84_1: Sañcicca ukkhipituṃ na vaṭṭatīti ettha sacepi sarīre laggabhāvaṃ jānantova udakato uṭṭhahati,
tika-vin02t:84_4: Bījagāme saṅgahaṃ gacchantīti bhūtagāmato parimocitattā vuttaṃ. Anantaka-
tika-vin02t:84_8: Abhūtagāmamūlattāti ettha bhūtagāmo mūlaṃ kāraṇaṃ etassāti bhūtagāmamūlo,
tika-vin02t:84_12: ayaṃ pana tādiso na hotīti “abhūtagāmamūlattā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:84_15: Kiñcāpi hi tālanāḷikerādīnaṃ khāṇu uddhaṃ avaḍḍhanato bhūtagāmassa kāraṇaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin02t:84_16: tathāpi bhūtagāmasaṅkhyupagatanibbattapaṇṇamūlabījato sambhūtattā bhūtagāmato uppanno nāma hotīti bījagāmena saṅgahaṃ gacchati.
tika-vin02t:85_3: Amūlakabhūtagāme saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti nāḷikerassa āveṇikaṃ katvā vadati.
tika-vin02t:85_4: “Pānīyaghaṭādīnaṃ bahi sevālo udake aṭṭhitattā bījagāmānulomattā ca dukkaṭavatthū”ti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:85_6: Seleyyakaṃ nāma silāya sambhūtā ekā sugandhajāti.
tika-vin02t:85_7: “Rukkhattacaṃ vikopetīti vuttattā rukkhe jātaṃ yaṃ kiñci chattakaṃ rukkhattacaṃ avikopetvā matthakato chinditvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:85_8: Rukkhato muccitvā tiṭṭhatīti ettha “yadipi kiñcimattaṃ rukkhe allīnā hutvā tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin02t:85_9: rukkhato gayhamāno pana rukkhacchaviṃ na vikopeti,
tika-vin02t:85_11: Allarukkhato na vaṭṭatīti etthāpi rukkhattacaṃ avikopetvā matthakato tacchetvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:85_14: Pānīyaṃ na vāsetabbanti idaṃ attano atthāya nāmitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:85_15: Kevalaṃ anupasampannassa atthāya nāmite pana pacchā tato labhitvā na vāsetabbanti natthi.
tika-vin02t:85_16: “Yesaṃ rukkhānaṃ sākhā ruhatīti vuttattā yesaṃ sākhā na ruhati,
tika-vin02t:86_2: Kiñcāpi hi bījānaṃ agginā phuṭṭhamattena nakhādīhi vilikhanamattena ca aviruḷhīdhammatā na hoti,
tika-vin02t:86_3: tathāpi evaṃ kateyeva samaṇānaṃ kappatīti aggiparijitādayo samaṇavohārā nāma jātā,
tika-vin02t:86_4: tasmā tehi samaṇavohārehi karaṇabhūtehi phalaṃ paribhuñjituṃ anujānāmīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:86_5: Abījanibbaṭṭabījānipi samaṇānaṃ kappantīti paññattapaṇṇattibhāvato samaṇavohārāicceva saṅkhaṃ gatāni.
tika-vin02t:86_6: Atha vā aggiparijitādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ kappiyabhāvatoyeva pañcahi samaṇakappiyabhāvasaṅkhātehi kāraṇehi
tika-vin02t:86_7: phalaṃ paribhuñjituṃ anujānāmīti evamettha adhippāyo veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:86_11: yaṃ bījaṃ nibbaṭṭetvā visuṃ katvā paribhuñjituṃ sakkā hoti.
tika-vin02t:86_13: tena kattabbākārasseva vuttattā bhikkhunā avuttepi kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti na gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:86_14: Puna “kappiyaṃ kāretabba”nti kārāpanassa paṭhamameva kathitattā bhikkhunā “kappiyaṃ karohī”ti vutteyeva
tika-vin02t:86_16: “Kappiyanti vacanaṃ pana yāya kāyaci bhāsāya vattuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:86_17: “Kappiyanti vatvāva kātabba”nti vacanato paṭhamaṃ “kappiya”nti vatvā pacchā aggiādinā phusanādi kātabbanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:86_18: “Paṭhamaṃ aggiṃ nikkhipitvā nakhādinā vā vijjhitvā taṃ anuddharitvāva ‘kappiya’nti vattumpi vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:87_0: Ekasmiṃ bīje vātiādīsu “ekaṃyeva kāremīti adhippāye satipi ekābaddhattā sabbaṃ katameva hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:87_1: Dāruṃ vijjhatīti ettha “jānitvāpi vijjhati vā vijjhāpeti vā,
tika-vin02t:87_6: Maricapakkādīhi missetvāti ettha bhattasitthasambandhavasena ekābaddhatā veditabbā,
tika-vin02t:87_8: Bhindāpetvā kappiyaṃ kārāpetabbanti bījato muttassa kaṭāhassa bhājanagatikattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:88_1: “Sace etassa anuloma”nti senāsanarakkhaṇatthāya anuññātampi paṭaggidānādiṃ attanāpi kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti ettakeneva
tika-vin02t:88_3: Paṭaggidānaṃ parittakaraṇañca attano parassa vā senāsanarakkhaṇatthāya vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin02t:88_4: Tasmā sace tassa suttassa etaṃ anulomaṃ siyā,
tika-vin02t:88_6: aññassa vaṭṭatīti ayaṃ viseso kuto labbhatīti āha “attano na vaṭṭati…pe…
tika-vin02t:88_11: vikopanaṃ vā vikopāpanaṃ vāti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:91_1: Dutiye aññaṃ vacananti yaṃ codakena cuditakassa dosavibhāvanavacanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:91_3: Atha vā aññenaññaṃ paṭicaratīti aññena kāraṇena aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicaratīti evamettha attho veditabbo,
tika-vin02t:91_5: tato aññena codanāya amūlakabhāvadīpakena kāraṇena paṭicaratīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:91_11: Ko āpannotiādinā pāḷiyaṃ codanaṃ avissajjetvā vikkhepāpajjanavasena aññena aññaṃ paṭicaraṇaṃ dassitaṃ.
tika-vin02t:91_12: Aparampi pana codanaṃ vissajjetvā bahiddhā kathāapanāmavasena pavattaṃ pāḷimuttakaṃ aññenaññaṃ paṭicaraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:91_13: “Itthannāmaṃ āpattiṃ āpannosī”ti puṭṭho “pāṭaliputtaṃ gatomhī”ti vatvā puna “na tava pāṭaliputtagamanaṃ pucchāma,
tika-vin02t:91_14: āpattiṃ pucchāmā”ti vutte “tato rājagahaṃ gatomhī”ti vatvā “rājagahaṃ vā yāhi brāhmaṇagahaṃ vā,
tika-vin02t:91_15: āpattiṃ āpannosī”ti vutte “tattha me sūkaramaṃsaṃ laddha”ntiādīni vatvāva kathaṃ bahiddhā vikkhipantopi
tika-vin02t:92_1: tadeva pucchitamatthaṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ vadatīti aññavādakanti āha “aññenaññaṃ paṭicaraṇassetaṃ nāma”nti.
tika-vin02t:92_5: aññavādakattaṃ vā idāni kariyamānena kammena āropetūti attho.
tika-vin02t:92_6: Vihesakaṃ āropetūti etthāpi vihesakakammaṃ vihesakabhāvaṃ vā āropetūti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin02t:93_0: Anāropite aññavādake vuttadukkaṭaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgataaññenaññaṃpaṭicaraṇavasena yujjati.
tika-vin02t:93_1: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatena pana pāḷimuttakaaññenaññaṃpaṭicaraṇavasena anāropite aññavādake musāvādena pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin02t:93_3: Keci pana “āropite aññavādake musāvādena iminā ca pācittiyadvayaṃ hotī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin02t:93_11: chādetukāmatāya aññenaññaṃ paṭicaraṇaṃ vā tuṇhībhāvo vāti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:96_2: saddo cintāyaṃ paṭhitoti āha “lāmakato vā cintāpentī”tiādi.
tika-vin02t:96_3: Ayameva ca anekatthattā dhātūnaṃ olokanatthopi hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:97_1: Yena vacanenāti yena “chandāya itthannāmo idaṃ nāma karotī”tiādivacanena.
tika-vin02t:97_2: Yena ca khiyyantīti yena “chandāya itthannāmo”tiādivacanena tattha tattha bhikkhūnaṃ savanūpacāre ṭhatvā avaṇṇaṃ pakāsenti.
tika-vin02t:98_1: Aññaṃ anupasampannaṃ ujjhāpetīti aññena anupasampannena ujjhāpeti.
tika-vin02t:98_2: Tassa vā taṃ santike khiyyatīti tassa anupasampannassa santike taṃ saṅghena sammataṃ upasampannaṃ khiyyati,
tika-vin02t:98_4: Anupasampannaṃ saṅghena sammatanti ettha sammatapubbo sammatoti vutto.
tika-vin02t:98_7: tasmā ādikammikassa anāpattīti pācittiyaṭṭhāne dukkaṭaṭṭhāne ca imināva anāpattidassanatthaṃ vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:98_8: Evañca katvā ujjhāpentassa khiyyantassa ca ekakkhaṇe dve dve āpattiyo hontīti āpannaṃ.
tika-vin02t:98_9: Atha vā īdisaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ musāvādato paṭhamaṃ paññattanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:98_17: ujjhāpanaṃ vā khiyyanaṃ vāti imāni panettha cha aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:101_4: “Maṇḍape vā rukkhamūle vāti vacanato vivaṭaṅgaṇepi nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:101_6: “Aṭṭha māse”ti iminā vassānaṃ cātumāsaṃ cepi devo na vassati,
tika-vin02t:101_9: Tattha cattāro māseti vassānassa cattāro māse.
tika-vin02t:101_10: Avassikasaṅketeti iminā anuññātepi aṭṭha māse yattha hemante devo vassati,
tika-vin02t:101_11: tattha aparepi cattāro māsā paṭikkhittāti āha “avassikasaṅketeti vacanato”tiādi.
tika-vin02t:101_12: Iminā imaṃ dīpeti “yasmiṃ dese hemante devo vassati,
tika-vin02t:101_13: tattha aṭṭha māse paṭikkhipitvā cattāro māsā anuññātā.
tika-vin02t:101_15: tattha cattāro māse paṭikkhipitvā aṭṭha māsā anuññātā”ti.
tika-vin02t:102_0: Imināva nayena majjhimapadese yattha hemante himavassaṃ vassati,
tika-vin02t:102_2: Tasmā vassānakāle pakatiajjhokāse ovassakamaṇḍape rukkhamūle ca santharituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin02t:102_4: Tañca kho yattha himavassena senāsanaṃ na temati,
tika-vin02t:102_7: kākādīnaṃ nibaddhavāsarukkhamūle pana kadācipi na vaṭṭatīti evamettha vinicchayo veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:103_0: Imañca pana atthavisesaṃ gahetvā bhagavatā paṭhamameva sikkhāpadaṃ paññattanti visuṃ anupaññatti na vuttā.
tika-vin02t:103_1: Teneva hi mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “iti yattha ca yadā ca santharituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin02t:103_3: Atha vā avisesena ajjhokāse santharaṇasantharāpanāni paṭikkhipitvā “īdise kāle īdise ca padese ṭhapethā”ti
tika-vin02t:103_4: anujānanamatteneva alanti na sikkhāpade visuṃ anupaññatti uddhaṭāti veditabbā.
tika-vin02t:103_5: Parivāre pana imasseva sikkhāpadassa anurūpavasena paññattattā “ekā anupaññattī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:104_0: Navavāyimo sīghaṃ na nassatīti āha “navavāyimo vā”ti.
tika-vin02t:104_3: ukkaṭṭhaabbhokāsikassa pana cīvarakuṭi na vaṭṭatīti natthi.
tika-vin02t:104_4: Kāyānugatikattāti bhikkhuno tattheva sannihitabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:104_5: Iminā ca tasmiṃyeva kāle anāpatti vuttā,
tika-vin02t:104_6: cīvarakuṭito nikkhamitvā pana aññattha gacchantassa piṇḍāya pavisantassapi āpattiyeva.
tika-vin02t:104_7: “Yasmā pana dāyakehi dānakāleyeva sahassagghanakampi kambalaṃ ‘pādapuñchaniṃ katvā paribhuñjathā’ti dinnaṃ tatheva paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin02t:104_8: tasmā ‘imaṃ mañcapīṭhādisenāsanaṃ abbhokāsepi yathāsukhaṃ paribhuñjathā’ti dāyakehi dinnaṃ ce,
tika-vin02t:104_9: sabbasmimpi kāle abbhokāse nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:104_10: Pesetvā gantabbanti ettha “yo bhikkhu imaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgantvā vasati,
tika-vin02t:105_0: Valāhakānaṃ anuṭṭhitabhāvaṃ sallakkhetvāti iminā ca gimhānepi meghe uṭṭhite mañcapīṭhādiṃ yaṃkiñci senāsanaṃ
tika-vin02t:105_1: ajjhokāse nikkhipituṃ na vaṭṭatīti dīpitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:105_4: “Bahi vālukāya agamananimittaṃ pādaṭṭhānābhimukhā vālikā haritabbāti vutta”nti eke.
tika-vin02t:105_5: Kacavaraṃ hatthehi gahetvā bahi chaṭṭetabbanti iminā kacavaraṃ chaḍḍessāmīti vālikā na chaḍḍetabbāti dīpeti.
tika-vin02t:106_1: Anto saṃveṭhetvā baddhanti erakapattādīhi veṇiṃ katvā tāya veṇiyā ubhosu passesu vitthataṭṭhānesu bahuṃ veṭhetvā tato paṭṭhāya yāva majjhaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin02t:106_2: tāva anto ākaḍḍhanavasena veṭhetvā majjhe saṅkhipitvā tiriyaṃ tattha tattha bandhitvā kataṃ.
tika-vin02t:106_3: Kappaṃ labhitvāti gacchāti vuttavacanena kappaṃ labhitvā.
tika-vin02t:106_6: Aññattha gacchatīti taṃ maggaṃ atikkamitvā aññattha gacchati.
tika-vin02t:107_0: Āvāsikānaṃyeva palibodhoti ettha āgantukehi āgantvā kiñci avatvā tattha nisinnepi āvāsikānaṃyeva palibodhoti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:107_1: Mahāpaccarivāde pana “aññesu āgantvā nisinnesū”ti idaṃ amhākanti vatvā vā avatvā vā nisinnesūti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:107_3: Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana santharaṇasantharāpane sati pācittiyena bhavitabbanti anāṇattiyā paññattattā dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:107_5: idaṃ dhammakathikassā”ti visuṃ paññattattā anāṇattiyā paññattepi pācittiyeneva bhavitabbanti adhippāyena
tika-vin02t:107_7: Keci pana vadanti “anāṇattiyā paññattepi dhammakathikassa anuṭṭhāpanīyattā pācittiyena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-vin02t:107_8: āgantukassa pana pacchā āgatehi vuḍḍhatarehi uṭṭhāpetabbattā dukkaṭaṃ vutta”nti.
tika-vin02t:108_1: Bhūmiyaṃ attharitabbāti cimilikāya sati tassā upari,
tika-vin02t:110_3: bahipi mañce paññattāni hontī”ti imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ sikkhāpadassa paññattattā mañcapīṭhesu attharitvā paribhogoyeva paṭikkhitto,
tika-vin02t:110_5: Yadi evaṃ “pariharaṇeyeva paṭikkhepo”ti idaṃ kasmā vuttanti?
tika-vin02t:110_8: sabbaṃ pāsādaparibhoga”nti vacanato puggalikepi senāsane senāsanaparibhogavasena niyamitaṃ suvaṇṇaghaṭādikaṃ
tika-vin02t:110_9: paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭamānampi kevalaṃ attano santakaṃ katvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin02t:110_10: evamidaṃ bhūmattharaṇavasena paribhuñjiyamānampi attano santakaṃ katvā taṃ taṃ vihāraṃ haritvā paribhuñjituṃ
tika-vin02t:110_11: na vaṭṭatīti dassanatthaṃ “pariharaṇeyeva paṭikkhepo veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:110_15: paṭisāmetabbanti ettha theve asati rajanakamme niṭṭhite paṭisāmetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:111_1: “Bhikkhu vā sāmaṇero vā ārāmiko vā lajjī hotīti vuttattā alajjiṃ āpucchitvā gantuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:111_2: Otāpento gacchatīti ettha “kiñcāpi ‘ettakaṃ dūraṃ gantabba’nti paricchedo natthi,
tika-vin02t:111_3: tathāpi leḍḍupātaṃ atikkamma nātidūraṃ gantabba”nti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:111_6: vuttalakkhaṇe dese santharaṇaṃ vā santharāpanaṃ vā,
tika-vin02t:112_0: Mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana anāpucchaṃ vā gaccheyyāti ettha “yo bhikkhu vā sāmaṇero vā ārāmiko vā lajjī hoti,
tika-vin02t:112_2: tathārūpaṃ anāpucchitvā taṃ senāsanaṃ tassa aniyyātetvā nirapekkho gacchati,
tika-vin02t:112_5: dutiyapādātikkame pācittiya”nti vatvā aṅgesupi nirapekkhatāya saddhiṃ cha aṅgāni vuttāni.
tika-vin02t:112_6: Pāḷiyaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāyañca “nirapekkho gacchatī”ti ayaṃ viseso na dissati.
tika-vin02t:112_7: “Otāpento gacchatī”ti ca otāpanavisaye eva sāpekkhagamane anāpatti vuttā.
tika-vin02t:115_3: aññampi tādisaṃ mañcapīṭhesu attharitaṃ paccattharaṇamevā”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:115_4: Mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “paccattharaṇaṃ nāma pāvāro kojavoti ettakamevā”ti niyametvā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:115_5: tasmā gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ iminā na sameti,
tika-vin02t:115_8: Yo kocīti tassa ñātako vā aññātako vā yo koci.
tika-vin02t:116_2: Kurundaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttamevatthaṃ savisesaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “kiñcāpi vutto”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin02t:116_4: Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “aparicchannamaṇḍape vā paricchanne vāpi bahūnaṃ sannipātabhūte”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:116_6: Vattabbaṃ natthīti visesetvā kiñci vattabbaṃ natthi.
tika-vin02t:117_1: Yena mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā vinanti,
tika-vin02t:117_5: “Senāsanaṃ upacikāhi khāyita”nti imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattattā vatthuanurūpavasena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ upacikāsaṅkāya abhāve anāpatti vuttā.
tika-vin02t:117_6: Vattakkhandhake gamikavattaṃ paññapentena “senāsanaṃ āpucchitabba”nti vuttattā kevalaṃ itikattabbākāramattadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin02t:117_9: Teneva andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “senāsanaṃ āpucchitabba”nti ettha “yaṃ pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ vā pāsāṇatthambhesu vā katasenāsanaṃ yattha upacikā nārohanti,
tika-vin02t:117_11: tasmā yaṃ vuttaṃ gaṇṭhipade “tādise senāsane anāpucchā gacchantassa pācittiyaṃ natthi,
tika-vin02t:117_12: gamikavattavasena pana anāpucchā gacchato vattabhedo hoti,
tika-vin02t:118_0: Pacchimassa ābhogena mutti natthīti tassa pacchato gacchantassa aññassa abhāvato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:118_1: Ekaṃ vā pesetvā āpucchitabbanti ettha gamanacittassa uppannaṭṭhānato anāpucchitvā gacchato dutiyapāduddhāre pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin02t:118_2: Kiñcāpi mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā ajjhokāse nikkhipitvā gacchantassa idha visuṃ āpatti na vuttā,
tika-vin02t:118_3: tathāpi akāle ajjhokāse mañcapīṭhāni paññapetvā gacchantassa leḍḍupātātikkame purimasikkhāpadena pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin02t:118_5: “Maṇḍape vā rukkhamūle vā”ti iminā ajjhokāsopi saṅgahitoyevāti tatthāpi dukkaṭaṃ idha vuttamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:118_6: Seyyaṃ pana ajjhokāse santharitvā gacchantassa ubhayenapi dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin02t:118_7: “Saṅghike vihāre saṅghikaṃyeva seyyaṃ santharitvā pakkamantassa pācittiyaṃ vuttanti ubhosu ekekasmiṃ saṅghike dukkaṭa”nti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:118_11: vuttalakkhaṇe vihāre santharaṇaṃ vā santharāpanaṃ vā,
tika-vin02t:121_2: Bahūpakārataṃ guṇavisiṭṭhatañca sallakkhentoti bhaṇḍāgārikassa bahūpakārataṃ dhammakathikādīnaṃ guṇavisiṭṭhatañca sallakkhento.
tika-vin02t:121_3: Samantā diyaḍḍho hatthoti majjhe paññattamañcapīṭhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:122_4: “Gilāno pavisatītiādīsu anāpattikāraṇasabbhāvato gilānāditāya pavisissāmīti upacāraṃ pavisantassa satipi
tika-vin02t:122_5: sambādhetukāmatāya anāpatti vuttāyevā”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:122_6: Evañca sati agilānādibhāvopi visuṃ aṅgesu vattabbo siyā,
tika-vin02t:122_10: upacāre nisīdanaṃ vā nipajjanaṃ vāti imāni panettha cattāri aṅgānī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:126_1: Alajjiṃ nikkaḍḍhatītiādīsu paṭhamaṃ alajjīādibhāvena nikkaḍḍhissāmīti cintetvā nikkaḍḍhantassa cittassa lahuparivattitāya kope uppannepi anāpatti.
tika-vin02t:126_5: kopena nikkaḍḍhanaṃ vā nikkaḍḍhāpanaṃ vāti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:129_7: apaṭāṇidinne āhaccapādake nisīdanaṃ vā nipajjanaṃ vāti imāni panettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:132_1: Navame “mahallako nāma vihāro sasāmiko”ti vuttattā saññācikāya kuṭiyā anāpatti.
tika-vin02t:132_2: “Aḍḍhateyyahatthampī”ti ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena vuttavacanaṃ pāḷiyā sametīti āha “taṃ suvutta”nti.
tika-vin02t:132_3: “Pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāyañca ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena aḍḍhateyyahatthappamāṇassa okāsassa dassitattā kavāṭaṃ
tika-vin02t:132_4: aḍḍhateyyahatthavitthārato ūnakaṃ vā hotu adhikaṃ vā,
tika-vin02t:133_1: Sā aparipūraupacārāpi hotīti vivariyamānaṃ kavāṭaṃ yaṃ bhittiṃ āhanati,
tika-vin02t:133_5: punappunaṃ limpāpesīti imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ uppannadosena sikkhāpadassa paññattattā lepaṃ anujānantena
tika-vin02t:133_6: ca dvārabandhassa samantā aḍḍhateyyahatthappamāṇeyeva padese punappunaṃ lepassa anuññātattā tato aññattha
tika-vin02t:133_7: punappunaṃ limpentassa vā limpāpentassa vā bhittiyaṃ mattikāya kattabbakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā puna catutthalepe
tika-vin02t:133_9: Gaṇṭhipadesu pana tīsupi “punappunaṃ lepadānassa vuttappamāṇato aññattha paṭikkhittamattaṃ ṭhapetvā pācittiyassa
tika-vin02t:134_3: Patanokāsoti patanokāsattā tatra ṭhitassa bhikkhuno upari pateyyāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:134_6: sace vihārassa samantā vuttappamāṇe paricchede pubbaṇṇādīni na santi,
tika-vin02t:135_1: Ekekaṃ maggaṃ ujukameva uṭṭhapetvā chādanaṃ maggena chādanaṃ nāma hotīti dassetuṃ “maggena chādentassā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:135_2: Iminā pana nayena sabbasmiṃ vihāre ekavāraṃ chādite taṃ chadanaṃ ekamagganti gahetvā “dve magge”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:135_3: “Pariyāyena chādanepi imināva nayena yojetabba”nti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:135_4: taṃ “punappunaṃ chādāpesī”ti imāya pāḷiyā “sabbampi cetaṃ chadanaṃ chadanūpari veditabba”nti iminā aṭṭhakathāvacanena ca sameti,
tika-vin02t:135_5: tasmā dve magge adhiṭṭhahitvā tatiyāya maggaṃ āṇāpetvā pakkamitabbanti ettha dve chadanāni adhiṭṭhahitvā
tika-vin02t:135_6: tatiyaṃ chadanaṃ “evaṃ chādehī”ti āṇāpetvā pakkamitabbanti evamattho gahetabbo.
tika-vin02t:136_0: Keci pana “paṭhamaṃ tāva ekavāraṃ aparisesaṃ chādetvā puna chadanadaṇḍake bandhitvā dutiyavāraṃ tatheva chādetabbaṃ,
tika-vin02t:136_1: tatiyavāracatutthavāre sampatte dve magge adhiṭṭhahitvā āṇāpetvā pakkamitabba”nti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:136_2: Apare pana “paṭhamavāreyeva tayopi magge adhiṭṭhātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin02t:136_4: Tadubhayampi pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāya ca na sameti.
tika-vin02t:136_5: Tatiyāya magganti ettha tatiyāyāti upayogatthe sampadānavacanaṃ,
tika-vin02t:136_7: Tiṇṇaṃ maggānanti maggavasena chāditānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ chadanānaṃ.
tika-vin02t:136_9: Catutthe magge vā pariyāye vāti ca tathā chādentānaṃ catutthaṃ chādanameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:136_13: uttari adhiṭṭhānanti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:139_1: Dasame imassa sikkhāpadassa “siñceyya vā siñcāpeyya vā”ti bāhiraparibhogavasena paṭhamaṃ paññattattā
tika-vin02t:139_2: “sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ paribhuñjeyyā”ti sikkhāpadaṃ attano nahānapānādiparibhogavasena paññattanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:139_3: Tasmiṃ vā paṭhamaṃ paññattepi attano paribhogavaseneva paññattattā puna imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ bāhiraparibhogavaseneva paññattanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:140_0: Sappāṇakasaññissa “paribhogena pāṇakā marissantī”ti pubbabhāge jānantassapi siñcanasiñcāpanaṃ “padīpe
tika-vin02t:140_1: nipatitvā paṭaṅgādipāṇakā marissantī”ti jānantassa padīpujjalanaṃ viya vināpi vadhakacetanāya hotīti
tika-vin02t:140_7: vinā vadhakacetanāya kenacideva karaṇīyena tiṇādīnaṃ siñcananti imāni panettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:146_1: Bhikkhunivaggassa paṭhamasikkhāpade kathānusārenāti “so thero kiṃsīlo kiṃsamācāro katarakulā pabbajito”tiādinā pucchantānaṃ pucchākathānusārena.
tika-vin02t:146_2: Kathetuṃ vaṭṭantīti nirāmiseneva cittena kathetuṃ vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin02t:146_3: Aniyyānikattā saggamokkhamaggānaṃ tiracchānabhūtā kathā tiracchānakathāti āha “saggamaggagamanepī”tiādi. Api-
tika-vin02t:146_7: Laddhāsevanā hi tiracchānakathā saggamokkhānaṃ bādhikāva hoti.
tika-vin02t:147_10: Yena hi te saṃvutā pihitā honti,
tika-vin02t:147_14: Tathābhūto ca yasmā tena samaṅgī nāma hoti,
tika-vin02t:147_17: Viharatīti iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarasīle ṭhitassa bhikkhuno iriyāpathavihāro dassito.
tika-vin02t:148_0: Saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato pāḷiyā vibhāvetuṃ “vuttañheta”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin02t:148_3: Tattha sīlanti kāmañcetaṃ saha kammavācāpariyosānena ijjhanakassa pātimokkhasseva vevacanaṃ,
tika-vin02t:148_4: evaṃ santepi dhammato etaṃ sīlaṃ nāma pāṇātipātādīhi vā viramantassa vattapaṭipattiṃ vā pūrentassa cetanādayo dhammā veditabbā.
tika-vin02t:148_5: Yasmā pana pātimokkhasīlena bhikkhu sāsane patiṭṭhāti nāma,
tika-vin02t:148_8: kusaladhammā eva vā ettha patiṭṭhahantīti patiṭṭhā.
tika-vin02t:148_9: Ayamattho “sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño”ti ca “patiṭṭhā, mahārāja,
tika-vin02t:148_10: sīlaṃ sabbesaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammāna”nti ca “sīle patiṭṭhitassa kho, mahārāja,
tika-vin02t:148_11: sabbe kusalā dhammā na parihāyantī”ti ca ādisuttavasena veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:151_0: Yathā hi nagaravaḍḍhakī nagaraṃ māpetukāmo paṭhamaṃ nagaraṭṭhānaṃ sodheti,
tika-vin02t:151_1: tato aparabhāge vīthicatukkasiṅghāṭakādiparicchedena vibhajitvā nagaraṃ māpeti,
tika-vin02t:151_4: Yathā vā pana rajako paṭhamaṃ tīhi khārehi vatthaṃ dhovitvā parisuddhe vatthe yadicchakaṃ raṅgajātaṃ upaneti,
tika-vin02t:151_5: yathā vā pana cheko cittakāro rūpaṃ likhitukāmo ādito bhittiparikammaṃ karoti,
tika-vin02t:151_7: evameva yogāvacaro āditova sīlaṃ visodhetvā aparabhāge samathavipassanādayo dhamme sacchikaroti.
tika-vin02t:152_2: Yathā hi chinnacaraṇassa purisassa disaṃgamanābhisaṅkhāro na jāyati,
tika-vin02t:152_4: evameva yassa sīlaṃ bhinnaṃ hoti khaṇḍaṃ aparipuṇṇaṃ,
tika-vin02t:152_6: Yassa pana taṃ abhinnaṃ hoti akhaṇḍaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ,
tika-vin02t:153_1: saṃvaraṇavasena saṃvaroti ubhayenapi sīlasaṃyamo ceva sīlasaṃvaro ca kathito.
tika-vin02t:153_3: puggalaṃ vā saṃyameti vītikkamavasena tassa vipphandituṃ na detīti saṃyamo,
tika-vin02t:153_6: Yathā hi sattānaṃ catubbidho āhāro mukhena pavisitvā aṅgamaṅgāni pharati,
tika-vin02t:153_7: evaṃ yoginopi catubhūmakakusalaṃ sīlamukhena pavisitvā atthasiddhiṃ sampādeti.
tika-vin02t:153_11: Kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyāti catubhūmakakusalānaṃ paṭilābhatthāya pamokkhaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ seṭṭhaṃ padhānanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:154_6: Yathā hi saṃvutadvāraṃ gehaṃ “saṃvutagehaṃ pihitageha”nti vuccati,
tika-vin02t:155_0: Iriyatītiādīhi sattahipi padehi pātimokkhasaṃvarasīle ṭhitassa bhikkhuno iriyāpathavihāro kathito.
tika-vin02t:155_1: Tattha iriyatīti catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ aññatarasamaṅgibhāvato iriyati.
tika-vin02t:155_3: Ekaṃ iriyāpathadukkhaṃ aparena iriyāpathena vicchinditvā ciraṭṭhitibhāvena sarīrarakkhaṇato pāleti.
tika-vin02t:155_4: Ekasmiṃ iriyāpathe asaṇṭhahitvā sabbairiyāpathe vattanato yapeti.
tika-vin02t:155_5: Tena tena iriyāpathena tathā tathā kāyassa yāpanato yāpeti.
tika-vin02t:157_0: “Idhekacco veḷudānena vā pattadānena vā puppha phala sinānadantakaṭṭhadānena vā cāṭukamyatāya vā muggasūpyatāya
tika-vin02t:157_1: vā pāribhaṭayatāya vā jaṅghapesanikena vā aññataraññatarena vā buddhapaṭikuṭṭhena micchāājīvena jīvikaṃ kappeti,
tika-vin02t:160_0: “Idhekacco na veḷudānena na patta na puppha na phala na sināna na dantakaṭṭha na cāṭukamyatāya na muggasūpyatāya
tika-vin02t:160_1: na pāribhaṭayatāya na jaṅghapesanikena na aññataraññatarena buddhapaṭikuṭṭhena micchāājīvena jīvikaṃ kappeti,
tika-vin02t:163_0: “Idhekacco vesiyagocaro vā hoti vidhava thullakumāri paṇḍaka bhikkhuni pānāgāragocaro vā,
tika-vin02t:163_1: saṃsaṭṭho viharati rājūhi rājamahāmattehi titthiyehi titthiyasāvakehi ananulomikena saṃsaggena,
tika-vin02t:163_2: yāni pana tāni kulāni assaddhāni appasannāni anopānabhūtāni akkosakaparibhāsakāni anatthakāmāni ahitakāmāni
tika-vin02t:163_3: aphāsukakāmāni ayogakkhemakāmāni bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ upāsakānaṃ upāsikānaṃ,
tika-vin02t:165_2: Tividho hi gocaro upanissayagocaro ārakkhagocaro upanibandhagocaroti.
tika-vin02t:165_10: Yassa vā pana anusikkhamāno saddhāya vaḍḍhati,
tika-vin02t:165_14: Idha bhikkhu antaragharaṃ paviṭṭho vīthiṃ paṭipanno okkhittacakkhu yugamattadassāvī saṃvuto gacchati,
tika-vin02t:165_32: Iti ayaṃ tividho gocaro idha ādi-
tika-vin02t:166_1: Bhayato dassanasīloti paramāṇumattaṃ vajjaṃ aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyojanasatasahassubbedhasinerupabbatasadisaṃ katvā dassanasabhāvo,
tika-vin02t:166_2: sabbalahukaṃ vā dubbhāsitamattaṃ pārājikasadisaṃ katvā dassanasabhāvo.
tika-vin02t:166_3: Sammā ādāyāti sammadeva sakkaccaṃ sabbaso vā ādiyitvā.
tika-vin02t:167_4: Yassa hi ito gahitaṃ etto palāyati,
tika-vin02t:167_6: parisamajjhe ekaṃ suttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā kathetuṃ vā vācetuṃ vā na sakkoti,
tika-vin02t:167_8: Yassa pana uggahitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggahitakālasadisameva hoti,
tika-vin02t:167_9: dasapi vīsatipi vassāni sajjhāyaṃ akarontassa na nassati,
tika-vin02t:167_12: Ekapadampi ekakkharampi avinaṭṭhaṃ hutvā sanniciyatīti sannicayo,
tika-vin02t:167_13: sutaṃ sannicayo etasminti sutasannicayoti āha “sutaṃ sannicitaṃ asminti sutasannicayo”ti.
tika-vin02t:167_14: Yassa hi sutaṃ hadayamañjusāyaṃ sannicitaṃ silāya lekhā viya suvaṇṇaghaṭe pakkhittā sīhavasā viya ca sādhu tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin02t:168_1: Ekassa hi uggahitabuddhavacanaṃ niccakālikaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin02t:168_2: “asukasuttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā kathehī”ti vutte “sajjhāyitvā aññehi saṃsanditvā paripucchāvasena atthaṃ ogāhitvā jānissāmī”ti vadati.
tika-vin02t:168_3: Ekassa paguṇaṃ pabandhavicchedābhāvato gaṅgāsotasadisaṃ bhavaṅgasotasadisañca akittimaṃ sukhappavatti hoti,
tika-vin02t:168_4: “asukasuttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā kathehī”ti vutte uddharitvā tameva katheti.
tika-vin02t:168_6: Vācāya paguṇā katāti suttadasakavaggadasakapaṇṇāsadasakavasena vācāya sajjhāyitā,
tika-vin02t:168_8: dasa vaggāni gatānītiādinā sallakkhetvā vācāya sajjhāyitāti attho.
tika-vin02t:168_9: Suttekadesassa hi suttamattassa ca vacasā paricayo idha nādhippeto,
tika-vin02t:168_11: Manasā anupekkhitāti manasā anu anu pekkhitā,
tika-vin02t:168_13: Āvajjantassāti vācāya sajjhāyituṃ buddhavacanaṃ manasā cintentassa.
tika-vin02t:168_14: Suṭṭhu paṭividdhāti nijjaṭaṃ niggumbaṃ katvā suṭṭhu yāthāvato paṭividdhā.
tika-vin02t:169_6: “Vipassanāvasena uggaṇhantena catudhātuvavatthānamukhena uggahetabba”nti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:169_7: Catūsu disāsu appaṭihatattā catasso disā etassāti catuddiso,
tika-vin02t:170_2: “Dve vibhaṅgā paguṇā vācuggatā kātabbāti idaṃ paripucchāvasena uggahaṇampi sandhāya vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:170_4: itarassa paguṇaṃ hotīti āha “tīhi janehi saddhiṃ parivattanakkhamā kātabbā”ti.
tika-vin02t:170_6: Heṭṭhimā vā tayo vaggāti mahāvaggato heṭṭhā sagāthakavaggo nidānavaggo khandhakavaggoti ime tayo vaggā.
tika-vin02t:170_7: “Dhammapadampi saha vatthunā uggahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttattā jātakabhāṇakena sāṭṭhakathaṃ
tika-vin02t:170_8: jātakaṃ uggahetvāpi dhammapadampi saha vatthunā uggahetabbameva.
tika-vin02t:171_0: Kalyāṇā sundarā parimaṇḍalapadabyañjanā vācā assāti kalyāṇavāco.
tika-vin02t:171_3: Tattha parimaṇḍalapadabyañjanāyāti ṭhānakaraṇasampattiyā sikkhāsampattiyā ca katthacipi anūnatāya parimaṇḍalapadāni
tika-vin02t:171_6: taṃ akkharapāripūriṃ katvā sithiladhanitādidasavidhaṃ byañjanabuddhiṃ aparihāpetvā vuttaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin02t:171_10: Atha vā pajjati ñāyati attho etenāti padaṃ, nāmādi.
tika-vin02t:172_0: Apica yo bhikkhu parisati dhammaṃ desento suttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā nikkhipitvā aññaṃ upārambhakaraṃ suttaṃ āharati,
tika-vin02t:172_3: evaṃ idaṃ gahetvā ettha khipanto ekapasseneva pariharanto kālaṃ ñatvā vuṭṭhahati,
tika-vin02t:172_5: tassa kathā aparimaṇḍalā nāma hoti atthassa aparipuṇṇabhāvato.
tika-vin02t:172_6: Yo pana suttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā nikkhipitvā bahi ekapadampi agantvā yathānikkhittassa suttassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanāvaseneva
tika-vin02t:172_7: suttantarampi ānento pāḷiyā anusandhiñca pubbāparañca apekkhanto ācariyehi dinnanaye ṭhatvā tulikāya
tika-vin02t:172_8: paricchindanto viya taṃ taṃ atthaṃ suvavatthitaṃ katvā dassento gambhīramātikāya udakaṃ pesento viya
tika-vin02t:172_9: gambhīramatthaṃ gamento vaggihārigatiyā pade padaṃ koṭṭento sindhavājānīyo viya ekaṃyeva padaṃ anekehi
tika-vin02t:172_11: tassa kathā parimaṇḍalā nāma hoti dhammato atthato anusandhito pubbāparato ācariyuggahatoti sabbaso paripuṇṇabhāvato.
tika-vin02t:173_1: tassa bhikkhuno tenetaṃ bhāsitabbaṃ atthassa guṇaparipuṇṇabhāvena pure puṇṇabhāve bhavāti attho.
tika-vin02t:173_2: Pure vā bhavattā poriyā nāgarikitthiyā sukhumālattanena sadisāti porī,
tika-vin02t:173_8: Evarūpī hi kathā bahuno janassa kantā hoti manāpā,
tika-vin02t:174_1: Atha vā nātisīghaṃ nātisaṇikaṃ nirantaraṃ ekarasañca katvā parisāya ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ dhammaṃ kathentassa vācā vissaṭṭhā nāma.
tika-vin02t:174_2: Yo hi bhikkhu dhammaṃ kathento suttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā ārabhitvā āraddhakālato paṭṭhāya turitaturito araṇiṃ
tika-vin02t:174_3: manthento viya uṇhakhādanīyaṃ khādanto viya pāḷiyā anusandhipubbāparesu gahitaṃ gahitameva,
tika-vin02t:174_4: aggahitaṃ aggahitameva katvā purāṇapaṇṇantaresu caramānaṃ godhaṃ uṭṭhāpento viya tattha tattha paharanto osāpetvā uṭṭhāya gacchati.
tika-vin02t:174_5: Purāṇapaṇṇantaresu hi paripātiyamānā godhā kadāci dissati kadāci na dissati,
tika-vin02t:174_6: evamekaccassa atthavaṇṇanā katthaci dissati katthaci na dissati.
tika-vin02t:174_12: yathā nijjhāmataṇhikapetassa mukhato niccharaṇakaaggi kālena jalati kālena nibbāyati,
tika-vin02t:174_17: kenaci rogena nitthunanto viya kandanto viya katheti,
tika-vin02t:174_18: imesaṃ sabbesampi kathā vissaṭṭhā nāma na hoti sukhena appavattabhāvato.
tika-vin02t:174_19: Yo pana suttaṃ āharitvā ācariyehi dinnanaye ṭhito ācariyuggahaṃ amuñcanto yathā ca ācariyā taṃ taṃ suttaṃ saṃvaṇṇesuṃ,
tika-vin02t:174_20: teneva nayena saṃvaṇṇento nātisīghaṃ nātisaṇikantiādinā vuttanayena kathāpabandhaṃ avicchinnaṃ katvā nadīsoto viya pavatteti,
tika-vin02t:175_6: Atthassa viññāpaniyāti ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā bhāsitatthassa viññāpanasamatthatāya atthañāpane sādhanāya.
tika-vin02t:176_8: Vaṭṭabhayena tajjetvāti yobbanamadādimattā bhikkhuniyo saṃsārabhayena tāsetvā.
tika-vin02t:176_10: Bhikkhuniyā methunena bhikkhunīdūsako hotīti bhikkhuniyā kāyasaṃsaggameva vadati.
tika-vin02t:176_11: Sikkhamānāsāmaṇerīsu pana methunenapi bhikkhunīdūsako na hotīti āha “sikkhamānāsāmaṇerīsu methunadhamma”nti.
tika-vin02t:176_12: “Kāsāyavatthavasanāyā”ti vacanato dussīlāsu bhikkhunīsikkhamānāsāmaṇerīsu garudhammaṃ ajjhāpannapubbo paṭikkhittoyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:176_13: Tassā bhikkhuniyā abhāvepi yā yā tassā vacanaṃ assosuṃ,
tika-vin02t:176_14: tā tā tatheva maññantīti āha “mātugāmo hī”tiādi.
tika-vin02t:177_0: Idāni aṭṭha aṅgāni samodhānetvā dassetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin02t:177_1: Imehi pana aṭṭhahaṅgehi asamannāgataṃ ñatticatutthena kammena sammannento dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati,
tika-vin02t:178_3: “Ovadatī”ti vā imassa “vadatī”ti atthe sati sampadānavacanampi yujjati.
tika-vin02t:178_4: Bhikkhūnaṃ santike upasampannā nāma parivattaliṅgā vā pañcasatasākiyāniyo vā.
tika-vin02t:179_1: Āsanaṃ paññapetvāti ettha “sace bhūmi manāpā hoti,
tika-vin02t:179_2: āsanaṃ apaññāpetumpi vaṭṭatī”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:179_4: Sammatassa bhikkhuno santikaṃ pāṭipade ovādatthāya sabbāhi bhikkhunīhi āgantabbato “samaggāttha bhaginiyo”ti
tika-vin02t:179_5: iminā sabbāsaṃ āgamanaṃ pucchatīti āha “sabbā āgatātthā”ti.
tika-vin02t:179_6: Gilānāsu anāgatāsupi gilānānaṃ anāgamanassa anuññātattā āgantuṃ samatthāhi ca sabbāhi āgatattā “samaggāmhayyā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:179_7: Antogāme vātiādīsu yattha pañca aṅgāni bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā vandituṃ na sakkā hoti,
tika-vin02t:179_8: tattha ṭhitāya eva kāyaṃ purato nāmetvā “vandāmi ayyā”ti añjaliṃ paggayha gantumpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:179_9: Antaragharanti katthaci nagaradvārassa bahiindakhīlato paṭṭhāya antogāmo vuccati,
tika-vin02t:179_11: Idha pana “antogāme vā”ti visuṃ vuttattā “antaraghare vā”ti antogehaṃ sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:180_1: mayaṃ bhikkhū ānessāmā”ti vuttavacanaṃ saddahantīhi vasituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:180_2: Na nimantitā hutvā gantukāmāti manussehi nimantitā hutvā gantukāmā na hontīti attho,
tika-vin02t:180_7: Āgatānaṃ santike ovādena vasitabbanti pacchimikāya vassaṃ vasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:180_8: Abhikkhukāvāse vasantiyā āpattīti codanāmukhena sāmaññato āpattippasaṅgaṃ vadati,
tika-vin02t:180_10: Vassacchedaṃ katvā gacchantiyāpi āpattīti vassānupagamamūlaṃ āpattiṃ vadati.
tika-vin02t:180_13: abhikkhukepi āvāse īdisāsu āpadāsu vassaṃ upagantabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:180_17: kāraṇe asati pacchimikāyapi vassaṃ na upagantabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:180_18: Santesu hi bhikkhūsu vassaṃ anupagacchantiyā āpatti.
tika-vin02t:180_19: Tattha gantvā pavāretabbanti ettha apavārentīnaṃ āpattisambhavato.
tika-vin02t:180_21: sakkā ca hoti navamiyaṃ gantvā pavāretuṃ,
tika-vin02t:180_23: Sace pana navamiyaṃ nikkhamitvā sampāpuṇituṃ na sakkā hoti,
tika-vin02t:181_2: ppaccayaṃ rassattañca katvā uposathapucchakanti vuttāti āha “uposathapucchana”nti.
tika-vin02t:181_7: Bhikkhū kadāci kenaci kāraṇena pannarasikaṃ vā cātuddasīuposathaṃ,
tika-vin02t:181_10: tasmiṃyeva bhikkhunīhipi uposatho kātabboti adhippāyena “pakkhassa terasiyaṃyeva gantvā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:181_11: Evaṃ pucchitena bhikkhunā sace cātuddasiyaṃ uposathaṃ karonti,
tika-vin02t:181_16: Pāṭipadadivasato pana paṭṭhāya dhammasavanatthāya gantabbanti pāṭipadadivase ovādaggahaṇatthāya dutiyadivasato
tika-vin02t:181_19: Nirantaraṃ vihāraṃ upasaṅkamiṃsūti yebhuyyena upasaṅkamanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:181_20: Vuttañhetantiādinā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjissāmāti sabbāsaṃyeva bhikkhunīnaṃ upasaṅkamanadīpanatthaṃ pāḷi nidassitā.
tika-vin02t:182_2: Sace pātimokkhuddesakaṃyeva disvā tāhi bhikkhunīhi ovādo yācito bhaveyya,
tika-vin02t:182_4: Uposathagge sannipatite bhikkhusaṅghe pubbakiccavasena “atthi kāci bhikkhuniyo ovādaṃ yācamānā”ti pucchiyamāne
tika-vin02t:182_5: “evaṃ vadehī”ti ovādapaṭiggāhakena vattabbavacanaṃ aññena bhikkhunā kathāpetvā pātimokkhuddesakena vattabbavacanaṃ
tika-vin02t:182_6: attanā vatvā puna sayameva gantvā bhikkhunīnaṃ ārocetabbaṃ,
tika-vin02t:182_7: aññena vā bhikkhunā tasmiṃ divase pātimokkhaṃ uddisāpetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:183_0: Ekā bhikkhunī vāti idaṃ bahūhi bhikkhunupassayehi ekāya eva bhikkhuniyā sāsanapaṭiggahaṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:183_2: Bahūhi bhikkhunupassayehīti antarāmagge vā tasmiṃyeva vā gāme bahūhi bhikkhunupassayehi.
tika-vin02t:183_3: “Bhikkhunisaṅgho ca ayya bhikkhuniyo ca bhikkhunī cā”ti iminā nānāupassayehi sāsanaṃ gahetvā āgatabhikkhuniyā vattabbavacanaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin02t:183_5: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ pana bhikkhunupassaye bhikkhunīnaṃ pamāṇaṃ sallakkhetvā tadanurūpena nayena vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:183_6: Bhikkhusaṅghassa ayyānaṃ ayyassāti idaṃ saṅkhipitvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:184_1: Yattha pana tiṇṇaṃ dvinnaṃ vā vasanaṭṭhāne pātimokkhuddeso natthi,
tika-vin02t:184_2: tatthāpi ñattiṭhapanakena itarena vā bhikkhunā imināva nayena vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:184_3: Ekapuggalenapi uposathadivase ovādayācanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā pāṭipade āgatānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ “natthi kocī”tiādi vattabbameva.
tika-vin02t:184_6: Imaṃ vidhiṃ ajānanto idha bāloti adhippeto.
tika-vin02t:185_1: Adhammakamme adhammakammasaññī vaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ vaggasaññī ovadati,
tika-vin02t:185_2: āpatti pācittiyassātiādīsu vijjamānesupi vaggādibhāvanimittesu dukkaṭesu adhammakammamūlakaṃ pācittiyameva
tika-vin02t:185_3: pāḷiyaṃ sabbattha vuttanti āha “adhammakamme dvinnaṃ navakānaṃ vasena aṭṭhārasa pācittiyānī”ti.
tika-vin02t:185_7: ovādavasena aṭṭhagarudhammabhaṇananti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:188_1: Dutiye kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ sātaccakiriyāyāti pubbabhāgappaṭipattivasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:188_7: Atha vā “appamajjato sikkhato”ti imesaṃ padānaṃ hetuatthatā daṭṭhabbā,
tika-vin02t:188_8: tasmā appamajjanahetu sikkhanahetu ca adhicetasoti attho.
tika-vin02t:188_14: monapathesu sikkhatoti etena tāsaṃ lokuttarasikkhānaṃ pubbabhāgappaṭipadā,
tika-vin02t:188_15: sokā na bhavantītiādīhi sikkhāpāripūriyā ānisaṃsā pakāsitāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:189_1: taṃ kira bahupattaṃ vaṇṇasampannaṃ ativiya sugandhañca hoti.
tika-vin02t:189_5: yathā kokanudasaṅkhātaṃ padumaṃ pāto sūriyuggamanavelāyaṃ phullaṃ vikasitaṃ avītagandhaṃ siyā virocamānaṃ,
tika-vin02t:189_6: evaṃ sarīragandhena guṇagandhena ca sugandhaṃ saradakāle antalikkhe ādiccamiva attano tejasā tapantaṃ
tika-vin02t:190_4: Suddhaṃ pilotikakhaṇḍanti iddhiyā abhisaṅkhataṃ parisuddhaṃ coḷakhaṇḍaṃ.
tika-vin02t:190_5: Tadā kira bhagavā “na sajjhāyaṃ kātuṃ asakkonto mama sāsane abhabbo nāma hoti,
tika-vin02t:190_6: mā soci bhikkhū”ti taṃ bāhāyaṃ gahetvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā iddhiyā pilotikakhaṇḍaṃ abhinimminitvā “handa, bhikkhu,
tika-vin02t:190_7: imaṃ parimajjanto ‘rajoharaṇaṃ rajoharaṇa’nti punappunaṃ sajjhāyaṃ karohī”ti vatvā adāsi tattha pubbekatādhikārattā.
tika-vin02t:191_0: So kira pubbe rājā hutvā nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karonto nalāṭato sede muccante parisuddhena sāṭakena nalāṭaṃ puñchi,
tika-vin02t:191_2: So “imaṃ sarīraṃ nissāya evarūpo parisuddhasāṭako pakatiṃ jahitvā kiliṭṭho jāto,
tika-vin02t:191_6: Saṃvegaṃ paṭilabhitvāti asubhasaññaṃ aniccasaññañca upaṭṭhapento saṃvegaṃ paṭilabhitvā.
tika-vin02t:191_9: attabhāvassa panāyaṃ doso”ti asubhasaññaṃ aniccasaññañca paṭilabhitvā nāmarūpapariggahādinā pañcasu khandhesu
tika-vin02t:191_10: ñāṇaṃ otāretvā kalāpasammasanādikkamena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā udayabbayañāṇādipaapāṭiyā vipassanaṃ anulomagotrabhusamīpaṃ pāpesi.
tika-vin02t:192_0: Ettha ca “adhicetasoti imaṃ obhāsagāthaṃ abhāsī”ti idheva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:193_0: “Rāgo rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati;
tika-vin02t:198_0: “Moho rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati;
tika-vin02t:202_1: Adhicetasoti ca ayaṃ cūḷapanthakattherassa udānagāthāti imissāyeva pāḷiyā āgataṃ.
tika-vin02t:202_2: Theragāthāyaṃ pana cūḷapanthakattherassa udānagāthāsu ayaṃ anāruḷhā,
tika-vin02t:202_4: Evaṃ santepi imissā pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāya ca evamāgatattā cūḷapanthakattherassapi ayaṃ udānagāthā obhāsagāthāvasena ca bhagavatā bhāsitāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:202_6: Abhabbo tvantiādivacanato anukampāvasena saddhivihārikādiṃ saṅghikavihārā nikkaḍḍhāpentassa anāpatti viya dissati.
tika-vin02t:202_7: Abhabbo hi thero sañcicca taṃ kātuṃ,
tika-vin02t:202_8: nikkaḍḍhanasikkhāpade vā apaññatte therena evaṃ katanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:203_1: Ovadantassa pācittiyanti atthaṅgate sūriye garudhammehi vā aññena vā dhammeneva ovadantassa sammatassapi pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin02t:206_5: garudhammehi ovadananti imāni panettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:209_3: “Avaṇṇaṃ kattukāmo ayasaṃ kattukāmo”ti imesaṃ pana vasena “upasampanna”ntiādīsu “upasampannassā”ti vibhattivipariṇāmo
tika-vin02t:209_4: kātabboti imamatthaṃ sandhāya “ujjhāpanake vuttanayenevattho veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:209_5: “Cīvarahetu ovadatī”tiādinā bhaṇantassa ekekasmiṃ vacane niṭṭhite pācittiyaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:209_6: “Upasampannaṃ saṅghena asammata”nti pāḷivacanato “sammatena vā saṅghena vā bhāraṃ katvā ṭhapito”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanato
tika-vin02t:209_7: ca aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgato sammatena vā vippavasitukāmena “yāvāhaṃ āgamissāmi,
tika-vin02t:209_8: tāva te bhāro hotū”ti yācitvā ṭhapito tassābhāvato saṅghena vā tatheva bhāraṃ katvā ṭhapito aṭṭhahi garudhammehi
tika-vin02t:209_9: aññena vā dhammena ovadituṃ labhatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:209_12: pācittiya”nti idaṃ pageva bhāraṃ katvā aṭṭhapitaṃ sandhāya vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:210_2: ovadantaṃ bhaṇatīti ettha āmisahetu ovadantaṃ “āmisahetu ovadatī”ti saññāya evaṃ bhaṇantassa anāpatti,
tika-vin02t:210_4: na āmisahetu ovadantaṃ pana “āmisahetu ovadatī”ti saññāya bhaṇantassapi anāpatti sacittakattā sikkhāpadassa.
tika-vin02t:210_9: avaṇṇakāmatāya evaṃ bhaṇananti imāni panettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:214_1: Chaṭṭhe sace sā bhikkhunī taṃ cīvaraṃ āditova pārupeyya,
tika-vin02t:214_3: tato mahājano passituṃ na labhatīti maññamāno “yathāsaṃhaṭaṃ haritvā nikkhipitvā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin02t:215_5: Vañcetvāti “tava ñātikāyā”ti avatvā “ekissā bhikkhuniyā”ti ettakameva vatvā.
tika-vin02t:215_6: “Ekissā bhikkhuniyā”ti sutvā te aññātikasaññino bhaveyyunti āha “akappiye niyojitattā”ti.
tika-vin02t:215_7: “Idaṃ te mātu cīvara”ntiādīni avatvāpi “idaṃ cīvaraṃ sibbehī”ti suddhacittena sibbāpentassapi anāpatti.
tika-vin02t:216_2: saddena yaṃ cīvaraṃ nivāsetuṃ vā pārupituṃ vā na sakkā hoti,
tika-vin02t:216_7: vuttanayena sibbanaṃ vā sibbāpanaṃ vāti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:219_1: Sattame “pacchā gacchantīnaṃ corā acchindiṃsū”ti ettha “pattacīvara”nti pāṭhasesoti āha “pacchā gacchantīnaṃ pattacīvara”nti.
tika-vin02t:220_1: Dvidhā vuttappakāroti pādagamanavasena pakkhagamanavasena vāti dvidhā vuttappabhedo.
tika-vin02t:220_4: “Gāmantare gāmantare”ti ettha añño gāmo gāmantaranti āha “nikkhamane anāpatti…pe…
tika-vin02t:220_6: “Saṃvidhāyā”ti pāḷiyaṃ avisesena vuttattā “neva pāḷiyā sametī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:220_7: “etthantare saṃvidahitepi bhikkhuno dukkaṭa”nti vuttattā “na sesaaṭṭhakathāya sametī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:220_8: Addhayojanaṃ atikkamantassāti asati gāme addhayojanaṃ atikkamantassa.
tika-vin02t:220_9: Yattha hi addhayojanabbhantare añño gāmo na hoti,
tika-vin02t:220_11: addhayojanabbhantare pana gāme sati gāmantaragaṇanāya eva āpatti.
tika-vin02t:221_7: gāmantarokkamanaṃ vā addhayojanātikkamo vāti imāni panettha pañca aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:221_8: Ekatoupasampannādīhi saddhiṃ gacchantassa pana mātugāmasikkhāpadena āpatti.
tika-vin02t:224_1: Aṭṭhame lokassādamittasanthavavasena kīḷāpurekkhārā saṃvidahitvāti ayaṃ viseso “evamime…pe…
tika-vin02t:224_2: bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ nāvāya kīḷantī”ti iminā “uddhaṃgāminiṃ vā adhogāminiṃ vā”ti iminā ca siddho.
tika-vin02t:225_3: addhayojanagaṇanāyāti ekekapasseneva gamanaṃ sandhāya vuttattā tādisikāya nadiyā majjhena gacchantassa
tika-vin02t:225_6: “Kīḷāpurekkhāratāya bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya nāvaṃ abhiruhantassa nadiyaṃyeva pācittiyassa vuttattā
tika-vin02t:225_9: “Lokassādamittasanthavavasena kīḷāpurekkhārā saṃvidahitvā”ti vacanato keci “imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ akusalacittaṃ lokavajja”nti vadanti,
tika-vin02t:225_11: Kīḷāpurekkhāratāya hi abhiruhitvāpi gāmantarokkamane addhayojanātikkame vā kusalābyākatacittasamaṅgīpi hutvā āpattiṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin02t:225_12: Yadi hi so saṃvegaṃ paṭilabhitvā arahattaṃ vā sacchikareyya,
tika-vin02t:228_2: Ñātakā vā honti pavāritā vāti ettha sacepi bhikkhuno aññātakā appavāritā ca siyuṃ,
tika-vin02t:229_3: Pañca bhojanāni ṭhapetvā sabbattha anāpattīti idaṃ pana iminā sikkhāpadena anāpattidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:229_4: Viññattiyā uppannaṃ paribhuñjantassa hi aññattha vuttanayena dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin02t:229_9: tassa ajjhoharaṇanti imāni panettha pañca aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:232_1: Dasame upanandassa catutthasikkhāpadenāti appaṭicchanne mātugāmena saddhiṃ rahonisajjasikkhāpadaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:232_3: upanandattheraṃ ārabbha paññattesu pana catutthabhāvato “upanandassa catutthasikkhāpadenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:232_4: Catutthasikkhāpadassa vatthuto imassa sikkhāpadassa vatthuno paṭhamaṃ uppannattā idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paṭhamaṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin02t:232_5: Iminā ca sikkhāpadena kevalaṃ bhikkhuniyā eva rahonisajjāya āpatti paññattā,
tika-vin02t:232_6: upari mātugāmena saddhiṃ rahonisajjāya āpatti visuṃ paññattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:237_1: Bhojanavaggassa paṭhamasikkhāpade addhayojanaṃ vā yojanaṃ vā gantuṃ sakkotīti ettha tattakaṃ gantuṃ sakkontassapi
tika-vin02t:237_2: tāvatakaṃ gantvā aladdhabhikkhassa ito bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:237_6: “Ekadivasaṃ bhuñjitabba”nti vacanato pana ekasmiṃ divase punappunaṃ bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti na gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:237_7: Puna ādito paṭṭhāya bhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭatīti iminā paṭhamaṃ bhuttaṭṭhānesu puna ekasmimpi ṭhāne bhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin02t:238_1: “Gacchanto vā āgacchanto vāti idaṃ addhayojanavasena gahetabba”nti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:238_2: Antarāmagge gataṭṭhāneti ekasseva santakaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:238_3: “Āgacchantepi eseva nayo”ti saṅkhepena vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāvento “gantvā paccāgacchanto”tiādimāha.
tika-vin02t:238_4: Āpattiṭṭhāneyeva puna bhuñjantassa anāpatti vattabbāti gamane āgamane ca paṭhamaṃ bhojanaṃ avatvā antarāmagge
tika-vin02t:238_5: ekadivasaṃ gataṭṭhāne ca ekadivasanti punappunaṃ bhojanameva dassitaṃ,
tika-vin02t:238_6: gamanadivase pana āgamanadivase ca “gamissāmi āgamissāmī”ti bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin02t:238_7: Suddhacittena punappunaṃ bhuñjantassapi punappunaṃ bhojane anāpatti.
tika-vin02t:238_8: Aññassatthāya uddisitvā paññattaṃ bhikkhuno gahetumeva na vaṭṭatīti āha “bhikkhūnaṃyeva atthāyā”ti.
tika-vin02t:238_12: anuvasitvā bhojananti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:241_1: Dutiye abhimāreti abhigantvā bhagavato māraṇatthāya niyojite dhanuddhare.
tika-vin02t:241_4: Nanu rājānampi mārāpesīti vacanato idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ ajātasattuno kāle paññattanti siddhaṃ,
tika-vin02t:242_0: “Tena kho pana samayena rañño māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa ñātisālohito ājīvakesu pabbajito hoti.
tika-vin02t:242_1: Atha kho so ājīvako yena rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro tenupasaṅkami,
tika-vin02t:242_2: upasaṅkamitvā rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ seniyaṃ bimbisāraṃ etadavoca…pe…
tika-vin02t:243_1: So kira ājīvako taṃ dānaṃ dento bimbisārakālato paṭṭhāya adāsi,
tika-vin02t:243_2: pacchā ajātasattukāle sikkhāpadapaññattito paṭṭhāya bhikkhū kukkuccāyantā taṃ dānaṃ na paṭiggaṇhiṃsu,
tika-vin02t:243_3: tasmā ādito paṭṭhāya taṃ vatthu dassitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:243_4: “Atha kho so ājīvako bhikkhūnaṃ santike dūtaṃ pāhesī”ti idañca tato pabhuti so ājīvako antarantarā bhikkhū
tika-vin02t:243_5: nimantetvā dānaṃ dento ajātasattukāle sikkhāpade paññatte yaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santike dūtaṃ pāhesi,
tika-vin02t:244_8: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana nānāvidhehi aññarajjehi āgateti rajjānaṃyeva vasena nānappakāratā vuttā.
tika-vin02t:245_1: Imassa sikkhāpadassa viññattiṃ katvā bhuñjanavatthusmiṃ paññattattā viññattito gaṇabhojanaṃ vatthuvaseneva
tika-vin02t:245_3: nimantitā bhuñjantī”ti nimantanavaseneva padabhājane gaṇabhojanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:245_4: “Kiñci pana sikkhāpadaṃ vatthuananurūpampi siyāti padabhājane vuttanayena nimantanavaseneva gaṇabhojanaṃ
tika-vin02t:245_5: hotīti kesañci āsaṅkā bhaveyyā”ti taṃnivattanatthaṃ “taṃ panetaṃ gaṇabhojanaṃ dvīhākārehi pasavatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:245_6: Pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ nāmaṃ gahetvāti ettha “bhojanaṃ gaṇhathāti vuttepi gaṇabhojanaṃ hotiyevā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:245_8: bhuñjathā’ti vutte yasmā kukkuccāyantā na paṭiggaṇhiṃsu,
tika-vin02t:245_9: tasmā ‘bhuñjathā’ti vuttepi gaṇabhojanaṃ na hotiyevā”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:245_10: “Pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā nimantetī”ti vuttattā pana “odanaṃ bhuñjathā”ti vā “bhattaṃ bhuñjathā”ti
tika-vin02t:245_11: vā bhojananāmaṃ gahetvāva vutte gaṇabhojanaṃ hoti,
tika-vin02t:245_13: bhuñjathā”ti etthāpi “odana”nti vā “bhatta”nti vā vatvāva te evaṃ nimantesunti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:245_14: Gaṇavasena vā nimantitattā te bhikkhū apakataññutāya kukkuccāyantā na paṭiggaṇhiṃsūti ayaṃ amhākaṃ khanti,
tika-vin02t:246_0: Ekato gaṇhantīti ettha aññamaññassa dvādasahatthaṃ amuñcitvā ṭhitā ekato gaṇhanti nāmāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:246_1: “Amhākaṃ catunnampi bhattaṃ dehīti vā viññāpeyyu”nti vacanato heṭṭhā “tvaṃ ekassa bhikkhuno bhattaṃ dehi,
tika-vin02t:246_2: tvaṃ dvinnanti evaṃ viññāpetvā”ti vacanato ca attano atthāya aññehi viññattampi sādiyantassa gaṇabhojanaṃ hotiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:246_3: Evaṃ viññattito pasavatīti ettha viññattiyā sati gaṇhantassa ekato hutvā gahaṇe iminā sikkhāpadena āpatti,
tika-vin02t:247_1: Ghaṭṭetīti anuvātaṃ chinditvā hatthena daṇḍakena vā ghaṭṭeti.
tika-vin02t:247_3: Valetīti daṇḍake vā hatthe vā āvaṭṭeti.
tika-vin02t:247_5: purāṇacīvare sūcikammaṃ nāma na hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:247_6: “Catutthe āgate na yāpentīti vacanato sace añño koci āgacchanto natthi,
tika-vin02t:247_7: cattāroyeva ca tattha nisinnā yāpetuṃ na sakkonti,
tika-vin02t:248_3: Gaṇo bhijjatīti gaṇo āpattiṃ na āpajjatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:248_5: bhuñjantī”ti imāya pāḷiyā saṃsandanato “itaresaṃ pana gaṇapūrako hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:248_6: Avisesenāti “gilāno vā cīvarakārako vā”ti avisesetvā sabbasādhāraṇavacanena.
tika-vin02t:248_8: Bhutvā gatesūti ettha agatesupi bhojanakicce niṭṭhite gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:248_9: Tāni ca tehi ekato na gahitānīti yehi bhojanehi visaṅketo natthi,
tika-vin02t:248_10: tāni bhojanāni tehi bhikkhūhi ekato na gahitāni ekena pacchā gahitattā.
tika-vin02t:248_12: Dūtassa puna paṭipathaṃ āgantvā “bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vacanabhayena “gāmadvāre aṭṭhatvāvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:248_13: Tattha tattha gantvāti antaravīthiādīsu tattha tattha ṭhitānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā.
tika-vin02t:248_14: Bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya gharadvāre ṭhapetvā diyyamānepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin02t:248_15: Nivattathāti vuttapade nivattituṃ vaṭṭatīti “nivattathā”ti vicchinditvā pacchā “bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vuttattā vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:251_1: Tatiye kulapaṭipāṭiyā abbocchinnaṃ katvā nirantaraṃ diyyamānattā “bhattapaṭipāṭi aṭṭhitā hotī”ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:251_2: antarā aṭṭhatvā nirantaraṃ pavattāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:252_1: Vikappanāvaseneva taṃ bhattaṃ asantaṃ nāma hotīti anupaññattivasena vikappanaṃ aṭṭhapetvā yathāpaññattaṃ sikkhāpadameva ṭhapitaṃ.
tika-vin02t:252_2: Parivāre pana vikappanāya anujānanampi anupaññattisamānanti katvā “catasso anupaññattiyo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:252_3: Mahāpaccariādīsu vuttanayaṃ pacchā vadanto pāḷiyā saṃsandanato parammukhāvikappanameva patiṭṭhāpesi.
tika-vin02t:252_4: Keci pana “tadā attano santike ṭhapetvā bhagavantaṃ aññassa abhāvato thero sammukhāvikappanaṃ nākāsi,
tika-vin02t:252_5: bhagavatā ca visuṃ sammukhāvikappanā na vuttā,
tika-vin02t:252_7: Teneva mātikāaṭṭhakathāyampi “yo bhikkhu pañcasu sahadhammikesu aññatarassa ‘mayhaṃ bhattapaccāsaṃ tuyhaṃ
tika-vin02t:252_8: dammī’ti vā ‘vikappemī’ti vā evaṃ sammukhā vā ‘itthannāmassa dammī’ti vā ‘vikappemī’ti vā evaṃ parammukhā
tika-vin02t:252_9: vā paṭhamanimantanaṃ avikappetvā pacchā nimantitakule laddhabhikkhato ekasitthampi ajjhoharati,
tika-vin02t:253_1: Pañcahi bhojanehi nimantitassa yena yena paṭhamaṃ nimantito,
tika-vin02t:253_2: tassa tassa bhojanato uppaṭipāṭiyā avikappetvā vā parassa parassa bhojanaṃ paramparabhojananti āha “sace pana mūlanimantanaṃ heṭṭhā hoti,
tika-vin02t:253_5: Hatthaṃ anto pavesetvā sabbaheṭṭhimaṃ gaṇhantassa majjhe ṭhitampi antohatthagataṃ hotīti āha “hatthaṃ pana…pe…
tika-vin02t:253_7: Khīrassa rasassa ca bhattena amissaṃ hutvā upari ṭhitattā “khīraṃ vā rasaṃ vā pivato anāpattī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:254_1: “Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘āpattī’ti vacanena kurundiyaṃ ‘vaṭṭatī’ti vacanaṃ viruddhaṃ viya dissati,
tika-vin02t:254_2: dvinnampi adhippāyo mahāpaccariyaṃ vibhāvito”ti mahāgaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:254_4: “Paramparabhojanaṃ nāma pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarena bhojanena nimantito,
tika-vin02t:254_5: taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññataraṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjati,
tika-vin02t:254_6: etaṃ paramparabhojanaṃ nāmā”ti vuttattā satipi bhikkhācariyāya paṭhamaṃ laddhabhāve “piṇḍāya caritvā laddhabhattaṃ bhuñjati,
tika-vin02t:257_1: Catutthe kāṇāya mātāti kāṇāti laddhanāmāya dārikāya mātā.
tika-vin02t:257_2: Kasmā panesā kāṇā nāma jātāti āha “sā kirassā”tiādi.
tika-vin02t:257_6: tassā ca mātā “kāṇamātā”ti pākaṭā ahosīti evamettha kāraṇaṃ vadanti.
tika-vin02t:258_1: Pūvagaṇanāya pācittiyanti mukhavaṭṭiyā heṭṭhimalekhato upariṭṭhitapūvagaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin02t:258_2: “Dvattipattapūrā paṭiggahetabbā”ti hi vacanato mukhavaṭṭiyā heṭṭhimalekhaṃ anatikkante dve vā tayo vā pattapūre gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:259_2: vuttanti idaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu tathā āgatabhāvamattadīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:259_6: Aññathā “anāpatti dvattipattapūre paṭiggaṇhātī”ti imināva pamāṇayuttaggahaṇe anāpattisiddhito “ñātakānaṃ pavāritāna”nti visuṃ na vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:259_7: Yadi evaṃ “taṃ pāḷiyā na sametī”ti kasmā na vuttanti?
tika-vin02t:259_8: Heṭṭhā tatuttarisikkhāpade vuttanayeneva sakkā viññātunti na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:259_9: Vuttañhi tattha “aṭṭhakathāsu pana ñātakapavāritaṭṭhāne pakatiyāva bahumpi vaṭṭati,
tika-vin02t:259_12: “Apātheyyādiatthāya paṭiyādita”nti saññāya gaṇhantassapi āpattiyeva acittakattā sikkhāpadassa.
tika-vin02t:259_13: Attanoyeva gahaṇatthaṃ “imassa hatthe dehī”ti vacanenapi āpajjanato “vacīkamma”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:262_3: Pavāritāti ettha catūsu pavāraṇāsu yāvadatthapavāraṇā paṭikkhepapavāraṇā ca labbhatīti āha “brāhmaṇena…pe…
tika-vin02t:262_11: vassaṃvutthānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tīhi ṭhānehi pavāretu”nti ayaṃ vassaṃvutthapavāraṇā.
tika-vin02t:262_12: Pakārehi diṭṭhādīhi vāreti saṅghādike bhajāpeti bhatte karoti etāyāti pavāraṇā,
tika-vin02t:262_14: Sā pana yasmā yebhuyyena vassaṃvutthehi kātabbā vuttā,
tika-vin02t:262_18: “aññatra puna pavāraṇāya aññatra niccapavāraṇāyā”ti ca ayaṃ paccayapavāraṇā pavāreti paccaye icchāpeti etāyāti katvā,
tika-vin02t:262_25: Vippakatabhojanatādipañcaṅgasahito bhojanapaṭikkhepoyeva hettha pakārayuttā vāraṇāti pavāraṇā.
tika-vin02t:262_26: “Paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappesi sampavāresī”ti ayaṃ yāvadatthapavāraṇā.
tika-vin02t:263_3: kāre pana vuttepi akataṃ nāma na hotī”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:264_2: Yo hi bhuñjanto parivesakena upanītaṃ bhojanaṃ anicchanto paṭikkhipati,
tika-vin02t:264_3: so tena pavārito paṭikkhepito nāma hoti.
tika-vin02t:264_4: Byañjanaṃ pana anādiyitvā atthamattameva dassetuṃ “katapavāraṇo katapaṭikkhepo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:264_5: Yasmā “asana”nti imināva padena “bhuttāvī”ti imassa attho vutto,
tika-vin02t:264_6: tasmā na tassa kiñci payojanaṃ visuṃ upalabbhati.
tika-vin02t:264_8: pavāraṇā chaḷaṅgasamannāgatā āpajjeyyāti manasi katvā pañcasamannāgatattaṃyeva dassetuṃ “vuttampi ceta”ntiādinā pāḷiṃ āharati.
tika-vin02t:264_9: Keci pana “hatthapāse ṭhito abhiharatī”ti ekameva aṅgaṃ katvā “caturaṅgasamannāgatā pavāraṇā”tipi vadanti.
tika-vin02t:265_4: Pavāraṇaṃ na janetīti anatirittabhojanāpattinibandhanaṃ paṭikkhepaṃ na sādheti.
tika-vin02t:265_5: Katopi paṭikkhepo anatirittabhojanāpattinibandhano na hotīti akataṭṭhāneyeva tiṭṭhatīti āha “pavāraṇaṃ na janetī”ti. “Yāgu-
tika-vin02t:265_6: saddassa pavāraṇajanakayāguyāpi sādhāraṇattā ‘yāguṃ gaṇhathā’ti vuttepi pavāraṇā hotīti pavāraṇaṃ janetiyevāti vutta”nti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:265_7: taṃ parato tattheva “bhattamissakaṃ yāguṃ āharitvā”ti ettha vuttakāraṇena na sameti.
tika-vin02t:265_8: Vuttañhi tattha “heṭṭhā ayāguke nimantane udakakañjikakhīrādīhi saddhiṃ madditaṃ bhattameva sandhāya ‘yāguṃ gaṇhathā’ti vuttattā pavāraṇā hoti,
tika-vin02t:265_9: ‘bhattamissakaṃ yāguṃ āharitvā’ti ettha pana visuṃ yāguyā vijjamānattā pavāraṇā na hotī”ti.
tika-vin02t:265_10: Tasmā tattha vuttanayeneva khīrādīhi saṃmadditaṃ bhattameva sandhāya “yāguṃ gaṇhathā”ti vuttattā yāguyā
tika-vin02t:265_11: ca tattha abhāvato pavāraṇā hotīti evamettha kāraṇaṃ vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:265_16: paññāyatīti iminā vuttappamāṇassa macchamaṃsakhaṇḍassa nahāruno vā sabbhāvamattaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin02t:266_1: satta dhaññāni pana bhajjitvā katopi sattuyeva.
tika-vin02t:266_4: Sattumodakoti sattuyo piṇḍetvā kato apakko sattuguḷo.
tika-vin02t:266_5: Pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññataravasena vippakatabhojanabhāvassa upacchinnattā “mukhe sāsapamattampi…pe…
tika-vin02t:266_8: na pavāretī”ti vacanato sace saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ attano apāpuṇantaṃ jānitvā vā ajānitvā vā paṭikkhipati,
