tika-vin02t:266_14: tassa paṭikkhepo āpattiaṅgaṃ na hotīti taṃ “pavāraṇāya avatthū”ti vuccati.
tika-vin02t:267_1: Hatthapāsato bahi ṭhitassa satipi dātukāmābhihāre paṭikkhipantassa dūrabhāveneva pavāraṇāya abhāvato
tika-vin02t:267_2: therassapi dūrabhāvamattaṃ gahetvā pavāraṇāya abhāvaṃ dassento “therassa dūrabhāvato”ti āha,
tika-vin02t:267_4: Sacepi gahetvā gato hatthapāse ṭhito hoti,
tika-vin02t:267_5: kiñci pana avatvā ādhārakaṭṭhāne ṭhitattā abhihāro nāma na hotīti “dūtassa ca anabhiharaṇato”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:267_6: “Gahetvā gatena ‘bhattaṃ gaṇhathā’ti vutte abhihāro nāma hotīti ‘sace pana gahetvā āgato bhikkhu…pe…
tika-vin02t:267_7: pavāraṇā hotī’ti vutta”nti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:267_8: Keci pana “pattaṃ kiñci upanāmetvā ‘imaṃ bhattaṃ gaṇhathā’ti vuttanti gahetabba”nti vadanti,
tika-vin02t:267_9: taṃ yuttaṃ viya dissati vācābhihārassa idha anadhippetattā.
tika-vin02t:268_2: Tato dātukāmatāya gaṇhantaṃ paṭikkhipantassa pavāraṇā hotīti ettha agaṇhantampi paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā hotiyeva. Kasmā?
tika-vin02t:268_5: Teneva tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu “dātukāmābhihāre sati kevalaṃ ‘dassāmī’ti gahaṇameva abhihāro nāma na hoti,
tika-vin02t:268_6: ‘dassāmī’ti gaṇhantepi agaṇhantepi dātukāmābhihārova abhihāro nāma hoti,
tika-vin02t:268_7: tasmā gahaṇasamaye vā aggahaṇasamaye vā taṃ paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:268_8: Idāni asati tassa dātukāmābhihāre gahaṇasamayepi paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā na hotīti dassetuṃ “sace panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:269_0: “Rasaṃ gaṇhathā”ti apavāraṇajanakassa nāmaṃ gahetvā vuttattā “taṃ sutvā paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā natthī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:269_1: Maccharasaṃ maṃsarasanti ettha pana na kevalaṃ macchassa rasaṃ maccharasamicceva viññāyati,
tika-vin02t:269_2: atha kho maccho ca maccharasañca maccharasanti evaṃ pavāraṇajanakasādhāraṇanāmavasenapi viññāyamānattā taṃ paṭikkhipato pavāraṇāva hoti.
tika-vin02t:269_4: “Idaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vuttepīti ettha evaṃ avatvāpi pavāraṇapahonakaṃ yaṃkiñci abhihaṭaṃ paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā hotiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:269_8: So sacepi maṃsena missetvā katova hoti,
tika-vin02t:269_9: “karambakaṃ gaṇhathā”ti apavāraṇārahassa nāmena vuttattā paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā na hoti.
tika-vin02t:269_10: “Maṃsakarambakaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vutte pana maṃsamissakaṃ gaṇhathāti vuttaṃ hoti,
tika-vin02t:270_0: “Uddissakata”nti maññamānoti ettha “vatthuno kappiyattā akappiyasaññāya paṭikkhipatopi acittakattā imassa sikkhāpadassa pavāraṇā hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:270_1: “Heṭṭhā ayāguke nimantane udakakañjikakhīrādīhi saddhiṃ madditaṃ bhattameva sandhāya ‘yāguṃ gaṇhathā’ti vuttattā pavāraṇā hoti,
tika-vin02t:270_2: ‘bhattamissakaṃ yāguṃ āharitvā’ti ettha pana visuṃ yāguyā vijjamānattā pavāraṇā na hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:270_4: Kāraṇaṃ panettha duddasanti ettha eke tāva vadanti “yasmā yāgumissakaṃ nāma bhattameva na hoti,
tika-vin02t:270_6: tasmā karambake viya pavāraṇāya na bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:270_7: Evañca sati yāgu bahutarā vā hoti samasamā vā,
tika-vin02t:270_13: tasmā taṃ paṭikkhipato pavāraṇāya eva bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:270_14: Evañca sati ‘idha pavāraṇā hoti na hotī’ti ettha kāraṇaṃ duddasa”nti.
tika-vin02t:271_1: evaṃ parato “missakaṃ gaṇhathā”ti etthāpi kāraṇaṃ duddasamevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:271_2: Na hi pavāraṇappahonakassa appabahubhāvo pavāraṇāya bhāvābhāvanimittaṃ,
tika-vin02t:271_4: tasmā “idañca karambakena na samānetabba”ntiādinā yampi kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:271_5: tampi pubbe vuttena saṃsandiyamānaṃ na sameti.
tika-vin02t:271_7: evaṃ sati yathā “bhattamissakaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vutte bhattaṃ bahutaraṃ vā samaṃ vā appataraṃ vā hoti,
tika-vin02t:271_9: evaṃ “missakaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vuttepi appatarepi bhatte pavāraṇāya bhavitabbaṃ missakanti bhattamissakeyeva ruḷhattā.
tika-vin02t:271_10: Tathā hi “missakanti bhattamissakeyeva ruḷhavohārattā idaṃ pana ‘bhattamissakamevā’ti vutta”nti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:271_13: Evampi yathā ayāguke nimantane khīrādīhi saddhiṃ madditaṃ bhattameva sandhāya “yāguṃ gaṇhathā”ti vutte pavāraṇā hoti,
tika-vin02t:271_14: evamidhāpi missakabhattameva sandhāya “missakaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vutte bhattaṃ appaṃ vā hotu bahu vā,
tika-vin02t:271_16: Tasmā “missaka”nti bhattamissake ruḷhaṃ vā hotu sandhāyabhāsitaṃ vā,
tika-vin02t:271_17: ubhayatthāpi pubbenāparaṃ na sametīti kimettha kāraṇacintāya,
tika-vin02t:271_18: īdisesu pana ṭhānesu aṭṭhakathāpamāṇeneva gantabbanti ayaṃ amhākaṃ khanti.
tika-vin02t:272_0: “Visuṃ katvā detīti bhattassa upari ṭhitaṃ rasādiṃ visuṃ gahetvā detī”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:272_2: tathā gāḷhaṃ hatthena pīḷetvā parissāvetvā detī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:272_4: Yathā hi bhattamissakaṃ yāguṃ āharitvā “yāguṃ gaṇhathā”ti vatvā yāgumissakaṃ bhattampi dentaṃ paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā na hoti,
tika-vin02t:272_5: evamidhāpi bahukhīrarasādīsu bhattesu “khīraṃ gaṇhathā”tiādīni vatvā khīrādīni vā detu khīrādimissakabhattaṃ vā,
tika-vin02t:272_7: tasmā “visuṃ katvā detī”ti tenākārena dentaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:272_8: na pana bhattamissakaṃ katvā diyyamānaṃ paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā hotīti dassanatthanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:272_9: Yadi pana bhattamissakaṃ katvā diyyamāne pavāraṇā hotīti adhippāyena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “visuṃ katvā detī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:273_0: Sace ukkuṭikaṃ nisinno pāde amuñcitvāpi bhūmiyaṃ nisīdati,
tika-vin02t:273_1: iriyāpathaṃ vikopento nāma hotīti ukkuṭikāsanaṃ avikopetvāva sukhena nisīdituṃ “tassa pana heṭṭhā…pe…
tika-vin02t:273_5: adinnādāne viya ṭhānācāvanaṃ na gahetabba”nti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:274_0: Akappiyakatanti ettha akappiyakatasseva anatirittabhāvato kappiyaṃ akārāpetvā tasmiṃ patte pakkhittamūlaphalādiyeva atirittaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin02t:274_3: Taṃ pana mūlaphalādiṃ paribhuñjitukāmena tato nīharitvā kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā aññasmiṃ bhājane ṭhapetvā atirittaṃ kārāpetvā bhuñjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:275_0: So puna kātuṃ na labhatīti tasmiṃyeva bhājane kariyamānaṃ paṭhamaṃ katena saddhiṃ kataṃ hotīti puna soyeva kātuṃ na labhati,
tika-vin02t:275_2: Aññasmiṃ pana bhājane tena vā aññena vā kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:275_8: saddo na kevalaṃ aññena vāti imamatthaṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin02t:275_11: Imassa vinayakammabhāvato “anupasampannassa hatthe ṭhitaṃ na kāretabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:276_0: Sace pana āmisasaṃsaṭṭhānīti ettha sace mukhagatenapi anatirittena āmisena saṃsaṭṭhāni honti,
tika-vin02t:276_2: Tasmā pavāritena bhojanaṃ atirittaṃ kārāpetvā bhuñjantenapi yathā akatena missaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin02t:276_3: evaṃ mukhañca hatthañca suddhaṃ katvā bhuñjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:276_4: Kiñcāpi appavāritassa purebhattaṃ yāmakālikādīni āhāratthāya paribhuñjatopi anāpatti,
tika-vin02t:277_1: Kāyena bhuñjanato vācāya āṇāpetvā atirittaṃ akārāpanato ca āpajjatīti “kāyavācato”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:277_5: kāle ajjhoharaṇanti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:280_1: Chaṭṭhe sādhāraṇamevāti “handa bhikkhu khāda vā”tiādinā vuttapavāraṇāya sādhāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin02t:280_5: āpatti pācittiyassāti idañca bhojanapariyosānaṃyeva sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:283_2: Taṃ kira pabbatamatthake ṭhatvā ekaṃ devataṃ uddissa karonti.
tika-vin02t:284_2: Na hi tāni pariyāyantarena vuccamānānipi sakkā viññātuṃ.
tika-vin02t:284_3: Pariyāyantarepi hi vuccamāne taṃ taṃ nāmaṃ ajānantānaṃ sammohoyeva siyā,
tika-vin02t:284_7: Tesu tesu janapadesūti ettha “ekasmiṃ janapade āhārakiccaṃ sādhentaṃ sesajanapadesupi na kappatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:284_11: Tesampi nāmavasena na sakkā pariyantaṃ dassetunti sambandho.
tika-vin02t:284_12: Acchivādīnaṃ aparipakkāneva phalāni yāvajīvikānīti dassetuṃ “aparipakkānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:285_0: Harītakādīnaṃ aṭṭhīnīti ettha miñjaṃ paṭicchādetvā ṭhitakapālāni yāvajīvikānīti ācariyā.
tika-vin02t:285_4: Tattha hiṅgujatu nāma hiṅgurukkhassa daṇḍapattāni pacitvā kataniyyāso,
tika-vin02t:288_2: Yaṃkiñci yāvakālikaṃ vā yāmakālikaṃ vāti ettha “yāmakālika”nti iminā na kevalaṃ yāvakālike eva sannidhipaccayā pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin02t:288_4: Nanu ca yāmakālikaṃ neva khādanīyesu antogadhaṃ,
tika-vin02t:288_6: Teneva padabhājanīye “khādanīyaṃ nāma pañca bhojanāni yāmakālikaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ khādanīyaṃ nāma.
tika-vin02t:288_8: “yo pana bhikkhu sannidhikārakaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā,
tika-vin02t:288_10: tasmā yāmakālike pācittiyena bhavitabbanti kathaṃ viññāyatīti? Vuccate –
tika-vin02t:288_15: na ca yāmakālikesu kiñci khāditabbaṃ atthi pātabyabhāvato.
tika-vin02t:288_16: Tasmā kiñcāpi yāmakālikaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyehi na saṅgahitaṃ,
tika-vin02t:288_17: tathāpi anāpattiṃ dassentena “anāpatti yāmakālikaṃ yāme nidahitvā bhuñjatī”ti vacanato yāmātikkame sannidhipaccayā
tika-vin02t:288_22: yāmātikkante na kappatī”ti imināpi cāyamattho siddho.
tika-vin02t:288_23: Teneva bhagavato adhippāyaññūhi aṭṭhakathācariyehi yāmakālike pācittiyameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:289_7: Telavaṇṇe patte satipi nisnehabhāve aṅguliyā ghaṃsantassa vaṇṇavaseneva lekhā paññāyati,
tika-vin02t:289_8: tasmā tattha anāpattīti dassanatthaṃ “sā abbohārikā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:289_9: Sayaṃ paṭiggahetvā apariccattameva hi dutiyadivase na vaṭṭatīti ettha paṭiggahaṇe anapekkhavissajjanena
tika-vin02t:289_10: anupasampannassa nirapekkhadānena vā vijahitapaṭiggahaṇaṃ pariccattameva hotīti “apariccatta”nti iminā
tika-vin02t:289_12: Tasmā yaṃ parassa pariccajitvā adinnampi sace paṭiggahaṇe nirapekkhavissajjanena vijahitapaṭiggahaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin02t:290_0: Yadi evaṃ “patto duddhoto hotī”tiādīsu kasmā āpatti vuttāti?
tika-vin02t:290_1: “Paṭiggahaṇaṃ avissajjetvāva sayaṃ vā aññena vā tucchaṃ katvā na sammā dhovitvā niṭṭhāpite patte laggampi
tika-vin02t:290_2: avijahitapaṭiggahaṇameva hotīti tattha āpattī”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:290_3: Keci pana “sāmaṇerānaṃ pariccajantīti imasmiṃ adhikāre ṭhatvā ‘apariccattamevā’ti vuttattā anupasampannassa pariccattameva vaṭṭati,
tika-vin02t:290_5: tasmā nirālayabhāvena paṭiggahaṇe vijahitepi anupasampannassa apariccattaṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin02t:290_8: tadaggena sannidhimpi na karoti vijahitapaṭiggahaṇassa appaṭiggahitasadisattā.
tika-vin02t:290_9: Paṭiggahetvā nidahiteyeva ca sannidhipaccayā āpatti vuttā.
tika-vin02t:291_1: āpatti dukkaṭassā”tiādinā sannihitesu sattāhakālikayāvajīvikesu purebhattampi āhāratthāya ajjhoharaṇepi
tika-vin02t:291_2: dukkaṭassa vuttattā yāmakālikepi āhāratthāya ajjhoharaṇe visuṃ dukkaṭenapi bhavitabbanti āha “āhāratthāya
tika-vin02t:291_5: Yāmakālikaṃ sati paccaye sāmisena mukhena ajjhoharato dveti hiyyo paṭiggahitayāmakālikaṃ ajja purebhattaṃ
tika-vin02t:291_6: sāmisena mukhena bhuñjato sannihitayāmakālikapaccayā ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin02t:291_9: Dukkaṭaṃ vaḍḍhatīti āhāratthāya ajjhoharaṇapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ vaḍḍhati.
tika-vin02t:292_1: Paṭiggahaṇapaccayā tāva dukkaṭanti ettha sannihitattā purebhattampi dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin02t:292_2: Sati paccaye pana sannihitampi sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ bhesajjatthāya gaṇhantassa paribhuñjantassa ca anāpattiyeva.
tika-vin02t:292_6: tassa ajjhoharaṇanti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:295_10: Na hi akappiyamaṃsasattānaṃ sappiādīni na kappanti.
tika-vin02t:295_11: Ekañhi manussavasātelaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbesaṃ khīrasappinavanītavasātelesu akappiyaṃ nāma natthi.
tika-vin02t:295_12: Sappibhattanti ettha kiñcāpi sappisaṃsaṭṭhaṃ bhattaṃ sappibhattaṃ,
tika-vin02t:295_14: aṭṭhakathāsu pana “sālibhattaṃ viya sappibhattaṃ nāma natthī”ti kāraṇaṃ vatvā dukkaṭasseva daḷhataraṃ katvā vuttattā na sakkā aññaṃ vattuṃ.
tika-vin02t:295_15: Aṭṭhakathācariyā eva hi īdisesu ṭhānesu pamāṇaṃ.
tika-vin02t:296_5: Kappiyasappinā akappiyasappināti ca idaṃ kappiyākappiyamaṃsānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:296_6: tasmā kappiyamaṃsasappinā akappiyamaṃsasappināti evamettha attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin02t:298_0: “Agilānena bhikkhunā catumāsapaccayapavāraṇā sāditabbā aññatra punapavāraṇāya aññatra niccapavāraṇāya,
tika-vin02t:299_1: Iminā ca sikkhāpadena saṅghavasena gilānapaccayapavāraṇāya pavāritaṭṭhāne sace tattha rattīhi vā bhesajjehi vā paricchedo kato hoti,
tika-vin02t:299_2: ettakāyeva rattiyo ettakāni vā bhesajjāni viññāpetabbānīti.
tika-vin02t:299_3: Atha tato rattipariyantato vā bhesajjapariyantato vā uttari na bhesajjakaraṇīyena vā bhesajjaṃ aññabhesajjakaraṇīyena
tika-vin02t:299_4: vā aññaṃ bhesajjaṃ viññāpentassa pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:299_5: Tasmā agilāno gilānasaññī hutvā pañca bhesajjāni viññāpento na bhesajjakaraṇīyena bhesajjaṃ viññāpento
tika-vin02t:299_7: Etāni pāṭidesanīyavatthūnīti pāḷiyaṃ āgatasappiādīni sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:299_8: Pāḷiyaṃ anāgatāni pana akappiyasappiādīni bhikkhunīnampi dukkaṭavatthūnīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:299_9: Sūpodanaviññattiyanti bhikkhūnaṃ pācittiyavatthūni bhikkhunīnaṃ pāṭidesanīyavatthūni ca ṭhapetvā avasesaviññattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:302_2: Ummāreti susāne katagehassa attano gehassa vā ummāre.
tika-vin02t:303_4: Mukhena vā paviṭṭhaṃ hotu nāsikāya vā,
tika-vin02t:303_5: galena ajjhoharaṇīyattā sabbampi taṃ mukhadvāraṃ pavesitameva hoti.
tika-vin02t:303_6: Yasmā pana te bhikkhū anāhārepi udake āhārasaññāya dantapone ca mukhadvāraṃ āhaṭaṃ idanti saññāya kukkuccāyiṃsu,
tika-vin02t:303_9: Udakañhi yathāsukhaṃ pātuṃ dantakaṭṭhañca dantaponaparibhogena paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin02t:303_10: tassa pana rasaṃ gilituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:303_13: Anajjhoharantena pana dantakaṭṭhaṃ vā hotu aññaṃ vā,
tika-vin02t:304_1: Akallakoti gilāno sahatthā paribhuñjituṃ asakkonto mukhena paṭiggaṇhāti.
tika-vin02t:304_6: Sacepi bhūmiyaṃ ṭhitameva ghaṭaṃ dāyakena hatthapāse ṭhatvā ghaṭaṃ dassāmīti dinnaveṇukoṭiggahaṇavasena paṭiggaṇhāti,
tika-vin02t:304_8: Bhikkhussa atthāya apīḷetvā pakatiyā pīḷiyamānaucchurasaṃ sandhāya “gaṇhathā”ti vuttattā “abhihāro na paññāyatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:304_9: Hatthapāse ṭhitassa pana bhikkhussa atthāya pīḷiyamānā ucchuto paggharantaṃ rasaṃ gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin02t:304_10: doṇikāya sayaṃ paggharantaṃ ucchurasaṃ majjhe āvaritvā āvaritvā vissajjitampi gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:305_3: tasmā puñchitvā gahetvāti evamattho gahetabbo”ti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:305_4: Puñchitvā paṭiggahetvā vāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin02t:305_5: Patte patitarajanacuṇṇañhi abbhantaraparibhogatthāya aparihaṭabhāvato paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:305_8: Yasmā pana taṃ “aññassa dassāmī”ti cittuppādamattena parasantakaṃ nāma na hoti,
tika-vin02t:305_9: tasmā tassa adatvāpi paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:306_1: Kañjikanti khīrarasādiṃ yaṃkiñci dravaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:306_6: Āharitvā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapitattā abhihāro natthīti āha “patto paṭiggahetabbo”ti.
tika-vin02t:306_7: Paṭhamataraṃ uḷuṅkato thevā patte patantīti ettha “yathā paṭhamataraṃ patitatheve doso natthi,
tika-vin02t:306_8: tathā ākiritvā apanentānaṃ pacchā patitathevepi abhihaṭattā nevatthi doso”ti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:306_10: Mukhavaṭṭiyāpi gahetuṃ vaṭṭatīti mukhavaṭṭiṃ ukkhipitvā hatthe phusāpite gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:306_12: Esa nayoti kāyapaṭibaddhapaṭibaddhampi kāyapaṭibaddhamevāti ayaṃ nayo.
tika-vin02t:306_13: Tathā ca tattha kāyapaṭibaddhe taṃpaṭibaddhe ca thullaccayameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:307_0: Tenāti yassa bhikkhuno santikaṃ gataṃ, tena.
tika-vin02t:307_1: Tasmāti yasmā mūlaṭṭhasseva paribhogo anuññāto, tasmā.
tika-vin02t:307_2: Taṃ divasaṃ hatthena gahetvā dutiyadivase paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjantassa uggahitakapaṭiggahitaṃ hotīti āha “anāmasitvā”ti.
tika-vin02t:307_4: Appaṭiggahetvā paribhuñjantassa adinnamukhadvārāpatti hotīti āha “paṭiggahetvā pana paribhuñjitabba”nti.
tika-vin02t:307_6: na tato para”nti vacanato taṃ divasaṃ hatthena gahetvā vā aggahetvā vā ṭhapitaṃ dutiyadivase appaṭiggahetvā
tika-vin02t:307_8: hatthena gahetvā ṭhapitaṃ dutiyadivase paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjantassa pana uggahitakapaṭiggahitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:307_10: “Sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjitu”nti hi vacanato appaṭiggahitasseva tasmiṃ divase paribhogo anuññāto.
tika-vin02t:307_11: Tasmā yaṃ vuttaṃ gaṇṭhipade “taṃ diyyamānaṃ patatīti ettha yathā gaṇabhojanādīsu gilānādīnaṃ kukkuccāyantānaṃ gaṇabhojanaṃ anuññātaṃ,
tika-vin02t:307_14: “Taṃ diyyamānaṃ patatī”ti avisesena vuttattā catūsupi kālikesu ayaṃ nayo veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:308_1: Kasmā panettha uggahitapaccayā sannidhipaccayā vā doso na siyāti āha “na hi taṃ paribhogatthāya pariharantī”ti.
tika-vin02t:308_2: Imināva bāhiraparibhogatthaṃ sāmaṃ gahetvā anupasampannena dinnaṃ vā gahetvā pariharituṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpeti.
tika-vin02t:308_3: Tasmā pattasammakkhanādiatthaṃ sāmaṃ gahetvā parihaṭatelādiṃ sace paribhuñjitukāmo hoti,
tika-vin02t:308_5: Abbhantaraparibhogatthaṃ pana sāmaṃ gahitaṃ paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjantassa uggahitakapaṭiggahitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin02t:308_7: abbhantaraparibhogatthameva anupasampannena dinnaṃ gahetvā pariharantassa siṅgīloṇakappo viya sannidhipaccayā āpatti hoti.
tika-vin02t:308_8: Keci pana “thāmamajjhimassa purisassa uccāraṇamattaṃ hotītiādinā vuttapañcaṅgasampattiyā paṭiggahaṇassa
tika-vin02t:308_9: ruhanato bāhiraparibhogatthampi sace anupasampannena dinnaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-vin02t:308_11: Evaṃ sati idha bāhiraparibhogatthaṃ anupasampannena dinnaṃ gahetvā pariharantassa sannidhipaccayā āpatti vattabbā siyā,
tika-vin02t:308_12: “na hi taṃ paribhogatthāya pariharantī”ti ca na vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin02t:308_13: tasmā bāhiraparibhogatthaṃ gahitaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ nāma na hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:308_14: Yadi evaṃ pañcasu paṭiggahaṇaṅgesu “paribhogatthāyā”ti visesanaṃ vattabbanti?
tika-vin02t:308_16: Paṭiggahaṇañhi paribhogatthameva hotīti “paribhogatthāyā”ti visuṃ avatvā “tañce bhikkhu kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena
tika-vin02t:308_18: Apare pana “satipi paṭiggahaṇe ‘na hi taṃ paribhogatthāya pariharantī’ti idha aparibhogatthāya pariharaṇe anāpatti vuttā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:308_19: Udukkhalamusalāni khiyyantīti ettha udukkhalamusalānaṃ khayena pisitakoṭṭitabhesajjesu sace āgantukavaṇṇo paññāyati,
tika-vin02t:309_0: Suddhaṃ udakaṃ hotīti rukkhasākhādīhi gaḷitvā patanaudakaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:309_1: Patto vāssa paṭiggahetabboti etthāpi pattagataṃ chupitvā dentassa hatthalaggena āmisena dosābhāvatthaṃ
tika-vin02t:309_4: paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vijahatīti ettha punappunaṃ gaṇhantassa attano patte pakkhittameva “attano santaka”nti
tika-vin02t:309_6: paricchinditvā dinnaṃ pana gaṇhantassa gahaṇasamayeyeva “attano santaka”nti sanniṭṭhānassa katattā hatthagataṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahati.
tika-vin02t:309_7: Kesañci atthāya odanaṃ pakkhipatīti ettha anupasampannassa atthāya pakkhipantepi “āgantvā gaṇhissatī”ti
tika-vin02t:309_8: sayameva pakkhipitvā ṭhapanato paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vijahati,
tika-vin02t:309_9: anupasampannassa hatthe pakkhittaṃ pana anupasampanneneva ṭhapitaṃ nāma hotīti paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahati pariccattabhāvato.
tika-vin02t:310_0: Paṭiggahaṇūpagaṃ bhāraṃ nāma thāmamajjhimassa purisassa ukkhepārahaṃ.
tika-vin02t:310_1: Kiñcāpi avissajjetvāva aññena hatthena pidahantassa doso natthi,
tika-vin02t:310_3: Macchikavāraṇatthanti ettha “sacepi sākhāya laggarajaṃ patte patati,
tika-vin02t:310_4: sukhena paribhuñjituṃ sakkāti sākhāya paṭiggahitattā abbhantaraparibhogatthamevidha paṭiggahaṇanti mūlapaṭiggahaṇameva vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:310_5: Apare pana “macchikavāraṇatthanti ettha vacanamattaṃ gahetvā bāhiraparibhogatthaṃ gahita”nti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:310_6: Tasmimpi asatīti cāṭiyā vā kuṇḍake vā asati.
tika-vin02t:310_7: Anupasampannaṃ gāhāpetvāti taṃyeva ajjhoharaṇīyabhaṇḍaṃ anupasampannena gāhāpetvā.
tika-vin02t:310_8: Therassa pattaṃ anutherassāti therassa pattaṃ attanā gahetvā anutherassa deti.
tika-vin02t:310_9: Tuyhaṃ yāguṃ mayhaṃ dehīti ettha evaṃ vatvā sāmaṇerassa pattaṃ gahetvā attanopi pattaṃ tassa deti.
tika-vin02t:310_11: Kāraṇaṃ upaparikkhitabbanti yathā mātuādīnaṃ telādīni haranto tathārūpe kicce anupasampannena aparivattetvāva paribhuñjituṃ labhati,
tika-vin02t:310_12: evamidha pattaparivattanaṃ akatvā paribhuñjituṃ na labhatīti ettha kāraṇaṃ vīmaṃsitabbanti attho.
tika-vin02t:311_0: Ettha pana “sāmaṇerehi gahitataṇḍulesu parikkhīṇesu avassaṃ amhākaṃ sāmaṇerā saṅgahaṃ karontīti vitakkuppatti sambhavati,
tika-vin02t:311_2: Mātāpitūnaṃ atthāya pana chāyatthāya vā gahaṇe paribhogāsā natthi,
tika-vin02t:315_0: Tassa sālayabhāvaṃ tu, visesaṃ takkayāma ta”nti.
tika-vin02t:316_1: Na sakkā hi ettha vitakkaṃ sodhetunti.
tika-vin02t:316_2: Mātādīnaṃ atthāya haraṇe pana nāvassaṃ tathāvidhavitakkuppattīti sakkā vitakkaṃ sodhetuṃ.
tika-vin02t:316_5: Teneva vakkhati “sace pana sakkoti vitakkaṃ sodhetuṃ,
tika-vin02t:317_0: Niccāletuṃ na sakkotīti niccāletvā sakkharā apanetuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-vin02t:317_1: Ādhārake patto ṭhapito hotīti paṭiggahetabbapattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:317_3: Satipi kāraṇe bhikkhūnaṃ paribhogārahaṃ cāletuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:317_6: amanussikābādhe āmakamaṃsaṃ āmakalohita”nti tādise ābādhe attano atthāya āmakamaṃsapaṭiggahaṇaṃ anuññātaṃ,
tika-vin02t:317_8: tathāpi attano aññassa vā bhikkhuno atthāya aggahitattā “sīhavighāsādiṃ…pe…
tika-vin02t:317_10: Sakkoti vitakkaṃ sodhetunti mayhampi detīti vitakkassa anuppannabhāvaṃ sallakkhetuṃ sakkoti,
tika-vin02t:317_11: sāmaṇerassa dassāmīti suddhacittena mayā gahitanti vā sallakkhetuṃ sakkoti.
tika-vin02t:318_0: Sace pana mūlepi paṭiggahitaṃ hotīti ettha “gahetvā gate mayhampi dadeyyunti saññāya sace paṭiggahitaṃ hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:318_1: Koṭṭhāse karotīti bhikkhusāmaṇerā ca attano attano abhirucitaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ gaṇhantūti sabbesaṃ samake koṭṭhāse karoti.
tika-vin02t:318_4: Idha gahitāvasesaṃ nāma tena gaṇhitvā puna ṭhapitaṃ.
tika-vin02t:318_7: Sace pana purimadivase paṭiggahetvā ṭhapitā hoti,
tika-vin02t:318_8: sāmisena mukhena tassā vaṭṭiyā dhūmaṃ pivituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:318_10: Yasmā katakaṭṭhi udakaṃ pasādetvā visuṃ tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin02t:318_12: Laggatīti mukhe hatthe ca udake sukkhe setavaṇṇaṃ dassentaṃ laggati.
tika-vin02t:318_14: Sace pana pītāvasesaṃ tattheva ākirissāmīti gaṇhāti,
tika-vin02t:319_4: Alladāruṃ rukkhato chinditvāpi kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti ettha mattikatthāya pathaviṃ khaṇitumpi vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:319_5: Sappadaṭṭhakkhaṇeyeva vaṭṭatīti asati kappiyakārake sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin02t:324_4: Sace titthiyo vadatīti “paṭhamameva maṃ sandhāya abhiharitvā ṭhapitaṃ mayhaṃ santakaṃ hoti,
tika-vin02t:324_9: ajjhoharaṇatthāya sahatthā anikkhittabhājane dānanti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:327_4: evaṃ uyyojentassa upacārātikkamoti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:330_2: Khuddakaṃ nāma sayanigharaṃ vitthārato pañcahatthappamāṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin02t:330_3: tassa ca majjhimaṭṭhānaṃ piṭṭhasaṅghāṭato aḍḍhateyyahatthappamāṇameva hoti,
tika-vin02t:330_4: tasmā tādise sayanighare piṭṭhasaṅghāṭato hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā nisinno piṭṭhivaṃsaṃ atikkamitvā nisinno nāma hoti.
tika-vin02t:330_5: Evaṃ nisinno ca majjhaṃ atikkamitvā nisinno nāma hotīti āha “iminā majjhātikkamaṃ dassetī”ti.
tika-vin02t:330_6: Yathā vā tathā vā katassāti piṭṭhivaṃsaṃ āropetvā vā anāropetvā vā katassa.
tika-vin02t:330_12: anupakhajja nisīdananti imāni panettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:334_1: Chaṭṭhe pakativacanenāti ettha yaṃ dvādasahatthabbhantare ṭhitena sotuṃ sakkā bhaveyya,
tika-vin02t:334_3: Āpucchitabboti “ahaṃ itthannāmassa gharaṃ gacchāmī”ti vā “cārittaṃ āpajjāmī”ti vā īdisena vacanena āpucchitabbo.
tika-vin02t:334_9: samayassa vā āpadānaṃ vā abhāvoti imāni panettha pañca aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:337_1: Sattame mahānāmo nāmāti anuruddhattherassa bhātā bhagavato cūḷapitu putto.
tika-vin02t:337_2: Suddhodano sakkodano sukkodano dhotodano amitodanoti ime hi pañca janā bhātaro.
tika-vin02t:337_5: Tathāgato ca nandatthero ca suddhodanassa puttā,
tika-vin02t:338_5: Tato ce uttari sādiyeyyāti sace tattha rattīhi vā bhesajjehi vā paricchedo kato hoti “ettakāyeva vā rattiyo ettakāni vā bhesajjāni viññāpetabbānī”ti,
tika-vin02t:338_6: tato rattipariyantato vā bhesajjapariyantato vā uttari viññāpento sādiyeyya.
tika-vin02t:338_8: amhākañca imināva bhesajjena attho”ti ācikkhitvā viññāpetumpi gilānova labhati.
tika-vin02t:339_2: tasmā “ye attano puggalikāya pavāraṇāya pavāritā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:342_5: tathārūpapaccayassa āpadāya vā abhāvoti imāni panettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:345_4: gilānatādīnaṃ abhāvoti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:348_1: Dasame kati te lakkhāni laddhānīti tava sarappahārassa lakkhaṇabhūtā kittakā janā tayā laddhāti attho,
tika-vin02t:348_6: tathārūpapaccayassa āpadāya vā abhāvoti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:353_2: Pāḷiyaṃ piṭṭhasurādīsu piṭṭhaṃ bhājane pakkhipitvā tajjaṃ udakaṃ datvā madditvā katā piṭṭhasurā.
tika-vin02t:353_3: Evaṃ pūve odane ca bhājane pakkhipitvā tajjaṃ udakaṃ datvā madditvā katā pūvasurā odanasurāti ca vuccati.
tika-vin02t:354_5: Bījato paṭṭhāyāti sambhāre paṭiyādetvā cāṭiyaṃ pakkhittakālato,
tika-vin02t:355_1: Loṇasovīrakaṃ suttañca anekehi bhesajjehi abhisaṅkhato amajjabhūto āsavaviseso.
tika-vin02t:355_7: tassa pānañcāti imāni panettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:358_1: Dutiye bhikkhunīpi anupasampannaṭṭhāne ṭhitāti ettha bhikkhupi bhikkhuniyā anupasampannaṭṭhāne ṭhitoti veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:358_4: upasampannassa kāyena kāyāmasananti imāni panettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:361_0: 335. Tatiyaṃ uttānatthameva. Uparigopphakatā, hasādhippāyena kīḷananti imāni panettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:364_1: Catutthe gārayho ācariyuggaho na gahetabboti yasmā ucchuraso sattāhakāliko,
tika-vin02t:364_4: tasmā vikāle ucchuyaṭṭhiṃ khādituṃ vaṭṭati guḷaharītakaṃ viyāti evamādiko gārayhācariyavādo na gahetabbo.
tika-vin02t:364_5: Lokavajje ācariyuggaho na vaṭṭatīti lokavajjasikkhāpade āpattiṭṭhāne yo ācariyavādo,
tika-vin02t:364_7: lokavajjaṃ atikkamitvā “idaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyuggaho”ti vadantassa uggaho na vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:364_9: Paveṇiyā āgatasamodhānaṃ gacchatīti “paveṇiyā āgato ācariyuggahova gahetabbo”ti evaṃ vutte mahāaṭṭhakathāvādeyeva saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:367_3: tassa dassanasavanavisaye bhiṃsāpetukāmatāya vāyamananti imāni panettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:370_2: tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhīsaddena “bhaggā”ti vuccati.
tika-vin02t:370_5: Tassa kira nagarassa māpanatthaṃ vatthuvijjācariyena nagaraṭṭhānassa pariggaṇhanadivase avidūre susumāro saddamakāsi giraṃ nicchāresi.
tika-vin02t:370_6: Atha anantarāyena nagare māpite tameva susumāragiraṇaṃ subhanimittaṃ katvā susumāragiraṃtvevassa nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
tika-vin02t:370_7: Keci pana “susumārasaṇṭhānattā susumāro nāma eko giri,
tika-vin02t:370_9: tasmā taṃ susumāragiri etassa atthīti ‘susumāragirī’ti vuccatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:370_11: nāmametaṃ tassa nagarassāti āha “susumāragiranti nagarassa nāma”nti.
tika-vin02t:370_14: Tesaṃ bahulatāya pana taṃ vanaṃ bhesakaḷāvanantveva paññāyittha.
tika-vin02t:370_17: tassa tato gaḷitaṭṭhānatāya taṃ vanaṃ bhesagaḷāvanaṃ nāma jāta”nti hi keci.
tika-vin02t:374_3: Orenaddhamāsaṃ nahāyeyyāti nahātadivasato paṭṭhāya addhamāse aparipuṇṇe nahāyeyya.
tika-vin02t:374_7: samayānaṃ vā nadīpāragamanassa vā āpadānaṃ vā abhāvoti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:377_1: Aṭṭhame “cammakāranīlaṃ nāma pakatinīla”nti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:377_2: Gaṇṭhipade pana “cammakārā udake tipumalaṃ ayagūthañca pakkhipitvā cammaṃ kāḷaṃ karonti,
tika-vin02t:377_7: nivāsanaṃ vā pārupanaṃ vāti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:380_1: Navame apaccuddhāraṇanti “mayhaṃ santakaṃ paribhuñja vā vissajjehi vā”tiādinā akatapaccuddhāraṃ.
tika-vin02t:380_2: Yena vinayakammaṃ katanti yena saddhiṃ vinayakammaṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin02t:383_3: vihesetukāmatā vā hasādhippāyatā vāti imāni panettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:388_1: Sappāṇakavaggassa paṭhamasikkhāpade usuṃ saraṃ assati khipatīti issāso,
tika-vin02t:388_5: Appamattena vattaṃ kātabbanti yathā te pāṇā na maranti,
tika-vin02t:391_1: Dutiye udakasaṇṭhānakappadeseti yattha bhūmibhāge udakaṃ nikkhittaṃ santiṭṭhati,
tika-vin02t:394_1: Tatiye yathāpatiṭṭhitabhāvena patiṭṭhātuṃ na dentīti tesaṃ pavattiākāradassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:397_2: Ārocetīti paṭicchādanatthameva mā kassaci ārocesīti vadati.
tika-vin02t:397_4: Yenassa ārocitanti yena dutiyena assa tatiyassa ārocitaṃ.
tika-vin02t:397_5: Koṭi chinnā hotīti yasmā paṭicchādanapaccayā āpattiṃ āpajjitvāva dutiyena tatiyassa ārocitaṃ,
tika-vin02t:397_6: tasmā tappaccayā puna tena āpajjitabbāpattiyā abhāvato āpattiyā koṭi chinnā nāma hoti.
tika-vin02t:398_1: “Anupasampannassa sukkavissaṭṭhi ca kāyasaṃsaggo cāti ayaṃ duṭṭhullaajjhācāro nāmā”ti idaṃ duṭṭhullārocanasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāya na sameti.
tika-vin02t:398_2: Vuttañhi tattha “anupasampannassa duṭṭhullaṃ vā aduṭṭhullaṃ vā ajjhācāranti ettha ādito pañca sikkhāpadāni duṭṭhullo nāma ajjhācāro,
tika-vin02t:398_6: paṭicchādane aññathā”ti etthāpi visesakāraṇaṃ na dissati,
tika-vin02t:398_11: paṭicchādetukāmatāya nārocessāmīti dhuranikkhepoti imāni panettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:401_4: Vacanapathānanti ettha vacanameva tadatthaṃ ñātukāmānaṃ ñāpetukāmānañca pathoti vacanapatho.
tika-vin02t:402_1: Gabbhe sayitakālena saddhiṃ vīsatimaṃ vassaṃ assāti gabbhavīso.
tika-vin02t:402_4: Ekūnavīsativassanti dvādasamāse mātukucchismiṃ vasitvā mahāpavāraṇāya jātakālato paṭṭhāya ekūnavīsativassaṃ.
tika-vin02t:402_8: tatiye saṃvacchare ekamāsaṃ adhikamāsavasena pariccajantā vassaṃ uddhaṃ kaḍḍhantīti attho,
tika-vin02t:402_10: saṃvaccharassa pana dvādasamāsikattā aṭṭhārasasu vassesu adhikamāse visuṃ gahetvā “cha māsā vaḍḍhantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:402_12: Nikkaṅkhā hutvāti adhikamāsehi saddhiṃ paripuṇṇavīsativassattā nibbematikā hutvā.
tika-vin02t:402_13: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ tīsu gaṇṭhipadesu “aṭṭhārasannaṃyeva vassānaṃ adhikamāse gahetvā gaṇitattā sesavassadvayassapi adhikāni divasāni honteva,
tika-vin02t:402_16: Na hi dvīsu vassesu adhikadivasāni nāma visuṃ upalabbhanti tatiye vasse vassukkaḍḍhanavasena adhikamāse pariccatteyeva atirekamāsasambhavato.
tika-vin02t:402_17: Tasmā dvīsu vassesu atirekadivasāni nāma visuṃ na sambhavanti.
tika-vin02t:403_0: Nanu ca “te dve māse gahetvā vīsativassāni paripuṇṇāni hontī”ti kasmā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:403_1: ekūnavīsativassamhi puna aparasmiṃ vasse pakkhitte vīsativassāni paripuṇṇāni hontīti āha “ettha pana…pe…
tika-vin02t:403_7: Iminā ca imaṃ dīpeti “yaṃ vuttaṃ ‘ekūnavīsativassaṃ sāmaṇeraṃ nikkhamanīyapuṇṇamāsiṃ atikkamma pāṭipadadivase upasampādentī’ti,
tika-vin02t:403_8: tattha gabbhamāsepi aggahetvā dvīhi māsehi aparipuṇṇavīsativassaṃ sandhāya ‘ekūnavīsativassa’nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:403_9: tasmā adhikamāsesu dvīsu gahitesu vīsativassāni paripuṇṇāni nāma hontī”ti.
tika-vin02t:403_10: Tasmāti yasmā gabbhamāsāpi gaṇanūpagā honti, tasmā.
tika-vin02t:403_11: Ekavīsativasso hotīti jātadivasato paṭṭhāya vīsativasso samāno gabbhamāsehi saddhiṃ ekavīsativasso hoti.
tika-vin02t:404_1: Aññaṃ upasampādetīti upajjhāyo kammavācācariyo vā hutvā upasampādeti.
tika-vin02t:407_4: avisaṅketena gamananti imāni panettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:411_2: Taṃtaṃsampattiyā vibandhanavasena sattasantānassa antare vemajjhe eti āgacchatīti antarāyo,
tika-vin02t:411_24: Abhibhavitvā pana pavattiyaṃ saggantarāyikatāpi na sakkā nivāretunti.
tika-vin02t:412_8: Sañcicca āpannā āpattiyoti sañcicca vītikkantā satta āpattikkhandhā.
tika-vin02t:412_9: Sañcicca vītikkantañhi antamaso dukkaṭadubbhāsitampi saggamaggaphalānaṃ antarāyaṃ karoti.
tika-vin02t:413_1: Rasena rasaṃ saṃsanditvāti anavajjena paccayaparibhuñjanarasena sāvajjakāmaguṇaparibhogarasaṃ samānetvā.
tika-vin02t:413_2: Yoniso paccavekkhaṇena natthi ettha chandarāgoti nicchandarāgo,
tika-vin02t:413_6: Upasaṃharanto viyāti sadisataṃ upasaṃharanto viya ekantasāvajje anavajjabhāvapakkhepanato.
tika-vin02t:413_8: Mahāsamuddaṃ bandhantena viyāti setukaraṇavasena mahāsāgaraṃ bandhantena viya.
tika-vin02t:413_9: Sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ paṭivirujjhantoti sabbaññutaññāṇena “sāvajja”nti diṭṭhaṃ “anavajja”nti gahaṇena tena saha paṭivirujjhanto.
tika-vin02t:414_0: Aṭṭhikaṅkalaṃ nāma uraṭṭhi vā piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṃ vā sīsaṭṭhi vā.
tika-vin02t:414_2: Vigatamaṃsāya hi aṭṭhisaṅkhalikāya ekaṭṭhimhi vā kaṅkala-
tika-vin02t:414_10: avaṇe vaṇaṃ uppādetvā anto anupavisanabhāvatāya vinivijjhanaṭṭhena,
tika-vin02t:415_5: Diṭṭhiyeva hi dhammasabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā parato āmasanena parāmāso.
tika-vin02t:415_8: Yato ca kho te bhikkhūti yadā te bhikkhū.
tika-vin02t:415_10: bhagavatāti idaṃ esa attano laddhiṃ nigūhitukāmatāya natthīti vattukāmopi bhagavato ānubhāvena sampaṭicchati.
tika-vin02t:415_11: Buddhānaṃ kira sammukhā dve kathā kathetuṃ samattho nāma natthi.
tika-vin02t:415_12: Kassa nu kho nāma tvaṃ moghapurisāti tvaṃ moghapurisa kassa khattiyassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā vessassa vā
tika-vin02t:415_13: suddassa vā gahaṭṭhassa vā pabbajitassa vā devassa vā manussassa vā mayā evaṃ dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāsi.
tika-vin02t:418_3: sahaseyyāya ekasmiṃ nipanne itarassa nipajjanapayogavasena āpattiparicchedo veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:418_4: Ettha ca padabhājane “ekacchanne”ti avisesena vuttattā nānūpacārepi ekacchanne nipajjantassa āpatti.
tika-vin02t:418_5: Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “saha vā seyyaṃ kappeyyāti nānūpacārepi ekacchanne nipajjeyyā”ti.
tika-vin02t:418_6: Paṇṇattiṃ ajānantena arahatāpi kiriyābyākatacittena āpajjitabbattā “ticitta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:418_7: Yaṃ pana kenaci vuttaṃ “ticittanti ettha vipākābyākatacittena saha vā seyyaṃ kappeyyāti evamattho daṭṭhabbo,
tika-vin02t:418_8: aññathā sacittakattā sikkhāpadassa kiriyābyākataṃ sandhāya na yujjatī”ti,
tika-vin02t:418_10: Na hi sacittakasikkhāpadavītikkamo arahato na sambhavati.
tika-vin02t:421_7: mā idha tiṭṭhāti evampettha attho veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:426_1: Sahadhammikavaggassa paṭhamasikkhāpade vācāya vācāya āpattīti anādariyabhayā lesena evaṃ vadantassa āpatti.
tika-vin02t:426_4: asikkhitukāmatāya evaṃ vacananti imāni panettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:429_1: Dutiye vinayassa pariyāpuṇanaṃ vinayapariyattīti āha “vinayaṃ pariyāpuṇantāna”ntiādi.
tika-vin02t:429_2: Suguttoti yathā karaṇḍake pakkhittamaṇikkhandho viya na nassati vipattiṃ na pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin02t:429_12: Suniggahitaṃ niggaṇhātīti yathā na puna sīsaṃ ukkhipanti,
tika-vin02t:431_2: Parūpahāraaññāṇakaṅkhāparavitāraṇādivādāti ettha ye arahattaṃ paṭijānantānaṃ appatte pattasaññīnaṃ adhimānikānaṃ
tika-vin02t:431_3: kuhakānaṃ vā arahattaṃ paṭijānantānaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ disvā mārakāyikā devatā “arahato asuciṃ upasaṃharantī”ti
tika-vin02t:431_6: Yesaṃ pana arahato itthipurisādīnaṃ nāmagottādīsu ñāṇappavattiyā abhāvena atthi arahato aññāṇaṃ,
tika-vin02t:431_8: yasmā cassa tāni vatthūni pare vitārenti pakāsenti ācikkhanti,
tika-vin02t:431_9: tasmā atthi arahato paravitāraṇāti imā tisso laddhiyo seyyathāpi etarahi pubbaseliyānaṃ,
tika-vin02t:431_11: Niggaho pana nesaṃ kathāvatthuppakaraṇe vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:432_0: Cattāro maggā ca phalāni cāti ukkaṭṭhaniddesavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:432_1: catasso paṭisambhidā tisso vijjā cha abhiññāti ayampi adhigamasaddhammoyeva. Ca-
tika-vin02t:433_2: imasmiṃ kira dīpe caṇḍālatissamahābhaye sakko devarājā mahāuḷumpaṃ māpetvā bhikkhūnaṃ ārocāpesi “mahantaṃ bhayaṃ bhavissati,
tika-vin02t:433_4: bhikkhū paccayehi kilamantā pariyattiṃ sandhāretuṃ na sakkhissanti,
tika-vin02t:433_5: paratīraṃ gantvā ayyehi jīvitaṃ rakkhituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:433_10: Tadā samuddatīraṃ patvā saṭṭhi bhikkhū katikaṃ katvā “amhākaṃ ettha gamanakiccaṃ natthi,
tika-vin02t:433_11: mayaṃ idheva hutvā tepiṭakaṃ rakkhissāmā”ti tato nivattitvā dakkhiṇamalayajanapadaṃ gantvā kandamūlapaṇṇehi jīvikaṃ kappentā vasiṃsu,
tika-vin02t:433_13: avahante vālikaṃ ussāretvā parivāretvā sīsāni ekaṭṭhāne katvā pariyattiṃ sammasanti.
tika-vin02t:433_14: Iminā niyāmena dvādasa saṃvaccharāni sāṭṭhakathaṃ tepiṭakaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā dhārayiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:434_0: Bhaye vūpasante sattasatā bhikkhū attano gataṭṭhāne sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake ekakkharampi ekabyañjanampi
tika-vin02t:434_1: avināsetvā imameva dīpamāgamma kallagāmajanapade maṇḍalārāmavihāraṃ pavisiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:434_2: Therānaṃ āgatapavattiṃ sutvā imasmiṃ dīpe ohīnā saṭṭhi bhikkhū “there passissāmā”ti gantvā therehi saddhiṃ
tika-vin02t:434_3: tepiṭakaṃ sodhentā ekakkharampi ekabyañjanampi asamentaṃ nāma na passiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:434_4: Tasmiṃ ṭhāne therānaṃ ayaṃ kathā udapādi “pariyatti nu kho sāsanassa mūlaṃ,
tika-vin02t:434_8: Atha ne therā “tumhākaṃ dvinnampi janānaṃ vacanamatteneva na sakkā viññātuṃ,
tika-vin02t:437_0: Imaṃ suttaṃ sutvā dhammakathikā attano vādaṭṭhapanatthāya imaṃ suttaṃ āhariṃsu –
tika-vin02t:439_0: Tāva dakkhanti ālokaṃ, sūriye abbhuṭṭhite yathā.
tika-vin02t:441_0: Tamo bhavissati loke, sūriye atthaṅgate yathā.
tika-vin02t:443_0: Paṭipattiyaṃ ṭhito dhīro, yogakkhemā na dhaṃsatī”ti.
tika-vin02t:444_0: Imasmiṃ sutte āhaṭe paṃsukūlikattherā tuṇhī ahesuṃ.
tika-vin02t:444_2: Yathā hi gavasatassa gavasahassassa vā antare paveṇipālikāya dhenuyā asati so vaṃso sā paveṇī na ghaṭīyati,
tika-vin02t:444_3: evameva āraddhavipassakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ satepi sahassepi vijjamāne pariyattiyā asati ariyamaggapaṭivedho nāma na hoti.
tika-vin02t:444_4: Yathā ca nidhikumbhiyā jānanatthāya pāsāṇapiṭṭhe akkharesu upanibaddhesu yāva akkharāni dharanti,
tika-vin02t:444_5: tāva nidhikumbhī naṭṭhā nāma na hoti,
tika-vin02t:444_6: evameva pariyattiyā dharamānāya sāsanaṃ antarahitaṃ nāma na hotīti.
tika-vin02t:445_4: upasampannassa santike sikkhāpadavivaṇṇanañcāti imāni panettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:451_2: Sace pana methunarāgena ratto pahāraṃ deti,
tika-vin02t:451_6: upasampannassa pahāradānanti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:454_1: Pañcame na paharitukāmatāya dinnattā dukkaṭanti ettha paharitukāmatāya pahaṭe purimasikkhāpadena pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin02t:454_2: uccāretukāmatāya kevalaṃ uggiraṇamatte kate iminā pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin02t:454_7: Tattha keci tāva vadanti “pahārapaccayā eva dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin02t:454_11: na ca pacchā pahāraṃ nissāya purimaṃ uggiraṇaṃ anāpattivatthukaṃ bhavitumarahatī”ti.
tika-vin02t:455_0: Mayaṃ panettha evaṃ takkayāma “uggiraṇassa attano sabhāveneva asaṇṭhitattā tappaccayā pācittiyena na bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-vin02t:455_1: asuddhacittena katapayogattā pana na sakkā ettha anāpattiyā bhavitunti dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:455_2: ‘Na paharitukāmatāya dinnattā’ti iminā ca pahārapaccayā purimasikkhāpadena pācittiyāsambhave kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:455_4: Na hi apaharitukāmatāya pahāre dinne purimasikkhāpadena pahārapaccayā pācittiyena dukkaṭena vā bhavituṃ yutta”nti.
tika-vin02t:455_5: “Tiracchānādīnaṃ asucikaraṇādiṃ disvā kujjhitvāpi uggirantassa mokkhādhippāyo evā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:455_8: upasampannassa talasattiuggiraṇanti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:464_6: Gaṇṭhipadesu ca suyyatīti sutīti saddova vutto.
tika-vin02t:464_7: Yattha pana ṭhitena sakkā hoti saddaṃ sotuṃ,
tika-vin02t:464_8: tattha tiṭṭhanto saddasamīpe ṭhito nāma hotīti āha “yattha ṭhatvā”tiādi.
tika-vin02t:464_13: evaṃ pana gayhamāne yasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhito suṇāti,
tika-vin02t:464_14: tassa āsanne aññasmiṃ padese tiṭṭhatīti āpajjati.
tika-vin02t:464_16: saddasseva atthaṃ dassetuṃ “yattha ṭhatvā sakkā hoti,
tika-vin02t:464_17: tesaṃ vacanaṃ sotu”nti vuttaṃ, na suti- saddassa.
tika-vin02t:464_19: Atha vā upecca suyyati etthāti upassuti, ṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin02t:464_20: Yaṃ ṭhānaṃ upagatena sakkā hoti kathentānaṃ saddaṃ sotuṃ,
tika-vin02t:465_3: Imāni hi tīṇi sikkhāpadāni kadāci kiriyato samuṭṭhahanti,
tika-vin02t:468_4: chandaṃ datvā khiyyananti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:471_7: kopetukāmatāya hatthapāsavijahananti imāni panettha cha aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:474_5: pacchā khīyitukāmatāya khiyyanāti imāni panettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:480_3: Kataṃ vā karissanti vāti methunavītikkamanaṃ kataṃ vā karissanti vā.
tika-vin02t:480_4: Imesanti padaṃ vibhattivipariṇāmaṃ katvā ubhayattha yojetabbaṃ “imehi kataṃ ime karissantī”ti.
tika-vin02t:480_7: “Ubhato sujāto”ti ettake vutte yehi kehici dvīhi bhāgehi sujātatā viññāyeyya, sujāta-
tika-vin02t:480_8: saddo ca “sujāto cārudassano”tiādīsu ārohasampattipariyāyoti jātivaseneva sujātataṃ vibhāvetuṃ “mātito ca pitito cā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:480_10: idha pana sā orasaputtavaseneva icchitāti dassetuṃ “saṃsuddhagahaṇiko”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:480_15: “Samavepākiniyā gahaṇiyā”ti ettha pana yathābhuttassa āhārassa vipācanavasena gaṇhanato achaḍḍanato kammajatejodhātu “gahaṇī”ti vuccati.
tika-vin02t:481_0: Yāva sattamā pitāmahayugāti ettha pitu pitā pitāmaho,
tika-vin02t:481_10: Evañhi pitāmahaggahaṇeneva mātāmahopi gahito hoti. Yuga-
tika-vin02t:481_11: saddo cettha ekasesena daṭṭhabbo yugo ca yugo ca yugoti.
tika-vin02t:481_12: Evañhi tattha tattha dvandaṃ gahitameva hoti,
tika-vin02t:481_13: tasmā tato uddhaṃ sabbepi pubbapurisā pitāmahayugaggahaṇeneva gahitā.
tika-vin02t:482_3: na akkosaṃ vā nindaṃ vā pattapubbo.
tika-vin02t:482_6: pitāmahayugā”ti etena tassa yonidosābhāvo dassito saṃsuddhagahaṇikabhāvakittanato,
tika-vin02t:485_1: Dutiye mahālataṃ nāmāti patikulaṃ gacchantiyā kira tassā pitā mahālatāpiḷandhanaṃ nāma kārāpesi.
tika-vin02t:485_2: Tasmiṃ piḷandhane catasso vajiranāḷiyo tattha tattha appetabbaṭṭhāne appanavasena viniyogaṃ agamaṃsu,
tika-vin02t:485_6: Iti etehi ca aññehi ca veḷuriyalohitaṅkamasāragallādīhi sattavaṇṇehi ca ratanehi niṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
tika-vin02t:485_7: Taṃ sīse paṭimukkaṃ yāva pādapiṭṭhiyā bhassati,
tika-vin02t:485_8: pañcannaṃ hatthīnaṃ balaṃ dhārayamānāva itthī naṃ dhāretuṃ sakkoti.
tika-vin02t:486_1: Āvasathassa pana suppapāto vā musalapāto vā upacāro nāmāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:486_2: Āvasathoti cettha antoārāme vā hotu aññattha vā,
tika-vin02t:486_6: Tameva bhikkhuṃ āsaṅkantīti vissaritvā gamanakāle attano pacchato aññassābhāvā āsaṅkanti.
tika-vin02t:486_7: Patirūpaṃ nāma ratanasammate paṃsukūlaggahaṇaṃ vā ratane nirussukkagamanaṃ vā.
tika-vin02t:486_8: Yadi hi taṃ ratanasammataṃ āmāsaṃ ce,
tika-vin02t:486_19: uggahaṇaṃ vā uggahāpanaṃ vāti imāni panettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:489_2: Aniyyānikattā saggamokkhamaggānaṃ tiracchānabhūtā hi kathā tiracchānakathā.
tika-vin02t:489_4: Rājapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ kathanti rājānaṃ ārabbha “mahāsammato mandhātā dhammāsoko evaṃmahānubhāvo”tiādinā nayena pavattakathaṃ.
tika-vin02t:489_5: Ettha ca “asuko rājā abhirūpo dassanīyo”tiādinā nayena gehassitakathāva tiracchānakathā hoti.
tika-vin02t:489_6: “Sopi nāma evaṃmahānubhāvo khayaṃ gato”ti evaṃ pavattā pana aniccatāpaṭisaṃyuttā kammaṭṭhānabhāve tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin02t:489_8: meghamālo evaṃmahānubhāvo”ti tesaṃ kammaṃ paṭicca “aho sūrā”ti gehassitakathāva tiracchānakathā.
tika-vin02t:489_9: Yuddhepi bharatayuddhādīsu “asukena asuko evaṃ mārito evaṃ viddho”ti kāmassādavaseneva kathā tiracchānakathā.
tika-vin02t:489_10: “Tepi nāma khayaṃ gatā”ti evaṃ pavattā pana sabbattha kammaṭṭhānameva hoti.
tika-vin02t:490_0: Apica annādīsu “evaṃ vaṇṇavantaṃ gandhavantaṃ rasavantaṃ phassasampannaṃ khādimha bhuñjimha pivimha paribhuñjimhā”ti
tika-vin02t:490_2: sātthakaṃ pana katvā “pubbe evaṃ vaṇṇādisampannaṃ annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ sayanaṃ mālāgandhaṃ sīlavantānaṃ adamha,
tika-vin02t:490_4: Ñātikathādīsupi “amhākaṃ ñātakā sūrā samatthā”ti vā “pubbe mayaṃ evaṃ vicitrehi yānehi vicarimhā”ti vā assādavasena vattuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin02t:490_5: sātthakaṃ pana katvā “tepi no ñātakā khayaṃ gatā”ti vā “pubbe mayaṃ evarūpā upāhanā saṅghassa adamhā”ti vā kathetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:490_6: Gāmakathāpi suniviṭṭhadunniviṭṭhasubhikkhadubbhikkhādivasena vā “asukagāmavāsino sūrā samatthā”ti vā evaṃ assādavasena na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin02t:490_7: sātthakaṃ pana katvā “saddhā pasannā”ti vā “khayavayaṃ gatā”ti vā vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:491_0: Itthikathāpi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīni paṭicca assādavasena na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin02t:491_3: Sūrakathāpi “nandimitto nāma yodho sūro ahosī”ti assādavasena na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin02t:491_6: Visikhākathāpi “asukā visikhā suniviṭṭhā dunniviṭṭhā sūrā samatthā”ti assādavaseneva na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin02t:492_2: Sāpi “pāsādikā naccituṃ gāyituṃ chekā”ti assādavasena na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin02t:493_2: asukena pajāpatinā brahmunā issarena vā nimmito,
tika-vin02t:493_4: bakā rattā lohitassa rattattā”ti evamādikā lokāyatavitaṇḍasallāpakathā.
tika-vin02t:493_8: Khato amhehīti hatthamuddāya niveditattā samuddoti evamādikā niratthakā samuddakkhāyikakathā.
tika-vin02t:494_0: Iti bhavo iti abhavoti yaṃ vā taṃ vā niratthakakāraṇaṃ vatvā pavattitakathā itibhavābhavakathā.
tika-vin02t:494_7: Iti imāya chabbidhāya itibhavābhavakathāya saddhiṃ bāttiṃsa tiracchānakathā nāma hoti.
tika-vin02t:494_8: Atha vā pāḷiyaṃ sarūpato anāgatāpi araññapabbatanadīdīpakathā iti-
tika-vin02t:494_14: “evaṃpakāraṃ ito aññaṃ vā tādisaṃ niratthakakathaṃ kathentī”ti.
tika-vin02t:494_16: saddo “iti vā iti evarūpā naccagītavāditavisūkadassanā paṭivirato”tiādīsu viya,
tika-vin02t:494_17: evamādiṃ aññampi tādisaṃ kathaṃ kathentīti attho.
tika-vin02t:495_1: Aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāro adinnādāne vuttanayeneva veditabboti iminā dutiyaleḍḍupāto idha upacāroti dasseti.
tika-vin02t:495_5: vikāle gāmappavisananti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:498_1: Catutthe taṃ assa atthīti paṭhamaṃ bhinditvā pacchā desetabbattā taṃ bhedanakaṃ tassa pācittiyassa atthīti bhedanakaṃ,
tika-vin02t:498_9: attano atthāya karaṇaṃ vā kārāpetvā vā paṭilābhoti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:501_2: taṃ tassa atthīti chedanakanti imamatthaṃ atidissati.
tika-vin02t:501_5: attano atthāya karaṇaṃ vā kārāpetvā vā paṭilābhoti imāni panettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:504_1: Chaṭṭhe tūlaṃ pakkhipitvāti heṭṭhā cimilikaṃ pattharitvā tassa upari tūlaṃ pakkhipitvāti attho.
tika-vin02t:504_5: attano atthāya karaṇaṃ vā kārāpetvā vā paṭilābhoti imāni panettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:504_7: Teneva padabhājane “paṭilābhena uddāletvā pācittiyaṃ desetabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:504_8: Kenaci pana “paṭilābhena uddāletvā pācittiyaṃ desetabbanti ettha kiñcāpi paṭilābhamatteneva pācittiyaṃ viya dissati,
tika-vin02t:504_11: āpatti dukkaṭassā’ti vacanaṃ ettha sādhaka”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:504_14: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti idaṃ attanā kārāpitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:504_15: karaṇakārāpanapaccayā ca iminā sikkhāpadena pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:504_18: tūlonaddhaṃ mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā paribhuñjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin02t:504_20: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti hi khandhake vuttattā attanā vā kataṃ hotu aññena vā,
tika-vin02t:507_4: attano atthāya karaṇaṃ vā kārāpetvā vā paṭilābhoti imāni panettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:509_0: 537-542. Aṭṭhamanavamadasamesu natthi vattabbaṃ, aṅgānipi sattameva vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
tika-vin02t:516_1: Pāṭidesanīyesu paṭhame “gārayhaṃ āvusotiādi paṭidesetabbākāradassana”nti vacanato pāḷiyaṃ āgatanayeneva āpatti desetabbā.
tika-vin02t:518_4: ṭhapetvā niccabhattādīni aññaṃ āmisaṃ gahetvā bhuñjananti imāni pañca aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:524_0: Sekhiyesu sikkhitasikkhenāti catūhi maggehi tisso sikkhā sikkhitvā ṭhitena,
tika-vin02t:525_1: Sikkhā karaṇīyāti “evaṃ nivāsessāmī”ti ārāmepi antaragharepi sabbattha sikkhā kattabbā.
tika-vin02t:525_2: Ettha ca yasmā vattakkhandhake vuttavattānipi sikkhitabbattā sekhiyāneva honti,
tika-vin02t:525_3: tasmā pārājikādīsu viya paricchedo na kato,
tika-vin02t:525_5: dukkaṭa”nti evaṃ āpattināmena avatvā “sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti evaṃ sabbasikkhāpadesu pāḷi āropitā.
tika-vin02t:525_6: Padabhājane pana “āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vuttattā sabbattha anādariyakaraṇe dukkaṭaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:525_8: Yasmā aṭṭhaṅgulamattaṃ otāretvā nivatthameva nisinnassa caturaṅgulamattaṃ hoti,
tika-vin02t:526_1: Kiñcāpi kurundivādaṃ pacchā vadantena “parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsetuṃ ajānantassa anāpattī”ti ayamattho patiṭṭhāpito,
tika-vin02t:526_4: Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “ajānantassāti parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsetuṃ ajānantassa anāpatti,
tika-vin02t:527_0: Sacittakanti vatthuvijānanacittena paṇṇattivijānanacittena ca sacittakaṃ “anādariyaṃ paṭiccā”ti vuttattā.
tika-vin02t:527_1: “Pāṇātipātādi viya nivāsanadoso lokagarahito na hotīti paṇṇattivajja”nti phussadevatthero āha.
tika-vin02t:527_2: Upatissatthero pana “yasmā anādariyavaseneva āpajjitabbattā kevalaṃ akusalameva,
tika-vin02t:527_10: evaṃ sabbattha purimāni dve tattha tattha vuttapaṭipakkhakaraṇañcāti tīṇiyeva honti.
tika-vin02t:528_1: Dutiyādīsu anekappakāraṃ gihipārutanti setapaṭapārutaṃ paribbājakapārutaṃ ekasāṭakapārutantiādi anekappabhedaṃ gihipārutaṃ.
tika-vin02t:529_1: “Suppaṭicchanno”ti vuttattā “sasīsaṃ pāruto sabbathā suppaṭicchannattā suppaṭicchanno nāma hotī”ti yassa siyā,
tika-vin02t:530_1: Ekasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ṭhatvāti ettha “gacchantopi parissayābhāvaṃ oloketuṃ labhatiyeva,
tika-vin02t:530_2: tathā gāme pūja”nti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:536_4: Byañjanaṃ pana anādiyitvā atthamattameva dassetuṃ “patte saññaṃ katvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:537_4: ggahaṇena yā kāci sūpeyyasākehi katā byañjanavikati vuttā.
tika-vin02t:537_6: saddena avasesā sabbāpi byañjanavikati saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:537_7: Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “ṭhapetvā pana sūpaṃ avasesā sabbāpi sūpeyyā byañjanavikati rasaraso nāma hotī”ti.
tika-vin02t:538_1: Samapuṇṇanti adhiṭṭhānupagassa pattassa antomukhavaṭṭilekhaṃ anatikkāmetvā racitaṃ.
tika-vin02t:538_5: Heṭṭhā orohatīti samantā okāsasabbhāvato cāliyamānaṃ heṭṭhā bhassati.
tika-vin02t:539_0: Yasmā “samatittiko piṇḍapāto paṭiggahetabbo”ti vacanaṃ piṇḍapāto sampuṇṇo paṭiggahetabboti dīpeti,
tika-vin02t:539_1: tasmā attano hatthagate patte piṇḍapāto diyyamāno thūpīkatopi ce hoti,
tika-vin02t:539_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti hi vacanaṃ paṭhamaṃ thūpīkataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ pacchā paṭiggaṇhato āpattīti dīpeti.
tika-vin02t:539_7: payogo pana natthi aññatra pubbadesā”ti kenaci vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:539_9: “Na thūpīkataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggaṇhātī”ti vacanaṃ paṭhamaṃ thūpīkatasseva pacchā paṭiggaṇhanaṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin02t:539_10: Na hi hatthagatepi patte diyyamānaṃ thūpīkataṃ gaṇhanto thūpīkataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggaṇhanto nāma na hoti,
tika-vin02t:539_11: na ca tena samatittiko piṇḍapāto paṭiggahitoti sakkā viññātuṃ.
tika-vin02t:539_12: “Thūpīkata”nti ca bhāvanapuṃsakaniddese gayhamāne ayamattho suṭṭhutaraṃ pākaṭoyevāti.
tika-vin02t:542_1: Catutthavagge sapadānanti ettha dānaṃ vuccati avakhaṇḍanaṃ,
tika-vin02t:543_1: Yasmiṃ samaye “pāṇo na hantabbo”ti rājāno bheriṃ carāpenti,
tika-vin02t:543_5: Sūpodanaviññattisikkhāpade asañcicca assatiyāti ettha “mukhe pakkhipitvā puna vippaṭisārī hutvā chaḍḍentassa aruciyā pavisante ‘asañciccā’ti vuccati,
tika-vin02t:543_6: viññattimpi aviññattimpi etasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhitaṃ sahasā gahetvā bhuñjante ‘assatiyā’ti vuccatī”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:544_3: “Mayūraṇḍaṃ atimahanta”nti vacanato mayūraṇḍappamāṇo kabaḷo na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:544_4: Keci pana “mayūraṇḍato mahanto na vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin02t:544_6: “nātimahanta”nti ca atimahantasseva paṭikkhittattā khuddake āpatti na dissati.
tika-vin02t:544_9: tesaṃ vemajjhappamāṇo”ti iminā pana sāruppavasena khuddakampi paṭikkhipitvā paricchedo na dassitoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:547_3: samudāye pavattavohārassa avayavepi vattanato ekaṅgulimpi mukhe pakkhipituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:551_2: Tatthajātakadaṇḍakena katanti tālapaṇṇaṃ saha daṇḍakena chinditvā tameva chattadaṇḍaṃ karonti gopālakādayo viya,
tika-vin02t:551_4: Chattapādukāya vā ṭhitaṃ hotīti ettha chattapādukā vuccati chattādhāro.
tika-vin02t:555_1: Sattamavagge paṭicchanno hutvāti so kira rattibhāge uyyānaṃ gantvā ambaṃ abhiruhitvā sākhāya sākhaṃ ambaṃ olokento vicari.
tika-vin02t:555_8: So rukkhato otaranto ekaṃ olambinisākhaṃ gahetvā tesaṃ ubhinnampi antare patiṭṭhāsi.
tika-vin02t:555_9: Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “tesaṃ dvinnampi antarā rukkhato patito”ti.
tika-vin02t:555_10: Pāḷiyā atthaṃ na jānantīti attano gahaṇassa atthaṃ na jānanti.
tika-vin02t:557_0: “Sabbamidaṃ carimaṃ kataṃ, ubho dhammaṃ na passare;
tika-vin02t:558_0: Ubho pakatiyā cutā, yo cāyaṃ mantejjhāpeti;
tika-vin02t:560_2: sabbamidaṃ carimaṃ katanti yaṃ amhehi tīhi janehi kataṃ,
tika-vin02t:560_4: Evaṃ attano corabhāvaṃ tesañca mantesu agāravaṃ garahitvā puna itare dveyeva garahanto “ubho dhammaṃ na passare”tiādimāha.
tika-vin02t:560_5: Tattha ubhoti ime dvepi janā garukārārahaṃ porāṇakadhammaṃ na passanti,
tika-vin02t:563_0: Yo cāyanti yo ca ayaṃ nīce nisīditvā mante ajjhāpeti, yo ca ucce nisīditvā adhīyatīti.
tika-vin02t:566_0: Tasmā etaṃ na sevāmi, dhammaṃ isīhi sevita”nti. –
tika-vin02t:568_5: Vutti nāma hotīti yathāvutto duvidhopi lābho apāyasaṃvattanikatāya samparāye vinipātanahetubhāvena pavattanato
tika-vin02t:568_6: sampati adhammacaraṇena pavattanato ca vutti nāma hotīti attho.
tika-vin02t:568_7: Evarūpā yā vuttīti evarūpā dhanalābhayasalābhasaṅkhātā yā vutti.
tika-vin02t:572_0: Adhikaraṇasamathesu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgataṭṭhāneyeva dassayissāma.
tika-vin02t:580_2: Migāranattāti majjhapadalopenetaṃ vuttanti āha “migāramātuyā pana nattā hotī”ti.
tika-vin02t:580_6: yathāsutaṃ dhāraṇameva tattha karaṇīyanti satiyā byāpāro adhiko,
tika-vin02t:580_10: Atthaggahaṇe pana paññāya byāpāro adhiko paṭivijjhitabbassa atthassa atigambhīrattāti āha “paññāpubbaṅgamāya satiyā”ti.
tika-vin02t:580_12: Yathā aññā kusītā nisinnaṭṭhāne nisinnāva honti,
tika-vin02t:580_14: evaṃ ahutvā vipphārikena cittena sabbakiccaṃ nipphādeti.
tika-vin02t:581_0: Sabbā bhikkhuniyo satthuladdhūpasampadā saṅghato laddhūpasampadāti duvidhā.
tika-vin02t:581_1: Garudhammapaaggahaṇena hi laddhūpasampadā mahāpajāpatigotamī satthusantikāva laddhūpasampadattā satthuladdhūpasampadā nāma.
tika-vin02t:581_4: Tattha yā tā mahāpajāpatigotamiyā saddhiṃ nikkhantā pañcasatā sākiyāniyo,
tika-vin02t:581_7: Ehibhikkhunībhāvena upasampannā pana bhikkhuniyo na santi tāsaṃ tathā upasampadāya abhāvato.
tika-vin02t:581_8: Yadi evaṃ “ehi bhikkhunī”ti idha kasmā vuttanti?
tika-vin02t:581_10: Ayañhi sotapatitatā nāma katthaci labbhamānassapi aggahaṇena hoti,
tika-vin02t:581_11: yathā abhidhamme manodhātuniddese labbhamānampi jhānaṅgaṃ pañcaviññāṇasote patitāya na uddhaṭaṃ katthaci desanāya asambhavato,
tika-vin02t:583_1: Parikappavacanañhetaṃ “sace bhagavā bhikkhunībhāvayogyaṃ kañci mātugāmaṃ ‘ehi bhikkhunī’ti vadeyya,
tika-vin02t:584_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā evaṃ na kathesīti?
tika-vin02t:584_2: Ye pana “anāsannāsannihitabhāvato”ti kāraṇaṃ vatvā “bhikkhū eva hi satthu āsannacārino sadā sannihitā ca honti,
tika-vin02t:584_5: taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ satthu āsannadūrabhāvassa bhabbābhabbabhāvasiddhattā.
tika-vin02t:585_2: bhikkhu gahetvā piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandho assa pāde pādaṃ nikkhipanto,
tika-vin02t:585_3: so ca hoti abhijjhālu kāmesu tibbasārāgo byāpannacitto paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo muṭṭhassati asampajāno asamāhito vibbhantacitto pākatindriyo,
tika-vin02t:585_14: so ca hoti anabhijjhālu kāmesu na tibbasārāgo abyāpannacitto appaduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo upaṭṭhitassati sampajāno samāhito ekaggacitto saṃvutindriyo,
tika-vin02t:586_1: Akatādhikāratāya pana bhikkhunīnaṃ ehibhikkhunūpasampadāya ayogyatā veditabbā.
tika-vin02t:587_0: Yadi evaṃ yaṃ taṃ therīgāthāsu bhaddāya kuṇḍalakesāya vuttaṃ –
tika-vin02t:589_0: Ehi bhaddeti maṃ avaca, sā me āsūpasampadā”ti. ;
tika-vin02t:593_4: Tathā hi vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ehi bhadde bhikkhunupassayaṃ gantvā bhikkhunīnaṃ santike pabbaja upasampajjassūti maṃ avaca āṇāpesi,
tika-vin02t:593_5: sā satthu āṇā mayhaṃ upasampadāya kāraṇattā upasampadā āsi ahosī”ti.
tika-vin02t:593_7: Tasmā bhikkhunīnaṃ ehibhikkhunūpasampadā natthiyevāti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:593_9: evaṃ “tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampannāti bhikkhunī”ti idampi sotapatitavaseneva vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ saraṇagamanūpasampadāyapi bhikkhunīnaṃ asambhavato.
tika-vin02t:594_1: Bhikkhuvibhaṅge “kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyeyyā”ti avatvā “samāpajjeyyā”ti vuttattā “bhikkhu āpattiyā na kāretabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:594_4: Brāhmaṇagāmepi hi antamaso rajakādīni pañca kulāni santi.
tika-vin02t:595_0: 662. Tathevāti kāyasaṃsaggarāgena avassutoyevāti attho. Sesamettha uttānameva.
tika-vin02t:598_1: Dutiye “kissa pana tvaṃ ayye jānaṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpanna”nti vacanato “uddiṭṭhā kho ayyāyo aṭṭha
tika-vin02t:598_2: pārājikā dhammā”tiādivacanato ca bhikkhunīvibhaṅgaṃ patvā sādhāraṇāni sikkhāpadāni bhikkhūnaṃ uppannavatthusmiṃyeva
tika-vin02t:598_3: “yā pana bhikkhunī chandaso methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyya,
tika-vin02t:598_5: pārājikā hoti asaṃvāsā”tiādinā nayena savisesampi avisesampi mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā anukkamena padabhājanaṃ
tika-vin02t:598_6: āpattibhedaṃ tikacchedaṃ anāpattivārañca anavasesaṃ vatvā vitthāresi.
tika-vin02t:598_7: Saṅgītikārakehi pana asādhāraṇapaññattiyoyeva idha vitthāritāti veditabbā.
tika-vin02t:599_0: Atha uparimesu dvīsu apaññattesu aṭṭhannaṃ pārājikānaṃ aññataranti idaṃ vacanaṃ na yujjatīti āha “idañca pārājikaṃ pacchā paññatta”ntiādi.
tika-vin02t:599_1: Yadi evaṃ imasmiṃ okāse kasmā ṭhapitanti āha “purimena pana saddhiṃ yugaḷattā”tiādi,
tika-vin02t:599_2: purimena saddhiṃ ekasambandhabhāvato idha vuttanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:599_3: “Aṭṭhannaṃ pārājikānaṃ aññatara”nti vacanato ca vajjapaṭicchādikaṃ yā paṭicchādeti,
tika-vin02t:599_6: tathāpi sikkhāpadavītikkamacittaṃ domanassitameva hotīti katvā “dukkhavedana”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:604_0: Tissitthiyo methunaṃ taṃ na seveti yā tisso itthiyo vuttā,
tika-vin02t:604_3: Tayo puriseti tayo purisepi upagantvā methunaṃ na sevati.
tika-vin02t:604_4: Tayo ca anariyapaṇḍaketi ubhatobyañjanasaṅkhāte tayo anariye,
tika-vin02t:604_5: tayo ca paṇḍaketi imepi cha jane upagantvā methunaṃ na sevati.
tika-vin02t:604_6: Na cācare methunaṃ byañjanasminti anulomapārājikavasenapi attano nimitte methunaṃ nācarati.
tika-vin02t:604_7: Chejjaṃ siyā methunadhammapaccayāti siyā methunadhammapaccayā pārājikanti ayaṃ pañho aṭṭhavatthukaṃva sandhāya vutto.
tika-vin02t:604_8: Tassā hi methunadhammassa pubbabhāgakāyasaṃsaggaṃ āpajjituṃ vāyamantiyā methunadhammapaccayā chejjaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:605_0: Methunadhammassa pubbabhāgattāti iminā methunadhammassa pubbabhāgabhūto kāyasaṃsaggoyeva tattha methunadhamma-
tika-vin02t:605_9: aṭṭhamassa vatthussa pūraṇanti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:611_1: Saṅghādisesakaṇḍassa paṭhamasikkhāpade dvīsu janesūti aḍḍakārakesu dvīsu janesu.
tika-vin02t:611_2: Yo kocīti tesuyeva dvīsu yo koci,
tika-vin02t:611_4: Dutiyassa ārocetīti etthāpi dvīsu janesu yassa kassaci dutiyassa kathaṃ yo koci ārocetīti evamattho gahetabboti
tika-vin02t:612_10: evaṃ tesaṃ atthāya aḍḍakaraṇampi na vaṭṭatīti āha “ayaṃ akappiyaaḍḍo nāma,
tika-vin02t:613_0: Ettha ca sace adhikaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā “amhākaṃ eso dāso, dāsī, vāpī, khettaṃ, ārāmo,
tika-vin02t:613_5: ayaṃ vāpī itthannāmena saṅghassa bhaṇḍadhovanatthāya dinnā,
tika-vin02t:613_6: ito khettato ārāmato uppajjanakacatupaccayā ito gāvito mahiṃsito ajāto uppajjanakagorasā itthannāmena
tika-vin02t:613_7: saṅghassa dinnāti pucchite vā apucchite vā vattuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:616_1: Dutiye mallagaṇabhaṭiputtagaṇādikantiādīsu mallagaṇo nāma nārāyanabhattiko tattha tattha pānīyaṭṭhapanapokkharaṇīkhaṇanādipuññakammakārako gaṇo,
tika-vin02t:617_2: Paṇṇattiṃ ajānantā ariyāpi vuṭṭhāpentīti vā kammavācāpariyosāne āpattikkhaṇe vipākābyākatasamaṅgitāvasena vā “ticitta”nti vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:617_5: aññatra anuññātakāraṇā vuṭṭhāpananti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:620_1: Tatiye parikkhepaṃ atikkāmentiyāti sakagāmato aññassa gāmassa parikkhepaṃ atikkāmentiyā.
tika-vin02t:620_2: “Gāmantaraṃ gaccheyyā”ti hi vacanato aññassa gāmassa parikkhepaṃ atikkāmentiyā eva āpatti,
tika-vin02t:620_9: Aññathā yathā vikālagāmappavisanasikkhāpade “parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepaṃ atikkamantassa,
tika-vin02t:620_11: evamidhāpi “parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepaṃ atikkāmentiyā aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ okkamantiyā”ti vadeyya.
tika-vin02t:620_13: Vihārassa catugāmasādhāraṇattāti iminā “vihārato ekaṃ gāmaṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ettha kāraṇamāha.
tika-vin02t:620_14: Vihārassa catugāmasādhāraṇattāyeva hi catūsu gāmesu yaṃkiñci ekaṃ gāmaṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:621_2: dutiyaṃ pādaṃ uttārentiyā āpatti saṅghādisesassā”ti vacanato nadiṃ otaritvā padasā uttarantiyā eva āpattīti āha “setunā gacchati,
tika-vin02t:621_4: Paratīrameva akkamantiyā anāpattīti nadiṃ anotaritvā yānanāvādīsu aññatarena gantvā paratīrameva akkamantiyā anāpatti.
tika-vin02t:621_6: vaṭṭatīti idaṃ asatipi nadīpāragamane upari vakkhamānassa vinicchayassa phalamattadassanatthaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:622_0: Tādise araññeti “bahiindakhīlā sabbametaṃ arañña”nti evaṃ vuttalakkhaṇe araññe.
tika-vin02t:622_1: Atha tādisasseva araññassa gahitabhāvo kathaṃ viññāyatīti āha “tenevā”tiādi.
tika-vin02t:622_2: Iminā hi aṭṭhakathāvacanena īdisepi gāmasamīpe dassanūpacāre vijahite satipi savanūpacāre āpatti hotīti viññāyati.
tika-vin02t:622_12: āpadāya abhāvoti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:625_6: aññatra anuññātakāraṇā osāraṇanti imāni panettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:628_1: Pañcame etaṃ na vuttanti “bhikkhuniyā avassutabhāvo daṭṭhabbo”ti etaṃ niyamanaṃ na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:628_3: Pāḷiyā sametīti “ekato avassute”ti avisesetvā vuttapāḷiyā “anavassutoti jānantī paṭiggaṇhātī”ti imāya ca pāḷiyā sameti.
tika-vin02t:628_9: anavassutoti jānantī paṭiggaṇhātī”ti imassa ca anāpattivārassa ayamattho.
tika-vin02t:628_12: Atha bhikkhunī anavassutā samānā avassutampi “anavassuto”ti saññāya tassa hatthato paṭiggaṇhāti,
tika-vin02t:628_14: Atha sayaṃ anavassutāpi aññaṃ anavassutaṃ vā avassutaṃ vā “avassuto”ti jānāti,
tika-vin02t:628_16: Vuttañhetaṃ anantarasikkhāpade “kissa tvaṃ ayye na paṭiggaṇhāsīti.
tika-vin02t:631_2: Na deti na paṭiggaṇhātīti na uyyojikā deti,
tika-vin02t:631_4: Paṭiggaho tena na vijjatīti teneva kāraṇena uyyojikāya hatthato uyyojitāya paṭiggaho na vijjati.
tika-vin02t:631_5: Āpajjati garukanti evaṃ santepi avassutassa hatthato piṇḍaggahaṇe uyyojentī saṅghādisesāpattiṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin02t:631_6: Tañca paribhogapaccayāti tañca pana āpattiṃ āpajjamānā tassā uyyojitāya paribhogapaccayā āpajjati.
tika-vin02t:631_7: Tassā hi bhojanapariyosāne uyyojikāya saṅghādiseso hoti.
tika-vin02t:631_10: aññatra anuññātakāraṇā khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ gahetvā bhuñjāti uyyojanā,
tika-vin02t:631_11: tena vacanena gahetvā itarissā bhojanapariyosānanti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:634_0: 709. Sattame kinnumāva samaṇiyoti kiṃ nu imā eva samaṇiyo. Tāsāhanti tāsaṃ ahaṃ. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
tika-vin02t:638_2: Samanubhāsanakammakāle cettha dve tisso ekato samanubhāsitabbā.
tika-vin02t:645_2: Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyampi “nissaṭṭhaṃ paṭilabhitvāpi yathādāneyeva upanetabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:645_6: Ettha ca bhājāpitāya laddhacīvarameva nissaggiyaṃ hoti,
tika-vin02t:645_7: taṃ vinayakammaṃ katvāpi attanā na labhati.
tika-vin02t:646_6: sakasaññāya acchindanaṃ vā acchindāpanaṃ vāti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:647_2: Yamakaṃ pacitabbanti sappiñca telañca ekato katvā pacitabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:648_3: Cetāpetvāti jānāpetvā icceva atthoti idha vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:648_4: mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “aññaṃ cetāpetvāti attano kappiyabhaṇḍena idaṃ nāma āharāti aññaṃ parivattāpetvā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:648_6: Aññaṃ cetāpeyyāti “evaṃ me idaṃ datvā aññampi āharissatī”ti maññamānā “na me iminā attho,
tika-vin02t:648_7: idaṃ nāma me āharā”ti tato aññaṃ cetāpeyya.
tika-vin02t:649_5: tasmā tāya bhikkhuniyā nissaṭṭhaṃ paṭilabhitvā yathādāne upanetabbaṃ,
tika-vin02t:650_1: Sattame sayaṃ yācitakenāti sayaṃ yācitakenāpīti attho.
tika-vin02t:650_2: Teneva pāḷiyaṃ “tena ca parikkhārena sayampi yācitvā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:650_3: tatoyeva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “saññācikenāti sayaṃ yācitakenāpī”ti attho vutto.
tika-vin02t:652_1: Ekādasame yasmā pavāritaṭṭhāne viññatti nāma na paṭisedhetabbā,
tika-vin02t:652_2: tasmā bhagavā dhammanimantanavasena pavāritaṭṭhāne “vadeyyāsi yenattho”ti vuttāya “catukkaṃsaparamaṃ
tika-vin02t:652_4: Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “cetāpetabbanti ṭhapetvā sahadhammike ca ñātakapavārite ca aññena kismiñcideva
tika-vin02t:652_5: guṇe parituṭṭhena vadeyyāsi yenatthoti vuttāya viññāpetabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:658_1: Pācittiyesu lasuṇavaggassa paṭhame jātiṃ saratīti jātissaro.
tika-vin02t:658_3: Badarasāḷavaṃ nāma badaraphalāni sukkhāpetvā cuṇṇetvā kattabbā khādanīyavikati.
tika-vin02t:658_5: Āmakalasuṇañceva ajjhoharaṇañcāti imāni panettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:660_1: Pañcame dvinnaṃ pabbānaṃ uparīti ettha dvinnaṃ aṅgulīnaṃ saha pavesane ekekāya aṅguliyā ekekaṃ pabbaṃ katvā dvinnaṃ pabbānaṃ upari.
tika-vin02t:660_2: Ekaṅgulipavesane dvinnaṃ pabbānaṃ upari na vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:660_4: Udakasuddhipaccayena pana satipi phassasādiyane yathāvuttaparicchede anāpatti.
tika-vin02t:661_4: pānīyassa vā vidhūpanassa vā gahaṇanti imāni panettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:662_2: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti idaṃ pubbapayogadukkaṭassa nidassanamattanti āha “na kevalaṃ paṭiggahaṇeyeva hotī”tiādi.
tika-vin02t:662_7: Taṃ pubbāparaviruddhanti punapi vuttanti vuttavādaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-vin02t:662_8: Aññāya viññattiyā laddhampi hi anāṇattiyā viññattiyā imissā aviññattiyā laddhapakkhaṃ bhajati,
tika-vin02t:662_9: tasmā heṭṭhā aviññattiyā laddhe karaṇakārāpanesu visesaṃ avatvā idha visesavacanaṃ pubbāparaviruddhaṃ.
tika-vin02t:662_14: Na hi karaṇe vā kārāpane vā viseso atthi,
tika-vin02t:662_15: tasmā aññāya viññattiyā laddhaṃ sayaṃ bhajjanādīni katvāpi kārāpetvāpi bhuñjantiyā dukkaṭamevāti idamettha sanniṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin02t:662_18: Sattannaṃ dhaññānaṃ aññatarassa viññāpanaṃ vā viññāpāpanaṃ vā,
tika-vin02t:662_20: bhajjanādīni katvā vā kāretvā vā ajjhoharaṇanti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:663_9: chaḍḍanaṃ vā chaḍḍāpanaṃ vāti imāni panettha pañca aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:664_0: 830. Navame sabbesanti bhikkhussa bhikkhuniyā ca. Idha khettapālakā ārāmādigopakā ca sāmikā eva.
tika-vin02t:665_3: Kiñcāpi sayaṃ naccanādīsu pācittiyaṃ pāḷiyaṃ na vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:665_4: tathāpi aṭṭhakathāpamāṇena gahetabbanti dassetuṃ “sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu vutta”nti āha.
tika-vin02t:665_8: Itarathā nisinnāpi na labheyyā”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:665_12: dassanaṃ vā savanaṃ vāti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:668_1: Andhakāravaggassa paṭhame dāne vā pūjāya vāti dānanimittaṃ vā pūjānimittaṃ vā.
tika-vin02t:668_4: purisassa hatthapāse ṭhānaṃ vā sallapanaṃ vā,
tika-vin02t:670_1: Pañcame anovassakaṃ atikkāmentiyāti channassa anto nisīditvā pakkamantiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:675_1: Tatiye visibbetvāti dussibbitaṃ puna sibbanatthāya visibbetvā vijaṭetvā.
tika-vin02t:675_2: Aññatra catūhapañcāhāti visibbitadivasato pañca divase atikkamitvā.
tika-vin02t:676_1: Catutthe pañcannaṃ cīvarānanti ticīvaraṃ udakasāṭikā saṅkaccikāti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ cīvarānaṃ.
tika-vin02t:678_4: vinā ānisaṃsadassanena antarāyakaraṇanti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:680_6: Caturassaambaṇakatāḷaṃ nāma rukkhasāradantādīsu yena kenaci caturassaambaṇaṃ katvā catūsu passesu cammena onandhitvā katavāditabhaṇḍaṃ.
tika-vin02t:680_12: ṭhapetvā sahadhammike mātāpitaro ca aññesaṃ dānaṃ,
tika-vin02t:682_1: Dasame dhammikaṃ kathinuddhāranti sabbāsaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ akālacīvaraṃ dātukāmena upāsakena yattako atthāramūlako ānisaṃso,
tika-vin02t:682_2: tato adhikaṃ vā samakaṃ vā datvā yācitakena samaggena bhikkhunisaṅghena yaṃ kathinaṃ ñattidutiyena kammena antarā uddharīyati,
tika-vin02t:686_1: Cittāgāravaggassa paṭhame kīḷanaupavananti antonagare ṭhitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:686_6: tāni passantiyā anāpattī”ti vacanato “antoārāme tattha tattha gantvā naccādīni passituṃ labhatī”tipi siddhaṃ.
tika-vin02t:688_4: Tattha āthabbaṇamanto nāma āthabbaṇavedavihito parūpaghātakaro manto,
tika-vin02t:688_5: khīlanamanto nāma dārusārakhīlaṃ mantetvā pathaviyaṃ pavesetvā māraṇamanto,
tika-vin02t:694_1: Kumāribhūtavaggassa paṭhame sabbapaṭhamā dve mahāsikkhamānāti gabbhinivagge sabbapaṭhamaṃ vuttā dve sikkhamānā.
tika-vin02t:694_2: Sikkhamānā icceva vattabbāti sammutikammādīsu evaṃ vattabbā.
tika-vin02t:694_3: Gihigatāti vā kumāribhūtāti vā na vattabbāti sace vadanti,
tika-vin02t:695_1: Dasame apubbasamuṭṭhānasīsanti paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānādīsu terasasu samuṭṭhānesu ananuññātasamuṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:695_2: Tañhi ito pubbe tādisassa samuṭṭhānasīsassa anāgatattā “apubbasamuṭṭhānasīsa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:699_1: Chattupāhanavaggassa ekādasame upacāraṃ sandhāyāti samantā dvādasahatthupacāraṃ sandhāya.
tika-vin02t:701_0: Giraggasamajjādīni acittakāni lokavajjānīti vuttattā naccanti vā vaṇṇakanti vā ajānitvāva passantiyā
tika-vin02t:701_1: vā nahāyantiyā vā āpattisambhavato vatthuajānanacittena acittakāni,
tika-vin02t:701_2: naccanti vā vaṇṇakanti vā jānitvā passantiyā vā nahāyantiyā vā akusaleneva āpajjanato lokavajjānīti veditabbāni.
tika-vin02t:701_3: Corīvuṭṭhāpanādīni corītiādinā vatthuṃ jānitvā karaṇe eva āpattisambhavato sacittakāni,
tika-vin02t:701_5: “Idha sacittakācittakatā paṇṇattijānanājānanatāya aggahetvā vatthujānanājānanatāya gahetabbā”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:706_1: Pāṭidesanīyā nāma ye aṭṭha dhammā saṅkhepeneva saṅgahaṃ āruḷhāti sambandho.
tika-vin02t:709_0: Ye pana pañcasattati sekhiyā dhammā uddiṭṭhā,
tika-vin02t:709_1: ye ca tesaṃ anantarā sattādhikaraṇavhayā dhammā uddiṭṭhāti sambandho.
tika-vin02t:709_4: Taṃ atthavinicchayaṃ tādisaṃyeva yasmā vidū vadantīti attho.
tika-vin02t:710_1: Sabbāsavapahaṃ magganti sabbāsavavighātakaṃ arahattamaggaṃ patvā sasantāne uppādetvā.
tika-vin02t:719_0: Idāni ubhatovibhaṅgānantaraṃ saṅgahamāropitassa mahāvaggacūḷavaggasaṅgahitassa khandhakassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ
tika-vin02t:719_3: Pātimokkhaggahaṇena hettha tesaṃ vibhaṅgo abhedena gahito.
tika-vin02t:719_7: “Khandhā”ti cettha pabbajjupasampadādivinayakammasaṅkhātā cārittavārittasikkhāpadasaṅkhātā ca paññattiyo adhippetā.
tika-vin02t:719_10: Apica bhāgarāsaṭṭhatāpettha yujjatiyeva tāsaṃ paññattīnaṃ bhāgato rāsito ca vibhattattā.
tika-vin02t:720_0: Padabhājanīye yesaṃ padānaṃ atthā yehi aṭṭhakathānayehi pakāsitāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:720_1: Te ce puna vadeyyāmāti te ce aṭṭhakathānaye punapi vadeyyāma.
tika-vin02t:720_2: Atha vā padabhājanīye yesaṃ padānaṃ ye atthā heṭṭhā pakāsitā,
tika-vin02t:720_3: te ce atthe puna vadeyyāmāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:720_7: Uttānā ceva ye atthāti ye atthā pubbe apakāsitāpi uttānā agambhīrā.
tika-vin02t:721_1: Visesakāraṇaṃ natthīti “yena samayena āyasmato sāriputtattherassa sikkhāpadapaññattiyācanahetubhūto parivitakko udapādi,
tika-vin02t:721_2: tena samayenā”tiādinā vuttakāraṇaṃ viya idha visesakāraṇaṃ natthi.
tika-vin02t:721_4: Kiṃ panetassa vacane payojananti yadi visesakāraṇaṃ natthi,
tika-vin02t:722_3: Uru maru sikatā vālukā vaṇṇu vālikāti ime saddā samānatthā,
tika-vin02t:725_0: Tasmā mayaṃ karissāma, tāsaṃ atthassa dīpanaṃ.
tika-vin02t:726_8: nāmameva vā etaṃ tassā nadiyāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:726_9: Tassā nadiyā tīre yattha bhagavā vihāsi,
tika-vin02t:726_11: “Bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇa”nti ettha maggañāṇaṃ bodhīti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:726_13: Tadubhayampi bodhiṃ bhagavā ettha pattoti rukkhopi “bodhirukkho”tveva nāmaṃ labhi.
tika-vin02t:726_14: Atha vā satta bojjhaṅge bujjhatīti bhagavā bodhi.
tika-vin02t:726_15: Tena bujjhantena sannissitattā so rukkho “bodhirukkho”ti nāmaṃ labhi.
tika-vin02t:726_16: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ekadeseneva atthaṃ dassetuṃ “bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:726_20: tasmā abhisambuddho hutvā sabbapaṭhamaṃ bodhirukkhamūle viharatīti evamettha sambandho veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:727_0: Atha kho bhagavāti ettha athāti tasmiṃ samayeti evamattho gahetabbo anekatthattā nipātānaṃ,
tika-vin02t:727_1: yasmiṃ samaye abhisambuddho hutvā bodhirukkhamūle viharati,
tika-vin02t:727_3: Teneva udānapāḷiyaṃ “tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena nisinno hoti vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:727_4: Athāti vā pacchāti imasmiṃ atthe nipāto,
tika-vin02t:727_9: Yasmā bhagavā taṃ sattāhaṃ nirantaratāya accantameva phalasamāpattisukhena vihāsi,
tika-vin02t:727_11: Ekapallaṅkenāti visākhapuṇṇamāya anatthaṅgateyeva sūriye aparājitapallaṅkavasena vajirāsane nisinnakālato
tika-vin02t:727_12: paṭṭhāya sakimpi anuṭṭhahitvā yathābhujitena ekeneva pallaṅkena.
tika-vin02t:728_1: paṭippassaddhivimuttisaṅkhātā bhagavato phalavimutti adhippetāti āha “vimuttisukhaṃ phalasamāpattisukhaṃ
tika-vin02t:728_3: Vimuttīti ca upakkilesehi paṭippassaddhivasena cittassa vimuttabhāvo,
tika-vin02t:728_7: upekkhā sante sukhe vuttā bhagavatā”ti vacanato upekkhāpi cettha sukhamicceva veditabbā.
tika-vin02t:728_8: Tathā hi vuttaṃ sammohavinodaniyaṃ “upekkhā pana santattā,
tika-vin02t:728_12: Atha vā “tesaṃ vūpasamo sukho”tiādīsu yathā saṅkhāradukkhavūpasamo “sukho”ti vuccati,
tika-vin02t:728_13: evaṃ sakalakilesadukkhūpasamabhāvato aggaphale labbhamānā paṭippassaddhivimutti eva idha “sukha”nti veditabbā.
tika-vin02t:729_2: Tesu adhikāratthena “athā”ti iminā vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedanato aññaṃ adhikāraṃ dasseti.
tika-vin02t:729_7: Bhagavā hi tassā rattiyā sakalampi paṭhamaṃ yāmaṃ teneva manasikārena yutto ahosīti.
tika-vin02t:730_3: Paṭimukhagamanañca paccayassa kāraṇasāmaggiyā aṅgabhāvena phalassa uppādanameva.
tika-vin02t:730_4: Apaṭikkhipitvāti pana vinā tāya kāraṇasāmaggiyā aṅgabhāvaṃ agantvā sayameva na uppādetīti attho.
tika-vin02t:730_9: Avijjādiko hi paccayadhammo sahiteyeva aññamaññaṃ avinibbhogavuttidhamme uppādeti.
tika-vin02t:730_12: Ekato hi kāraṇato na idha kiñci ekaṃ phalamatthi,
tika-vin02t:730_16: Tathā hi anekehi utupathavībījasalilasaṅkhātehi kāraṇehi anekameva rūpagandharasādiaṅkurasaṅkhātaṃ phalamuppajjamānaṃ dissati.
tika-vin02t:731_0: Bhagavā hi katthaci padhānattā katthaci pākaṭattā katthaci asādhāraṇattā desanāvilāsassa ca veneyyānañca anurūpato ekameva hetuṃ vā phalaṃ vā dīpeti.
tika-vin02t:731_2: Phasso hi vedanāya padhānahetu yathāphassaṃ vedanāvavatthānato.
tika-vin02t:731_3: Vedanā ca phassassa padhānaphalaṃ yathāvedanaṃ phassavavatthānato.
tika-vin02t:731_9: sabbete ayonisomanasikāramūlakā”ti asādhāraṇattā ekaṃ hetuṃ āha.
tika-vin02t:731_12: Tasmā avijjā tāvettha vijjamānesupi aññesu vatthārammaṇasahajātadhammādīsu saṅkhārakāraṇesu “assādānupassino
tika-vin02t:731_13: taṇhā pavaḍḍhatī”ti ca “avijjāsamudayā āsavasamudayo”ti ca vacanato aññesampi taṇhādīnaṃ saṅkhārahetūnaṃ
tika-vin02t:731_16: avijjāgato puññābhisaṅkhārampi abhisaṅkharotī”ti pākaṭattā asādhāraṇattā ca saṅkhārānaṃ hetubhāvena dīpitāti veditabbā.
tika-vin02t:731_17: Evaṃ sabbattha ekekahetuphaladīpane yathāsambhavaṃ nayo netabbo.
tika-vin02t:732_0: “Ekaṃ na ekato idha, nānekamanekatopi no ekaṃ;
tika-vin02t:734_4: Paccayadhammo hi attano phalaṃ uppādento sampuṇṇameva uppādeti,
tika-vin02t:734_9: Iti paṭicco ca so samuppādo cāti paṭiccasamuppādoti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin02t:734_11: Mayampi taṃ atipapañcabhayā idha na dassayissāma,
tika-vin02t:734_15: Purimanayena vā vuttoti “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādinā nayena vutto paccayākāro.
tika-vin02t:734_17: Manasi akāsīti yo yo paccayadhammo yassa yassa paccayuppannadhammassa yathā yathā hetupaccayādinā paccayabhāvena paccayo hoti,
tika-vin02t:734_18: taṃ sabbaṃ aviparītaṃ aparihāpetvā anavasesato paccavekkhaṇavasena citte akāsīti attho.
tika-vin02t:735_3: antavirahite saṃsāre bhavādīsu satte javāpetīti avijjā,
tika-vin02t:735_8: Paṭicca naṃ na vinā phalaṃ eti uppajjati ceva pavattati cāti paccayo,
tika-vin02t:735_10: Avijjā ca sā paccayo cāti avijjāpaccayo,
tika-vin02t:736_13: atha kho sabbapadehi “sambhavantī”ti padassa yojanā kātabbā.
tika-vin02t:736_14: Evañhi avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā sambhavantīti paccayapaccayuppannavavatthānaṃ dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:736_15: Tenevāha “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā sambhavantīti iminā nayena sabbapadesu attho veditabbo”ti.
tika-vin02t:737_3: asesetvā nissesetvā nirodhā samucchindanā anusayappahānavasena aggamaggena avijjāya accantasamugghātatoti attho.
tika-vin02t:737_4: Yadipi heṭṭhimamaggehipi pahīyamānā avijjā accantasamugghātavaseneva pahīyati,
tika-vin02t:737_7: tathā sakideva imasmiṃ loke sabbattha ca anariyabhūmiyaṃ upapattiyā paccayabhūtā avijjā yathākkamaṃ dutiyatatiyamaggehi pahīyati,
tika-vin02t:737_10: Anuppādanirodho hotīti sabbesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ anavasesaṃ anuppādanirodho hoti.
tika-vin02t:737_11: Heṭṭhimena hi maggattayena keci saṅkhārā nirujjhanti,
tika-vin02t:737_13: aggamaggena panassā anavasesanirodhā na keci saṅkhārā na nirujjhantīti.
tika-vin02t:737_14: Evaṃ niruddhānanti evaṃ anuppādanirodhena niruddhānaṃ. Kevala-
tika-vin02t:738_1: saṅkhāranirodhā viññāṇanirodho”ti ettāvatāpi sakalassa dukkhakkhandhassa anavasesato nirodho vutto hoti,
tika-vin02t:738_2: tathāpi yathā anulome yassa yassa paccayadhammassa atthitāya yo yo paccayuppannadhammo na nirujjhati
tika-vin02t:738_3: pavattati evāti imassa atthassa dassanatthaṃ “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā…pe…
tika-vin02t:738_5: Evaṃ tappaṭipakkhato tassa tassa paccayassa abhāve so so paccayuppannadhammo nirujjhati na pavattatīti
tika-vin02t:738_10: na pana anulome viya kālattayapariyāpannassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodhadassanatthaṃ.
tika-vin02t:738_11: Anāgatasseva hi ariyamaggabhāvanāya asati uppajjanārahassa dukkhakkhandhassa ariyamaggabhāvanāya nirodho icchitoti ayampi viseso veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:739_0: Yadā haveti ettha haveti byattanti imasmiṃ atthe nipāto.
tika-vin02t:739_1: Keci pana “haveti āhave yuddhe”ti atthaṃ vadanti,
tika-vin02t:739_2: “yodhetha māraṃ paññāvudhenā”ti hi vacanato kilesamārena yujjhanasamayeti tesaṃ adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:739_5: Tattha ārammaṇūpanijjhānaṃ nāma aṭṭha samāpattiyo kasiṇārammaṇassa upanijjhāyanato.
tika-vin02t:739_7: Vipassanā hi tīṇi lakkhaṇāni upanijjhāyatīti lakkhaṇūpanijjhānaṃ,
tika-vin02t:740_2: tatrassa kallo pañho ‘ko nu kho, bhante,
tika-vin02t:740_5: evaṃ maṃ avadantaṃ yo evaṃ puccheyya ‘kiṃpaccayā nu kho, bhante,
tika-vin02t:740_15: tatrassa kallo pañho ‘ko nu kho, bhante,
tika-vin02t:740_18: Evaṃ maṃ avadantaṃ yo evaṃ puccheyya ‘kiṃpaccayā nu kho, bhante,
tika-vin02t:742_1: saddena pana “katamā nu kho, bhante, jāti,
tika-vin02t:742_3: ‘No kallo pañho’ti bhagavā avocā”ti evamādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin02t:742_7: yathā pana satasahassagghanake suvaṇṇathālake vaḍḍhitassa subhojanassa matthake āmalakamatte gūthapiṇḍe
tika-vin02t:742_8: ṭhapite sabbaṃ bhojanaṃ dubbhojanaṃ hoti chaḍḍetabbaṃ,
tika-vin02t:742_9: evameva “kassa ca panidaṃ jarāmaraṇa”nti iminā sattūpaladdhivādapadena gūthapiṇḍena taṃ bhojanaṃ dubbhojanaṃ viya ayampi sabbo duppañho jātoti.
tika-vin02t:743_0: Soḷasa kaṅkhāti “ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhānaṃ,
tika-vin02t:743_4: kiṃ hutvā kiṃ ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhānaṃ,
tika-vin02t:743_9: kiṃ hutvā kiṃ bhavissāmi nu kho ahaṃ anāgatamaddhānaṃ,
tika-vin02t:743_14: ayaṃ nu kho satto kuto āgato,
tika-vin02t:743_15: so kuhiṃ gāmī bhavissatī”ti evamāgatā atītānāgatapaccuppannavisayā soḷasavidhā kaṅkhā.
tika-vin02t:744_1: na nu khoti sassatākārañca adhiccasamuppattiākārañca nissāya atīte attano vijjamānatañca avijjamānatañca kaṅkhati,
tika-vin02t:744_3: Ummattako viya hi bālaputhujjano yathā tathā vā pavattati.
tika-vin02t:744_7: Nanu ca puthujjanopi yoniso manasi karotīti.
tika-vin02t:744_11: Na hi macchamaṃsādīni attano pakatiyā sugandhāni,
tika-vin02t:745_0: Kiṃ nu kho ahosinti jātiliṅgupapattiyo nissāya “khattiyo nu kho ahosiṃ,
tika-vin02t:746_0: Kathaṃ nu khoti saṇṭhānākāraṃ nissāya “dīgho nu kho ahosiṃ,
tika-vin02t:746_2: Keci pana “issaranimmānādiṃ nissāya ‘kena nu kho kāraṇena ahosi’nti hetuto kaṅkhatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:747_0: Kiṃ hutvā kiṃ ahosinti jātiādīni nissāya “khattiyo hutvā nu kho brāhmaṇo ahosiṃ…pe…
tika-vin02t:747_1: devo hutvā manusso”ti attano paramparaṃ kaṅkhati.
tika-vin02t:748_1: na nu khoti sassatākārañca ucchedākārañca nissāya anāgate attano vijjamānatañca avijjamānatañca kaṅkhati.
tika-vin02t:749_0: Ahaṃ nu khosmīti attano atthibhāvaṃ kaṅkhati.
tika-vin02t:749_7: So uṭṭhāya “ahaṃ nu kho cūḷamātāya putto”ti cintesi.
tika-vin02t:750_0: No nu khosmīti attano natthibhāvaṃ kaṅkhati.
tika-vin02t:750_2: eko kira macche gaṇhanto udake ciraṭṭhānena sītibhūtaṃ attano ūruṃ “maccho”ti cintetvā pahari.
tika-vin02t:750_3: Aparo susānapasse khettaṃ rakkhanto bhīto saṅkuṭito sayi.
tika-vin02t:750_4: So paṭibujjhitvā attano jaṇṇukāni “dve yakkhā”ti cintetvā pahari,
tika-vin02t:751_0: Kiṃ nu khosmīti khattiyova samāno attano khattiyabhāvaṃ kaṅkhati kaṇṇo viya sūtaputtasaññī.
tika-vin02t:751_2: Devo pana samāno devabhāvaṃ ajānanto nāma natthi.
tika-vin02t:751_3: Sopi pana “ahaṃ rūpī nu kho arūpī nu kho”tiādinā nayena kaṅkhati.
tika-vin02t:751_5: Appaccakkhā tesaṃ tattha tattha kule uppatti.
tika-vin02t:751_7: Pabbajitāpi “kuppaṃ nu kho me kamma”ntiādinā nayena gahaṭṭhasaññino.
tika-vin02t:751_8: Manussāpi ca ekacce rājāno viya attani devasaññino honti.
tika-vin02t:752_1: Kevalañhettha abbhantare jīvo nāma atthīti gahetvā tassa saṇṭhānākāraṃ nissāya “dīgho nu khosmi,
tika-vin02t:752_2: rassacaturassachaḷaṃsaaṭṭhaṃsasoḷasaṃsādīnaṃ aññatarappakāro”ti kaṅkhanto “kathaṃ nu khosmī”ti kaṅkhatīti veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:752_3: Sarīrasaṇṭhānaṃ pana paccuppannaṃ ajānanto nāma natthi.
tika-vin02t:753_0: Kuto āgato, so kuhiṃ gāmī bhavissatīti attabhāvassa āgatigatiṭṭhānaṃ kaṅkhati.
tika-vin02t:755_1: Kadā panassa bodhipakkhiyadhammā catusaccadhammā vā pātubhavanti uppajjanti pakāsantīti?
