tika-vin02t:755_3: Tattha vipassanāñāṇe tāva vipassanāñāṇasampayuttā satiādayo vipassanāñāṇañca yathārahaṃ attano attano
tika-vin02t:755_4: visayesu tadaṅgappahānavasena subhasaññādike pajahantā kāyānupassanādivasena visuṃ visuṃ uppajjanti.
tika-vin02t:755_5: Maggakkhaṇe pana te nibbānamālambitvā samucchedavasena paṭipakkhe pajahantā catūsupi ariyasaccesu asammohapaṭivedhasādhanavasena sakideva uppajjanti.
tika-vin02t:755_6: Evaṃ tāvettha bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ uppajjanaṭṭhena pātubhāvo veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:755_7: Ariyasaccadhammānaṃ pana lokiyānaṃ vipassanākkhaṇe vipassanāya ārammaṇakaraṇavasena lokuttarānaṃ tadadhimuttatāvasena
tika-vin02t:755_8: maggakkhaṇe nirodhasaccassa ārammaṇābhisamayavasena sabbesampi kiccābhisamayavasena pākaṭabhāvato pakāsanaṭṭhena
tika-vin02t:756_0: Iti bhagavā satipi sabbākārena sabbadhammānaṃ attano ñāṇassa pākaṭabhāve paṭiccasamuppādamukhena vipassanābhinivesassa
tika-vin02t:756_1: katattā nipuṇagambhīrasududdasatāya paccayākārassa taṃ paccavekkhitvā uppannabalavasomanasso paṭipakkhasamucchedavibhāvanena
tika-vin02t:757_0: “Kāmā te paṭhamā senā”tiādinā nayena vuttappakāraṃ mārasenanti –
tika-vin02t:758_0: “Kāmā te paṭhamā senā, dutiyā arati vuccati;
tika-vin02t:759_0: Tatiyā khuppipāsā te, catutthī taṇhā pavuccati.
tika-vin02t:761_0: Sattamī vicikicchā te, makkho thambho ca aṭṭhamā.
tika-vin02t:762_0: “Lābho siloko sakkāro, micchāladdho ca yo yaso;
tika-vin02t:763_0: Yo cattānaṃ samukkaṃse, pare ca avajānati.
tika-vin02t:765_0: Na naṃ asūro jināti, jetvā ca labhate sukha”nti. –
tika-vin02t:767_0: Tattha yasmā āditova agāriyabhūte satte vatthukāmesu kilesakāmā mohayanti,
tika-vin02t:767_1: te abhibhuyya anagāriyabhāvaṃ upagatānaṃ pantesu vā senāsanesu aññataraññataresu vā adhikusalesu dhammesu arati uppajjati.
tika-vin02t:767_5: tāya bādhitānaṃ pariyesana taṇhā cittaṃ kilamayati,
tika-vin02t:767_7: tato visesamanadhigacchantānaṃ durabhisambhavesu araññavanapatthesu senāsanesu viharataṃ utrāsasaññitā bhīru jāyati,
tika-vin02t:767_8: tesaṃ ussaṅkitaparisaṅkitānaṃ dīgharattaṃ vivekarasamanassādayamānānaṃ viharataṃ “na siyā nu kho esa maggo”ti paṭipattiyaṃ vicikicchā uppajjati,
tika-vin02t:767_9: taṃ vinodetvā viharataṃ appamattakena visesādhigamena mānamakkhathambhā jāyanti,
tika-vin02t:767_10: tepi vinodetvā viharataṃ tato adhikataraṃ visesādhigamaṃ nissāya lābhasakkārasilokā uppajjanti,
tika-vin02t:767_11: lābhādimucchitā dhammapatirūpakāni pakāsentā micchāyasaṃ adhigantvā tattha ṭhitā jātiādīhi attānaṃ ukkaṃsenti paraṃ vambhenti,
tika-vin02t:768_0: Evametaṃ dasavidhaṃ senaṃ uddisitvā yasmā sā kaṇhadhammasamannāgatattā kaṇhassa namucino upakārāya saṃvattati,
tika-vin02t:768_1: tasmā naṃ “tava senā”ti niddisantena “esā namuci te senā,
tika-vin02t:768_6: jetvā ca labhate sukhanti evaṃ tava senaṃ asūro kāye ca jīvite ca sāpekkho puriso na jināti,
tika-vin02t:768_8: jetvā ca maggasukhaṃ phalasukhañca adhigacchatīti attho.
tika-vin02t:769_0: Idāni “tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena nisinno hoti vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedī.
tika-vin02t:769_1: Atha kho bhagavā tassa sattāhassa accayena tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhahitvā rattiyā paṭhamaṃ yāmaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ anulomaṃ sādhukaṃ manasākāsi.
tika-vin02t:769_2: Rattiyā majjhimaṃ yāmaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ paṭilomaṃ sādhukaṃ manasākāsi.
tika-vin02t:769_3: Rattiyā pacchimaṃ yāmaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ anulomapaṭilomaṃ sādhukaṃ manasākāsī”ti evaṃ vuttāya udānapāḷiyā
tika-vin02t:769_4: imissā ca khandhakapāḷiyā avirodhaṃ dassetuṃ “udāne panā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin02t:769_5: Ettha tassa vasenāti tassa paccayākārapajānanassa paccayakkhayādhigamassa ca vasena.
tika-vin02t:769_7: Pāṭipadarattiyā evaṃ manasākāsīti rattiyā tīsupi yāmesu anulomapaṭilomaṃyeva manasākāsi.
tika-vin02t:769_8: Bhagavā kira ṭhapetvā ratanagharasattāhaṃ sesesu chasu sattāhesu antarantarā dhammaṃ paccavekkhitvā yebhuyyena vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedī vihāsi,
tika-vin02t:769_10: Tasmā antarantarā dhammapaccavekkhaṇavasena uppāditamanasikāresu pāṭipadarattiyā uppāditaṃ manasikāraṃ
tika-vin02t:769_11: sandhāya imissaṃ khandhakapāḷiyaṃ evaṃ vuttanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:772_2: Tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhahitvāti tato arahattaphalasamāpattisamādhito yathākālaparicchedaṃ vuṭṭhahitvā.
tika-vin02t:772_3: Aññepi buddhattakarāti visākhapuṇṇamito paṭṭhāya rattindivaṃ evaṃ niccasamāhitabhāvahetubhūtānaṃ buddhaguṇānaṃ upari aññepi buddhattasādhakā.
tika-vin02t:772_4: “Ayaṃ buddho”ti buddhabhāvassa paresaṃ vibhāvanā dhammā kiṃ nu kho santīti yojanā.
tika-vin02t:772_5: Ekaccānaṃ devatānanti yā adhigatamaggā sacchikatanirodhā ekapadesena buddhaguṇe jānanti,
tika-vin02t:772_9: “Ratanabhūtānaṃ sattannaṃ pakaraṇānaṃ tattha ca anuttarassa dhammaratanassa sammasanena taṃ ṭhānaṃ ratanagharacetiyaṃ nāma jāta”ntipi vadanti.
tika-vin02t:772_10: Teneva aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ “ratanagharaṃ nāma na ratanamayaṃ gehaṃ,
tika-vin02t:772_11: sattannaṃ pana pakaraṇānaṃ sammasitaṭṭhānaṃ ratanagharanti veditabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:773_0: Kasmā panāyaṃ ajapālanigrodho nāma jātoti āha “tassa kirā”tiādi.
tika-vin02t:773_1: Keci pana “yasmā tattha vede sajjhāyituṃ asamatthā mahallakabrāhmaṇā pākāraparikkhepayuttāni nivesanāni katvā sabbe vasiṃsu,
tika-vin02t:773_6: Ajapā lanti ādiyanti nivāsaṃ etthāti ajapāloti.
tika-vin02t:773_7: Apare pana vadanti “yasmā majjhanhike samaye anto paviṭṭhe aje attano chāyāya pāleti rakkhati,
tika-vin02t:774_0: Vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedentoti dhammaṃ vicinantoyeva antarantarā vimuttisukhañca paṭisaṃvedento.
tika-vin02t:774_1: “Dhammaṃ vicinanto vimuttisukhañca paṭisaṃvedento”ti evaṃ vā ettha pāṭho gahetabbo.
tika-vin02t:774_3: Dhammaṃ vicinanto cettha evaṃ abhidhamme nayamaggaṃ sammasi paṭhamaṃ dhammasaṅgaṇīpakaraṇaṃ nāma,
tika-vin02t:774_10: Tatthassa saṇhasukhumaṭṭhānamhi citte otiṇṇe pīti uppajji,
tika-vin02t:774_13: chaviyā pasannāya puratthimakāyato kūṭāgārādippamāṇā rasmiyo uṭṭhahitvā ākāse pakkhandaṃ chaddantanāgakulaṃ
tika-vin02t:774_17: vāmaṃsakūṭato uṭṭhahitvā uttaradisāya anantāni cakkavāḷāni pakkhandā.
tika-vin02t:774_18: Pādatalehi pavāḷaṅkuravaṇṇā rasmiyo nikkhamitvā mahāpathaviṃ vinibbijjha udakaṃ dvidhā bhinditvā vātakkhandhaṃ padāletvā ajaṭākāsaṃ pakkhandā.
tika-vin02t:774_19: Sīsato saṃparivattiyamānaṃ maṇidāmaṃ viya nīlavaṇṇarasmivaṭṭi uṭṭhahitvā cha devaloke vinivijjhitvā nava brahmaloke atikkamma ajaṭākāsaṃ pakkhandā.
tika-vin02t:774_20: Tasmiṃ divase aparimāṇesu cakkavāḷesu aparimāṇā sattā sabbe suvaṇṇavaṇṇāva ahesuṃ.
tika-vin02t:774_21: Taṃ divasañca pana bhagavato sarīrā nikkhantā yāvajjadivasāpi kira tā rasmiyo anantalokadhātuyo gacchantiyeva.
tika-vin02t:774_22: Na kevalañca imasmiṃyeva sattāhe dhammaṃ vicinantassa sarīrato rasmiyo nikkhamiṃsu,
tika-vin02t:774_23: atha kho ratanagharasattāhepi paṭṭhānaṃ sammasantassa evameva sarīrato rasmiyo nikkhantā evāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:776_0: “Imesu ca ekavīsatiyā divasesu ekadivasepi satthu sarīrato rasmiyo na nikkhantā,
tika-vin02t:776_1: catutthe pana sattāhe pacchimuttarāya disāya ratanaghare nisīdi.
tika-vin02t:776_2: Tattha dhammasaṅgaṇiṃ sammasantassapi sarīrato rasmiyo na nikkhantā.
tika-vin02t:776_10: athassa catuvīsatisamantapaṭṭhānaṃ sammasantassa ekantato sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ mahāpakaraṇe okāsaṃ labhi.
tika-vin02t:776_11: Yathā hi timirapiṅgalamahāmaccho caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīre mahāsamuddeyeva okāsaṃ labhati,
tika-vin02t:776_12: evameva sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ ekantato mahāpakaraṇeyeva okāsaṃ labhi.
tika-vin02t:777_0: “Satthu evaṃ laddhokāsena sabbaññutaññāṇena yathāsukhaṃ saṇhasukhumadhammaṃ sammasantassa sarīrato nīlapītalohitodātamañjiṭṭhapabhassaravasena
tika-vin02t:777_2: Kesamassūhi ceva akkhīnañca nīlaṭṭhānehi nīlarasmiyo nikkhamiṃsu,
tika-vin02t:777_3: yāsaṃ vasena gaganatalaṃ añjanacuṇṇasamokiṇṇaṃ viya umāpupphanīluppaladalasañchannaṃ viya vītipatantamaṇitālavaṇṭaṃ
tika-vin02t:777_5: Chavito ceva akkhīnañca pītaṭṭhānehi pītarasmiyo nikkhamiṃsu,
tika-vin02t:777_6: yāsaṃ vasena disābhāgā suvaṇṇarasanisiñcamānā viya suvaṇṇapaṭapasāritā viya kuṅkumacuṇṇakaṇikārapupphasamparikiṇṇā viya ca virociṃsu.
tika-vin02t:777_7: Maṃsalohitehi ceva akkhīnañca rattaṭṭhānehi lohitarasmiyo nikkhamiṃsu,
tika-vin02t:777_8: yāsaṃ vasena disābhāgā cīnapiṭṭhacuṇṇarañjitā viya supakkalākhārasanisiñcamānā viya rattakambalaparikkhittā
tika-vin02t:777_10: Aṭṭhīhi ceva dantehi ca akkhīnañca setaṭṭhānehi odātarasmiyo nikkhamiṃsu,
tika-vin02t:777_11: yāsaṃ vasena disābhāgā rajatakuṭehi āsiñcamānakhīradhārāsamparikiṇṇā viya pasāritarajatapaṭavitānā viya
tika-vin02t:777_13: Mañjiṭṭhapabhassarā pana tamhā tamhā sarīrappadesā nikkhamiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:777_14: Iti tā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo nikkhamitvā ghanamahāpathaviṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:778_2: Pathavīsandhārakaṃ aṭṭhanahutādhikacatuyojanasatasahassabahalaṃ udakaṃ suvaṇṇakalasehi āsiñcamānavilīnasuvaṇṇaṃ viya ahosi.
tika-vin02t:778_14: tato pañca suddhāvāse vinivijjhitvā cattāro āruppe gaṇhiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:778_15: Cattāro ca āruppe vinivijjhitvā ajaṭākāsaṃ pakkhandiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:779_4: devatānaṃ uyyānavimānakapparukkhesu sarīre ābharaṇesūti sabbattha pabhā natthi.
tika-vin02t:779_5: Tisahassimahāsahassilokadhātuyā ālokapharaṇasamattho mahābrahmāpi sūriyuggamane khajjopanako viya ahosi,
tika-vin02t:779_10: Saṇhasukhumadhammaṃ pana sammasato lokanāthassa lohitaṃ pasīdi,
tika-vin02t:779_13: Cittasamuṭṭhānā vaṇṇadhātu samantā asītihatthamatte padese niccalā aṭṭhāsī”ti.
tika-vin02t:780_0: Evaṃ nisinneti tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhahitvā nisinne.
tika-vin02t:780_1: Eko brāhmaṇoti nāmagottavasena anabhiññāto apākaṭo eko brāhmaṇo.
tika-vin02t:780_2: “Huṃ hu”nti karonto vicaratīti sabbaṃ acokkhajātikaṃ passitvā jigucchanto “huṃ hu”nti karonto vicarati.
tika-vin02t:780_3: Etadavocāti etaṃ idāni vattabbaṃ “kittāvatā nu kho”tiādivacanaṃ avoca.
tika-vin02t:780_8: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “bhovādi nāma so hoti,
tika-vin02t:780_11: Kathaṃ panāyaṃ brāhmaṇo sampati samāgato bhagavato gottaṃ jānātīti?
tika-vin02t:780_13: chabbassāni padhānakaraṇakāle upaṭṭhahantehi pañcavaggiyehi saddhiṃ caramāno aparabhāge taṃ vataṃ chaḍḍetvā
tika-vin02t:780_14: uruvelāyaṃ senanigame eko adutiyo hutvā piṇḍāya caramānopi tena brāhmaṇena diṭṭhapubbo ceva sallapitapubbo ca,
tika-vin02t:780_15: tena so pubbe pañcavaggiyehi gayhamānaṃ bhagavato gottaṃ anussaranto “bho gotamā”ti bhagavantaṃ gottena ālapati.
tika-vin02t:780_16: Yato paṭṭhāya vā bhagavā mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhanto anomānadītīre pabbaji,
tika-vin02t:780_17: tato pabhuti “samaṇo gotamo”ti cando viya sūriyo viya pākaṭo paññāto hoti,
tika-vin02t:780_18: na ca tassa gottajānane kāraṇaṃ gavesitabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:780_21: Ettha ca “kittāvatā”ti etena yehi dhammehi brāhmaṇo hoti,
tika-vin02t:781_1: na pana tassa brāhmaṇassa dhammaṃ desesi. Kasmā?
tika-vin02t:781_3: Tathā hi tassa brāhmaṇassa imaṃ gāthaṃ sutvā na saccābhisamayo ahosi.
tika-vin02t:781_6: Dhammacakkappavattanato hi pubbabhāge bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ paresaṃ suṇantānampi tapussabhallikānaṃ saraṇadānaṃ viya vāsanābhāgiyameva jātaṃ,
tika-vin02t:781_9: Vedehi vā antanti ettha antaṃ nāma sabbasaṅkhārapariyosānaṃ nibbānaṃ.
tika-vin02t:781_10: Ime ussadā natthīti sabbaso ime pahīnattā na santi.
tika-vin02t:784_7: Evarūpo kira megho dvīsuyeva kālesu vassati cakkavattimhi vā uppanne buddhe vā,
tika-vin02t:784_9: Pokkharaṇiyā nibbattoti pokkharaṇiyā heṭṭhā nāgabhavanaṃ atthi,
tika-vin02t:784_12: Evaṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvāti satta vāre attano sarīrabhogehi bhagavato kāyaṃ parivāretvā.
tika-vin02t:784_13: Uparimuddhani mahantaṃ phaṇaṃ vihaccāti bhagavato muddhappadesassa upari attano mahantaṃ phaṇaṃ pasāretvā.
tika-vin02t:785_0: Tassa kira nāgarājassa etadahosi “bhagavā ca mayhaṃ bhavanasamīpe rukkhamūle nisinno,
tika-vin02t:785_3: So sattaratanamayaṃ pāsādaṃ nimminituṃ sakkontopi “evaṃ kate kāyasāro gahito na bhavissati,
tika-vin02t:785_4: dasabalassa kāyaveyyāvaccaṃ karissāmī”ti mahantaṃ attabhāvaṃ katvā satthāraṃ sattakkhattuṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvā upari phaṇaṃ dhāresi.
tika-vin02t:785_5: “Tassa parikkhepabbhantaraṃ lohapāsāde bhaṇḍāgāragabbhappamāṇaṃ ahosī”ti idha vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:786_1: ‘icchiticchitena iriyāpathena satthā viharissatī’ti nāgarājassa ajjhāsayo ahosi,
tika-vin02t:787_1: Icchiticchitena iriyāpathena viharissatīti ca nāgarājassa ajjhāsayamattametaṃ,
tika-vin02t:788_1: cintetuṃ yuttanti ettha keci vadanti “uṇhaggahaṇaṃ bhogaparikkhepassa vipulabhāvakaraṇe kāraṇakittanaṃ.
tika-vin02t:788_2: Khuddake hi tasmiṃ bhagavantaṃ nāgarājassa sarīrasambhūtā usmā bādheyya,
tika-vin02t:788_3: vipulabhāvakaraṇena pana tādisaṃ mā uṇhaṃ bādhayitthā”ti.
tika-vin02t:788_4: Saupasaggapadassa attho upasaggena vināpi viññāyatīti āha “viddhanti ubbiddha”nti,
tika-vin02t:788_5: sā cassa ubbiddhatā upakkilesavigamena dūrabhāvena upaṭṭhānanti āha “meghavigamena dūrībhūta”nti.
tika-vin02t:788_6: Indanīlamaṇi viya dibbati jotatīti devo, ākāso.
tika-vin02t:789_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti “vivekasukhapaṭisaṃvedino yattha katthaci sukhameva hotī”ti etaṃ atthaṃ sabbākārena jānitvā.
tika-vin02t:789_1: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ vivekasukhānubhāvadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
tika-vin02t:792_3: Paccaggheti ettha purimaṃ atthavikappaṃ keci na icchanti,
tika-vin02t:792_7: Na hi buddhā bhagavanto mahagghaṃ paṭiggaṇhanti paribhuñjanti vā”ti.
tika-vin02t:795_1: Āciṇṇasamāciṇṇoti ācarito ceva ācarantehi ca sammadeva ācaritoti attho.
tika-vin02t:795_2: Etena ayaṃ parivitakko sabbabuddhānaṃ paṭhamābhisambodhiyaṃ uppajjatevāti ayamettha dhammatāti dasseti.
tika-vin02t:795_7: So visesato loke sambhāvanīyassa garukātabbassa abhipatthanāhetukoti paramparāya sattānaṃ dhammasampaṭipattiyā
tika-vin02t:795_8: brahmuno yācanānimittanti taṃ dassento “brahmunā yācite desetukāmatāyā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin02t:796_3: Gambhīroti mahāsamuddo viya makasatuṇḍasūciyā aññatra samupacitaparipakkañāṇasambhārehi aññesaṃ ñāṇena alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭho.
tika-vin02t:796_7: so ogāhituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya sarūpato ca visesato ca sukhena passituṃ na sakkā,
tika-vin02t:796_8: atha kho kicchena kenaci kadācideva daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin02t:796_12: tassa ogāhetvā anubujjhane kathā eva natthi avabodhassa dukkarabhāvato.
tika-vin02t:796_15: katamaṃ nu kho dukkarataraṃ vā durabhisambhavataraṃ vā”ti suttapadaṃ vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:797_0: Santoti anupasantasabhāvānaṃ kilesānaṃ saṅkhārānañca abhāvato vūpasantasabbapariḷāhatāya santo nibbuto,
tika-vin02t:797_2: Ettha ca nirodhasaccaṃ santaṃ ārammaṇanti santārammaṇaṃ,
tika-vin02t:797_5: Atha vā paṇītoti atittikaraṇaṭṭhena atappako sādurasabhojanaṃ viya.
tika-vin02t:797_8: Atakkāvacaroti uttamañāṇavisayattā takkena avacaritabbo ogāhitabbo na hoti,
tika-vin02t:797_10: Tato eva nipuṇañāṇagocaratāya saṇhasukhumasabhāvattā ca nipuṇo saṇho.
tika-vin02t:797_11: Paṇḍitavedanīyoti bālānaṃ avisayattā sammāpaṭipadaṃ paṭipannehi paṇḍitehi eva veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:798_3: Tattha pañcakāmaguṇe allīyantīti pañcakāmaguṇe sevantīti attho.
tika-vin02t:798_8: tehi ālayehi ramantīti ālayarāmāti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin02t:798_11: Yatheva hi susajjitapupphaphalabharitarukkhādisampannaṃ uyyānaṃ paviṭṭho rājā tāya tāya sampattiyā ramati,
tika-vin02t:798_17: Tena nesaṃ bhagavā duvidhampi ālayaṃ uyyānabhūmiṃ viya dassento “ālayarāmā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin02t:799_1: Atthato pana ṭhānanti ca paṭiccasamuppādo eva adhippeto.
tika-vin02t:799_6: Idappaccayā eva idappaccayatā yathā devo eva devatā.
tika-vin02t:799_7: Idappaccayānaṃ vā avijjādīnaṃ attano phalaṃ paṭicca paccayabhāvo uppādanasamatthatā idappaccayatā.
tika-vin02t:799_13: Yasmā hi taṃ āgamma paṭicca ariyamaggassa ārammaṇapaccayabhāvahetu sabbasaṅkhāravipphanditāni sammanti vūpasammanti,
tika-vin02t:800_0: Yasmā ca taṃ āgamma sabbe upadhayo paṭinissaṭṭhā samucchedavasena pariccattā honti,
tika-vin02t:800_5: yā panesā taṇhā tena tena bhavena bhavantaraṃ bhavanikantibhāvena vinati saṃsibbati,
tika-vin02t:800_6: phalena vā saddhiṃ kammaṃ vinati saṃsibbatīti katvā vānanti vuccati,
tika-vin02t:800_10: citte pana ubhayampetaṃ buddhānaṃ natthi bodhimūleyeva samucchinnattā.
tika-vin02t:800_11: Ettha ca ciranisajjācirabhāsanehi piṭṭhiāgilāyanatālugalasosādivasena kāyakilamatho ceva kāyavihesā ca veditabbā,
tika-vin02t:800_12: sā ca kho desanāya atthaṃ ajānantānañca appaṭipajjantānañca vasena.
tika-vin02t:800_13: Jānantānaṃ pana paṭipajjantānañca desanāya kāyaparissamopi satthu aparissamova,
tika-vin02t:800_14: tenāha bhagavā “na ca maṃ dhammādhikaraṇaṃ vihesetī”ti.
tika-vin02t:801_7: Kappānaṃ cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni satasahassañca sadevakassa lokassa dhammasaṃvibhāgakaraṇatthameva pāramiyo
tika-vin02t:801_8: pūretvā idāni samadhigatadhammarajjassa tattha appossukkatāpattidīpanattā gāthātthassa anuacchariyatā
tika-vin02t:802_2: Pāramīpūraṇakāle pana sarāgasadosasamohasseva sato āgatāgatānaṃ yācakānaṃ alaṅkatappaṭiyattaṃ sīsaṃ kantitvā
tika-vin02t:802_3: galalohitaṃ nīharitvā suañjitāni akkhīni uppāṭetvā kulavaṃsappadīpaṃ puttaṃ manāpacāriniṃ bhariyanti
tika-vin02t:802_4: evamādīni dentassa aññāni ca khantivādisadisesu attabhāvesu chejjabhejjādīni pāpuṇantassa āgamanīyapaṭipadaṃ
tika-vin02t:802_6: iti vā byattanti etasmiṃ atthe nipāto.
tika-vin02t:802_8: Ha byattaṃ ekaṃsena vā alaṃ nippayojanaṃ evaṃ kicchena adhigataṃ dhammaṃ desetunti yojanā.
tika-vin02t:802_9: Halanti vā alanti iminā samānatthaṃ padaṃ “halanti vadāmī”tiādīsu viya.
tika-vin02t:802_12: Evaṃ kicchena adhigatassa dhammassa alaṃ desitaṃ pariyattaṃ desitaṃ,
tika-vin02t:802_15: phuṭṭhavisena viya sappena rāgena dosena ca samphuṭṭhehi abhibhūtehīti attho.
tika-vin02t:802_17: rāgena ca dosena ca anubandhehīti attho.
tika-vin02t:803_0: Paṭisotagāminti niccagāhādīnaṃ paṭisotaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā asubhanti evaṃ gataṃ pavattaṃ catusaccadhammanti attho.
tika-vin02t:803_1: Rāgarattāti kāmarāgena bhavarāgena diṭṭhirāgena ca rattā.
tika-vin02t:803_2: Na dakkhantīti aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā asubhanti iminā sabhāvena na passissanti,
tika-vin02t:803_3: te apassante ko sakkhissati aniccantiādinā sabhāvena yāthāvato dhammaṃ jānāpetunti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:804_0: Appossukkatāya cittaṃ namatīti kasmā panassa evaṃ cittaṃ nami,
tika-vin02t:807_0: Patthanaṃ katvā pāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññutaṃ pattoti?
tika-vin02t:807_2: tadeva paccavekkhaṇānubhāvena panassa evaṃ cittaṃ nami.
tika-vin02t:807_3: Tassa hi sabbaññutaṃ patvā sattānaṃ kilesagahanataṃ dhammassa ca gambhīrataṃ paccavekkhantassa sattānaṃ
tika-vin02t:807_4: kilesagahanatā ca dhammagambhīratā ca sabbākārena pākaṭā jātā.
tika-vin02t:807_5: Athassa “ime sattā kañjiyapuṇṇalābu viya takkabharitacāṭi viya vasātelapītapilotikā viya añjanamakkhitahattho
tika-vin02t:807_6: viya ca kilesabharitā atisaṃkiliṭṭhā rāgarattā dosaduṭṭhā mohamuḷhā,
tika-vin02t:807_7: te kiṃ nāma paṭivijjhissantī”ti cintayato kilesagahanapaccavekkhaṇānubhāvenapi evaṃ cittaṃ nami.
tika-vin02t:808_1: pabbatena paṭicchādetvā ṭhapito sāsapo viya duddaso,
tika-vin02t:808_2: satadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭi viya aṇu.
tika-vin02t:808_3: Mayā hi imaṃ dhammaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ vāyamantena adinnaṃ dānaṃ nāma natthi,
tika-vin02t:808_6: tassa me nirussāhaṃ viya mārabalaṃ vidhamantassapi pathavī na kampittha,
tika-vin02t:808_9: pacchimayāme pana paṭiccasamuppādaṃ paṭivijjhantasseva me dasasahassilokadhātu kampittha.
tika-vin02t:808_10: Iti mādisenapi tikkhañāṇena kicchenevāyaṃ dhammo paṭividdho,
tika-vin02t:808_11: taṃ lokiyamahājanā kathaṃ paṭivijjhissantī”ti dhammagambhīratāya paccavekkhaṇānubhāvenapi evaṃ cittaṃ namīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:809_0: Apica brahmunā yācite desetukāmatāyapissa evaṃ cittaṃ nami.
tika-vin02t:809_1: Jānāti hi bhagavā “mama appossukkatāya citte namamāne mahābrahmā dhammadesanaṃ yācissati,
tika-vin02t:809_3: te ‘satthā kira dhammaṃ na desetukāmo ahosi,
tika-vin02t:809_5: santo vata bho dhammo paṇīto’ti maññamānā sussūsissantī”ti.
tika-vin02t:809_6: Idampissa kāraṇaṃ paṭicca appossukkatāya cittaṃ nami,
tika-vin02t:810_1: Sahampatissāti so kira kassapassa bhagavato sāsane sahako nāma thero paṭhamajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ kappāyukabrahmā hutvā nibbatto,
tika-vin02t:810_4: Nassati vatāti so kira imaṃ saddaṃ tathā nicchāreti,
tika-vin02t:810_6: Apparajakkhajātikāti paññāmaye akkhimhi appaṃ parittaṃ rāgadosamoharajaṃ etesaṃ evaṃsabhāvāti apparajakkhajātikā.
tika-vin02t:810_7: Appaṃ rāgādirajaṃ yesaṃ te sabhāvā apparajakkhajātikāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin02t:810_10: Bhavissantīti purimabuddhesu dasapuññakiriyavasena katādhikārā paripākagatapadumāni viya sūriyarasmisamphassaṃ
tika-vin02t:810_11: dhammadesanaṃyeva ākaṅkhamānā catuppadikagāthāvasāne ariyabhūmiṃ okkamanārahā na eko, na dve,
tika-vin02t:811_1: Samalehi cintitoti samalehi pūraṇakassapādīhi chahi satthārehi cintito.
tika-vin02t:811_2: Te hi puretaraṃ uppajjitvā sakalajambudīpe kaṇṭake pattharamānā viya visaṃ siñcamānā viya ca samalaṃ micchādiṭṭhidhammaṃ desayiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:811_3: Te kira buddhakolāhalānussavena sañjātakutūhalā lokaṃ vañcetvā kohaññe ṭhatvā sabbaññutaṃ paṭijānantā yaṃ kiñci adhammaṃyeva dhammoti dīpesuṃ.
tika-vin02t:811_5: Amatassa dvāranti amatassa nibbānassa dvārabhūtaṃ ariyamaggaṃ.
tika-vin02t:811_7: etaṃ kassapassa bhagavato sāsanantaradhānato pabhuti pihitaṃ nibbānanagarassa mahādvāraṃ ariyamaggaṃ
tika-vin02t:811_9: Suṇantu dhammaṃ vimalenānubuddhanti ime sattā rāgādimalānaṃ abhāvato vimalena sammāsambuddhena anubuddhaṃ
tika-vin02t:812_1: na paṃsupabbato missakapabbato vāti āha “sele yathā pabbatamuddhaniṭṭhito”ti.
tika-vin02t:812_3: Na hi tattha ṭhitassa dassanatthaṃ gīvukkhipanapasāraṇādikiccaṃ atthī”ti.
tika-vin02t:812_6: So hi sabbaso pasādāvaho sabbadhamme atikkamma abbhuggataṭṭhena pāsādasadiso ca,
tika-vin02t:812_8: Paññā hi abbhuggataṭṭhena pāsādoti abhidhamme niddiṭṭhā.
tika-vin02t:815_1: yathā selapabbatamuddhani yathāṭhitova cakkhumā puriso samantato janataṃ passeyya,
tika-vin02t:815_2: tathā tvampi sumedha sundarapañña sabbaññutaññāṇena samantacakkhu bhagavā dhammamayaṃ paññāmayaṃ pāsādamāruyha
tika-vin02t:815_3: sayaṃ apetasoko sokāvatiṇṇaṃ jātijarābhibhūtaṃ janataṃ avekkhassu upadhāraya upaparikkhāti.
tika-vin02t:815_5: yathā hi pabbatapāde samantā mahantaṃ khettaṃ katvā tattha kedārapāḷīsu kuṭikāyo katvā rattiṃ aggiṃ jāleyyuṃ,
tika-vin02t:815_7: atha tassa pabbatassa matthake ṭhatvā cakkhumato purisassa bhūmiṃ olokayato neva khettaṃ,
tika-vin02t:815_12: evaṃ dhammapāsādaṃ āruyha sattanikāyaṃ olokayato tathāgatassa ye te akatakalyāṇā sattā,
tika-vin02t:815_13: te ekavihāre dakkhiṇajāṇupasse nisinnāpi buddhacakkhussa āpāthaṃ nāgacchanti ñāṇagginā anujjalabhāvato anuḷārabhāvato ca,
tika-vin02t:815_16: te evassa dūrepi ṭhitā āpāthamāgacchanti paripakkañāṇaggitāya samujjalabhāvato uḷārasantānatāya ca,
tika-vin02t:815_17: so aggi viya himavantapabbato viya ca.
tika-vin02t:817_0: Asantettha na dissanti, rattiṃ khittā yathā sarā”ti. ;
tika-vin02t:818_0: Uṭṭhehīti bhagavato dhammadesanatthaṃ cārikacaraṇaṃ yācanto bhaṇati.
tika-vin02t:818_1: Uṭṭhehīti vā dhammadesanāya appossukkatāsaṅkhātasaṅkocāpattito kilāsubhāvato uṭṭhaha.
tika-vin02t:818_4: jātikantārādito veneyyasatthaṃ vāhanasamatthatāya nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ khemappadesaṃ sampāpanasamatthatāya satthavāho,
tika-vin02t:818_6: Yo hi paresaṃ iṇaṃ gahetvā vināseti,
tika-vin02t:818_7: so tehi “iṇaṃ dehī”ti tajjamānopi pharusaṃ vuccamānopi vambhamānopi vadhiyamānopi kiñci paṭippaharituṃ na sakkoti,
tika-vin02t:818_12: so tena pharusaṃ vuccamānopi vambhamānopi vadhiyamānopi kiñci paṭippaharituṃ na sakkoti,
tika-vin02t:818_14: Titikkhakāraṇañhissa so kāmacchando hoti gharasāmikehi viheṭhiyamānānaṃ itthīnaṃ viya. Kasmā?
tika-vin02t:819_1: Ajjhesananti garuṭṭhānīyaṃ payirupāsitvā garutaraṃ payojanaṃ uddissa abhipatthanā ajjhesanā,
tika-vin02t:819_7: Apparajakkhetiādīsu yesaṃ vuttanayeneva paññācakkhumhi rāgādirajaṃ appaṃ,
tika-vin02t:820_5: Antonimuggaposīnīti yāni udakassa anto nimuggāneva hutvā pussanti vaḍḍhanti,
tika-vin02t:820_7: Udakaṃ accuggamma tiṭṭhantīti udakaṃ atikkamitvā tiṭṭhanti.
tika-vin02t:820_8: Tattha yāni accuggamma ṭhitāni sūriyarasmisamphassaṃ āgamayamānāni,
tika-vin02t:820_14: Udakā pana anuggatāni aññānipi sarogauppalādīni nāma atthi,
tika-vin02t:820_19: evameva ugghaṭitaññū vipañcitaññū neyyo padaparamoti cattāro puggalā.
tika-vin02t:821_0: Tattha yassa puggalassa saha udāhaṭavelāya dhammābhisamayo hoti,
tika-vin02t:821_1: ayaṃ “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”tiādinā nayena saṅkhittena mātikāya ṭhapiyamānāya desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā
tika-vin02t:821_2: arahattaṃ gaṇhituṃ samattho puggalo ugghaṭitaññūti vuccati.
tika-vin02t:821_3: Yassa puggalassa saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthe vibhajiyamāne dhammābhisamayo hoti,
tika-vin02t:821_5: Yassa puggalassa uddesato paripucchato yoniso manasikaroto kalyāṇamitte sevato bhajato payirupāsato anupubbena dhammābhisamayo hoti,
tika-vin02t:821_7: Yassa puggalassa bahumpi suṇato bahumpi bhaṇato bahumpi dhārayato bahumpi vācayato na tāya jātiyā dhammābhisamayo hoti,
tika-vin02t:821_8: tena attabhāvena maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā antamaso jhānaṃ vā vipassanaṃ vā nibbattetuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-vin02t:821_10: Tattha bhagavā uppalavanādisadisaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuṃ olokento ajja pupphanakāni viya ugghaṭitaññū,
tika-vin02t:821_16: tatrāpi ettakā ugghaṭitaññū”ti evaṃ sabbākāratova addasa.
tika-vin02t:822_0: Tattha tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ imasmiññeva attabhāve bhagavato dhammadesanā atthaṃ sādheti.
tika-vin02t:822_2: Atha bhagavā imesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ atthāvahaṃ dhammadesanaṃ viditvā desetukamyataṃ uppādetvā puna
tika-vin02t:822_3: sabbepi tīsu bhavesu satte bhabbābhabbavasena dve koṭṭhāse akāsi.
tika-vin02t:822_4: Ye sandhāya vuttaṃ “ye te sattā kammāvaraṇena samannāgatā vipākāvaraṇena samannāgatā kilesāvaraṇena samannāgatā
tika-vin02t:822_5: assaddhā acchandikā duppaññā abhabbā niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṃ,
tika-vin02t:822_10: Tattha sabbepi abhabbapuggale pahāya bhabbapuggaleyeva ñāṇena pariggahetvā “ettakā rāgacaritā,
tika-vin02t:822_14: Ettha ca apparajakkhādibhabbādivasena āvajjentassa bhagavato te sattā puñjapuñjāva hutvā upaṭṭhahanti,
tika-vin02t:823_4: so mayā vivaritvā ṭhapito mahākaruṇūpanissayena sayambhūñāṇena adhigatattāti dasseti.
tika-vin02t:823_6: Pamuñcantu saddhanti sabbe attano saddhaṃ muñcantu vissajjentu pavedentu,
tika-vin02t:823_7: mayā desite dhamme mayi ca attano saddahanākāraṃ uṭṭhāpentūti attho.
tika-vin02t:823_9: ahañhi attano paguṇaṃ suppavattitampi imaṃ paṇītaṃ uttamaṃ dhammaṃ kāyavācākilamathasaññī hutvā na bhāsiṃ,
tika-vin02t:823_11: idāni pana sabbo jano saddhābhājanaṃ upanetu,
tika-vin02t:823_15: Satthusantikañhi upagatānaṃ devānaṃ brahmānañca tassa purato antaradhānaṃ nāma sakaṭṭhānagamanameva.
tika-vin02t:826_2: “kassa nu kho ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyya”nti ayaṃ dhammadesanāpaṭisaṃyutto vitakko udapādīti attho.
tika-vin02t:826_14: Atha vā medhāvīti tihetukapaṭisandhipaññāsaṅkhātāya taṃtaṃitikattabbatāpaññāsaṅkhātāya ca medhāya samannāgatoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin02t:827_0: Bhagavatopi kho ñāṇaṃ udapādīti bhagavatopi sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ uppajji.
tika-vin02t:827_1: Bhagavā kira devatāya kathiteneva niṭṭhaṃ agantvā sayampi sabbaññutaññāṇena olokento ito sattamadivasamatthake
tika-vin02t:827_4: Mahājāniyoti sattadivasabbhantare pattabbamaggaphalato parihīnattā mahatī jāni parihāni assāti mahājāniyo.
tika-vin02t:827_5: Akkhaṇe nibbattatthā idha dhammadesanaṭṭhānaṃ āgamanapādāpi natthi,
tika-vin02t:827_7: gantvā desiyamānaṃ dhammampissa sotuṃ sotapasādopi natthi,
tika-vin02t:827_9: Kiṃ pana bhagavatā taṃ attano buddhānubhāvena dhammaṃ ñāpetuṃ na sakkāti?
tika-vin02t:827_11: na hi paratoghosamantarena sāvakānaṃ dhammābhisamayo sambhavati,
tika-vin02t:827_16: paccayā sammādiṭṭhiyā uppādāya parato ca ghoso ajjhattañca yonisomanasikāro”ti.
tika-vin02t:828_3: Bhagavatopi kho ñāṇaṃ udapādīti idhāpi kira bhagavā devatāya kathitavacanena sanniṭṭhānaṃ akatvā sabbaññutaññāṇena
tika-vin02t:828_4: olokento “hiyyo aḍḍharatte kālaṃ katvā udako rāmaputto nevasaññānāsaññāyatane nibbatto”ti addasa,
tika-vin02t:829_1: Padhānapahitattaṃ upaṭṭhahiṃsūti padhānatthāya pesitattabhāvaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne pariveṇasammajjanena pattacīvaraṃ
tika-vin02t:829_3: Ke panete pañcavaggiyā nāma? Ye te –
tika-vin02t:834_0: Bodhisattassa jātakāle supinapaṭiggāhakā ceva lakkhaṇapaṭiggāhakā ca aṭṭha brāhmaṇā.
tika-vin02t:834_1: Tesu tayo dvedhā byākariṃsu “imehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgato agāraṃ ajjhāvasamāno rājā hohiti cakkavattī,
tika-vin02t:834_3: Pañca brāhmaṇā ekaṃsabyākaraṇā ahesuṃ “imehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgato agāre na tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin02t:834_6: Ete hi lakkhaṇamantasaṅkhātavedavacanānurūpaṃ paṭipannā dve gatiyo bhavanti anaññāti vuttaniyāmena nicchinituṃ asakkontā vuttameva paṭipajjiṃsu,
tika-vin02t:834_8: Ime pana koṇḍaññādayo pañca “ekaṃsato buddho bhavissatī”ti jātanicchayattā mantapadaṃ atikkantā.
tika-vin02t:834_9: Te attanā laddhaṃ tuṭṭhidānaṃ ñātakānaṃ vissajjetvā “ayaṃ mahāpuriso agāre na ajjhāvasissati,
tika-vin02t:834_10: ekantena buddho bhavissatī”ti nibbematikā bodhisattaṃ uddissa samaṇapabbajjaṃ pabbajitā,
tika-vin02t:834_13: Ete kira daharakāleva bahū mante jāniṃsu,
tika-vin02t:834_15: Te “pacchā amhehi puttadārajaṭaṃ chinditvā na sakkā bhavissati pabbajitu”nti daharakāleyeva pabbajitvā ramaṇīyāni senāsanāni paribhuñjantā vicariṃsu.
tika-vin02t:834_16: Kālena kālaṃ pana “kiṃ bho mahāpuriso mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhanto”ti pucchanti.
tika-vin02t:834_18: tīsu pāsādesu vividhanāṭakamajjhe devo viya sampattiṃ anubhotī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:834_19: Te sutvā “na tāva mahāpurisassa ñāṇaṃ paripākaṃ gacchatī”ti appossukkā vihariṃsuyeva.
tika-vin02t:835_0: Kasmā panettha bhagavā “bahukārā kho me pañcavaggiyā”ti āha.
tika-vin02t:835_4: Paricayavasena hesa āḷārañceva kālāmaṃ udakañca rāmaputtaṃ olokesi.
tika-vin02t:835_5: Etasmiṃ pana buddhakkhette ṭhapetvā aññāsikoṇḍaññaṃ añño paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ sacchikātuṃ samattho nāma natthi. Kasmā?
tika-vin02t:835_7: Pubbe kira puññakaraṇakāle dve bhātaro ahesuṃ.
tika-vin02t:835_9: Tattha jeṭṭhassa “ekasmiṃ sasse nava vāre aggasassadānaṃ mayā dātabba”nti ahosi.
tika-vin02t:835_10: So vappakāle bījaggaṃ nāma datvā gabbhakāle kaniṭṭhena saddhiṃ mantesi “gabbhakāle gabbhaṃ phāletvā dassāmī”ti.
tika-vin02t:835_12: Jeṭṭho kaniṭṭhassa ananuvattanabhāvaṃ ñatvā khettaṃ vibhajitvā attano koṭṭhāsato gabbhaṃ phāletvā khīraṃ nīharitvā sappiphāṇitena yojetvā adāsi,
tika-vin02t:835_19: koṭṭhāgāre dhaññassa pakkhipanadivase koṭṭhagganti evaṃ ekasmiṃ sasse nava vāre aggadānaṃ adāsi.
tika-vin02t:835_20: Kaniṭṭho pana khalato dhaññaṃ uddharitvā gahaṇadivase adāsi.
tika-vin02t:835_23: Iti ekasmiṃ sasse navannaṃ aggadānānaṃ dinnattā ṭhapetvā theraṃ añño paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ sacchikātuṃ samattho nāma natthi.
tika-vin02t:835_24: “Navannaṃ aggadānānaṃ dinnattā”ti idañca tassa rattaññūnaṃ aggabhāvatthāya katābhinīhārānurūpaṃ pavattitasāvakapāramiyā ciṇṇante pavattitattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:835_25: Tiṇṇampi hi bodhisattānaṃ taṃtaṃpāramiyā sikhāppattakāle pavattitaṃ puññaṃ apuññaṃ vā garutaravipākameva hoti,
tika-vin02t:835_26: dhammassa ca sabbapaṭhamaṃ sacchikiriyāya vinā kathaṃ rattaññūnaṃ aggabhāvasiddhīti?
tika-vin02t:835_27: “Bahukārā kho me pañcavaggiyā”ti idaṃ pana upakārānussaraṇamattakeneva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:836_0: Isipatane migadāyeti tasmiṃ kira padese anuppanne buddhe paccekasambuddhā gandhamādanapabbate sattāhaṃ
tika-vin02t:836_1: nirodhasamāpattiyā vītināmetvā nirodhā vuṭṭhāya nāgalatādantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditvā anotattadahe mukhaṃ dhovitvā
tika-vin02t:836_3: Tattha cīvaraṃ pārupitvā nagare piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakiccā gamanakālepi tatoyeva uppatitvā gacchanti.
tika-vin02t:836_4: Iti isayo ettha nipatanti uppatanti cāti taṃ ṭhānaṃ “isipatana”nti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ,
tika-vin02t:836_7: Aññe buddhā paṭhamaṃ dhammadesanatthāya gacchantā ākāsena gantvā tattheva otaranti,
tika-vin02t:836_8: amhākaṃ pana bhagavā upakassa ājīvakassa upanissayaṃ disvā “upako imaṃ addhānaṃ paṭipanno,
tika-vin02t:836_10: atha puna nibbinno āgamma arahattaṃ sacchikarissatī”ti ñatvā aṭṭhārasayojanaṃ maggaṃ padasāva agamāsi.
tika-vin02t:837_1: Antarā ca gayaṃ antarā ca bodhinti gayāya ca bodhissa ca vivare tigāvutantare ṭhāne.
tika-vin02t:837_4: Upako bodhimaṇḍassa ca gayāya ca antare bhagavantaṃ addasa. Antarā-
tika-vin02t:837_6: Īdisesu ca ṭhānesu akkharacintakā “antarā gāmañca nadiñca yātī”ti evaṃ ekameva antarā-
tika-vin02t:837_9: ayojiyamāne upayogavacanaṃ na pāpuṇāti sāmivacanassa pasaṅge antarā-
tika-vin02t:837_14: Addhānagamanasamayassa vibhaṅge “addhayojanaṃ gacchissāmīti bhuñjitabba”ntiādivacanato addhayojanampi addhānamaggo hoti.
tika-vin02t:837_22: Etassa pariyodātataṃ disvāva indriyānaṃ vippasannataṃ aññāsi,
tika-vin02t:838_1: Sabbavidūti sabbaṃ catubhūmakadhammaṃ avediṃ aññāsiṃ sabbaso ñeyyāvaraṇassa pahīnattā.
tika-vin02t:838_2: Sabbesu dhammesu anūpalittoti sabbesu tebhūmakadhammesu rajjanadussanamuyhanādinā kilesalepena alitto.
tika-vin02t:838_4: Appahātabbampi hi kusalābyākataṃ tappaṭibaddhakilesappahānena pahīnattā na hotīti jahitameva hoti.
tika-vin02t:838_5: Taṇhakkhaye vimuttoti taṇhakkhaye nibbāne ārammaṇakaraṇavasena vimutto.
tika-vin02t:838_6: Sayaṃ abhiññāyāti sabbaṃ catubhūmakadhammaṃ attanāva jānitvā.
tika-vin02t:838_7: Kamuddiseyyanti kaṃ aññaṃ “ayaṃ me ācariyo”ti uddiseyyaṃ.
tika-vin02t:839_0: Na me ācariyo atthīti lokuttaradhamme mayhaṃ ācariyo nāma natthi.
tika-vin02t:839_1: Kiñcāpi hi lokiyadhammānampi yādiso lokanāthassa adhigamo,
tika-vin02t:839_4: Natthi me paṭipuggaloti mayhaṃ sīlādīhi guṇehi paṭinidhibhūto puggalo nāma natthi.
tika-vin02t:839_5: Sammāsambuddhoti hetunā nayena cattāri saccāni sayaṃ buddho.
tika-vin02t:840_2: Amatadundubhinti veneyyānaṃ amatādhigamāya ugghosanādiṃ katvā satthu dhammadesanā “amatadundubhī”ti vuttā,
tika-vin02t:840_3: dhammacakkapaṭilābhāya taṃ amatabheriṃ paharissāmīti gacchāmīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:841_0: Arahasi anantajinoti anantajinopi bhavituṃ yuttoti attho.
tika-vin02t:841_3: evaṃvidhe nāma rūparatane īdisena ñāṇena bhavitabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:841_6: Tathā hi bhagavā tena samāgamanatthaṃ padasāva taṃ maggaṃ paṭipajji.
tika-vin02t:842_4: Migaluddako dūraṃ migavaṃ gacchanto “amhākaṃ arahante mā pamajjī”ti cāpaṃ nāma dhītaraṃ āṇāpetvā agamāsi saddhiṃ puttabhātukehi.
tika-vin02t:842_5: Sā cassa dhītā dassanīyā hoti koṭṭhāsasampannā.
tika-vin02t:842_6: Dutiyadivase upako gharaṃ āgato taṃ dārikaṃ sabbaṃ upacāraṃ katvā parivisituṃ upagataṃ disvā rāgena abhibhūto
tika-vin02t:842_7: bhuñjitumpi asakkonto bhājanena bhattaṃ ādāya vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā bhattaṃ ekamantaṃ nikkhipitvā “sace
tika-vin02t:842_10: Sattame divase māgaviko āgantvā dhītaraṃ upakassa pavattiṃ pucchi.
tika-vin02t:843_0: Māgaviko āgataveseneva naṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchissāmīti taṅkhaṇaṃyeva gantvā “kiṃ, bhante,
tika-vin02t:843_6: Upako “sace cāpaṃ labhāmi, jīvāmi, no ce,
tika-vin02t:843_11: kiñci sippaṃ ajānantena sakkā gharāvāsaṃ adhiṭṭhātunti.
tika-vin02t:843_15: Māgaviko “amhākampi etadeva ruccatī”ti uttarasāṭakaṃ datvā gharaṃ ānetvā dhītaraṃ adāsi.
tika-vin02t:843_18: Cāpā tassa rodanakāle “maṃsahārakassa putta migaluddakassa putta mā rodi mā rodī”tiādīni vadamānā puttatosanagītena upakaṃ uppaṇḍesi.
tika-vin02t:844_0: Bhagavā ca tena samayena sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane,
tika-vin02t:844_1: atha kho bhagavā paṭikacceva bhikkhū āṇāpesi “yo,
tika-vin02t:844_5: Upakopi kho “kuhiṃ anantajino vasatī”ti pucchanto anupubbena sāvatthiṃ āgantvā vihāramajjhe ṭhatvā “kuhiṃ anantajino”ti pucchi.
tika-vin02t:844_7: So ca bhagavantaṃ disvā “sañjānātha maṃ bhagavā”ti āha.
tika-vin02t:844_15: So kammaṭṭhāne kammaṃ karonto anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhāya kālaṃ katvā avihesu nibbatto,
tika-vin02t:844_17: Avihe nibbattamattā hi satta janā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu,
tika-vin02t:847_0: “Upako palagaṇḍo ca, pukkusāti ca te tayo;
tika-vin02t:848_0: Bhaddiyo khaṇḍadevo ca, bāhuraggi ca saṅgiyo;
tika-vin02t:849_0: Te hitvā mānusaṃ dehaṃ, dibbayogaṃ upaccagu”nti. ;
tika-vin02t:850_3: Padhānavibbhantoti padhānato pubbe anuṭṭhitadukkaracaraṇato vibbhanto bhaṭṭho parihīno.
tika-vin02t:850_5: Apica kho āsanaṃ ṭhapetabbanti apica kho panassa uccakule nibbattassa āsanamattaṃ ṭhapetabbanti vadiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:850_6: Asaṇṭhahantāti buddhānubhāvena buddhatejena abhibhūtā attano katikāya ṭhātuṃ asakkontā.
tika-vin02t:850_7: Nāmena ca āvusovādena ca samudācarantīti “gotamā”ti ca “āvuso”ti ca vadanti,
tika-vin02t:850_9: mayaṃ uruvelāyaṃ padhānakāle tuyhaṃ pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā vicarimha,
tika-vin02t:850_13: kacci amhesu pakkantesu na cintayitthā”ti evarūpaṃ kathaṃ kathentīti attho.
tika-vin02t:851_1: Kulaputtāti duvidhā kulaputtā jātikulaputtā ācārakulaputtā ca,
tika-vin02t:851_14: Sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvāti attanoyeva paññāya paccakkhaṃ katvā,
tika-vin02t:852_7: alamariyo ca so ñāṇadassanaviseso cāti alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso.
tika-vin02t:852_8: Ñāṇadassananti ca dibbacakkhupi vipassanāpi maggopi phalampi paccavekkhaṇañāṇampi sabbaññutaññāṇampi vuccati.
tika-vin02t:852_9: “Appamatto samāno ñāṇadassanaṃ ārādhetī”ti hi ettha dibbacakkhu ñāṇadassanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin02t:852_11: “Abhabbā te ñāṇadassanāya anuttarāya sambodhāyā”ti ettha maggo.
tika-vin02t:852_12: “Ayamañño uttarimanussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato phāsuvihāro”ti ettha phalaṃ.
tika-vin02t:852_13: “Ñāṇañca pana me dassanaṃ udapādi ‘akuppā me cetovimutti,
tika-vin02t:852_16: “Ñāṇañca pana me dassanaṃ udapādi ‘sattāhakālakato āḷāro kālāmo”’ti ettha sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ.
tika-vin02t:852_17: Idha pana sabbaññutaññāṇapadaṭṭhāno ariyamaggo sabbaññutaññāṇameva vā adhippetaṃ.
tika-vin02t:853_0: Abhijānātha me noti abhijānātha nu me.
tika-vin02t:853_1: Evarūpaṃ pabhāvitametanti ettha evarūpaṃ vākyabhedanti attho,
tika-vin02t:853_2: api nu ahaṃ uruvelāyaṃ padhāne tumhākaṃ saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ anukkaṇṭhanatthaṃ rattiṃ vā divā vā āgantvā “āvuso,
tika-vin02t:853_3: mayaṃ yattha katthaci gamissāmāti mā vitakkayittha,
tika-vin02t:853_4: mayhaṃ obhāso vā kammaṭṭhānanimittaṃ vā paññāyatī”ti evarūpaṃ kañci vacanabhedaṃ akāsinti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:853_5: Te ekapadeneva satiṃ labhitvā uppannagāravā “addhā esa buddho jāto”ti saddahitvā “no hetaṃ bhante”ti āhaṃsu.
tika-vin02t:853_6: Asakkhi kho bhagavā pañcavaggiye bhikkhū saññāpetunti bhagavā pañcavaggiye bhikkhū “buddho aha”nti jānāpetuṃ asakkhi.
tika-vin02t:853_7: Aññā cittaṃ upaṭṭhāpesunti aññāya arahattappattiyā cittaṃ upaṭṭhapesuṃ abhinīhariṃsu.
tika-vin02t:855_7: Imassa pana padassa uccāraṇasamakālaṃ pavattanigghoso buddhānubhāvena heṭṭhā avīciṃ upari bhavaggaṃ patvā dasasahassilokadhātuṃ pharitvā aṭṭhāsi.
tika-vin02t:855_8: Tasmiṃyeva samaye paripakkakusalamūlā saccābhisambodhāya katādhikārā aṭṭhārasakoṭisaṅkhā brahmāno samāgacchiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:856_2: Yo cāyaṃ kāmesu kāmasukhallikānuyogoti yo ca ayaṃ vatthukāmesu kilesakāmasukhassa anuyogo,
tika-vin02t:856_7: Anariyoti na ariyo na visuddho na uttamo,
tika-vin02t:856_17: ete dve ante na upeti na upagacchati,
tika-vin02t:857_2: Sā hi catunnaṃ saccānaṃ dassanāya saṃvattati pariññābhisamayādibhedassa dassanassa pavattanaṭṭhenāti “cakkhukaraṇī”ti vuccati.
tika-vin02t:857_3: Tayidaṃ satipi paṭipadāya anaññatte avayavavasena sijjhamāno attho samudāyena kato nāma hotīti upacāravasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:858_0: Idāni taṃ majjhimappaṭipadaṃ sarūpato dassetukāmo “katamā ca sā”ti pucchitvā “ayamevā”tiādinā nayena vissajjesi.
tika-vin02t:858_1: Tattha ayamevāti avadhāraṇavacanaṃ aññassa nibbānagāmimaggassa atthibhāvapaṭisedhanatthaṃ.
tika-vin02t:858_2: Sattāpaṭikkhepo hi idha paṭisedhanaṃ alabbhamānattā aññassa maggassa.
tika-vin02t:858_4: Aripahānāya saṃvattatītipi ariyo arayo pāpadhammā yanti apagacchanti etenāti katvā.
tika-vin02t:858_5: Ariyena bhagavatā desitattā ariyassa ayantipi ariyo,
tika-vin02t:858_7: Ettha pana ariyakaro ariyotipi uttarapadalopena ariya-
tika-vin02t:858_11: samudāyo ca samudāyīhi samannāgato nāma hoti.
tika-vin02t:858_13: attano avayavabhūtāni aṭṭhaṅgāni etassa santīti aṭṭhaṅgikoti.
tika-vin02t:858_14: Paramatthato pana aṅgāniyeva maggo pañcaṅgikatūriyādīni viya,
tika-vin02t:858_15: na ca aṅgavinimutto chaḷaṅgo vedo viya.
tika-vin02t:858_18: Ariyamaggo hi nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karonto gavesanto viya hoti.
tika-vin02t:858_19: Nibbānatthikehi maggīyatīti vā maggo vivaṭṭūpanissayapuññakaraṇato paṭṭhāya tadatthapaṭipattito.
tika-vin02t:859_1: tassa katamo so iti ceti attho,
tika-vin02t:859_9: Nanu ca aṅgāni samuditāni maggo antamaso sattaṅgavikalassa ariyamaggassa abhāvatoti?
tika-vin02t:859_11: maggappaccayatāya pana yathāsakaṃ kiccakaraṇena paccekampi tāni maggoyeva,
tika-vin02t:859_12: aññathā samuditānampi tesaṃ maggakiccaṃ na sambhaveyyāti.
tika-vin02t:859_14: sammā saṅkappeti sampayuttadhamme nibbānasaṅkhāte ārammaṇe abhiniropetīti sammāsaṅkappo,
tika-vin02t:859_21: sammā samādhiyati cittaṃ etenāti sammāsamādhīti evaṃ nibbacanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:859_22: Idāni ayaṃ kho sā bhikkhaveti tameva paṭipadaṃ nigamento āha.
tika-vin02t:859_24: yvāyaṃ cattāropi lokuttaramagge ekato katvā kathito aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo,
tika-vin02t:860_1: Evaṃ majjhimapaṭipadaṃ sarūpato dassetvā idāni cattāri ariyasaccāni dassetuṃ “idaṃ kho pana,
tika-vin02t:860_15: Tathāgatena hi sayaṃ adhigatattā paveditattā tato eva ca aññehi adhigamanīyattā taṃ tassa hotīti.
tika-vin02t:860_16: Atha vā etassa abhisambuddhattā ariyabhāvasiddhito ariyasādhakaṃ saccantipi ariyasaccaṃ pubbe viya uttarapadalopena.
tika-vin02t:860_17: Avitathabhāvena vā araṇīyattā adhigantabbattā ariyaṃ saccantipi ariyasaccaṃ.
tika-vin02t:860_18: Saccatthaṃ pana catunnampi saccānaṃ parato ekajjhaṃ dassayissāma.
tika-vin02t:861_0: Idāni taṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ “jātipi dukkhā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin02t:861_3: Tathā hesa “ekampi jātiṃ dvepi jātiyo”ti ettha bhave āgato. “Atthi, visākhe,
tika-vin02t:861_6: “Yaṃ mātukucchismiṃ paṭhamaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ paṭhamaṃ viññāṇaṃ pātubhūtaṃ,
tika-vin02t:861_11: Svāyamidha gabbhaseyyakānaṃ paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya yāva mātukucchimhā nikkhamanaṃ,
tika-vin02t:861_15: nippariyāyato pana tattha tattha nibbattamānānaṃ sattānaṃ ye khandhā pātubhavanti,
tika-vin02t:862_4: dukkhadukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadukkhaṃ saṅkhāradukkhaṃ paṭicchannadukkhaṃ appaṭicchannadukkhaṃ pariyāyadukkhaṃ nippariyāyadukkhanti.
tika-vin02t:862_5: Tattha kāyikacetasikā dukkhā vedanā sabhāvato ca nāmato ca dukkhattā dukkhadukkhanti vuccati.
tika-vin02t:862_7: Upekkhā vedanā ceva sesā ca tebhūmakā saṅkhārā udayabbayapīḷitattā saṅkhāradukkhaṃ.
tika-vin02t:862_8: Kaṇṇasūladantasūlarāgajapariḷāhadosajapariḷāhādikāyikacetasikā ābādhā pucchitvā jānitabbato upakkamassa ca apākaṭabhāvato paṭicchannadukkhaṃ.
tika-vin02t:862_9: Dvattiṃsakammakāraṇādisamuṭṭhāno ābādho apucchitvāva jānitabbato upakkamassa ca pākaṭabhāvato appaṭicchannadukkhaṃ.
tika-vin02t:862_10: Ṭhapetvā dukkhadukkhaṃ sesadukkhaṃ saccavibhaṅge āgataṃ jātiādi sabbampi tassa tassa dukkhassa vatthubhāvato pariyāyadukkhaṃ.
tika-vin02t:862_12: Tatrāyaṃ jāti yaṃ taṃ bālapaṇḍitasuttādīsu bhagavatāpi upamāvasena pakāsitaṃ āpāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ,
tika-vin02t:862_13: yañca sugatiyampi manussaloke gabbhokkantimūlakādibhedaṃ dukkhaṃ uppajjati,
tika-vin02t:869_0: Yaṃ taṃ kathaṃ tattha bhaveyya jātiṃ;
tika-vin02t:877_0: Na taṃ bhave tattha na cassa jāti;
tika-vin02t:882_0: Jātiṃ vinā itipi jāti ayañhi dukkhā.
tika-vin02t:887_0: Jarāpi dukkhāti ettha pana duvidhā jarā saṅkhatalakkhaṇañca khaṇḍiccādisammato santatiyaṃ ekabhavapariyāpannakkhandhapurāṇabhāvo ca,
tika-vin02t:887_2: Sā panesā jarā saṅkhāradukkhabhāvato ceva dukkhavatthuto ca dukkhā.
tika-vin02t:892_0: “Pappoti dukkhaṃ yaṃ macco, kāyikaṃ mānasaṃ tathā;
tika-vin02t:893_0: Sabbametaṃ jarāhetu, yasmā tasmā jarā dukhā”ti. ;
tika-vin02t:894_0: Byādhipi dukkhoti idaṃ padaṃ vibhaṅge dukkhasaccaniddesapāḷiyaṃ na āgataṃ,
tika-vin02t:894_1: teneva visuddhimaggepi dukkhasaccaniddese taṃ na uddhaṭaṃ,
tika-vin02t:894_3: tasmā tatthevimassa vacane aññattha ca avacane kāraṇaṃ vīmaṃsitabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:895_0: Maraṇampi dukkhanti etthāpi duvidhaṃ maraṇaṃ saṅkhatalakkhaṇañca.
tika-vin02t:895_1: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “jarāmaraṇaṃ dvīhi khandhehi saṅgahita”nti.
tika-vin02t:895_5: Jātipaccayamaraṇaṃ upakkamamaraṇaṃ sarasamaraṇaṃ āyukkhayamaraṇaṃ puññakkhayamaraṇantipi tasseva nāmaṃ.
tika-vin02t:903_0: Imasmiñca ṭhāne “sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsāpi dukkhā”ti vibhaṅge dukkhasaccaniddese āgataṃ,
tika-vin02t:904_0: Appiyehi sampayogo dukkhoti ettha appiyasampayogo nāma amanāpehi sattasaṅkhārehi samodhānaṃ.
tika-vin02t:909_0: Piyehi vippayogo dukkhoti ettha pana piyavippayogo nāma manāpehi sattasaṅkhārehi vinābhāvo.
tika-vin02t:914_0: Yampicchaṃ na labhatīti ettha “aho vata mayaṃ na jātidhammā assāmā”tiādīsu alabbhaneyyavatthūsu icchāva “yampicchaṃ na labhati,
tika-vin02t:916_0: Yaṃ vighātamayaṃ dukkhaṃ, sattānaṃ idha jāyati.
tika-vin02t:919_0: Saṃkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhāti ettha pana yasmā indhanamiva pāvako,
tika-vin02t:919_5: upādānakkhandhapañcakameva jātiādayo nānappakārehi vibādhentā tiṇalatādīni viya bhūmiyaṃ,
tika-vin02t:919_10: manorathavighātappattānañca icchāvighātadukkhaṃ icchitālābhoti evaṃ nānappakārato upaparikkhiyamānā upādānakkhandhāva
tika-vin02t:919_11: dukkhāti yadetaṃ ekamekaṃ dassetvā vuccamānaṃ anekehipi kappehi na sakkā anavasesato vattuṃ,
tika-vin02t:919_12: tasmā taṃ sabbampi dukkhaṃ ekajalabindumhi sakalasamuddajalarasaṃ viya yesu kesuci pañcupādānakkhandhesu
tika-vin02t:919_13: saṅkhipitvā dassetuṃ “saṃkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā”ti bhagavā avoca.
tika-vin02t:921_0: Avuttaṃ yañca taṃ sabbaṃ, vinā ete na vijjati.
tika-vin02t:924_0: Evaṃ sarūpato dukkhasaccaṃ dassetvā idāni samudayasaccaṃ dassetuṃ “idaṃ kho pana,
tika-vin02t:924_4: iti ayaṃ saddo “samāgamo sameta”ntiādīsu saṃyogaṃ dīpeti, u-
tika-vin02t:924_7: Idañcāpi dutiyasaccaṃ avasesapaccayasamāyoge sati dukkhassuppattikāraṇanti dukkhassa saṃyoge uppattikāraṇattā “dukkhasamudaya”nti vuccati.
tika-vin02t:924_12: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “nandanato rajjanato ca nandīrāgabhāvaṃ sabbāsu avatthāsu appaccakkhāya vuttiyā nandīrāgasahagatā”ti.
tika-vin02t:925_2: Rūpataṇhādibhedena chabbidhāyeva taṇhā pavattiākārabhedato kāmataṇhādivasena tividhā vuttā.
tika-vin02t:925_3: Rūpataṇhāyeva hi yadā cakkhussa āpāthamāgataṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ kāmassādavasena assādayamānā pavattati,
tika-vin02t:925_5: Yadā tadevārammaṇaṃ dhuvaṃ sassatanti pavattāya sassatadiṭṭhiyā saddhiṃ pavattati,
tika-vin02t:925_8: Yadā pana tadevārammaṇaṃ ucchijjati vinassatīti pavattāya ucchedadiṭṭhiyā saddhiṃ pavattati,
tika-vin02t:926_2: Avijjā hi bhavesu ādīnavaṃ paṭicchādentī diṭṭhiādiupādānañca tattha tattha abhinivisamānaṃ taṇhaṃ abhivaḍḍheti,
tika-vin02t:926_5: kammavicittatāya upanissayataṃ kammassa ca sahāyabhāvaṃ upagacchantī bhavādivicittataṃ niyameti,
tika-vin02t:926_6: tasmā dukkhassa visesahetubhāvato aññesupi avijjāupādānakammādīsu sutte abhidhamme ca avasesakilesākusalamūlādīsu
tika-vin02t:926_7: vuttesu dukkhahetūsu vijjamānesu taṇhāva “samudayasacca”nti vuttāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:927_0: Idāni dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ dassetuṃ “idaṃ kho pana,
tika-vin02t:927_6: tasmā abhāvo ettha saṃsāracārakasaṅkhātassa dukkharodhassa sabbagatisuññattā,
tika-vin02t:927_7: samadhigate vā tasmiṃ saṃsāracārakasaṅkhātassa dukkharodhassa abhāvo hoti tappaṭipakkhattātipi “dukkhanirodha”nti vuccati.
tika-vin02t:927_9: Dukkhanirodhaṃ dassentena cettha “yo tassāyeva taṇhāyā”tiādinā nayena samudayanirodho vutto,
tika-vin02t:927_12: Byādhinimittavūpasamena byādhivūpasamo viya hi hetunirodhena phalanirodho,
tika-vin02t:932_1: tasmā bhagavā dukkhanirodhaṃ dassento samudayanirodhena desesi.
tika-vin02t:932_3: Te dukkhaṃ nirodhentā dukkhanirodhañca desentā hetumhi paṭipajjanti, na phale.
tika-vin02t:932_4: Yathā hi sīho yenattani saro khitto,
tika-vin02t:932_5: tattheva attano balaṃ dasseti, na sare,
tika-vin02t:932_6: tathā buddhānaṃ kāraṇe paṭipatti, na phale.
tika-vin02t:932_8: Te dukkhaṃ nirodhentā dukkhanirodhañca desentā attakilamathānuyogadesanādīhi phale paṭipajjanti,
tika-vin02t:932_10: Yathā hi sunakhā kenaci leḍḍuppahāre dinne bhussantā leḍḍuṃ khādanti,
tika-vin02t:932_14: evaṃ tāva dukkhanirodhassa samudayanirodhavasena desanāya payojanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:933_1: Tassāyeva taṇhāyāti tassā “ponobbhavikā”ti vatvā kāmataṇhādivasena vibhattataṇhāya.
tika-vin02t:933_7: tasmā anusayasamugghātato aseso virāgo aseso nirodhoti evampettha yojanā daṭṭhabbā,
tika-vin02t:933_8: atthato pana sabbāneva etāni nibbānassa vevacanāni.
tika-vin02t:933_9: Paramatthato hi dukkhanirodho ariyasaccanti nibbānaṃ vuccati.
tika-vin02t:933_10: Yasmā pana taṃ āgamma taṇhā virajjati ceva nirujjhati ca,
tika-vin02t:933_12: Yasmā ca tadeva āgamma tassā cāgādayo honti,
tika-vin02t:933_14: tasmā cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti anālayoti vuccati.
tika-vin02t:934_3: Yasmā panetaṃ ariyasaccaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ gacchati ārammaṇavasaena tadabhimukhabhūtattā,
tika-vin02t:934_10: titthiyānaṃ attā viya anupalabbhasabhāvo ca na hoti,
tika-vin02t:934_11: atha kho bādhanappabhavasantiniyyānappakārena tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvena ariyañāṇassa gocaro hotiyeva,
tika-vin02t:934_12: esa aggilakkhaṇaṃ viya lokapakati viya ca tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvo saccaṭṭhoti veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:934_14: Tañhi katthaci kaṭṭhādiupādānabhede visaṃvādakaṃ viparītaṃ abhūtaṃ vā kadācipi na hoti,
tika-vin02t:934_16: atho maraṇadhammino”ti evaṃ vuttajātiādikā lokapakatīti veditabbā.
tika-vin02t:934_19: vuddhiniṭṭhappattānaṃ puna avaḍḍhananti evamādikā ca lokapakatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:936_0: Nābādhakaṃ yato dukkhaṃ, dukkhā aññaṃ na bādhakaṃ;
tika-vin02t:938_0: Taṃ vinā nāññato dukkhaṃ, na hoti na ca taṃ tato;
tika-vin02t:940_0: Nāññā nibbānato santi, santaṃ na ca na taṃ yato;
tika-vin02t:942_0: Maggā aññaṃ na niyyānaṃ, aniyyāno na cāpi so;
tika-vin02t:946_1: Pubbe ananussutesūti ito pubbe “idaṃ dukkha”ntiādinā na anussutesu assutapubbesu catusaccadhammesu.
tika-vin02t:946_3: Ñāṇameva hettha paccakkhato dassanaṭṭhena cakkhu viyāti cakkhu,
tika-vin02t:946_7: saccappaṭicchādakassa mohandhakārassa vidhamanato obhāsanaṭṭhena ālokoti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:946_8: Taṃ panetaṃ catūsu saccesu lokiyalokuttaramissakaṃ niddiṭṭhanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:947_2: Tiparivaṭṭanti saccañāṇakiccañāṇakatañāṇasaṅkhātānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ parivaṭṭānaṃ vasena tiparivaṭṭaṃ.
tika-vin02t:947_3: Saccañāṇādivasena hi tayo parivaṭṭā etassāti tiparivaṭṭanti vuccati ñāṇadassanaṃ.
tika-vin02t:947_5: idaṃ dukkhasamudaya”nti evaṃ catūsu saccesu yathābhūtañāṇaṃ saccañāṇaṃ nāma.
tika-vin02t:947_6: Tesuyeva “pariññeyyaṃ pahātabbaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ bhāvetabba”nti evaṃ kattabbakiccajānanañāṇaṃ kiccañāṇaṃ nāma.
tika-vin02t:947_7: “Pariññātaṃ pahīnaṃ sacchikataṃ bhāvita”nti evaṃ tassa katabhāvajānanañāṇaṃ katañāṇaṃ nāma.
tika-vin02t:947_8: Dvādasākāranti tesaṃyeva ekekasmiṃ sacce tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ākārānaṃ vasena dvādasākāraṃ.
tika-vin02t:947_9: Ñāṇadassananti etesaṃ tiparivaṭṭānaṃ dvādasannaṃ ākārānaṃ vasena uppannañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ dassanaṃ.
tika-vin02t:948_0: Anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhinti uttaravirahitaṃ sabbaseṭṭhaṃ sammā sāmañca bodhiṃ.
tika-vin02t:948_12: buddhānaṃ pana sabbaguṇasampattiṃ deti abhiseko viya rañño sabbalokissariyabhāvaṃ.
tika-vin02t:948_13: Tasmā aññassa kassacipi anuttarā bodhi na hotīti.
tika-vin02t:948_14: Abhisambuddhoti paccaññāsinti abhisambuddho ahaṃ patto paṭivijjhitvā ṭhitoti evaṃ paṭijāniṃ.
tika-vin02t:948_15: Ñāṇañca pana me dassanaṃ udapādīti adhigataguṇānaṃ yāthāvato dassanasamatthaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇañca pana me udapādi.
tika-vin02t:948_16: Akuppā me vimuttīti ayaṃ mayhaṃ arahattaphalavimutti akuppā paṭipakkhehi na kopetabbāti evaṃ ñāṇaṃ udapādi.
tika-vin02t:948_17: Tattha dvīhākārehi akuppatā veditabbā maggasaṅkhātakāraṇato ca ārammaṇato ca.
tika-vin02t:948_18: Sā hi catūhi maggehi samucchinnakilesānaṃ puna anivattanatāya kāraṇatopi akuppā,
tika-vin02t:948_19: akuppadhammaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattatāya ārammaṇatopi akuppā anākuppārammaṇānaṃ lokiyasamāpattīnaṃ tadabhāvato.
tika-vin02t:948_21: Natthi dāni punabbhavoti idāni puna añño bhavo nāma natthīti.
tika-vin02t:949_0: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasminti imasmiṃ niggāthake sutte.
tika-vin02t:949_8: Dhammacakkhunti brahmāyusutte heṭṭhimā tayo maggā vuttā,
tika-vin02t:949_11: Catusaccasaṅkhātesu dhammesu tesaṃ dassanaṭṭhena cakkhūti dhammacakkhu,
tika-vin02t:949_12: heṭṭhimesu vā tīsu maggadhammesu ekaṃ sotāpattimaggasaṅkhātaṃ cakkhūti dhammacakkhu,
tika-vin02t:949_13: samathavipassanādhammanibbattatāya sīlāditividhadhammakkhandhabhūtatāya vā dhammamayaṃ cakkhūtipi dhammacakkhu,
tika-vin02t:949_19: yasmā taṃ nirodhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā kiccavasena sabbasaṅkhataṃ asammohappaṭivedhavasena paṭivijjhantaṃ uppajjati,
tika-vin02t:950_1: Dhammacakketi paṭivedhañāṇañceva desanāñāṇañca pavattanaṭṭhena cakkanti dhammacakkaṃ.
tika-vin02t:950_2: Bodhipallaṅke nisinnassa hi catūsu saccesu uppannaṃ dvādasākāraṃ paṭivedhañāṇampi,
tika-vin02t:950_3: isipatane nisinnassa dvādasākārāya saccadesanāya pavattakaṃ desanāñāṇampi dhammacakkaṃ nāma.
tika-vin02t:950_5: Tadubhayaṃ imāya desanāya pakāsentena bhagavatā dhammacakkaṃ pavattitaṃ nāma.
tika-vin02t:950_6: Taṃ panetaṃ dhammacakkaṃ yāva aññāsikoṇḍaññatthero aṭṭhārasahi brahmakoṭīhi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāti,
tika-vin02t:950_7: tāva bhagavā pavatteti nāma pavattanakiccassa aniṭṭhitattā.
tika-vin02t:950_8: Patiṭṭhite pavattitaṃ nāma kassapasammāsambuddhassa sāsanantaradhānato paṭṭhāya yāva buddhuppādo,
tika-vin02t:950_10: Taṃ sandhāya “pavattite ca pana bhagavatā dhammacakke bhummā devā saddamanussāvesu”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:950_12: Saddamanussāvesunti ekappahāreneva sādhukāraṃ datvā “etaṃ bhagavatā”tiādīni vadantā anussāvayiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:950_14: So hi tadā devānaṃ devānubhāvaṃ atikkamitvā virocittha.
tika-vin02t:950_15: Aññāsi vata bho koṇḍaññoti imassapi udānassa udāharaṇaghoso dasasahassilokadhātuṃ pharitvā aṭṭhāsi.
tika-vin02t:950_16: Bhagavato hi dhammacakkappavattanassa ārambhe viya parisamāpanepi ativiya uḷāratamaṃ pītisomanassaṃ udapādi.
tika-vin02t:951_3: Ettha ca dassanaṃ nāma ñāṇadassanato aññampi atthīti taṃnivattanatthaṃ “pattadhammo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:951_4: Patti ca ñāṇasampattito aññāpi vijjatīti tato visesanatthaṃ “viditadhammo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:951_5: Sā panesā viditadhammatā ekadesatopi hotīti nippadesato viditabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “pariyogāḷhadhammo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:951_7: Maggañāṇañhi ekābhisamayavasena pariññādikiccaṃ sādhentaṃ nippadesena catusaccadhammaṃ samantato ogāḷhaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin02t:951_8: Sappaṭibhayakantārasadisā soḷasavatthukā aṭṭhavatthukā ca tiṇṇā vicikicchā anenāti tiṇṇavicikiccho.
tika-vin02t:951_9: Pavattiādīsu “evaṃ nukho na nukho”ti evaṃ pavattikā vigatā samucchinnā kathaṃkathā assāti vigatakathaṃkatho.
tika-vin02t:951_10: Vesārajjappattoti sārajjakarānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ pahīnattā tappaṭipakkhesu ca sīlādīsu guṇesu suppatiṭṭhitattā
tika-vin02t:951_13: Attanā paccakkhato adhigatattā na paraṃ pacceti,
tika-vin02t:951_15: na tassa paro paccetabbo atthīti aparappaccayo.
tika-vin02t:952_3: tasmā ehi sampaṭicchāhi yathāyācitaṃ pabbajjūpasampadavisesanti attho. Iti-
tika-vin02t:952_6: Tenevāha “ehi bhikkhūti bhagavato vacanena abhinipphannā sāva tassa āyasmato ehibhikkhūpasampadā ahosī”ti.
tika-vin02t:952_11: “Nava koṭisahassānī”tiādinā vuttappabhedānaṃ anekasahassānaṃ saṃvaravinayānaṃ samādiyitvā vattanena uparibhūtā aggabhūtā sampadāti upasampadā.
tika-vin02t:953_2: gāmato bhikkhaṃ nīharitvā bhikkhūhi dinnabhattoti attho.
tika-vin02t:953_3: Bhagavā hi daharakumārake viya te bhikkhū pariharanto pāṭipadadivasato paṭṭhāya piṇḍapātatthāyapi gāmaṃ apavisitvā antovihāreyeva vasi.
tika-vin02t:956_1: Āmantesīti āsāḷhīpuṇṇamadivase dhammacakkappavattanato paṭṭhāya anukkamena sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhite
tika-vin02t:956_2: aññāsikoṇḍaññappamukhe pañcavaggiye “idāni tesaṃ āsavakkhayāya dhammaṃ desessāmī”ti pañcamiyā pakkhassa āmantesi.
tika-vin02t:956_3: Anattāti avasavattanaṭṭhena asāmikaṭṭhena suññataṭṭhena attapaṭikkhepaṭṭhenāti evaṃ catūhi kāraṇehi anattā.
tika-vin02t:956_7: udayabbayehi mā kilamayatū”ti na ettha kassaci vasībhāvo atthi,
tika-vin02t:956_13: Tattha attā abhavissāti kārako vedako sayaṃvasīti evaṃbhūto attā abhavissāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:956_14: Evañhi sati rūpassa ābādhāya saṃvattanaṃ ayujjamānakaṃ siyā.
tika-vin02t:956_18: tasmā rūpaṃ ābādhāya saṃvattatī”ti rūpassa anattatāya dukkhatā vibhāvitā viya dissati,
tika-vin02t:956_20: tasmā anattā”ti pākaṭāya sābādhatāya rūpassa attasārābhāvo vibhāvito,
tika-vin02t:956_21: tato eva ca “na ca labbhati rūpe ‘evaṃ me rūpaṃ hotu,
tika-vin02t:956_22: evaṃ me rūpaṃ mā ahosī’ti” rūpe kassaci anissaratā tassa ca avasavattanākāro dassito.
tika-vin02t:957_1: Taṃ kiṃmaññatha bhikkhaveti idaṃ kasmā āraddhaṃ?
tika-vin02t:957_4: idāni tāni dassetvā samodhānetvā tīṇipi lakkhaṇāni dassetuṃ idamāraddhanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:957_5: Aniccaṃ bhanteti bhante yasmā hutvā na hoti,
tika-vin02t:957_7: Yasmā pubbe asantaṃ paccayasamavāyena hutvā uppajjitvā puna bhaṅgupagamanena na hoti,
tika-vin02t:957_10: Atha vā uppādavayavantatāya tāvakālikatāya vipariṇāmakoṭiyā niccappaṭikkhepatoti imehipi kāraṇehi aniccaṃ.
tika-vin02t:957_11: Ettha khaṇe khaṇe uppajjanavasena nirujjhanavasena ca pavattanato uppādavayavantatā.
tika-vin02t:957_17: teneva attano aniccabhāvena atthato niccataṃ paṭikkhipanti nāma.
tika-vin02t:958_3: Atha vā santāpaṭṭhena dukkhamaṭṭhena dukkhavatthukaṭṭhena sukhapaṭikkhepaṭṭhena cāti catūhi kāraṇehi dukkhaṃ.
tika-vin02t:958_4: Ettha ca santāpo nāma dukkhadukkhatādivasena santāpanaṃ paridahanaṃ.
tika-vin02t:958_6: Tissannaṃ dukkhatānaṃ saṃsāradukkhassa ca adhiṭṭhānatāya dukkhavatthukatā.
tika-vin02t:958_10: Tanti evaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ rūpaṃ.
tika-vin02t:958_17: Imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhigāhānaṃ vasena yuttaṃ nu taṃ samanupassitunti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:959_1: Bhagavā hi katthaci aniccavasena anattataṃ dasseti,
tika-vin02t:959_7: Yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati,
tika-vin02t:959_8: ‘attā me uppajjati ceva veti cā’ti iccassa evamāgataṃ hoti,
tika-vin02t:959_11: iti cakkhu anattā”ti imasmiñca chachakkasutte aniccavasena anattataṃ dassesi.
tika-vin02t:959_15: evaṃ me rūpaṃ mā ahosī”ti imasmiṃyeva anattalakkhaṇasutte dukkhavasena anattataṃ dassesi. “Rūpaṃ,
tika-vin02t:959_22: na me so attā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabba”nti imasmiṃ arahantasutte ubhayavasena anattataṃ dassesi. Kasmā?
tika-vin02t:959_27: Sarīre gaṇḍapiḷakāsu vā uṭṭhitāsu kaṇṭakena vā viddhā “aho dukkha”nti vadanti,
tika-vin02t:959_28: “aho anattā”ti pana vattā nāma natthi. Kasmā?
tika-vin02t:959_29: Idañhi anattalakkhaṇaṃ nāma avibhūtaṃ duddasaṃ duppaññāpanaṃ.
tika-vin02t:959_32: tena naṃ bhagavā aniccavasena vā dukkhavasena vā ubhayavasena vā dassesi.
tika-vin02t:960_1: Tasmātihāti tasmā icceva vuttaṃ. Ti- kāra ha-
tika-vin02t:960_3: yasmā ime pañcakkhandhā aniccā dukkhā anattā,
tika-vin02t:960_9: santike vā appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā yādisaṃ vā tādisaṃ vā napuṃsakaniddesārahaṃ sabbaṃ byāpetvā saṅgaṇhāti,
tika-vin02t:960_11: Evañca sati aññesupi napuṃsakaniddesārahesu pasaṅgaṃ disvā tattha adhippetatthaṃ adhicca pavattanato atippasaṅgassa niyamanatthaṃ “rūpa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:960_12: Evaṃ padadvayenapi rūpassa asesapariggaho kato hoti.
tika-vin02t:961_0: Tattha rūpaṃ tāva addhāsantatisamayakhaṇavasena catudhā atītaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin02t:961_2: Tattha addhāvasena tāva ekassa ekasmiṃ bhave paṭisandhito pubbe atītaṃ,
tika-vin02t:961_12: Tesaṃyeva pana utuāhāracittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ upatthambhakavasena tassa atītādibhāvo veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:961_13: Samayavasena ekamuhuttapubbaṇhasāyanharattidivādīsu samayesu santānavasena pavattamānaṃ taṃtaṃsamayavantaṃ rūpaṃ paccuppannaṃ nāma,
tika-vin02t:962_0: Ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vāti cakkhādipañcavidhaṃ rūpaṃ attabhāvaṃ adhikicca pavattattā ajjhattaṃ,
tika-vin02t:962_4: Oḷārikaṃ vā sukhumaṃ vāti cakkhādīni nava,
tika-vin02t:962_5: āpodhātuvajjā tisso dhātuyo cāti dvādasavidhaṃ rūpaṃ ghaṭṭanavasena gahetabbato oḷārikaṃ,
tika-vin02t:962_7: Hīnaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vāti ettha hīnapaṇītabhāvo pariyāyato nippariyāyato ca.
tika-vin02t:962_8: Tattha akaniṭṭhānaṃ rūpato sudassīnaṃ rūpaṃ hīnaṃ,
tika-vin02t:962_12: Nippariyāyato pana yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā akusalavipākaviññāṇaṃ uppajjati,
tika-vin02t:962_14: Yaṃ pana ārammaṇaṃ katvā kusalavipākaviññāṇaṃ uppajjati,
tika-vin02t:962_16: Yathā hi akusalavipāko sayaṃ aniṭṭho aniṭṭhe eva uppajjati, na iṭṭhe,
tika-vin02t:962_17: evaṃ kusalavipākopi sayaṃ iṭṭho iṭṭheyeva uppajjati,
tika-vin02t:962_19: Yaṃ dūre santike vāti yaṃ sukhumaṃ,
tika-vin02t:962_23: Taṃ sabbanti taṃ atītādīhi padehi visuṃ niddiṭṭhaṃ sabbaṃ rūpaṃ.
tika-vin02t:963_0: Yā kāci vedanātiādīsu pana santativasena ca khaṇavasena ca vedanāya atītānāgatapaccuppannabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:963_1: Tattha santativasena ekavīthiekajavanaekasamāpattipariyāpannā ekavidhavisayasamāyogappavattā ca divasampi
tika-vin02t:963_2: buddharūpaṃ passantassa dhammaṃ suṇantassa pavattasaddhādisahitavedanā paccuppannā,
tika-vin02t:963_10: kusalābyākatā vedanā sukhumā”tiādinā nayena vibhaṅge vuttena jātisabhāvapuggalalokiyalokuttaravasena veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:963_11: Jātivasena tāva akusalavedanā sāvajjakiriyahetuto kilesasantāpasabhāvato ca avūpasantavuttīti kusalavedanāya oḷārikā,
tika-vin02t:963_12: sabyāpārato saussāhato savipākato kilesasantāpasabhāvato sāvajjato ca vipākābyākatāya oḷārikā,
tika-vin02t:963_13: savipākato kilesasantāpasabhāvato sabyāpajjato sāvajjato ca kiriyābyākatāya oḷārikā,
tika-vin02t:963_15: Dvepi kusalākusalavedanā sabyāpārato saussāhato savipākato ca yathāyogaṃ duvidhāyapi abyākatāya oḷārikā,
tika-vin02t:964_0: Sabhāvavasena pana dukkhavedanā nirassādato savipphārato ubbejanīyato abhibhavanato ca itarāhi dvīhi oḷārikā,
tika-vin02t:964_1: itarā pana dve sātato santato paṇītato manāpato majjhattato ca yathāyogaṃ dukkhāya sukhumā.
tika-vin02t:964_2: Ubho pana sukhadukkhā savipphārato khobhakaraṇato pākaṭato ca adukkhamasukhāya oḷārikā,
tika-vin02t:964_5: Puggalavasena pana asamāpannassa vedanā nānārammaṇavikkhittabhāvato samāpannassa vedanāya oḷārikā,
tika-vin02t:964_9: Sā āsavuppattihetuto oghaniyato yoganiyato ganthaniyato nīvaraṇiyato upādāniyato saṃkilesikato puthujjanasādhāraṇato ca anāsavāya oḷārikā,
tika-vin02t:965_1: Akusalavipākakāyaviññāṇasampayuttā hi vedanā jātivasena abyākatattā sukhumāpi samānā sabhāvādivasena oḷārikā hoti.
tika-vin02t:965_9: Tasmā yathā jātiādivasena sambhedo na hoti,
tika-vin02t:966_0: Apica “taṃ taṃ vā pana vedanaṃ upādāyupādāya vedanā oḷārikā sukhumā daṭṭhabbā”ti vacanato akusalādīsupi
tika-vin02t:966_1: lobhasahagatāya dosasahagatavedanā aggi viya attano nissayadahanato oḷārikā,
tika-vin02t:967_17: Esa nayo taṃtaṃbhūmivipākakiriyavedanāsu dukkhādiasamāpannādisāsavādivasena vuttavedanāsu ca.
tika-vin02t:968_5: Vatthuvasena cāpi hīnavatthukā yā kāci vedanā oḷārikā,
tika-vin02t:968_10: Dūrapadaṃ pana akusalā vedanā kusalābyākatāhi vedanāhi dūre,
tika-vin02t:968_11: santikapadaṃ akusalā vedanā akusalāya vedanāya santiketiādinā nayena vibhattaṃ.
tika-vin02t:968_12: Tasmā akusalā vedanā visabhāgato asaṃsaṭṭhato asarikkhato ca kusalābyākatāhi dūre,
tika-vin02t:968_15: Akusalā pana vedanā sabhāgato ca saṃsaṭṭhato ca sarikkhato ca akusalāya santiketi.
tika-vin02t:969_4: Nibbindaṃ virajjatīti ettha virāgavasena cattāro maggā kathitā.
tika-vin02t:969_5: Virāgā vimuccatīti virāgena maggeneva hetubhūtena paṭippassaddhivimuttivasena vimuccati.
tika-vin02t:969_7: Vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hotīti iminā pana paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ kathitaṃ.
tika-vin02t:969_9: Tena hi ñāṇena ariyasāvako paccavekkhanto “khīṇā jātī”tiādīni pajānāti.
tika-vin02t:969_12: Na tāvassa atītā jāti khīṇā pubbeva khīṇattā,
tika-vin02t:969_15: Yā pana maggassa abhāvitattā uppajjeyya ekacatupañcavokārabhavesu ekacatupañcakkhandhappabhedā jāti,
tika-vin02t:969_16: sā maggassa bhāvitattā anuppādadhammataṃ āpajjanena khīṇā,
tika-vin02t:969_17: taṃ so maggabhāvanāya pahīnakilese paccavekkhitvā kilesābhāve vijjamānampi kammaṃ āyatiṃ appaṭisandhikaṃ hotīti jānanto pajānāti.
tika-vin02t:970_3: Puthujjanakalyāṇakena hi saddhiṃ satta sekkhā maggabrahmacariyaṃ vasanti nāma,
tika-vin02t:970_5: tasmā ariyasāvako attano brahmacariyavāsaṃ paccavekkhanto “vusitaṃ brahmacariya”nti pajānāti.
tika-vin02t:970_6: Kataṃ karaṇīyanti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanāvasena soḷasavidhampi kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpitanti attho.
tika-vin02t:970_9: Tasmā ariyasāvako attano karaṇīyaṃ paccavekkhanto “kataṃ karaṇīya”nti pajānāti.
tika-vin02t:970_10: Nāparaṃ itthattāyāti idāni puna itthabhāvāya evaṃsoḷasakiccabhāvāya,
tika-vin02t:970_11: kilesakkhayāya vā maggabhāvanākiccaṃ me natthīti pajānāti.
tika-vin02t:970_12: Atha vā itthattāyāti itthabhāvā imasmā evaṃpakārā idāni vattamānakkhandhasantānā aparaṃ khandhasantānaṃ mayhaṃ natthi,
tika-vin02t:970_13: ime pana pañcakkhandhā pariññātā tiṭṭhanti chinnamūlakā rukkhā viya.
tika-vin02t:970_14: Te carimakaviññāṇanirodhena anupādāno viya jātavedo nibbāyissantīti pajānāti.
tika-vin02t:971_1: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti te bhikkhū sakamanā tuṭṭhamanā,
tika-vin02t:971_2: pītisomanassehi vā samattamanā hutvā karavīkarutamañjunā kaṇṇasukhena paṇḍitajanahadayānaṃ amatābhisekasadisena
tika-vin02t:971_3: brahmassarena bhāsato bhagavato vacanaṃ sukathitaṃ sulapitaṃ “evametaṃ bhagavā,
tika-vin02t:971_4: evametaṃ sugatā”ti matthakena sampaṭicchantā anumodiṃsu ceva sampaṭicchiṃsu cāti attho.
tika-vin02t:974_4: Anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṃsūti anuppādanirodhena nirujjhamānehi āsavehi anupādāya aggahetvā kañci
tika-vin02t:974_6: Cha arahantoti bhagavatā saddhiṃ cha janā arahanto.
tika-vin02t:974_7: Aññesaṃ pana devabrahmānampi arahattappattisambhavato idaṃ manussaarahanteyeva sandhāya vuttanti āha “cha manussā arahanto hontī”ti.
tika-vin02t:978_1: Idāni yasassa pabbajjaṃ dassetuṃ “tena kho pana samayenā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin02t:978_3: hemantikotiādīsu yattha sukhaṃ hoti hemantakāle vasituṃ,
tika-vin02t:978_10: Tattha vassiko pāsādo nātiucco hoti nātinīco,
tika-vin02t:978_22: vātapānasamīpesu cettha navā cāṭiyo ṭhapetvā udakassa pūretvā nīluppalādīhi sañchādenti,
tika-vin02t:978_24: yehi deve vassante viya udakadhārā nikkhamanti.
tika-vin02t:979_5: Pitā kira “tathārūpaṃ issariyasukhasampattiṃ anubhavamānassa purisaṃ disvā parisaṅkā uppajjati,
tika-vin02t:979_6: sā me puttassa mā ahosī”ti sabbakiccesu itthiyova ṭhapāpesi.
tika-vin02t:979_12: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāmaguṇe indriyāni cārayamānassāti attho.
tika-vin02t:979_17: Vippalapantiyoti viruddhaṃ palapantiyo vā rudantiyo vā.
tika-vin02t:979_18: Susānaṃ maññeti āmakasusānaṃ viya addasa sakaṃ parijananti sambandho.
tika-vin02t:980_1: Idaṃ kho yasāti bhagavā nibbānaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-vin02t:980_6: Tattha dānakathā nāma “idaṃ dānaṃ nāma sukhānaṃ nidānaṃ,
tika-vin02t:980_10: idhalokaparalokesu dānasadiso avassayo patiṭṭhā ārammaṇaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ natthi.
tika-vin02t:980_26: mayā dasa pāramiyo pūrentena velāmamahāyaññā mahāgovindamahāyaññā mahāsudassanamahāyaññā vessantaramahāyaññāti aneke mahāyaññā pavattitā,
tika-vin02t:980_27: sasabhūtena jalite aggikkhandhe attānaṃ niyyātentena sampattayācakānaṃ cittaṃ gahitaṃ.
tika-vin02t:980_29: mārasampattiṃ brahmasampattiṃ cakkavattisampattiṃ sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ abhisambodhiñāṇaṃ detī”ti evamādinā dānaguṇappaṭisaṃyuttakathā.
tika-vin02t:981_0: Yasmā pana dānaṃ dadanto sīlaṃ samādātuṃ sakkoti,
tika-vin02t:981_2: Dānañhi nāma dakkhiṇeyyesu hitajjhāsayena pūjanajjhāsayena vā attano santakassa paresaṃ pariccajanaṃ,
tika-vin02t:981_5: Tasmā dānaṃ dadanto sīlaṃ samādātuṃ sakkotīti dānānantaraṃ sīlaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:981_6: Apica dānakathā tāva pacurajanesupi pavattiyā sabbasādhāraṇattā sukarattā sīle patiṭṭhānassa upāyabhāvato ca ādito kathitā.
tika-vin02t:981_7: Pariccāgasīlo hi puggalo pariggahavatthūsu nissaṅgabhāvato sukheneva sīlāni samādiyati,
tika-vin02t:981_9: Sīlena dāyakapaṭiggāhakavisuddhito parānuggahaṃ vatvā parapīḷānivattivacanato kiriyadhammaṃ vatvā akiriyadhammavacanato
tika-vin02t:981_10: bhogayasasampattihetuṃ vatvā bhavasampattihetuvacanato ca dānakathānantaraṃ sīlakathā kathitā.
tika-vin02t:982_0: Sīlakathā nāma “sīlaṃ nāmetaṃ avassayo patiṭṭhā ārammaṇaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ.
tika-vin02t:982_2: ahaṃ saṅkhapālanāgarājakāle bhūridattanāgarājakāle campeyyanāgarājakāle sīlavarājakāle mātuposakahatthirājakāle
tika-vin02t:982_4: Idhalokaparalokasampattīnañhi sīlasadiso avassayo sīlasadisā patiṭṭhā ārammaṇaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ natthi,
tika-vin02t:982_8: Sīlālaṅkārena hi alaṅkataṃ sīlakusumapiḷandhanaṃ sīlagandhānulittaṃ sadevakopi loko olokento tittiṃ na gacchatī”ti evamādisīlaguṇappaṭisaṃyuttakathā.
tika-vin02t:983_0: Idaṃ pana sīlaṃ nissāya ayaṃ saggo labbhatīti dassanatthaṃ sīlānantaraṃ saggakathaṃ kathesi.
tika-vin02t:983_1: Saggakathā nāma “ayaṃ saggo nāma iṭṭho kanto manāpo,
tika-vin02t:983_4: cātumahārājikā devā navutivassasatasahassāni dibbasukhaṃ dibbasampattiṃ paṭilabhanti,
tika-vin02t:983_5: tāvatiṃsā tisso ca vassakoṭiyo saṭṭhi ca vassasatasahassānī”ti evamādisaggaguṇapaṭisaṃyuttakathā.
tika-vin02t:984_0: Evaṃ saggakathāya palobhetvā puna hatthiṃ alaṅkaritvā tassa soṇḍaṃ chindanto viya ayampi saggo anicco addhuvo,
tika-vin02t:984_1: na ettha chandarāgo kātabboti dassanatthaṃ “appassādā kāmā bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā,
tika-vin02t:984_2: ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo”tiādinā nayena kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ kathesi.
tika-vin02t:984_5: Atha vā ādīnaṃ vāti pavattatīti ādīnavo,
tika-vin02t:984_7: Tathā ca kāmā yathābhūtaṃ paccavekkhantānaṃ paccupatiṭṭhanti.
tika-vin02t:984_8: Okāroti lāmakabhāvo nihīnabhāvo aseṭṭhehi sevitabbatā seṭṭhehi na sevitabbatā ca.
tika-vin02t:985_0: Evaṃ kāmādīnavena tajjetvā nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsesi.
tika-vin02t:985_8: nikkhantaṃ byāpārato”tiādinā nayena nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsesi,
tika-vin02t:985_9: pabbajjāya jhānādīsu ca guṇe vibhāvesi vaṇṇesi.
tika-vin02t:985_10: Ettha ca saggaṃ kathetvā svāyaṃ saggo rāgādīhi upakkiliṭṭho,
tika-vin02t:985_11: sabbathāpi anupakkiliṭṭho ariyamaggoti dassanatthaṃ saggānantaraṃ maggo kathetabbo.
tika-vin02t:985_12: Maggañca kathentena tadadhigamupāyasandassanatthaṃ saggapariyāpannāpi pageva itare sabbepi kāmā nāma
tika-vin02t:985_13: bahvādīnavā aniccā addhuvā vipariṇāmadhammāti kāmānaṃ ādīnavo,
tika-vin02t:985_14: hīnā gammā pothujjanikā anariyā anatthasañhitāti tesaṃ okāro lāmakabhāvo,
tika-vin02t:985_15: sabbepi bhavā kilesānaṃ vatthubhūtāti tattha saṃkileso,
tika-vin02t:985_16: sabbasaṃkilesavippamuttaṃ nibbānanti nekkhamme ānisaṃso ca kathetabboti kāmesu ādīnavo okāro saṃkileso nekkhamme ca ānisaṃso pakāsitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:986_1: heṭṭhā pavattitadesanāya assaddhiyādīnaṃ cittadosānaṃ vigatattā uparidesanāya bhājanabhāvūpagamanena kammakkhamacittanti attho.
tika-vin02t:986_2: Assaddhiyādayo vā yasmā cittassa rogabhūtā tadā tassa vigatā,
tika-vin02t:986_7: Tattha saddhāsampattiyā pasannacittaṃ yadā bhagavā aññāsīti sambandho.
tika-vin02t:986_10: Vinīvaraṇacittanti uddhaccakukkuccavigamena vikkhepassa vigatattā tena apihitacittaṃ.
tika-vin02t:986_12: Pasannacittanti vicikicchāvigamena sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ adhimuttacittanti evampettha attho veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:987_0: Seyyathāpītiādinā upamāvasena tassa kilesappahānaṃ ariyamagguppādañca dasseti.
tika-vin02t:987_7: Etenassa lahuvipassakatā tikkhapaññatā sukhapaṭipadakhippābhiññatā ca dassitā hoti.
tika-vin02t:987_11: vatthassa āgantukamalehi kiliṭṭhabhāvo viya cittassa rāgādimalehi saṃkiliṭṭhabhāvo,
tika-vin02t:987_14: udakena temetvā temetvā ūsagomayachārikakhārakehi kāḷakapadese sammadditvā vatthassa dhovanapayogo viya
tika-vin02t:987_15: saddhāsinehena temetvā temetvā satisamādhipaññāhi dose sithile katvā sīlasutādividhinā cittassa sodhane
tika-vin02t:987_17: tena payogena vatthe kāḷakāpagamo viya vīriyārambhena kilesavikkhambhanaṃ,
tika-vin02t:987_19: tena suddhassa vatthassa pabhassarabhāvo viya vikkhambhitakilesassa cittassa maggena pariyodapananti.
tika-vin02t:988_8: puttassapi arahattappatti seṭṭhissapi dhammacakkhupaṭilābho na siyā.
tika-vin02t:988_9: Adiṭṭhasaccopi hi “dehi te mātuyā jīvita”nti yācanto kathañhi nāma vikkhepaṃ paṭibāhitvā bhagavato dhammadesanānusārena
tika-vin02t:988_11: yaso ca evaṃ tena yāciyamāno kathaṃ taṃ vikkhepaṃ paṭibāhitvā arahatte patiṭṭhaheyya.
tika-vin02t:989_0: Etadavocāti bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ abbhanumodamāno etaṃ “abhikkantaṃ bhante”tiādivacanaṃ avoca.
tika-vin02t:989_3: tasmā sādhu sādhu bhanteti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:991_0: Hāse soke pasāde ca, kare āmeḍitaṃ budho”ti. –
tika-vin02t:992_0: Imināva lakkhaṇena idha pasādavasena pasaṃsāvasena cāyaṃ dvikkhattuṃ vuttoti veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:992_1: Seyyathāpītiādinā catūhi upamāhi bhagavato desanaṃ thometi.
tika-vin02t:992_8: Maggaṃ ācikkheyyāti hatthe gahetvā “esa maggo”ti vadeyya.
tika-vin02t:993_0: Evaṃ desanaṃ thometvā imāya desanāya ratanattaye pasannacitto pasannākāraṃ karonto “esāha”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin02t:993_2: Upāsakaṃ maṃ bhagavā dhāretūti maṃ bhagavā “upāsako aya”nti evaṃ dhāretu,
tika-vin02t:993_6: tasmā ajjataggeti ajjataṃ ādiṃ katvāti evamattho veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:993_14: anaññasatthukaṃ tīhi saraṇagamanehi saraṇaṃ gataṃ upāsakaṃ kappiyakārakaṃ maṃ bhagavā dhāretu jānātu.
tika-vin02t:993_15: Ahañhi sacepi me tikhiṇena asinā sīsaṃ chindeyya,
tika-vin02t:993_18: saṅghaṃ “na saṅgho”ti vā vadeyyanti evaṃ attasanniyyātanena saraṇaṃ agamāsi.
tika-vin02t:993_20: vitthāro pana heṭṭhā verañjakaṇḍavaṇṇanāyaṃ āgatoyevāti idha na dassito.
tika-vin02t:994_2: Iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ paṭippassambhesīti yathā taṃ seṭṭhi gahapati tattha nisinnova yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ passati,
tika-vin02t:994_5: Ajjatanāyāti yaṃ me tumhesu sakkāraṃ karoto ajja bhavissati puññañca pītipāmojjañca,
tika-vin02t:994_7: Adhivāsesi bhagavā tuṇhībhāvenāti bhagavā kāyaṅgaṃ vā vācaṅgaṃ vā acopetvā abbhantareyeva khantiṃ karonto tuṇhībhāvena adhivāsesi,
tika-vin02t:994_8: seṭṭhissa anuggahatthaṃ manasāva sampaṭicchīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:994_9: “Ehi bhikkhū”ti bhagavā avocāti tassa kira iddhimayapattacīvarassa upanissayaṃ olokento anekāsu jātīsu
tika-vin02t:994_11: So tāvadeva bhaṇḍu kāsāvavasano aṭṭhahi bhikkhuparikkhārehi sarīre paṭimukkeheva vassasaṭṭhikatthero viya bhagavantaṃ namassamānova nisīdi.
tika-vin02t:994_12: Yo hi cīvarādike aṭṭha parikkhāre pattacīvarameva vā sotāpannādiariyassa puthujjanasseva vā sīlasampannassa
tika-vin02t:994_13: datvā “idaṃ parikkhāradānaṃ anāgate ehibhikkhubhāvāya paccayo hotū”ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapeti,
tika-vin02t:994_14: tassa taṃ sati adhikārasampattiyaṃ buddhānaṃ sammukhībhāve iddhimayaparikkhāralābhāya saṃvattatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:995_12: onittaṃ nānābhūtaṃ vinābhūtaṃ pattaṃ pāṇito assāti onittapattapāṇi,
tika-vin02t:995_14: hatthe ca pattañca dhovitvā ekamantaṃ pattaṃ nikkhipitvā nisinnanti attho.
tika-vin02t:995_15: Ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsūti bhagavantaṃ evaṃbhūtaṃ ñatvā ekasmiṃ okāse nisīdiṃsūti attho.
tika-vin02t:995_16: Dhammiyā kathāyātiādīsu taṅkhaṇānurūpāya dhammiyā kathāya diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaatthaṃ sandassetvā
tika-vin02t:995_17: kusale ca dhamme samādapetvā tattha ca naṃ samuttejetvā saussāhaṃ katvā tāya ca saussāhatāya aññehi ca
tika-vin02t:995_18: vijjamānaguṇehi sampahaṃsetvā dhammaratanavassaṃ vassitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
tika-vin02t:998_1: Idāni tassa sahāyānaṃ pabbajjaṃ dassento “assosuṃ kho”tiādimāha.
tika-vin02t:998_3: seṭṭhino ca anuseṭṭhino ca yesaṃ kulānaṃ tāni seṭṭhānuseṭṭhīni kulāni,
tika-vin02t:998_5: paveṇivasena āgatehi seṭṭhīhi ca anuseṭṭhīhi ca samannāgatānaṃ kulānanti attho.
tika-vin02t:998_8: Kāsāyāni vatthānīti kasāyarasapītāni brahmacariyaṃ carantānaṃ anucchavikāni vatthāni.
tika-vin02t:1001_3: Imesaṃ pana sabbesaṃ pubbayogo vattabboti taṃ dassetuṃ “yasaādīnaṃ kulaputtānaṃ ayaṃ pubbayogo”tiādimāha.
tika-vin02t:1004_1: Idāni saraṇagamanūpasampadaṃ dassetuṃ “atha kho bhagavā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1004_7: Mā ekena dve agamitthāti ekena maggena dvīsu gatesu ekasmiṃ dhammaṃ desente ekena tuṇhībhūtena ṭhātabbaṃ hoti,
tika-vin02t:1004_11: Ādimajjhapariyosānañca nāmetaṃ sāsanassa ca desanāya ca vasena dubbidhaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1004_21: Desanāya pana catuppadikagāthāya tāva paṭhamapādo ādi,
tika-vin02t:1004_30: Anekānusandhikassa suttassa majjhe bahukampi anusandhi majjhameva,
tika-vin02t:1004_34: Sabyañjananti byañjanehi ceva padehi ca paripūraṃ katvā desetha.
tika-vin02t:1005_1: dukūlasāṇiyā paṭicchannā viya catuppadikagāthāpariyosāne arahattaṃ pattuṃ samatthā sattā santīti attho.
tika-vin02t:1005_5: Paṭhamakappikānaṃ kira tasmiṃ ṭhāne senāniveso ahosi,
tika-vin02t:1005_10: Tenupasaṅkamissāmīti nāhaṃ tumhe uyyojetvā pariveṇādīni kāretvā upaṭṭhākādīhi paricariyamāno viharissāmi,
tika-vin02t:1005_11: tiṇṇaṃ pana jaṭilānaṃ aḍḍhuḍḍhāni pāṭihāriyasahassāni dassetvā dhammameva desetuṃ upasaṅkamissāmi.
tika-vin02t:1006_1: Māro pāpimāti attano visayaṃ atikkamituṃ paṭipanne satte māretīti māro,
tika-vin02t:1006_4: Aññānipissa kaṇho adhipati vasavattī antako namuci pamattabandhūtiādīni bahūni nāmāni,
tika-vin02t:1006_6: Upasaṅkamīti “ayaṃ samaṇo gotamo mahāyuddhaṃ vicārento viya ‘mā ekena dve agamittha,
tika-vin02t:1006_8: imasmiṃ pana ekasmimpi dhammaṃ desente mayhaṃ cittassa sātaṃ natthi,
tika-vin02t:1007_1: Ye dibbā ye ca mānusāti ye dibbakāmaguṇasaṅkhātā mānusakakāmaguṇasaṅkhātā ca kilesapāsā nāma atthi,
tika-vin02t:1007_6: Na me samaṇa mokkhasīti samaṇa tvaṃ mama visayato na muccissasi.
tika-vin02t:1007_7: “Na me samaṇa mokkhasī”ti ca idaṃ māro “muttāhaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1007_10: saddahantopi vā “evamayaṃ paresaṃ sattānaṃ mokkhāya ussāhaṃ na kareyyā”ti santajjento kohaññe ṭhatvā vadati.
tika-vin02t:1011_1: “Anujānāmi bhikkhave”tiādikāya pana pāḷiyā yo pabbajjūpasampadāvinicchayo vattabbo,
tika-vin02t:1011_4: Sayaṃ pabbājetabboti kesacchedanādīni sayaṃ karontena pabbājetabbo.
tika-vin02t:1011_5: Kesacchedanaṃ kāsāyacchādanaṃ saraṇadānanti hi imāni tīṇi karonto “pabbājetī”ti vuccati.
tika-vin02t:1011_6: Etesu ekaṃ dve vāpi karonto tathā voharīyatiyeva,
tika-vin02t:1011_7: tasmā etaṃ pabbājehīti kesacchedanaṃ kāsāyacchādanañca sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1011_8: Upajjhāyaṃ uddissa pabbājetīti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-vin02t:1011_10: Tena sabhikkhuke vihāre aññampi “etassa kese chindā”ti vattuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:1011_12: Bhikkhuto añño pabbājetuṃ na labhatīti saraṇadānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1012_3: Manuññepi hi yāgupatte vā bhattapatte vā kesavaṇṇaṃ kiñci disvā “kesamissakamidaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1012_6: Rattiṃ bhuñjantāpi kesasaṇṭhānaṃ akkavākaṃ vā makacivākaṃ vā chupitvā tatheva jigucchanti,
tika-vin02t:1012_12: Yathā hi daharassa kumārakassa vaccaṃ vaṇṇato haliddivaṇṇaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1012_21: Yathā pana asuciṭṭhāne gāmanissandena jātāni sūpeyyapaṇṇāni nāgarikamanussānaṃ jegucchāni honti aparibhogāni,
tika-vin02t:1012_22: evaṃ kesāpi pubbalohitamuttakarīsapittasemhādinissandena jātattā paramajegucchāti evaṃ āsayato paṭikūlā.
tika-vin02t:1012_23: Ime ca kesā nāma gūtharāsimhi uṭṭhitakaṇṇakaṃ viya ekatiṃsakoṭṭhāsarāsimhi jātā,
tika-vin02t:1012_24: te susānasaṅkāraṭṭhānādīsu jātasākaṃ viya parikhādīsu jātakamalakuvalayādipupphaṃ viya ca asuciṭṭhāne
tika-vin02t:1012_25: jātattā paramajegucchāti evaṃ okāsato paṭikūlātiādinā nayena tacapañcakassa vaṇṇādivasena paṭikūlabhāvaṃ
tika-vin02t:1013_0: Nijjīvanissattabhāvaṃ vā pākaṭaṃ karontenāti ime kesā nāma sīsakaṭāhapaliveṭhanacamme jātā.
tika-vin02t:1013_1: Tattha yathā vammikamatthake jātesu kunthatiṇesu na vammikamatthako jānāti “mayi kunthatiṇāni jātānī”ti,
tika-vin02t:1013_3: evameva na sīsakaṭāhapaliveṭhanacammaṃ jānāti “mayi kesā jātā”ti,
tika-vin02t:1013_6: Iti kesā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūtiādinā nayena nijjīvanissattabhāvaṃ pakāsentena.
tika-vin02t:1013_8: Madditasaṅkhāroti nāmarūpavavatthānena ceva paccayapariggahavasena ca ñāṇena parimadditasaṅkhāro.
tika-vin02t:1013_9: Bhāvitabhāvanoti kalāpasammasanādinā sabbaso kusalabhāvanāya pūraṇena bhāvitabhāvano.
tika-vin02t:1014_0: Adinnaṃ na vaṭṭatīti ettha pabbajjā na ruhatīti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:1014_4: Anunāsikantaṃ katvā dānakāle antarā vicchedaṃ akatvā dātabbānīti dassetuṃ “ekasambandhānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1014_7: Sabbamassa kappiyākappiyaṃ ācikkhitabbanti dasasikkhāpadavinimuttaṃ parāmāsāparāmāsādibhedaṃ kappiyākappiyaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1014_9: tattha ca kattabbassa akaraṇe akattabbassa ca karaṇe daṇḍakammāraho hotīti dīpeti.
tika-vin02t:1017_1: Atha kho bhagavā vassaṃvuṭṭhotiādikāya pana pāḷiyā ayaṃ apubbapadavaṇṇanā.
tika-vin02t:1017_7: Ajjhabhāsīti “ayaṃ attanā vīriyaṃ katvā arahattaṃ patvāpi na tussati,
tika-vin02t:1020_2: Buddhānañhi ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vasantānaṃ chāyūdakādīnaṃ vipattiṃ vā aphāsukasenāsanaṃ vā manussānaṃ assaddhādibhāvaṃ vā āgamma anabhirati nāma natthi,
tika-vin02t:1020_3: tesaṃ sampattiyā “idha phāsuṃ viharāmā”ti abhiramitvā ciravihāropi natthi.
tika-vin02t:1020_4: Yattha pana tathāgate viharante sattā saraṇesu vā tīsu patiṭṭhahanti,
tika-vin02t:1020_8: tattha buddhā satte tāsu sampattīsu patiṭṭhāpanaajjhāsayena vasanti,
tika-vin02t:1023_4: sāmaṃ vineti attano laddhiṃ sikkhāpetīti vināyako.
tika-vin02t:1023_5: Sace te kassapa agarūti kassapa sace tuyhaṃ bhāriyaṃ aphāsukaṃ kiñci natthi.
