tika-vin02t:1025_4: Ete hi cattāro mahārājāno majjhimayāmasamanantare āgatā.
tika-vin02t:1025_6: yadidaṃ buddhānaṃ vā buddhasāvakānaṃ vā upaṭṭhānaṃ āgacchantā majjhimayāmasamanantare āgacchanti.
tika-vin02t:1025_9: Devatā hi manussalokaṃ āgacchamānā pakativaṇṇaṃ pakatiiddhiṃ jahitvā oḷārikaṃ attabhāvaṃ katvā atirekavaṇṇavatthālaṅkārakāyādīhi
tika-vin02t:1025_10: obhāsaṃ muñcamānādivasena ca dibbaṃ iddhānubhāvañca nimminitvā naṭasamajjādīni gacchantā manussā viya
tika-vin02t:1025_12: Tattha kāmāvacarā anabhisaṅkhatenapi āgantuṃ sakkonti oḷārikarūpattā.
tika-vin02t:1025_14: rūpāvacarā pana anabhisaṅkhatena kāyena āgantuṃ na sakkonti sukhumatararūpattā.
tika-vin02t:1025_17: Tasmā brahmalokepi brahmāno yebhuyyena nimmitarūpeneva pavattanti.
tika-vin02t:1025_19: kevalaṃ taṃ cittuppādassa nissayādhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ saṇṭhānavantaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin02t:1026_3: tasmā kevalakappaṃ vanasaṇḍanti anavasesaṃ samantato vanasaṇḍanti attho.
tika-vin02t:1026_4: Anavasesaṃ pharituṃ samatthassapi hi obhāsassa kenaci kāraṇena ekadesapharaṇampi siyā,
tika-vin02t:1026_5: ayaṃ pana sabbaso pharatīti dassetuṃ samantattho kappa-
tika-vin02t:1026_8: Bhagavato pabhāya anobhāsitameva hi padesaṃ devatā attano pabhāya obhāsenti.
tika-vin02t:1026_9: Na hi bhagavato pabhā kāyaci pabhāya abhibhūyati,
tika-vin02t:1026_10: sūriyādīnampi pana pabhaṃ sā abhibhuyya tiṭṭhatīti.
tika-vin02t:1026_12: cando viya sūriyo viya ca ekobhāsaṃ ekapajjotaṃ karitvāti attho.
tika-vin02t:1026_13: Devatānañhi sarīrābhā dasadvādasayojanamattaṭṭhānaṃ tato bhiyyopi pharitvā tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin02t:1027_5: Tattha “idha bhikkhu ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti,
tika-vin02t:1027_6: bahudhāpi hutvā eko hoti āvibhāvaṃ tirobhāva”ntiādinayappavattaṃ iddhividhameva iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1027_11: itthampi te mano”’tiādinayappavattaṃ parassa cittaṃ ñatvā kathanaṃ ādesanāpāṭihāriyaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1027_17: idaṃ upasampajja viharathā”’ti evamādinayappavattā sāvakānaṃ buddhānañca sabbakālaṃ desetabbadhammadesanā anusāsanīpāṭihāriyaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1028_0: Tattha pāṭihāriyapadassa vacanatthaṃ paṭipakkhaharaṇato rāgādikilesāpanayanato pāṭihāriyanti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:1028_1: Bhagavato pana paṭipakkhā rāgādayo na santi ye haritabbā,
tika-vin02t:1028_2: puthujjanānampi vigatūpakkilese aṭṭhaguṇasamannāgate citte hatapaṭipakkhe iddhividhaṃ vattati,
tika-vin02t:1028_3: tasmā tattha pavattavohārena ca na sakkā idha pāṭihāriyanti vattuṃ.
tika-vin02t:1028_4: Sace pana mahākāruṇikassa bhagavato veneyyagatā ca kilesā paṭipakkhā,
tika-vin02t:1028_7: Atha vā bhagavato ca sāsanassa ca paṭipakkhā titthiyā,
tika-vin02t:1028_9: Te hi diṭṭhiharaṇavasena diṭṭhippakāsane asamatthabhāvena ca iddhiādesanānusāsanīhi haritā apanītā hontīti.
tika-vin02t:1028_10: Paṭīti vā ayaṃ saddo pacchāti etassa atthaṃ bodheti “tasmiṃ paṭipaviṭṭhamhi,
tika-vin02t:1028_12: tasmā samāhite citte vigatūpakkilesena katakiccena pacchā haritabbaṃ pavattetabbanti paṭihāriyaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1028_13: attano vā upakkilesesu catutthajjhānamaggehi haritesu pacchā haraṇaṃ paṭihāriyaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1028_14: iddhiādesanānusāsaniyo ca vigatūpakkilesena katakiccena sattahitatthaṃ puna pavattetabbā,
tika-vin02t:1028_15: haritesu ca attano upakkilesesu parasattānaṃ upakkilesaharaṇāni hontīti paṭihāriyāni bhavanti,
tika-vin02t:1028_17: Paṭihāriye vā iddhiādesanānusāsanīsamudāye bhavaṃ ekekaṃ pāṭihāriyanti vuccati.
tika-vin02t:1028_18: Paṭihāriyaṃ vā catutthajjhānaṃ maggo ca paṭipakkhaharaṇato,
tika-vin02t:1029_1: Paṃsukūlaṃ uppannaṃ hotīti pariyesamānassa paṭilābhavasena uppannaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:1029_3: Yasmā pāṇinā phuṭṭhamatte sā pokkharaṇī nimmitā ahosi,
tika-vin02t:1030_3: Antaraṭṭhakāsu himapātasamayeti hemantassa utuno abbhantarabhūte māghamāsassa avasāne catasso,
tika-vin02t:1030_4: phagguṇamāsassa ādimhi catassoti evaṃ ubhinnamantare aṭṭharattīsu himapatanakāle.
tika-vin02t:1030_5: Nerañjarāya ummujjantīti keci tasmiṃ titthasammate udake paṭhamaṃ nimuggasakalasarīrā tato ummujjantā vuṭṭhahanti uppilavanti.
tika-vin02t:1030_8: Tattha hi keci “ekummujjaneneva pāpasuddhi hotī”ti evaṃdiṭṭhikā,
tika-vin02t:1030_10: Ummujjanaṃ pana nimujjanamantarena natthīti avinābhāvato nimujjanampi te karontiyeva.
tika-vin02t:1030_12: tepi ekavārameva nimujjitvā vuttanayeneva avinābhāvato ummujjanampi katvā pakkamanti.
tika-vin02t:1030_13: Apare “punappunaṃ ummujjananimujjanāni katvā nahāte pāpasuddhi hotī”ti evaṃdiṭṭhikā,
tika-vin02t:1030_15: Te sabbepi sandhāya vuttaṃ “ummujjantipi nimujjantipi ummujjananimujjanampi karontī”ti.
tika-vin02t:1030_18: ummujjanaṃ tadubhayañca karontā bahūti tesaṃ yebhuyyabhāvadassanatthaṃ ummujjanaṃ paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1031_4: Neva ca kho tvaṃ kassapa arahāti etena tadā kassapassa asekkhabhāvaṃ paṭikkhipati,
tika-vin02t:1031_8: yāya tvaṃ arahā vā assasi arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannoti iminā panassa kalyāṇaputhujjanabhāvampi paṭikkhipati.
tika-vin02t:1032_2: Idāni aḍḍhuḍḍhāni pāṭihāriyasahassāni ekato gaṇetvā dassetuṃ “bhagavato adhiṭṭhānena pañca kaṭṭhasatāni na phāliyiṃsū”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1032_3: Nāgadamanādīni pana soḷasa pāṭihāriyāni idha na gaṇitāni,
tika-vin02t:1034_1: Idāni tassa bhikkhusahassassa ādittapariyāyadesanāya arahattappattiṃ dassetuṃ “atha kho bhagavā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1034_2: Tattha gayāyaṃ viharati gayāsīseti gayānāmikāya nadiyā avidūre bhavattā gāmo gayā nāma,
tika-vin02t:1034_5: Gayāgāmassa hi avidūre gayāti ekā pokkharaṇīpi atthi nadīpi gayāsīsanāmako hatthikumbhasadiso piṭṭhipāsāṇopi.
tika-vin02t:1034_9: gayāgāmassa āsanne gayāsīsanāmake piṭṭhipāsāṇe viharatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:1034_10: Bhikkhū āmantesīti tesaṃ sappāyadhammadesanaṃ vicinitvā taṃ desessāmīti āmantesi.
tika-vin02t:1034_11: Bhagavā hi taṃ iddhimayapattacīvaradharaṃ samaṇasahassaṃ ādāya gayāsīsaṃ gantvā tena parivārito nisīditvā
tika-vin02t:1034_12: “katarā nu kho etesaṃ dhammakathā sappāyā”ti cintento “ime sāyaṃ pātaṃ aggiṃ paricaranti,
tika-vin02t:1034_13: imesaṃ dvādasāyatanāni ādittāni sampajjalitāni viya katvā dassessāmi,
tika-vin02t:1034_14: evaṃ ime arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ sakkhissantī”ti sanniṭṭhānamakāsi.
tika-vin02t:1035_0: Tattha sabbaṃ nāma catubbidhaṃ sabbasabbaṃ āyatanasabbaṃ sakkāyasabbaṃ padesasabbanti. Tattha –
tika-vin02t:1040_8: “Sabbadhammesu vā paṭhamasamannāhāro uppajjati cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ tajjā manoviññāṇadhātū”ti idaṃ padesasabbaṃ nāma.
tika-vin02t:1040_13: Padesasabbaṃ sakkāyasabbaṃ na pāpuṇāti tassa tebhūmakadhammesupi ekadesassa asaṅgaṇhanato.
tika-vin02t:1040_14: Sakkāyasabbaṃ āyatanasabbaṃ na pāpuṇāti lokuttaradhammānaṃ asaṅgaṇhanato.
tika-vin02t:1041_0: Cakkhūti dve cakkhūni ñāṇacakkhu ceva maṃsacakkhu ca.
tika-vin02t:1041_1: Tattha ñāṇacakkhu pañcavidhaṃ buddhacakkhu dhammacakkhu samantacakkhu dibbacakkhu paññācakkhūti.
tika-vin02t:1041_4: Dhammacakkhu nāma heṭṭhimā tayo maggā tīṇi ca phalāni,
tika-vin02t:1041_13: Tesu yvāyaṃ akkhikūpake akkhipaṭalehi parivārito maṃsapiṇḍo,
tika-vin02t:1041_14: yattha catasso dhātuyo vaṇṇagandharasojā sambhavo jīvitaṃ bhāvo cakkhuppasādo kāyappasādoti saṅkhepato terasa sambhārā honti,
tika-vin02t:1041_15: vitthārato pana catasso dhātuyo vaṇṇagandharasojā sambhavoti ime nava catusamuṭṭhānavasena chattiṃsa,
tika-vin02t:1041_16: jīvitaṃ bhāvo cakkhuppasādo kāyappasādoti ime kammasamuṭṭhānā tāva cattāroti cattālīsa sambhārā honti,
tika-vin02t:1041_18: Yaṃ panettha setamaṇḍalaparicchinnena kaṇhamaṇḍalena parivārite diṭṭhimaṇḍale sanniviṭṭhaṃ rūpadassanasamatthaṃ pasādamattaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1041_20: Tassa tato paresañca sotādīnaṃ vitthārakathā visuddhimagge vuttāva.
tika-vin02t:1042_13: Cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitanti cakkhusamphassaṃ mūlapaccayaṃ katvā uppannā sampaṭicchanasantīraṇavoṭṭhabbanajavanavedanā.
tika-vin02t:1042_14: Cakkhuviññāṇasampayuttāya pana vedanāya cakkhusamphassassa paccayabhāve vattabbameva natthi.
tika-vin02t:1042_17: Teneva “cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1042_19: Ettha pana manoti bhavaṅgacittaṃ manodvārassa adhippetattā.
tika-vin02t:1042_24: Bhavaṅgasampayuttāya pana vedanāya gahaṇe vattabbameva natthi.
tika-vin02t:1042_25: Āvajjanaṃ vā bhavaṅgato amocetvā manoti sāvajjanaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1043_1: Rāgo hi tikhiṇaṃ hutvā uppajjamāno satte anudahati jhāpeti,
tika-vin02t:1043_5: ekā daharabhikkhunī cittalapabbatavihāre uposathāgāraṃ gantvā dvārapālarūpaṃ olokayamānā ṭhitā.
tika-vin02t:1043_6: Athassā anto rāgo tikhiṇataro hutvā uppanno,
tika-vin02t:1043_7: tasmā taṃsamuṭṭhānā tejodhātu ativiya tikhiṇabhāvena saddhiṃ attanā sahajātadhammehi hadayapadesaṃ jhāpesi yathā taṃ bāhirā tejodhātu sannissayaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1044_0: Dosassa pana anudahanatāya manopadosikā devā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-vin02t:1044_1: Tesu kira eko devaputto “nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmī”ti saparivāro rathena vīthiṃ paṭipajjati.
tika-vin02t:1044_2: Athañño nikkhamanto taṃ purato gacchantaṃ disvā “bho ayaṃ kapaṇo adiṭṭhapubbaṃ viya etaṃ disvā pītiyā
tika-vin02t:1044_3: uddhumāto viya bhijjamāno viya ca gacchatī”ti kujjhati.
tika-vin02t:1044_4: Purato gacchantopi nivattitvā taṃ kuddhaṃ disvā kuddhā nāma suvijānā hontīti kuddhabhāvamassa ñatvā “tvaṃ kuddho mayhaṃ kiṃ karissasi,
tika-vin02t:1044_5: ayaṃ sampatti mayā dānasīlādīnaṃ vasena laddhā,
tika-vin02t:1044_8: Kuddhassa hi so kodho itarasmiṃ akujjhante anupādāno ekavārameva uppattiyā anāsevano cāvetuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-vin02t:1044_11: Ubhosu pana kuddhesu ekassa kodho itarassa paccayo hoti,
tika-vin02t:1044_12: tassapi kodho itarassa paccayo hotīti ubho kandantānaṃyeva orodhānaṃ cavanti.
tika-vin02t:1044_13: Ubhosu hi kuddhesu bhiyyo bhiyyo aññamaññamhi parivaḍḍhanavasena tikhiṇasamudācāro nissayadahanaraso
tika-vin02t:1044_14: kodho uppajjamāno hadayavatthuṃ niddahanto accantasukhumālaṃ karajakāyaṃ vināseti,
tika-vin02t:1045_0: Mohassa pana anudahanatāya khiḍḍāpadosikā devā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-vin02t:1045_2: tasmā khiḍḍāvasena āhārakālaṃ ativattetvā kālaṃ karonti.
tika-vin02t:1045_3: Te kira puññavisesādhigatena mahantena attano sirivibhavena nakkhattaṃ kīḷantā tāya sampattimahantatāya “āhāraṃ paribhuñjimha,
tika-vin02t:1045_5: Atha ekāhārātikkamanato paṭṭhāya nirantaraṃ khādantāpi pivantāpi cavantiyeva na tiṭṭhanti. Kasmā?
tika-vin02t:1045_9: Tesaṃ tejassa mandatāya karajakāyassa balavatāya sattāhampi atikkamitvā uṇhodakaacchayāguādīhi sakkā vatthuṃ upatthambhetuṃ.
tika-vin02t:1045_10: Devānaṃ pana tejo balavā hoti uḷārapuññanibbattattā uḷāragarusiniddhasudhāhārajiraṇato ca,
tika-vin02t:1045_12: Teneva hi bhagavā indasālaguhāyaṃ pakatipathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhātuṃ asakkontaṃ sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ “oḷārikakāyaṃ adhiṭṭhāhī”ti āha,
tika-vin02t:1045_13: tasmā te ekaṃ āhāravelaṃ atikkamitvā saṇṭhātuṃ na sakkonti.
tika-vin02t:1045_14: Yathā nāma gimhānaṃ majjhanhike tattapāsāṇe ṭhapitaṃ padumaṃ vā uppalaṃ vā sāyanhasamaye ghaṭasatenapi siñciyamānaṃ pākatikaṃ na hoti vinassatiyeva,
tika-vin02t:1045_15: evameva pacchā nirantaraṃ khādantāpi pivantāpi cavantiyeva na tiṭṭhanti.
tika-vin02t:1046_3: so heṭṭhimehi heṭṭhimehi uparimānaṃ uparimānaṃ paṇītatamo hoti.
tika-vin02t:1046_4: Taṃ yathāsakaṃ divasavasena divase divase bhuñjanti.
tika-vin02t:1046_6: So jivhāya ṭhapitamatto yāva kesagganakhaggā kāyaṃ pharati,
tika-vin02t:1046_7: tesaṃyeva divasavasena sattadivasaṃ yāpanasamatthova hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:1047_0: Ke pana te khiḍḍāpadosikā nāma devāti?
tika-vin02t:1047_3: karajaṃ manda”nti avisesena vuttattā pana ye keci kabaḷīkārāhārūpajīvino evaṃ karonti,
tika-vin02t:1047_9: Evaṃ tāva rāgādayo tayo anudahanaṭṭhena “aggī”ti veditabbā.
tika-vin02t:1047_13: Iti imasmiṃ sutte dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ kathitaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ ekādasahi aggīhi ādittabhāvena dukkhamatāya dukkhabhāvassa kathitattā.
tika-vin02t:1051_1: Idāni “atha kho bhagavā gayāsīse yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā”tiādīsu yā sā anuttānapadavaṇṇanā,
tika-vin02t:1051_3: Tattha tāluyyāneti tālarukkhānaṃ bahubhāvato evaṃladdhanāme uyyāne.
tika-vin02t:1051_4: Appekacce yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvātiādīsu añjaliṃ paṇāmetvāti ye ubhatopakkhikā,
tika-vin02t:1051_6: Te kira evaṃ cintayiṃsu “sace no micchādiṭṭhikā codessanti ‘kasmā tumhe samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ vanditthā’ti,
tika-vin02t:1051_8: Sace no sammādiṭṭhikā codessanti ‘kasmā bhagavantaṃ na vanditthā’ti,
tika-vin02t:1051_12: ahaṃ asukassa putto datto nāma mitto nāma idha āgato”ti vadantā nāmaṃ sāventi nāma,
tika-vin02t:1051_14: ahaṃ vāseṭṭho nāma kaccāno nāma idhāgato”ti vadantā gottaṃ sāventi nāma.
tika-vin02t:1051_15: Ete kira daliddā jiṇṇakulaputtā parisamajjhe nāmagottavasena pākaṭā bhavissāmāti evaṃ akaṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1051_18: Tattha kerāṭikā “ekaṃ dve kathāsallāpe karonte vissāsiko hoti,
tika-vin02t:1051_19: atha vissāse sati ekaṃ dve bhikkhā adātuṃ na yutta”nti tato attānaṃ mocentā tuṇhī nisīdanti.
tika-vin02t:1051_20: Andhabālā aññāṇatāyeva avakkhittā mattikāpiṇḍo viya yattha katthaci tuṇhībhūtā nisīdanti.
tika-vin02t:1052_0: Kisakovadānoti ettha kisakānaṃ ovadāno kisakovadānoti imaṃ tāva atthavikappaṃ dassetuṃ “tāpasacariyāya kisasarīrattā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1052_2: Rūpādayova idha kāmanīyaṭṭhena “kāmā”ti vuttāti āha “ete rūpādayo kāme”ti.
tika-vin02t:1052_4: Upadhīsūti ettha cattāro upadhī kāmupadhi khandhupadhi kilesupadhi abhisaṅkhārupadhīti.
tika-vin02t:1052_5: Kāmāpi hi “yaṃ pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1052_6: ayaṃ kāmānaṃ assādo”ti evaṃ vuttassa sukhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato upadhīyati ettha sukhanti iminā vacanatthena “upadhī”ti vuccanti.
tika-vin02t:1052_10: tesu khandhupadhi idhādhippetoti āha “khandhupadhīsu malanti ñatvā”ti.
tika-vin02t:1052_11: Yaññā malameva vadantīti yāgahetu malameva ijjhatīti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:1053_3: Yatheva hi manussaparibhoge suvaṇṇe yuttikataṃ hīnaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1053_11: Siṅgīnikkhanti ca nikkhaparimāṇena siṅgīsuvaṇṇena kataṃ suvaṇṇapaṭṭaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1053_16: nikkhena kataṃ ghaṭṭanamajjanañceva khamati vaṇṇavantañca hoti.
tika-vin02t:1055_2: bhikkhu pañcaṅgavippahīno hoti chaḷaṅgasamannāgato ekārakkho caturāpasseno panuṇṇapaccekasacco samavayasaṭṭhesano
tika-vin02t:1057_4: bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā neva sumano hoti na dummano,
tika-vin02t:1057_10: manasā dhammaṃ viññāya neva sumano hoti na dummano,
tika-vin02t:1057_11: upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno. Evaṃ kho,
tika-vin02t:1058_4: bhikkhu satārakkhena cetasā samannāgato hoti. Evaṃ kho,
tika-vin02t:1060_5: sabbāni tāni nuṇṇāni honti panuṇṇāni cattāni vantāni muttāni pahīnāni paṭinissaṭṭhāni. Evaṃ kho,
tika-vin02t:1063_4: bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṃ
tika-vin02t:1063_5: upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṃ catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati. Evaṃ kho,
tika-vin02t:1064_6: mohā cittaṃ vimuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃ kho,
tika-vin02t:1065_4: bhikkhu ‘rāgo me pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṃkato āyatiṃ anuppādadhammo’ti pajānāti,
tika-vin02t:1065_6: moho me pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṃkato āyatiṃ anuppādadhammo’ti pajānāti. Evaṃ kho,
tika-vin02t:1067_1: ariyānaṃ eva vāsāti ariyavāsā anariyānaṃ tādisānaṃ vāsānaṃ asambhavato.
tika-vin02t:1067_3: Ekārakkhoti ekā satisaṅkhātā ārakkhā etassāti ekārakkho.
tika-vin02t:1067_4: Khīṇāsavassa hi tīsu dvāresu sabbakāle sati ārakkhakiccaṃ sādheti.
tika-vin02t:1067_5: Tenevassa carato ca tiṭṭhato ca suttassa ca jāgarassa ca satataṃ samitaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ hotīti vuccati.
tika-vin02t:1068_0: Caturāpassenoti cattāri apassenāni apassayā etassāti caturāpasseno.
tika-vin02t:1068_3: Tassa vitthāro “paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṃ paribhuñjatī”tiādinā nayena veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:1068_4: Saṅkhāyekaṃ adhivāsetīti ñāṇena ñatvā adhivāsetabbayuttakameva adhivāseti.
tika-vin02t:1068_5: Vitthāro panettha “paṭisaṅkhā yoniso khamo hoti sītassā”tiādinā nayena veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:1068_7: Tassa vitthāro “paṭisaṅkhā yoniso caṇḍaṃ hatthiṃ parivajjetī”tiādinā nayena veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:1068_8: Vinodetīti ñāṇena ñatvā vinodetabbameva vinodeti nudati nīharati anto vasituṃ na deti.
tika-vin02t:1068_9: Tassa vitthāro “uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetī”tiādinā nayena veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:1069_1: idameva sacca”nti evaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ gahitattā paccekasaṅkhātāni diṭṭhisaccāni panuṇṇāni nīhaṭāni pahīnāni assāti panuṇṇapaccekasacco.
tika-vin02t:1069_7: idameva sacca”nti pāṭiyekkaṃ gahitāni bahūni saccānīti attho.
tika-vin02t:1069_14: Paṭinissaṭṭhānīti yathā na puna cittaṃ ārohanti,
tika-vin02t:1069_16: Sabbāneva cetāni ariyamaggādhigamato pubbe gahitassa diṭṭhiggāhassa vissaṭṭhabhāvavevacanāni.
tika-vin02t:1070_2: Sammā avayā saṭṭhā esanā assāti samavayasaṭṭhesano,
tika-vin02t:1070_4: “Rāgā cittaṃ vimutta”ntiādīhi maggassa kiccanipphatti kathitā rāgādīnaṃ pahīnabhāvadīpanato.
tika-vin02t:1070_6: Adhigate hi aggaphale sabbaso rāgādīnaṃ anuppādadhammataṃ pajānāti,
tika-vin02t:1070_9: parivajjeti vinodetī”ti vuttesu apassenesu vinodanā ca maggakiccāneva,
tika-vin02t:1071_0: Dasabaloti kāyabalasaṅkhātāni ñāṇabalasaṅkhātāni ca dasa balāni etassāti dasabalo.
tika-vin02t:1074_26: tā bahū nānāvidhā tato uppajjantīti nārāyanaṃ, vajiraṃ,
tika-vin02t:1075_0: Ñāṇabalaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ āgatameva. Tatrāyaṃ pāḷi –
tika-vin02t:1076_3: yehi balehi samannāgato tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti,
tika-vin02t:1076_8: tathāgato ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, yampi,
tika-vin02t:1076_10: tathāgato ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti. Idampi,
tika-vin02t:1076_13: yaṃ balaṃ āgamma tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti,
tika-vin02t:1077_2: tathāgato atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ kammasamādānānaṃ ṭhānaso hetuso vipākaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti…pe…. (2)
tika-vin02t:1078_0: “Puna caparaṃ, sāriputta, tathāgato sabbatthagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti…pe…. (3)
tika-vin02t:1079_0: “Puna caparaṃ, sāriputta, tathāgato anekadhātuṃ nānādhātuṃ lokaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti…pe…. (4)
tika-vin02t:1080_0: “Puna caparaṃ, sāriputta, tathāgato sattānaṃ nānādhimuttikataṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti…pe…. (5)
tika-vin02t:1081_2: tathāgato parasattānaṃ parapuggalānaṃ indriyaparopariyattaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti…pe…. (6)
tika-vin02t:1082_2: tathāgato jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīnaṃ saṃkilesaṃ vodānaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti…pe…. (7)
tika-vin02t:1083_5: iti sākāraṃ sauddesaṃ anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati…pe…. (8)
tika-vin02t:1084_2: tathāgato dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate,
tika-vin02t:1085_2: tathāgato āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati…pe… idampi,
tika-vin02t:1085_5: yaṃ balaṃ āgamma tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti,
tika-vin02t:1086_1: “Ye ye dhammā yesaṃ yesaṃ dhammānaṃ hetū paccayā uppādāya,
tika-vin02t:1086_3: Ye ye dhammā yesaṃ yesaṃ dhammānaṃ na hetū na paccayā uppādāya,
tika-vin02t:1086_4: taṃ taṃ aṭṭhāna”nti pajānanto ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
tika-vin02t:1087_2: Ṭhānaso hetusoti paccayato ceva hetuto ca.
tika-vin02t:1088_2: Yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti bahūsupi manussesu ekameva pāṇaṃ ghātentesu kāmaṃ sabbesampi cetanā tassevekassa jīvitindriyārammaṇā,
tika-vin02t:1088_4: Tesu hi eko ādarena chandajāto karoti,
tika-vin02t:1088_5: eko “ehi tvampi karohī”ti parehi nippīḷito karoti,
tika-vin02t:1088_6: eko samānacchando viya hutvā appaṭibāhiyamāno vicarati,
tika-vin02t:1088_7: tasmā tesu eko teneva kammena niraye nibbattati,
tika-vin02t:1088_10: Taṃ tathāgato āyūhanakkhaṇeyeva “iminā nīhārena āyūhitattā esa niraye nibbattissati,
tika-vin02t:1088_22: Tesu ca kammesu “idaṃ kammaṃ paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhissati,
tika-vin02t:1088_23: etaṃ aññena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā upadhivepakkaṃ bhavissatī”ti jānāti.
tika-vin02t:1089_0: Tathā sakalagāmavāsikesu ekato piṇḍapātaṃ dadamānesu kāmaṃ sabbesampi cetanā piṇḍapātārammaṇāva,
tika-vin02t:1089_2: Tesu hi eko ādarena karotīti sabbaṃ purimasadisaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1089_3: Tasmā tesu ca keci devaloke nibbattanti,
tika-vin02t:1089_18: esa bhummadevesū”tiādinā tattha tattha hīnapaṇītasuvaṇṇadubbaṇṇaappaparivāramahāparivāratādibhedaṃ taṃ taṃ visesaṃ āyūhanakkhaṇeyeva jānāti.
tika-vin02t:1090_0: Tathā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapentesuyeva “iminā nīhārena esa kiñci sallakkhetuṃ na sakkhissati,
tika-vin02t:1090_14: esa jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhissatī”ti jānāti.
tika-vin02t:1091_4: Yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti tāsaṃ dhātūnaṃ aviparītato sabhāvaṃ paṭivijjhati.
tika-vin02t:1093_7: tamhā tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhānampi vuṭṭhāna”nti evaṃ vuttaṃ paguṇajjhānañceva bhavaṅgaphalasamāpattiyo ca.
tika-vin02t:1093_8: Heṭṭhimaṃ heṭṭhimañhi paguṇajjhānaṃ uparimassa uparimassa padaṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
tika-vin02t:1093_12: Tametaṃ sandhāya “tamhā tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhānampi vuṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1093_13: Sabbañāṇānañca vitthārakathāya vinicchayo sammohavinodaniyaṃ vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto.
tika-vin02t:1094_0: Imāni kho sāriputtāti yāni pubbe “dasa kho panimāni,
tika-vin02t:1094_4: Tattha paravādikathā hoti “dasabalañāṇaṃ nāma pāṭiyekkaṃ natthi,
tika-vin02t:1094_21: Sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pana etehi jānitabbañca tato uttariñca pajānāti,
tika-vin02t:1094_22: etesaṃ pana kiccaṃ na sabbaṃ karoti.
tika-vin02t:1094_23: Tañhi jhānaṃ hutvā appetuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-vin02t:1094_25: maggo hutvā kilese khepetuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-vin02t:1094_26: Iti yathāvuttakāyabalena ceva ñāṇabalena ca samannāgatattā bhagavā “dasabalo”ti vuccati.
tika-vin02t:1095_9: asekkhā sammāvimuttī”ti evaṃ vuttehi dasahi asekkhadhammehi samannāgato.
tika-vin02t:1095_10: Asekkhā sammādiṭṭhiādayo ca sabbe phalasampayuttadhammā eva.
tika-vin02t:1095_11: Ettha ca sammādiṭṭhi sammāñāṇanti dvīsu ṭhānesu paññāva kathitā “sammā dassanaṭṭhena sammādiṭṭhi,
tika-vin02t:1095_14: Sammāvimuttīti iminā pana padena vuttāvasesā phalasamāpattisahagatadhammā saṅgahitāti veditabbā.
tika-vin02t:1095_15: Ariyaphalasampayuttadhammāpi hi sabbaso paṭipakkhato vimuttataṃ upādāya vimuttīti vattabbataṃ labhanti.
tika-vin02t:1096_1: Vacanasaddena appasaddanti ārāmupacārena gacchato addhikajanassapi vacanasaddena appasaddaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1096_3: Manussehi samāgamma ekajjhaṃ pavattitasaddo hi nigghoso.
tika-vin02t:1096_5: Manussānaṃ rahassakiriyaṭṭhāniyanti manussānaṃ rahassakaraṇassa yuttaṃ anucchavikaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1099_1: Idāni “tena kho pana samayena sañcayo paribbājako”tiādīsu apubbapadavaṇṇanaṃ dassento “sāriputtamoggallānā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin02t:1099_4: Amhākaṃ kira bhagavato nibbattito puretarameva sāriputto rājagahanagarassa avidūre upatissagāme sārībrāhmaṇiyā nāma kucchiyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
tika-vin02t:1099_5: Taṃdivasamevassa sahāyopi rājagahasseva avidūre kolitagāme moggallībrāhmaṇiyā kucchiyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
tika-vin02t:1099_6: Tāni kira dvepi kulāni yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā ābaddhapaṭibaddhasahāyāneva.
tika-vin02t:1099_8: Dasamāsaccayena jātānampi tesaṃ chasaṭṭhi dhātiyo upanayiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1099_9: Nāmaggahaṇadivase sārībrāhmaṇiyā puttassa upatissagāme jeṭṭhakulassa puttattā “upatisso”ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu,
tika-vin02t:1099_10: itarassa kolitagāme jeṭṭhakulassa puttattā “kolito”ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1099_11: Tena vuttaṃ “gihikāle upatisso kolitoti evaṃ paññāyamānanāmā”ti.
tika-vin02t:1101_0: “Upatissamāṇavakassa kīḷanatthāya nadiṃ vā uyyānaṃ vā gamanakāle pañca suvaṇṇasivikāsatāni parivārāni honti,
tika-vin02t:1102_0: Rājagahe ca anusaṃvaccharaṃ giraggasamajjaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin02t:1102_2: Dvepi ekatova nisīditvā samajjaṃ passitvā hasitabbaṭṭhāne hasanti,
tika-vin02t:1102_5: Tesaṃ imināva niyāmena ekadivasaṃ samajjaṃ passantānaṃ paripākagatattā ñāṇassa purimadivasesu viya hasitabbaṭṭhāne
tika-vin02t:1102_6: hāso vā saṃvegaṭṭhāne saṃvijjanaṃ vā dāyaṃ dātuṃ yuttaṭṭhāne dāyadānaṃ vā nāhosi.
tika-vin02t:1102_7: Dvepi pana janā evaṃ cintayiṃsu “kiṃ ettha oloketabbaṃ atthi,
tika-vin02t:1102_9: amhehi pana ekaṃ mokkhadhammaṃ gavesituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā nisīdiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1102_17: attano mokkhadhammaṃ gavesituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti idaṃ cintayanto nisinnomhīti.
tika-vin02t:1102_20: Athassa attanā saddhiṃ ekajjhāsayataṃ ñatvā upatisso evamāha “amhākaṃ ubhinnaṃ sucintitaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1102_21: mokkhadhammaṃ pana gavesantehi ekā pabbajjā laddhuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin02t:1103_0: Tena kho pana samayena sañcayo paribbājako rājagahe paṭivasati mahatiyā paribbājakaparisāya saddhiṃ.
tika-vin02t:1103_1: Te “tassa santike pabbajissāmā”ti pañcahi māṇavakasatehi saddhiṃ sañcayassa santike pabbajiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1103_2: Tesaṃ pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya sañcayo atirekalābhaggayasaggappatto ahosi.
tika-vin02t:1103_3: Te katipāheneva sabbaṃ sañcayassa samayaṃ parimadditvā “ācariya,
tika-vin02t:1103_8: Tassa kathaṃ sutvā cintayiṃsu “evaṃ sati imassa santike brahmacariyavāso niratthako,
tika-vin02t:1103_10: so imassa santike uppādetuṃ na sakkā,
tika-vin02t:1103_12: gāmanigamarājadhāniyo carantā avassaṃ mokkhadhammadesakaṃ ācariyaṃ labhissāmā”ti.
tika-vin02t:1103_13: Te tato paṭṭhāya “yattha yattha paṇḍitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā atthī”ti suṇanti,
tika-vin02t:1103_15: tehi puṭṭhaṃ pañhaṃ añño kathetuṃ samattho nāma natthi,
tika-vin02t:1103_17: Evaṃ sakalajambudīpaṃ pariggaṇhitvā nivattitvā sakaṭṭhānameva āgantvā “samma kolita,
tika-vin02t:1103_20: Imameva vatthuṃ saṅkhipitvā dassento “tatra nesaṃ mahājanaṃ disvā…pe…
tika-vin02t:1104_2: Pāsādikena abhikkantenātiādīsu pāsādikenāti pasādāvahena sāruppena samaṇānucchavikena.
tika-vin02t:1104_10: tasmā satisampajaññakehi vabhisaṅkhatattā pāsādikaabhikkantapaṭikkantaālokitavilokitasamiñjitapasārito hutvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:1104_13: Atthikehi upaññātanti “maraṇe sati amatenapi bhavitabba”nti evaṃ anumānañāṇena “atthī”ti upagataṃ nibbānaṃ nāma,
tika-vin02t:1104_14: taṃ magganto pariyesanto yannūnāhaṃ imaṃ bhikkhuṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandheyyanti sambandho.
tika-vin02t:1104_18: tattha pabbajitā piṇḍāya caritvā nisīditvā bhuñjanti.
tika-vin02t:1104_21: tasmā tampi aññatarassa kulassa īdisāya sālāya aññataraṃ kuṭṭamūlanti veditabba”nti evaṃ vuttappakāraṃ.
tika-vin02t:1105_0: Appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā bhāsassūti paribbājako “ahaṃ upatisso nāma,
tika-vin02t:1105_1: tvaṃ yathāsattiyā appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā pāvada,
tika-vin02t:1105_2: etaṃ nayasatena nayasahassena paṭivijjhituṃ mayhaṃ bhāro”ti cintetvā evamāha.
tika-vin02t:1105_3: Nirodho ca nirodhupāyo ca ekadesasarūpekasesanayena “nirodho”ti vuttoti dassento “atha vā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin02t:1105_5: Imaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ sutvā virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādīti ettha paribbājako paṭhamapadadvayameva
tika-vin02t:1106_0: Bahukehi kappanahutehīti ettha dasa dasakāni sataṃ,
tika-vin02t:1107_1: Atha kho sāriputto paribbājako yena moggallāno paribbājako tenupasaṅkamīti sotāpanno hutvā uparivisese
tika-vin02t:1107_2: appavattante “bhavissati ettha kāraṇa”nti sallakkhetvā theraṃ āha “bhante,
tika-vin02t:1107_9: amhehi ca aññamaññaṃ katikā katā ‘yo paṭhamaṃ amataṃ adhigacchati,
tika-vin02t:1107_11: ahaṃ taṃ paṭiññaṃ mocetvā sahāyakaṃ gahetvā tumhākaṃ gatamaggeneva satthu santikaṃ āgamissāmī”ti pañcapatiṭṭhitena
tika-vin02t:1107_12: therassa pādesu nipatitvā tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā theraṃ uyyojetvā paribbājakārāmābhimukho agamāsi.
tika-vin02t:1108_1: Sāriputtaṃ paribbājakaṃ etadavocāti “ajja mayhaṃ sahāyassa mukhavaṇṇo na aññadivasesu viya,
tika-vin02t:1108_2: addhā anena amataṃ adhigataṃ bhavissatī”ti amatādhigamaṃ pucchanto etadavoca.
tika-vin02t:1108_4: amataṃ adhigata”nti paṭijānitvā sabbaṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā tameva gāthaṃ abhāsi.
tika-vin02t:1108_9: bhagavato santiketi “kahaṃ samma satthā vasatī”ti pucchitvā “veḷuvane kira samma,
tika-vin02t:1108_10: evaṃ no ācariyena assajittherena kathita”nti vutte evamāha.
tika-vin02t:1109_1: tasmā sahāyaṃ moggallānaṃ paribbājakaṃ evamāha “amhehi adhigataṃ amataṃ amhākaṃ ācariyassa sañcayaparibbājakassapi kathessāma,
tika-vin02t:1109_3: appaṭivijjhanto amhākaṃ saddahitvā satthu santikaṃ gamissati,
tika-vin02t:1109_5: Tato dvepi janā sañcayassa santikaṃ agamaṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1109_6: Tena vuttaṃ “atha kho sāriputtamoggallānā yena sañcayo paribbājako tenupasaṅkamiṃsū”ti.
tika-vin02t:1109_13: So “kiṃ vadatha tātā”ti tepi vāretvā lābhaggayasaggappavattimeva nesaṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin02t:1109_15: tumhākaṃ pana gamanaṃ vā agamanaṃ vā jānāthā”ti āhaṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1109_16: Sañcayo “ime ettakaṃ jānantā mama vacanaṃ na karissantī”ti ñatvā “gacchatha tumhe tātā,
tika-vin02t:1109_17: ahaṃ mahallakakāle antevāsikavāsaṃ vasituṃ na sakkomī”ti āha.
tika-vin02t:1109_18: Te anekehipi kāraṇasatehi taṃ bodhetuṃ asakkontā attano ovāde vattamānaṃ janaṃ ādāya veḷuvanaṃ agamaṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1109_21: Tena vuttaṃ “atha kho sāriputtamoggallānā tāni aḍḍhateyyāni paribbājakasatāni ādāya yena veḷuvanaṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃsū”ti.
tika-vin02t:1110_0: Vimutteti yathāvuttalakkhaṇe nibbāne tadārammaṇāya phalavimuttiyā adhimutte ne sāriputtamoggallāne byākāsīti sambandho.
tika-vin02t:1111_0: Evaṃ byākaritvā ca satthā catuparisamajjhe dhammaṃ desento nesaṃ parisāya cariyavasena dhammadesanaṃ vaḍḍhesi,
tika-vin02t:1111_1: ṭhapetvā dve aggasāvake sabbepi aḍḍhateyyasatā paribbājakā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1111_8: Athāyasmā mahāmoggallāno pabbajitadivasato sattame divase magadharaṭṭhe kallavāḷagāmakaṃ upanissāya samaṇadhammaṃ
tika-vin02t:1111_9: karonto thinamiddhaṃ okkamanto satthārā saṃvejito thinamiddhaṃ vinodetvā tathāgatena dinnaṃ dhātukammaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1111_10: suṇantova uparimaggattayakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā sāvakapāramīñāṇassa matthakaṃ patto.
tika-vin02t:1111_11: Sāriputtattheropi pabbajitadivasato addhamāsaṃ atikkamitvā satthārā saddhiṃ tameva rājagahaṃ upanissāya
tika-vin02t:1111_12: sūkarakhataleṇe viharanto attano bhāgineyyassa dīghanakhaparibbājakassa vedanāpariggahasuttante desiyamāne
tika-vin02t:1111_13: suttānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā parassa vaḍḍhitabhattaṃ bhuñjanto viya sāvakapāramīñāṇassa matthakaṃ patto.
tika-vin02t:1112_0: Yadipi mahāmoggallānatthero na cirasseva arahattaṃ patto,
tika-vin02t:1112_3: Mahāmoggallānatthero hi sāvakānaṃ sammasanacāraṃ yaṭṭhikoṭiyā uppīḷento viya ekadesameva sammasanto satta divase vāyamitvā arahattaṃ patto.
tika-vin02t:1112_4: Sāriputtatthero ṭhapetvā buddhānaṃ paccekabuddhānañca sammasanacāraṃ sāvakānaṃ sammasanacāraṃ nippadesaṃ sammasi,
tika-vin02t:1112_6: Ukkaṃsagatassa sāvakānaṃ sammasanacārassa nippadesena pavattiyamānattā sāvakapāramīñāṇassa ca tathā paripācetabbattā.
tika-vin02t:1112_7: Yathā hi puriso “veṇuyaṭṭhiṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti mahājaṭaṃ veṇuṃ disvā “jaṭaṃ chindantassa papañco bhavissatī”ti
tika-vin02t:1112_8: antarena hatthaṃ pavesetvā sampattameva yaṭṭhiṃ mūle ca agge ca chinditvā ādāya pakkameyya,
tika-vin02t:1112_10: yaṭṭhiṃ pana sāraṃ vā ujuṃ vā na labhati.
tika-vin02t:1112_11: Aparo tathārūpameva veṇuṃ disvā sace sampattayaṭṭhiṃ gaṇhissāmi,
tika-vin02t:1112_12: sāraṃ vā ujuṃ vā na labhissāmīti kacchaṃ bandhitvā mahantena satthena veṇujaṭaṃ chinditvā sārā ceva ujū ca yaṭṭhiyo uccinitvā ādāya pakkameyya,
tika-vin02t:1112_14: yaṭṭhiyo pana sārā ceva ujū ca labhati,
tika-vin02t:1113_0: Sammasanacāro ca nāmettha vipassanābhūmi veditabbā sammasanaṃ carati etthāti sammasanacāroti katvā.
tika-vin02t:1113_1: Tattha buddhānaṃ sammasanacāro dasasahassalokadhātuyaṃ sattasantānagatā anindriyabaddhā ca saṅkhārāti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:1113_3: Tathā hi attaniyavasena paṭiccasamuppādanayaṃ otaritvā chattiṃsakoṭisatasahassamukhena buddhānaṃ mahāvajirañāṇaṃ pavattaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1113_4: Paccekabuddhānaṃ sasantānagatehi saddhiṃ majjhimadesavāsīsattasantānagatā anindriyabaddhā ca saṅkhārā sammasanacāroti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:1113_6: Sasantānagate sabbadhamme parasantānagate ca santānavibhāgaṃ akatvā bahiddhābhāvasāmaññato sammasanaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1113_8: Moggallānatthero pana bahiddhā dhammepi sasantānavibhāgena keci keci uddharitvā sammasi,
tika-vin02t:1113_10: Tena vuttaṃ “yaṭṭhikoṭiyā uppīḷento viya ekadesameva sammasanto”ti.
tika-vin02t:1113_11: Tattha ñāṇena nāma yāvatā neyyaṃ vattitabbaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1113_15: Tattha pana thero sātisayaṃ niravasesaṃ anupadañca sammā vipassi.
tika-vin02t:1114_0: Ettha ca sukkhavipassakā lokiyābhiññappattā pakatisāvakā mahāsāvakā aggasāvakā paccekabuddhā sammāsambuddhāti
tika-vin02t:1114_1: chasu janesu sukkhavipassakānaṃ jhānābhiññāhi anadhigatapaññānepuññattā andhānaṃ viya icchitapadesokkamanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1114_4: Lokiyābhiññappattā pana pakatisāvakā yena mukhena vipassanaṃ ārabhanti,
tika-vin02t:1114_5: tato aññenapi vipassanaṃ vitthārikaṃ kātuṃ sakkonti vipulañāṇattā.
tika-vin02t:1114_6: Mahāsāvakā abhinīhārasampannattā tato sātisayaṃ vipassanaṃ vitthārikaṃ kātuṃ sakkonti.
tika-vin02t:1114_7: Aggasāvakesu dutiyo abhinīhārasampattiyā samādhānassa sātisayattā vipassanaṃ tatopi vitthārikaṃ karoti.
tika-vin02t:1114_8: Paṭhamo pana tatopi mahāpaññatāya sāvakehi asādhāraṇaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vitthārikaṃ karoti.
tika-vin02t:1114_9: Paccekabuddhā tehipi mahābhinīhāratāya attano abhinīhārānurūpaṃ tatopi vitthārikaṃ vipassanaṃ karonti.
tika-vin02t:1114_10: Buddhānaṃ sammadeva paripūritapaññāpāramīpabhāvitā sabbaññutaññāṇādhigamassa anurūpā yathā nāma katavālavedhaparicayena
tika-vin02t:1114_11: sarabhaṅgasadisena dhanuggahena khitto saro antarā rukkhalatādīsu asajjamāno lakkheyeva patati,
tika-vin02t:1114_13: evaṃ antarā asajjamānā avirajjamānā vipassanā sammasanīyadhammesu yāthāvato nānānayehi pavattati,
tika-vin02t:1115_6: Tathā sukkhavipassakānaṃ vipassanācāro andhānaṃ yaṭṭhikoṭiyā gamanasadiso,
tika-vin02t:1115_12: Tathā buddhānaṃ paccekabuddhānañca vipassanā cintāmayañāṇasaṃvaḍḍhitattā sayambhūñāṇabhūtā,
tika-vin02t:1116_0: Idāni ubhinnampi therānaṃ pubbayogaṃ dassetuṃ “atīte kirā”tiādimāha. Taṃ sabbaṃ uttānatthameva.
tika-vin02t:1117_1: Giribbajanagaranti samantā pabbataparikkhittaṃ vajasadisaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhatīti giribbajanti evaṃladdhanāmaṃ rājagahanagaraṃ.
tika-vin02t:1120_10: Piṇḍāya caraṇakapattanti iminā pana pattassa sarūpadassanamukhena ucchiṭṭhakappanāya kāraṇaṃ vibhāvitaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1121_4: Garunā kismiñci vutte gāravavasena patissavanaṃ patisso,
tika-vin02t:1121_11: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana byañjanavicāraṃ akatvā atthamattameva dassetuṃ “garukabhāvañceva jeṭṭhakabhāvañca upaṭṭhapetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1121_14: mama tuyhaṃ upajjhāyabhāve bhāriyaṃ nāma natthīti attho.
tika-vin02t:1121_15: Opāyikanti upāyapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ te upajjhāyaggahaṇaṃ iminā upāyena tvaṃ me ito paṭṭhāya bhāro jātosīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:1121_19: Kāyena vāti hatthamuddādiṃ dassento kāyena vā viññāpeti.
tika-vin02t:1121_21: viññāpetīti “sāhū”tiādīsu ekaṃ vadantoyeva imamatthaṃ viññāpetīti vuccati.
tika-vin02t:1121_23: Sādhūti sampaṭicchanaṃ sandhāyāti upajjhāyena “sāhū”ti vutte saddhivihārikassa “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchanavacanaṃ sandhāya.
tika-vin02t:1121_28: Na ettha sampaṭicchanaṃ aṅganti saddhivihārikassa sampaṭicchanavacanaṃ ettha upajjhāyaggahaṇe aṅgaṃ na hoti.
tika-vin02t:1122_3: Tādisameva mukhadhovanodakaṃ dātabbanti utumhi sarīrasabhāve ca ekākāre tādisameva dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1122_4: Dve cīvarānīti pārupanaṃ saṅghāṭiñca sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin02t:1122_5: Yadi evaṃ “saṅghāṭiyo”ti kasmā vuttanti āha “sabbañhi cīvaraṃ saṅghaṭitattā saṅghāṭīti vuccatī”ti.
tika-vin02t:1122_6: Padavītihārehīti ettha padaṃ vītiharati etthāti padavītihāro,
tika-vin02t:1122_7: padavītiharaṇaṭṭhānaṃ dūtavilambitaṃ akatvā samagamane dvinnaṃ padānaṃ antare muṭṭhiratanamattaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1122_8: Padānaṃ vā vītiharaṇaṃ abhimukhaṃ haritvā nikkhepo padavītihāroti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin02t:1122_9: Ito paṭṭhāyāti “na upajjhāyassa bhaṇamānassā”ti ettha vutta na-
tika-vin02t:1122_11: Sabbattha dukkaṭāpatti veditabbāti “īdisesu gilānopi na muccatī”ti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1122_12: Aññampi hi yathāvuttaṃ upajjhāyavattaṃ anādariyena akarontassa agilānassa vattabhede sabbattha dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin02t:1122_13: Teneva vakkhati “agilānena hi saddhivihārikena saṭṭhivassenapi sabbaṃ upajjhāyavattaṃ kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1122_15: kārapaṭisaṃyuttesu pana padesu gilānassapi paṭikkhittakiriyaṃ karontassa dukkaṭamevā”ti.
tika-vin02t:1122_16: Āpattiyā āsannavācanti āpattijanakameva vacanaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin02t:1122_18: sā vācā tassā āpattiyā āsannāti vuccati.
tika-vin02t:1123_0: Cīvarena pattaṃ veṭhetvāti ettha “uttarāsaṅgassa ekena kaṇṇena veṭhetvā”ti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1123_5: ādimhi majjhe anteti evaṃ tikkhattuṃ pucchitabboti attho.
tika-vin02t:1123_8: Sace pahotīti vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāveti “na kenaci gelaññena abhibhūto hotī”ti.
tika-vin02t:1127_1: Nasammāvattanādikathāyaṃ gehassitapemanti “pitā me aya”nti evaṃ uppannapemaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1127_2: Upajjhāyamhi pitucittupaṭṭhānameva hi idha gehassitapemaṃ nāma.
tika-vin02t:1127_3: Na hi idaṃ akusalapakkhiyaṃ gehassitapemaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ paṭividdhasaccānaṃ pahīnānugedhānaṃ tadasambhavato,
tika-vin02t:1127_4: na ca bhagavā bhikkhū saṃkilese niyojeti,
tika-vin02t:1127_5: gehassitapemasadisattā pana pemamukhena mettāsineho idha vuttoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1127_7: tesaṃ anāpattī”ti vacanato sace eko vattasampanno bhikkhu “bhante,
tika-vin02t:1127_9: ahaṃ tumhākaṃ saddhivihārikaṃ antevāsikaṃ vā gilānaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmi,
tika-vin02t:1130_1: Rādhabrāhmaṇavatthumhi kiso ahosīti khādituṃ vā bhuñjituṃ vā asakkonto tanuko ahosi appamaṃsalohito.
tika-vin02t:1130_8: Kiṃ pana thero bhagavatā bārāṇasiyaṃ tīhi saraṇagamanehi anuññātaṃ pabbajjaṃ upasampadañca na jānātīti?
tika-vin02t:1130_11: taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ pabbājemi upasampādemī”ti kasmā āhāti imaṃ anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “kiñcāpi āyasmā sāriputto”tiādi.
tika-vin02t:1130_13: Aññathā vā vattabbaṃ aññathā vadatīti “bhante”ti vattabbaṃ “bandhe”ti vadati.
tika-vin02t:1131_5: Tattha piṇḍiyālopabhojananti jaṅghapiṇḍiyabalena caritvā ālopamattaṃ laddhabhojanaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1131_6: Atirekalābhoti “piṇḍiyālopabhojanaṃ nissāyā”ti evaṃ vuttabhikkhāhāralābhato adhikalābho saṅghabhattādi.
tika-vin02t:1133_6: tassa kira ekapasse bhitti uccatarā hoti,
tika-vin02t:1136_2: Kacci bhikkhu khamanīyanti bhikkhu kacci tuyhaṃ idaṃ catucakkaṃ navadvāraṃ sarīrayantaṃ khamanīyaṃ sakkā khamituṃ sahituṃ pariharituṃ,
tika-vin02t:1136_4: Kacci yāpanīyanti kacci sabbakiccesu yāpetuṃ sakkā,
tika-vin02t:1136_6: Jānantāpi tathāgatātievamādi yaṃ parato “kati vassosi tvaṃ bhikkhū”tiādinā pucchi,
tika-vin02t:1136_9: tathāgatā nāma jānantāpi sace tādisaṃ pucchākāraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin02t:1136_13: Yasmā pana buddhānaṃ ajānanaṃ nāma natthi,
tika-vin02t:1136_15: Kālaṃ viditvā pucchantīti sace tassā pucchāya so kālo hoti,
tika-vin02t:1136_19: Evaṃ pucchantāpi ca atthasaṃhitaṃ tathāgatā pucchanti,
tika-vin02t:1136_25: maggeneva tādisassa vacanassa ghāto samucchedoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:1137_0: Idāni atthasaṃhitanti ettha yaṃ atthanissitaṃ vacanaṃ tathāgatā pucchanti,
tika-vin02t:1137_3: Dhammaṃ vā desessāmāti aṭṭhuppattiyuttaṃ suttaṃ vā pubbacaritakāraṇayuttaṃ jātakaṃ vā kathayissāma.
tika-vin02t:1137_4: Sāvakānaṃ vā sikkhāpadaṃ paññapessāmāti sāvakānaṃ vā tāya pucchāya vītikkamaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā garukaṃ vā
tika-vin02t:1137_5: lahukaṃ vā sikkhāpadaṃ paññapessāma āṇaṃ ṭhapessāma.
tika-vin02t:1138_1: Aññatitthiyavatthumhi aññatitthiyapubboti pubbe aññatitthiyo bhūtoti aññatitthiyapubbo.
tika-vin02t:1138_7: Ettha hi sattā taranti uppilavanti ummujjanimujjaṃ karonti,
tika-vin02t:1138_9: Tāsaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ uppādetā titthakaro nāma pūraṇakassapādiko.
tika-vin02t:1138_10: Tassa laddhiṃ gahetvā pabbajitā titthiyā nāma.
tika-vin02t:1138_12: yathāvuttaṃ vā diṭṭhigatasaṅkhātaṃ titthaṃ etesaṃ atthīti titthikā,
tika-vin02t:1138_18: tesaṃ vā santakattā “sahadhammika”nti laddhanāmena buddhapaññattena sikkhāpadena vuccamānoti attho.
tika-vin02t:1139_0: Taṃyeva titthāyatananti ettha dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhisaṅkhātaṃ titthameva āyatananti titthāyatanaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1139_1: titthaṃ vā etesaṃ atthīti titthino, titthiyā,
tika-vin02t:1139_4: gunnaṃ dakkhiṇapatho āyatana”nti ettha sañjātiṭṭhānaṃ āyatanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin02t:1142_5: Sabbepi hi diṭṭhigatikā sañjāyamānā imāsuyeva dvāsaṭṭhiyā diṭṭhīsu sañjāyanti,
tika-vin02t:1142_7: diṭṭhigatikabhāve ca nesaṃ imāyeva dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo kāraṇaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1142_8: tasmā yathāvuttaṃ titthameva sañjātiādinā atthena āyatananti titthāyatanaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1143_0: Āyasmato nissāya vacchāmīti ettha āyasmatoti upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1146_2: “teneva lakkhaṇena nissayantevāsikassa āpatti veditabbā”ti potthakesu pāṭho dissati,
tika-vin02t:1146_3: “na teneva lakkhaṇena nissayantevāsikassa āpatti veditabbā”ti evaṃ panettha pāṭho veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:1146_4: Saddhivihārikassa vuttalakkhaṇena nissayantevāsikassa āpatti na veditabbāti evaṃ panettha atthopi veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:1146_5: Aññathā “nissayantevāsikena hi yāva ācariyaṃ nissāya vasati,
tika-vin02t:1146_6: tāva sabbaṃ ācariyavattaṃ kātabba”nti idaṃ virujjheyya.
tika-vin02t:1146_7: Idañhi vacanaṃ nissayantevāsikassa amuttanissayasseva vattaṃ akarontassa āpattīti dīpeti.
tika-vin02t:1146_8: Tasmā saddhivihārikassa yathāvuttavattaṃ akarontassa nissayamuttakassa amuttakassapi āpatti,
tika-vin02t:1147_1: ghare mātā pitā bhaginī bhātāti evamādikā.
tika-vin02t:1147_3: tasmā so palibodho upaṭṭhahitvā tesaṃ pākatikakaraṇena upacchinditabbo.
tika-vin02t:1147_4: Tattha upajjhāyo tāva gilāno sace lahuṃ na vuṭṭhāti,
tika-vin02t:1147_7: Nissayācariya uddesācariya nissayantevāsika uddesantevāsikasamānācariyakā pana yāva nissayauddesā anupacchinnā,
tika-vin02t:1148_1: Ayañca vibhāgo “teneva lakkhaṇena nissayantevāsikassa āpatti veditabbā”ti evaṃ pāṭhe sati na yujjeyya.
tika-vin02t:1148_2: Ayañhi pāṭho saddhivihārikassa viya nissayantevāsikassapi yathāvuttavattaṃ akarontassa nissayamuttakassa amuttakassapi āpattīti imamatthaṃ dīpeti,
tika-vin02t:1153_1: Nissayapaṭippassaddhikathāyaṃ disaṃ gatoti puna āgantukāmo anāgantukāmo vā hutvā vāsatthāya kañci disaṃ gato.
tika-vin02t:1153_5: tattha gantabbanti ettha sace kenaci karaṇīyena tadaheva gantuṃ asakkonto katipāhena gamissāmīti gamane saussāho hoti,
tika-vin02t:1153_7: Mā idha paṭikkamīti mā idha pavisi.
tika-vin02t:1153_8: Tatreva vasitabbanti tattheva nissayaṃ gahetvā vasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1153_10: vasituṃ vaṭṭatīti ettha upajjhāyena pariccattattā upajjhāyasamodhānaparihāro natthi,
tika-vin02t:1153_11: tasmā upajjhāyena samodhānagatassapi ācariyassa santike gahitanissayo na paṭippassambhati.
tika-vin02t:1154_0: Ācariyamhā nissayapaṭippassaddhīsu ācariyo pakkanto vā hotīti ettha “pakkantoti disaṃ gato”tiādinā upajjhāyassa pakkamane yo vinicchayo vutto,
tika-vin02t:1154_1: so tattha vuttanayeneva idhāpi sakkā viññātunti taṃ avatvā “koci ācariyo āpucchitvā pakkamatī”tiādinā aññoyeva nayo āraddho,
tika-vin02t:1154_3: Īdisesu hi ṭhānesu ekattha vuttalakkhaṇaṃ aññatthāpi daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1154_5: paṭippassaddho hotīti ettha ettāvatā disāpakkanto nāma hotīti antevāsike anikkhittadhurepi nissayo paṭippassambhati.
tika-vin02t:1154_6: Ācariyupajjhāyā dve leḍḍupāte atikkamma aññasmiṃ vihāre vasantīti bahiupacārasīmāyaṃ antevāsikasaddhivihārikānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1154_7: vasanaṭṭhānato dve leḍḍupāte atikkamma aññasmiṃ senāsane vasanti,
tika-vin02t:1154_8: antoupacārasīmāyaṃ pana dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvāpi vasato nissayo na paṭippassambhati.
tika-vin02t:1154_9: “Sacepi ācariyo muñcitukāmova hutvā nissayapaṇāmanāya paṇāmetī”tiādi sabbaṃ upajjhāyassa āṇattiyampi veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1157_2: aṅgehi samannāgatenātiādīsu na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabboti upajjhāyena hutvā sāmaṇero na gahetabbo.
tika-vin02t:1160_0: Imassa anurūpavasena paṭhamaṃ tāva attasampattiyaṃ niyojetuṃ “na asekkhena sīlakkhandhenā”tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1160_2: Tattha asekkhena sīlakkhandhenāti asekkhassa sīlakkhandho asekkho sīlakkhandho nāma.
tika-vin02t:1160_6: Evañca katvā vimuttiñāṇadassanasaṅkhātassa paccavekkhaṇañāṇassapi asekkhatā upapannā.
tika-vin02t:1160_8: atha kho yaṃkiñci asekkhasantāne pavattasīlaṃ lokiyalokuttaramissakassa sīlassa idhādhippetattā.
tika-vin02t:1160_14: Teneva saṃyuttanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “purimehi catūhi padehi lokiyalokuttarasīlasamādhipaññāvimuttiyo kathitā,
tika-vin02t:1161_0: Assaddhotiādīsu tīsu vatthūsu saddhā etassa natthīti assaddho.
tika-vin02t:1162_0: Adhisīle sīlavipanno ca ajjhācāre ācāravipanno ca āpajjitvā avuṭṭhito.
tika-vin02t:1162_1: Sassatucchedasaṅkhātaṃ antaṃ gaṇhāti gāhayatīti vā antaggāhikā,
tika-vin02t:1162_3: Purimāni dve padānīti “na paṭibalo hoti antevāsiṃ vā saddhivihāriṃ vā gilānaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ vā upaṭṭhāpetuṃ vā,
tika-vin02t:1162_4: anabhirataṃ vūpakāsetuṃ vā vūpakāsāpetuṃ vā”ti imāni dve padāni.
tika-vin02t:1163_2: abhisamācāraṃ vā ārabbha paññattā sikkhā ābhisamācārikā.
tika-vin02t:1163_7: Tasmā sekkhapaṇṇattiyanti ettha sikkhitabbato sabbāpi ubhatovibhaṅgapariyāpannā paṇṇattīti gahetabbā.
tika-vin02t:1163_8: Teneva gaṇṭhipadepi vuttaṃ “sekkhapaṇṇattiyanti pārājikamādiṃ katvā sikkhitabbasikkhāpadapaññattiya”nti.
tika-vin02t:1166_1: Aññatitthiyavatthumhi ājīvako acelakoti duvidho naggaparibbājakoti āha “naggaparibbājakasseva ājīvakassa vā”tiādi.
tika-vin02t:1166_2: Tattha ājīvako upari ekameva vatthaṃ upakacchake pavesetvā paridahati,
tika-vin02t:1167_3: Vesiyā gocaro mittasanthavavasena upasaṅkamitabbaṭṭhānaṃ assāti vesiyāgocaro.
tika-vin02t:1167_5: Yobbanappattā yobbanātītā vāti ubhayenapi mahallikā anividdhakumāriyova vadati.
tika-vin02t:1167_8: Tesaṃ aññamaññavisabhāgavatthubhāvato santhavavasena upasaṅkamane katipāheneva brahmacariyantarāyo siyāti āha “tāhi saddhiṃ khippameva vissāso hoti,
tika-vin02t:1170_1: Pañcābādhavatthumhi nakhapiṭṭhippamāṇanti ettha “kaniṭṭhaṅgulinakhapiṭṭhi adhippetā”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1170_3: na pabbājetabbo”ti iminā sāmaññato lakkhaṇaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1170_4: tasmā yattha katthaci sarīrāvayavesu nakhapiṭṭhippamāṇaṃ vaḍḍhanakapakkhe ṭhitañce,
tika-vin02t:1170_8: tañca na sāmaññato adhippetanti padesaviseseyeva niyametvā dassento “sace panā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin02t:1170_9: Sace hi avisesena nakhapiṭṭhippamāṇaṃ avaḍḍhanakapakkhe ṭhitaṃ vaṭṭeyya,
tika-vin02t:1170_11: tasmā nivāsanapārupanehi pakatipaṭicchannaṭṭhānato aññattha nakhapiṭṭhippamāṇaṃ avaḍḍhanakapakkhe ṭhitampi na vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1170_12: nakhapiṭṭhippamāṇato khuddakataraṃ pana avaḍḍhanakapakkhe vaḍḍhanakapakkhe vā ṭhitaṃ hotu,
tika-vin02t:1170_13: vaṭṭati nakhapiṭṭhippamāṇato khuddakatarassa vaḍḍhanakapakkhe avaḍḍhanakapakkhe vā ṭhitassa mukhādīsuyeva paṭikkhittattā.
tika-vin02t:1171_1: Tattha pana mukhādīsu kolaṭṭhimattato khuddakataropi gaṇḍo na vaṭṭatīti visuṃ na dassito.
tika-vin02t:1171_2: “Mukhādike appaṭicchannaṭṭhāne avaḍḍhanakapakkhe ṭhitopi na vaṭṭatī”ti ettakameva hi tattha vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1171_3: tathāpi kuṭṭhe vuttanayena mukhādīsu kolaṭṭhippamāṇato khuddakataropi gaṇḍo na vaṭṭatīti viññāyati,
tika-vin02t:1171_6: Tena kolaṭṭhimattato khuddakataropi na vaṭṭatīti ayamattho dassitoyevāti ayamamhākaṃ khanti.
tika-vin02t:1171_7: Pakativaṇṇe jāteti rogahetukassa vikāravaṇṇassa abhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1174_3: tasmā bhikkhūhi apabbājitabbaṃ coraṃ aṅgulimālaṃ pabbājetvā āyatiṃ akaraṇatthāya bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapento “na,
tika-vin02t:1174_13: Apassamānānaṃ vā palāyatīti purisaguttiyaṃ purisānaṃ apassamānānaṃ palāyati.
tika-vin02t:1175_4: na vaṭṭatīti tā bhujissitthiyo “mayampi dāsiyo homā”ti sayameva dāsipaṇṇaṃ likhāpenti,
tika-vin02t:1175_6: Takkaṃ sīse āsittakasadisāva hontīti yathā adāse karontā takkena sīsaṃ dhovitvā adāsaṃ karonti,
tika-vin02t:1175_7: evaṃ ārāmikavacanena dinnattā adāsāva teti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:1175_9: Neva pabbājetabboti vuttanti kappiyavacanena dinnepi saṅghassa ārāmikadāsattā evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1175_10: Nissāmikadāso nāma yassa sāmikā saputtadārādayo matā honti,
tika-vin02t:1175_13: taṃ pana attanāpi bhujissaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:1175_14: Ye vā pana tasmiṃ raṭṭhe sāmino,
tika-vin02t:1175_17: Dāsassa pabbajitvā attano sāmike disvā palāyantassa āpatti natthīti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:1178_1: Nissayamuccanakassa vattesu pañcakachakkesu pana ubhayāni kho pana…pe…
tika-vin02t:1178_2: anubyañjanasoti ettha “sabbopi cāyaṃ pabhedo mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ ñātāyaṃ ñāto hotī”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1178_3: Āpattiṃ jānātītiādīsu ca “pāṭhe avattamānepi ‘idaṃ nāma katvā idaṃ āpajjatī’ti jānāti ce,
tika-vin02t:1178_5: Tañca kho pubbe pāṭhe paguṇe kateti gahetabbanti ca ācariyupajjhāyānampi eseva nayoti ca keci vadanti.
tika-vin02t:1181_1: Rāhulavatthumhi tattheva vihariṃsūti sabbepi te arahattaṃ pattakālato paṭṭhāya ariyā nāma majjhattāva
tika-vin02t:1181_2: hontīti rañño pahitasāsanaṃ dasabalassa anārocetvāva tattha vihariṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1181_3: Ekadivasaṃ jātaṃ kāḷudāyiṃ nāma amaccanti ayaṃ kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbatto
tika-vin02t:1181_4: satthu dhammadesanaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ kulappasādakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ
tika-vin02t:1181_6: So yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bodhisattassa mātukucchiyaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇadivase
tika-vin02t:1181_8: Jātadivase bodhisattena saddhiṃyeva jātoti taṃ divasaṃyeva dukūlacumbaṭake nipajjāpetvā bodhisattassa upaṭṭhānatthāya nayiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1181_9: Bodhisattena hi saddhiṃ bodhirukkho rāhulamātā catasso nidhikumbhiyo ārohaniyahatthī kaṇḍako channo kāḷudāyīti
tika-vin02t:1181_10: ime satta ekadivase jātattā sahajātā nāma ahesuṃ.
tika-vin02t:1181_11: Athassa nāmaggahaṇadivase sakalanagarassa udaggacittadivase jātoti udāyītveva nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1181_12: Thokaṃ kāḷadhātukattā pana kāḷudāyī nāma jāto.
tika-vin02t:1181_13: So bodhisattena saddhiṃ kumārakīḷaṃ kīḷanto vuddhiṃ agamāsi.
tika-vin02t:1188_0: Saddalā haritā bhūmi, esa kālo mahāmunī”ti. –
tika-vin02t:1189_2: Pokkharapattappamāṇaṃ majjhe uṭṭhahitvā anukkamena satapaṭalaṃ sahassapaṭalaṃ hutvā vassanakavassantipi vadanti.
tika-vin02t:1189_3: Tasmiṃ kira vassante temetukāmāva tementi, na itare.
tika-vin02t:1189_5: gato natthīti dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pakkantesu ñātīsu ekopi rājā vā rājamahāmatto vā “sve amhākaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti nimantetvā gato natthi.
tika-vin02t:1189_6: Pitāpissa suddhodanamahārājā “mayhaṃ putto mama gehaṃ anāgantvā kahaṃ gamissatī”ti animantetvāva agamāsi,
tika-vin02t:1189_7: gantvā pana gehe vīsatiyā bhikkhusahassānaṃ yāguādīni paṭiyādāpetvā āsanāni paññāpesi.
tika-vin02t:1190_2: Uṇhīsanti hi uṇhīsasadisattā bhagavato paripuṇṇanalāṭassa paripuṇṇasīsassa ca etaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1190_3: Bhagavato hi dakkhiṇakaṇṇacūḷikato paṭṭhāya maṃsapaṭalaṃ uṭṭhahitvā sakalanalāṭaṃ chādayamānaṃ pūrayamānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1190_4: gantvā vāmakaṇṇacūḷikāya patiṭṭhitaṃ saṇhatamatāya suvaṇṇavaṇṇatāya pabhassaratāya paripuṇṇatāya ca rañño
tika-vin02t:1190_6: Bhagavato kira imaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ disvā rājūnaṃ uṇhīsapaṭṭaṃ akaṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1190_14: bhagavato pana āraggena vaṭṭetvā ṭhapitaṃ viya suparipuṇṇaṃ udakapubbuḷasadisampi hoti.
tika-vin02t:1190_15: Teneva uṇhīsaveṭhitasīsasadisattā uṇhīsaṃ viya sabbattha parimaṇḍalasīsattā ca uṇhīsasīsoti bhagavā vuccati.
tika-vin02t:1233_1: tā pana “aṭṭhahi gāthāhī”ti vacanena na samenti.
tika-vin02t:1233_2: Uṇhīsato paṭṭhāya yāva pādatalāti vuttānukkamopi tattha na dissati.
tika-vin02t:1234_0: Uttiṭṭheti uttiṭṭhitvā paresaṃ gharadvāre ṭhatvā gahetabbapiṇḍe.
tika-vin02t:1234_1: Nappamajjheyyāti piṇḍacārikavattaṃ hāpetvā paṇītabhojanāni pariyesanto uttiṭṭhe pamajjati nāma,
tika-vin02t:1234_2: sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya caranto pana nappamajjati nāma,
tika-vin02t:1234_4: Dhammanti anesanaṃ pahāya sapadānaṃ caranto tameva bhikkhācariyadhammaṃ sucaritaṃ care.
tika-vin02t:1234_6: evaṃ panetaṃ bhikkhāya cariyadhammaṃ caranto dhammacārī idhaloke ca paraloke ca catūhipi iriyāpathehi sukhaṃ viharatīti attho.
tika-vin02t:1235_0: Dutiyagāthāya na naṃ duccaritanti vesiyādibhede agocare caranto naṃ bhikkhācariyadhammaṃ duccaritaṃ carati nāma,
tika-vin02t:1235_1: evaṃ acaritvā taṃ dhammaṃ care sucaritaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1235_4: Imaṃ pana dutiyagāthaṃ pitu nivesanaṃ gantvā abhāsīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1235_5: Teneva theragāthāsaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ ācariyadhammapālattherena vuttaṃ “dutiyadivase piṇḍāya paviṭṭho ‘uttiṭṭhe
tika-vin02t:1235_6: nappamajjeyyā’ti gāthāya pitaraṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpetvā nivesanaṃ gantvā ‘dhammaṃ care sucarita’nti
tika-vin02t:1235_7: gāthāya mahāpajāpatiṃ sotāpattiphale rājānañca sakadāgāmiphale patiṭṭhāpesī”ti.
tika-vin02t:1235_8: Dhammapadaṭṭhakathāyampi vuttaṃ “punadivase piṇḍāya paviṭṭho ‘uttiṭṭhe nappamajjeyyā’ti gāthāya pitaraṃ
tika-vin02t:1235_9: sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpetvā ‘dhammaṃ care’ti gāthāya mahāpajāpatiṃ sotāpattiphale rājānañca sakadāgāmiphale
tika-vin02t:1236_0: Dhammapālajātakaṃ sutvā anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhāsīti punekadivasaṃ rājanivesane katapātarāso ekamantaṃ nisinnena raññā “bhante,
tika-vin02t:1236_1: tumhākaṃ dukkarakārikakāle ekā devatā maṃ upasaṅkamitvā ‘putto te kālakato’ti āha.
tika-vin02t:1236_2: Ahaṃ tassā vacanaṃ asaddahanto ‘na mayhaṃ putto bodhiṃ appatvā kālaṃ karotī’ti paṭikkhipinti vutte idāni kathaṃ saddahissatha,
tika-vin02t:1236_3: pubbepi aṭṭhikāni dassetvā ‘putto te mato’ti vutte na saddahitthā”ti imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā mahādhammapālajātakaṃ kathesi.
tika-vin02t:1237_5: Janapadakalyāṇīti janapadamhi kalyāṇī uttamā chasarīradosarahitā pañcakalyāṇasamannāgatā.
tika-vin02t:1237_6: Sā hi yasmā nātidīghā nātirassā nātikisā nātithūlā nātikāḷā nāccodātāti atikkantā mānusaṃ vaṇṇaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1237_9: Chavikalyāṇaṃ maṃsakalyāṇaṃ nahārukalyāṇaṃ aṭṭhikalyāṇaṃ vayakalyāṇanti imehi pana pañcahi kalyāṇehi samannāgatattā pañcakalyāṇasamannāgatā nāma.
tika-vin02t:1237_14: Cattāro panassā hatthapādā mukhapariyosānañca lākhārasaparikammakataṃ viya rattapavāḷarattakambalasadisaṃ hoti,
tika-vin02t:1237_16: Vīsati pana nakhapattāni maṃsato amuttaṭṭhāne lākhārasapūritāni viya muttaṭṭhāne khīradhārāsadisāni honti,
tika-vin02t:1237_18: Dvattiṃsa dantā suphusitā sudhotavajirapanti viya khāyanti,
tika-vin02t:1237_20: Vīsativassasatikāpi samānā soḷasavassuddesikā viya hoti nivalipalitā,
tika-vin02t:1237_22: Iti imehi pañcahi kalyāṇehi samannāgatattā janapadakalyāṇīti vuccati.
tika-vin02t:1238_1: Sopi bhagavantaṃ “pattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vattuṃ avisahamāno vihāraṃyeva agamāsīti.
tika-vin02t:1238_2: So kira tathāgate gāravena “pattaṃ vo bhante gaṇhathā”ti vattuṃ nāsakkhi.
tika-vin02t:1238_9: Kumāro nivattitukāmo aruciyā gacchanto satthu gāravena “pattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vattumpi asakkonto “idha gaṇhissati,
tika-vin02t:1238_11: Janapadakalyāṇiyā ca vuttavacanaṃ tassa hadaye tiriyaṃ patitvā viya ṭhitaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1238_16: imasmiṃ ṭhāne nivattissatī”ti cintentameva satthā vihāraṃ netvā “pabbajissasi nandā”ti āha.
tika-vin02t:1238_17: So buddhagāravena “na pabbajissāmī”ti avatvā “āma pabbajissāmī”ti āha.
tika-vin02t:1238_18: Satthā “tena hi nandaṃ pabbājethā”ti vatvā pabbājesi.
tika-vin02t:1238_20: “Satthā kapilapuraṃ gantvā tatiyadivase nandaṃ pabbājesī”ti dhammapadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1239_0: “Mahāsattopi sabbaññutaṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakko lokānuggahaṃ karonto rājagahato kapilavatthuṃ
tika-vin02t:1239_2: punadivase pitu nivesanaṃ gantvā rāhulamātāya ovādaṃ katvā sesajanassapi dhammaṃ kathesi,
tika-vin02t:1239_3: punadivase nandakumārassa abhisekagehappavesanaāvāhamaṅgalesu vattamānesu tassa nivesanaṃ gantvā kumāraṃ
tika-vin02t:1240_1: idha pana “bhagavā kapilapuraṃ āgantvā dutiyadivase nandaṃ pabbājesī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1240_2: sabbampetaṃ ācariyena taṃtaṃbhāṇakānaṃ tathā tathā anussavavasena pariharitvā āgatabhāvato tattha tattha
tika-vin02t:1240_3: tathā tathā vuttanti natthettha ācariyavacane pubbāparavirodho.
tika-vin02t:1243_0: Sutadhanañca cāgo ca, paññā ve sattamaṃ dhana”nti. –
tika-vin02t:1244_2: Puttasineho uppajjamāno sakalasarīraṃ khobhetvā aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca tiṭṭhatīti āha “puttapemaṃ bhante…pe…
tika-vin02t:1244_4: Puttasineho hi balavabhāvato sahajātapītivegassa savipphāratāya taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpadhammehi pharaṇavasena
tika-vin02t:1247_3: sāmaṇerānaṃ dasa sikkhāpadānītiādīsu sikkhitabbāni padāni sikkhāpadāni,
tika-vin02t:1247_9: Saraseneva patanasabhāvassa antarā eva atipātanaṃ atipāto,
tika-vin02t:1247_10: saṇikaṃ patituṃ adatvā sīghaṃ pātananti attho.
tika-vin02t:1247_11: Atikkamma vā satthādīhi abhibhavitvā pātanaṃ atipāto,
tika-vin02t:1247_16: Tasmiṃ pana pāṇe pāṇasaññino jīvitindriyupacchedakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā kāyavacīdvārānaṃ aññatarappavattā vadhakacetanā pāṇātipāto,
tika-vin02t:1248_1: “mayi idha ṭhitāya kathamāgacchasī”ti vā tajjentī viya nīharatīti veramaṇī.
tika-vin02t:1248_2: Viramati etāyāti vā viramaṇīti vattabbe niruttinayena “veramaṇī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1248_4: Sā “pāṇātipātādiṃ viramantassa yā tasmiṃ samaye pāṇātipātā ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī akiriyā akaraṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:1248_5: anajjhāpatti velānatikkamo setughāto”ti evamādinā nayena vibhaṅge vuttā.
tika-vin02t:1248_7: idha pana samādānavasappavattā virati adhippetāti lokuttarāya viratiyā samādānavasena pavattiasambhavato
tika-vin02t:1249_4: Yattha paro yathākāmakāritaṃ āpajjanto adaṇḍāraho anupavajjo ca hoti,
tika-vin02t:1249_5: tasmiṃ pana parapariggahite parapariggahitasaañano tadādāyakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā theyyacetanā adinnādānaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1250_2: ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo”tiādinā hīḷitattā aseṭṭhā appasatthā cariyāti vā aseṭṭhānaṃ nihīnānaṃ itthipurisānaṃ cariyāti vā aseṭṭhacariyaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1250_4: atthato pana asaddhammasevanādhippāyena kāyadvārappavattā maggenamaggappaṭipattisamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā abrahmacariyaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1251_2: Lakkhaṇato pana atathaṃ vatthuṃ tathato paraṃ viññāpetukāmassa tathāviññattisamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā musāvādo musā vadīyati vuccati etāyāti katvā.
tika-vin02t:1252_0: Surāmerayamajjappamādaṭṭhānāti ettha surāti pūvasurā piṭṭhasurā odanasurā kiṇṇapakkhittā sambhārasaṃyuttāti pañca surā.
tika-vin02t:1252_1: Merayanti pupphāsavo phalāsavo madhvāsavo guḷāsavo sambhārasaṃyuttoti pañca āsavā.
tika-vin02t:1252_2: Tattha pūve bhājane pakkhipitvā tajjaṃ udakaṃ datvā madditvā katā pūvasurā.
tika-vin02t:1252_4: Kiṇṇāti pana tassā surāya bījaṃ vuccati,
tika-vin02t:1252_13: Taṃ sabbampi madakaraṇavasena majjaṃ pivantaṃ madayatīti katvā.
tika-vin02t:1253_1: Ayaṃ buddhādīnaṃ ariyānaṃ āciṇṇasamāciṇṇo bhojanassa kālo nāma,
tika-vin02t:1253_5: Yathā ca “rattūparato”ti ettha rattiyā bhojanaṃ rattīti uttarapadalopena vuccati,
tika-vin02t:1253_10: Atha vā na ettha kammasādhano bhuñjitabbatthavācako bhojanasaddo,
tika-vin02t:1253_15: saddassa vā yāvakālikajjhoharaṇe niruḷhattā yāvakālikassāti viññāyati,
tika-vin02t:1253_16: atthato pana kāyadvārappavattā vikāle yāvakālikajjhoharaṇacetanā “vikālabhojana”nti veditabbā.
tika-vin02t:1254_0: Naccagītavāditavisūkadassanāti ettha sāsanassa ananulomattā visūkaṃ paṭāṇībhūtaṃ dassananti visūkadassanaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1254_1: Naccādīnañhi dassanaṃ sachandarāgappavattito saṅkhepato “sabbapāpassa akaraṇa”ntiādinayappavattaṃ bhagavato sāsanaṃ na anulometi.
tika-vin02t:1254_3: Attanā payojiyamānaṃ parehi payojāpiyamānañcettha naccaṃ naccabhāvasāmaññato pāḷiyaṃ ekeneva nacca-
tika-vin02t:1254_7: tasmā attanā naccananaccāpanādivasena naccā ca gītā ca vāditā ca antamaso mayūranaccādivasenapi pavattānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1254_8: naccādīnaṃ visūkabhūtā dassanā ca veramaṇīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin02t:1254_9: Naccādīni attanā payojetuṃ vā parehi payojāpetuṃ vā payuttāni passituṃ vā neva bhikkhūnaṃ na bhikkhunīnaṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:1254_11: Yathā sakaṃ visayaālocanasabhāvatāya vā pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ savanakiriyāyapi dassanasaṅkhepasambhavato “dassanā” icceva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1254_12: Teneva vuttaṃ “pañcahi viññāṇehi na kañci dhammaṃ paṭivijānāti aññatra abhinipātamattā”ti.
tika-vin02t:1254_13: Dassanakamyatāya upasaṅkamitvā passato eva cettha vītikkamo hoti,
tika-vin02t:1254_14: ṭhitanisinnasayanokāse pana āgataṃ gacchantassa vā āpāthagataṃ passato siyā saṃkileso,
tika-vin02t:1255_4: tasmā yaṃ kiñci pupphaṃ baddhamabaddhaṃ vā,
tika-vin02t:1255_6: Gandhanti vāsacuṇṇadhūmādikaṃ vilepanato aññaṃ yaṃ kiñci gandhajātaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1255_7: Vilepananti vilepanatthaṃ pisitvā paṭiyattaṃ yaṃ kiñci chavirāgakaraṇaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1255_13: gandhavasena chavirāgavasena ca sādiyanto vibhūseti nāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1255_14: Paramatthajotikāyaṃ pana khuddakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “mālādīsu dhāraṇādīni yathāsaṅkhyaṃ yojetabbānī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1255_16: tasmā yāya dussīlyacetanāya tāni mālādhāraṇādīni mahājano karoti,
tika-vin02t:1256_7: Yasmā pana ādhāre paṭikkhitte tadādhārā kiriyā paṭikkhittāva hoti,
tika-vin02t:1256_9: atthato pana tadupabhogabhūtanisajjānipajjanehi virati dassitāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-vin02t:1256_10: Atha vā uccāsayanamahāsayanasayanāti etasmiṃ atthe ekasesanayena ayaṃ niddeso kato yathā “nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatana”nti,
tika-vin02t:1256_11: āsanakiriyāpubbakattā sayanakiriyāya sayanaggahaṇeneva āsanampi gahitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1257_1: Rajatanti kahāpaṇo lohamāsako jatumāsako dārumāsakoti ye vohāraṃ gacchanti,
tika-vin02t:1257_7: Tividhampi paṭiggahaṇaṃ sāmaññaniddesena ekasesanayena vā gahetvā “paṭiggahaṇā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1257_8: tasmā neva uggahetuṃ na uggahāpetuṃ na upanikkhittaṃ vā sādituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:1257_9: Imāni pana dasa sikkhāpadāni gahaṭṭhānampi sādhāraṇāni.
tika-vin02t:1257_13: Ettha hi dasāti sāmaṇerehi rakkhitabbasīlamāha ghaṭikārādīnaṃ viya.
tika-vin02t:1257_14: Paramatthajotikāyaṃ pana khuddakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ādito dve catutthapañcamāni upāsakānaṃ sāmaṇerānañca sādhāraṇāni niccasīlavasena,
tika-vin02t:1257_15: uposathasīlavasena pana upāsakānaṃ sattamaṭṭhamaṃ cekaṃ aṅgaṃ katvā sabbapacchimavajjāni sabbānipi sāmaṇerehi sādhāraṇāni,
tika-vin02t:1257_17: taṃ “sati vā ussāhe dasā”ti iminā na sameti.
tika-vin02t:1258_2: “Attano pariveṇanti idaṃ puggalikaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1258_4: “vassaggena pattasenāsana”nti iminā tassa vassaggena pattaṃ saṅghikasenāsanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1258_7: “yattha vā vasatī”ti iminā saṅghikaṃ vā hotu puggalikaṃ vā,
tika-vin02t:1258_9: “Yattha vā paṭikkamatī”ti iminā pana yaṃ ācariyassa upajjhāyassa vā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ upaṭṭhānādinimittaṃ nibaddhaṃ pavisati,
tika-vin02t:1258_11: Tasmā tadubhayaṃ dassetuṃ “ubhayenapi attano pariveṇañca vassaggena pattasenāsanañca vutta”nti āha.
tika-vin02t:1258_12: Tattha attano pariveṇanti iminā ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1258_13: vassaggena pattasenāsananti iminā pana tassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1258_14: Tadubhayampi saṅghikaṃ vā hotu puggalikaṃ vā,
tika-vin02t:1261_1: Daṇḍakammamassa karothāti assa daṇḍakammaṃ yojetha āṇāpetha.
tika-vin02t:1261_5: Senāsanaggāho ca paṭippassambhatīti iminā ca chinnavasso ca hotīti dīpeti.
tika-vin02t:1261_8: nikkaḍḍhitabboti ettha sace yāvatatiyaṃ vuccamāno na oramati,
tika-vin02t:1261_10: Puna pabbajjaṃ yācamānopi apaloketvā pabbājetabboti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:1261_11: Pacchimikāya vassāvāsikaṃ lacchatīti pacchimikāya puna vassaṃ upagatattā lacchati.
tika-vin02t:1264_5: juṇhapakkhe panassa pariḷāho vūpasammatī”ti apaṇḍakapakkhe pariḷāhavūpasamasseva vuttattā paṇḍakapakkhe
tika-vin02t:1264_8: Itthibhāvo pumbhāvo vā natthi etassāti abhāvako.
tika-vin02t:1264_9: Tasmiṃ yevassa pakkhe pabbajjā vāritāti ettha “apaṇḍakapakkhe pabbājetvā paṇḍakapakkhe nāsetabbo”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1264_10: Keci pana “apaṇḍakapakkhe pabbajito sace kilesakkhayaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin02t:1264_12: taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ paṇḍakassa kilesakkhayāsambhavato khīṇakilesassa ca paṇḍakabhāvānupapattito.
tika-vin02t:1264_16: Teneva ahetukapaṭisandhiniddese jaccandhabadhirādayo viya paṇḍako jātisaddena visesetvā na niddiṭṭho.
tika-vin02t:1264_17: Idhāpi catutthapārājikasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ “abhabbapuggale dassentena paṇḍakatiracchānagataubhatobyañjanakā tayo vatthuvipannā ahetukapaṭisandhikā,
tika-vin02t:1267_1: Theyyasaṃvāsakavatthumhi kolaññāti mātuvaṃse pituvaṃse ca jātā mātāpituppabhutisabbañātayo.
tika-vin02t:1267_3: So ca na saṃvāsamattasseva thenako idhādhippeto,
tika-vin02t:1267_4: atha kho liṅgassa tadubhayassa ca thenakopīti āha “tayo theyyasaṃvāsakā”tiādi.
tika-vin02t:1267_5: Na yathāvuḍḍhaṃ vandanaṃ sādiyatīti yathāvuḍḍhaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vā sāmaṇerānaṃ vā vandanaṃ na sādiyati.
tika-vin02t:1267_6: Yathāvuḍḍhaṃ vandanaṃ sādiyatīti attanā musāvādaṃ katvā dassitavassānurūpaṃ yathāvuḍḍhaṃ vandanaṃ sādiyati.
tika-vin02t:1267_7: Bhikkhuvassagaṇanādikoti iminā na ekakammādikova idha saṃvāso nāmāti dasseti.
tika-vin02t:1268_4: yāva so suddhamānasoti rājabhayādīhi gahitaliṅgatāya so suddhamānaso yāva saṃvāsaṃ nādhivāsetīti attho.
tika-vin02t:1268_5: Yo hi rājabhayādiṃ vinā kevalaṃ bhikkhū vañcetvā tehi saddhiṃ saṃvasitukāmatāya liṅgaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-vin02t:1268_6: so asuddhacittatāya liṅgaggahaṇeneva theyyasaṃvāsako nāma hoti.
tika-vin02t:1268_7: Ayaṃ pana tādisena asuddhacittena bhikkhū vañcetukāmatāya abhāvato yāva saṃvāsaṃ nādhivāseti,
tika-vin02t:1268_9: Teneva “rājabhayādīhi gahitaliṅgānaṃ ‘gihī maṃ samaṇoti jānantū’ti vañcanācitte satipi bhikkhūnaṃ vañcetukāmatāya
tika-vin02t:1268_10: abhāvā doso na jāto”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1268_12: evañca sati so vūpasantabhayo yāva saṃvāsaṃ nādhivāseti,
tika-vin02t:1268_13: tāva theyyasaṃvāsako na hotīti ayamattho viññāyati.
tika-vin02t:1268_14: Imasmiñca atthe viññāyamāne avūpasantabhayassa saṃvāsasādiyanepi theyyasaṃvāsakatā na hotīti āpajjeyya,
tika-vin02t:1268_15: na ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ avūpasantabhayassa saṃvāsasādiyanepi atheyyasaṃvāsakatā dassitā.
tika-vin02t:1268_16: Sabbapāsaṇḍiyabhattāni bhuñjantoti ca iminā avūpasantatayenapi saṃvāsaṃ asādiyanteneva vasitabbanti dīpeti.
tika-vin02t:1268_17: Teneva tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ “yasmā vihāraṃ āgantvā saṅghikaṃ gaṇhantassa saṃvāsaṃ pariharituṃ dukkaraṃ,
tika-vin02t:1269_0: Sabbapāsaṇḍiyabhattānīti sabbasāmayikānaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ katvā vīthicatukkādīsu ṭhapetvā dātabbabhattāni.
tika-vin02t:1269_4: Tadeva pattacīvaraṃ ādāya vihāraṃ gacchatīti cīvarāni nivāsanapārupanavasena ādāya pattañca aṃsakūṭe laggetvā vihāraṃ gacchati.
tika-vin02t:1269_6: so theyyasaṃvāsako nāma hotī”ti vā “evaṃ kātuṃ na labhatī”ti vā “evaṃ pabbajito samaṇo na hotī”ti vā na jānāti.
tika-vin02t:1269_8: so theyyasaṃvāsako nāma hotīti idaṃ pana nidassanamattaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1269_9: Anupasampannakāleyevāti iminā upasampannakāle sutvā sacepi nāroceti,
tika-vin02t:1270_1: theyyasaṃvāsako na hotīti idaṃ bhikkhūhi dinnaliṅgassa apariccattattā na liṅgathenako hoti,
tika-vin02t:1270_2: liṅgānurūpassa saṃvāsassa sāditattā nāpi saṃvāsathenako hotīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1270_3: Eko bhikkhu kāsāye saussāhova odātaṃ nivāsetvāti etthāpi idameva kāraṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1270_4: Parato sāmaṇero saliṅge ṭhitotiādinā sāmaṇerassa vuttavidhānesupi atheyyasaṃvāsakapakkhe ayameva nayo.
tika-vin02t:1270_5: Bhikkhuniyāpi eseva nayoti vuttamevatthaṃ “sāpi hi gihibhāvaṃ patthayamānā”tiādinā vibhāveti.
tika-vin02t:1270_6: Yo koci vuḍḍhapabbajitoti sāmaṇeraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1270_9: theyyasaṃvāsako na hotīti ettha kiñcāpi theyyasaṃvāsako na hoti,
tika-vin02t:1273_0: Titthiyapakkantakakathāyaṃ tesaṃ liṅge ādinnamatte titthiyapakkantako hotīti “titthiyo bhavissāmī”ti
tika-vin02t:1273_1: gatassa liṅgaggahaṇeneva tesaṃ laddhipi gahitāyeva hotīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1273_2: Kenaci pana “tesaṃ liṅge ādinnamatte laddhiyā gahitāyapi aggahitāyapi titthiyapakkantako hotī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1273_4: Na hi “titthiyo bhavissāmī”ti gatassa liṅgasampaṭicchanato aññaṃ laddhiggahaṇaṃ nāma atthi.
tika-vin02t:1273_11: padavāre padavāre dukkaṭanti “ājīvako bhavissa”nti asuddhacittena gamanapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1273_12: Naggena hutvā gamanapaccayāpi dukkaṭā na muccatiyeva.
tika-vin02t:1273_13: Kūṭavassaṃ gaṇentoti kūṭavassaṃ gaṇetvā saṃvāsaṃ sādiyantoti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:1277_7: so ca kho pariyāyatoti nippariyāyasiddhataṃ dassetuṃ “janikā mātā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1277_8: Yathā manussattabhāve ṭhitasseva kusaladhammānaṃ tikkhavisadasūrabhāvāpatti yathā taṃ tiṇṇampi bodhisattānaṃ bodhittayanibbattiyaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1277_9: evaṃ manussattabhāve ṭhitasseva akusaladhammānampi tikkhavisadasūrabhāvāpattīti āha “sayampi manussajātikenevā”ti.
tika-vin02t:1277_15: Pitughātakepi yena manussabhūto janako pitā sayampi manussajātikeneva satā sañcicca jīvitā voropito,
tika-vin02t:1277_16: ayaṃ ānantariyena pitughātakakammena pitughātakotiādinā sabbaṃ veditabbanti āha “pitughātakepi eseva nayo”ti.
tika-vin02t:1278_0: Parivattitaliṅgampi mātaraṃ pitaraṃ vā jīvitā voropentassa ānantariyakammaṃ hotiyeva.
tika-vin02t:1278_1: Satipi hi liṅgaparivatte so eva ekakammanibbatto bhavaṅgappabandho jīvitindriyappabandho ca, nāññoti.
tika-vin02t:1278_2: Yo pana sayaṃ manusso tiracchānabhūtaṃ mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ vā,
tika-vin02t:1278_9: “Eḷakaṃ māremī”ti abhisandhināpi hi eḷakaṭṭhāne ṭhitaṃ manusso manussabhūtaṃ mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ vā mārento
tika-vin02t:1278_11: Eḷakābhisandhinā pana mātāpitiaasandhinā vā eḷakaṃ mārento ānantariyaṃ na phusati ānantariyavatthuabhāvato.
tika-vin02t:1278_17: vadhakacittaṃ pana tadārammaṇaṃ jīvitindriyañca ānantariyānānantarabhāve pamāṇaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1278_18: Katānantariyakammo ca “tassa kammassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhissāmī”ti sakalacakkavāḷaṃ mahācetiyappamāṇehi kañcanathūpehi
tika-vin02t:1278_19: pūretvāpi sakalacakkavāḷaṃ pūretvā nisinnassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvāpi buddhassa bhagavato
tika-vin02t:1278_20: saṅghāṭikaṇṇaṃ amuñcanto vicaritvāpi kāyassa bhedā nirayameva upapajjati,
tika-vin02t:1279_6: Vadhakacetanāya hi dūsitacittaṃ idha duṭṭhacittaṃ nāma.
tika-vin02t:1279_7: Lohitaṃ uppādetīti ettha tathāgatassa abhejjakāyatāya parūpakkamena cammacchedaṃ katvā lohitapaggharaṇaṃ nāma natthi,
tika-vin02t:1279_8: sarīrassa pana antoyeva ekasmiṃ ṭhāne lohitaṃ samosarati,
tika-vin02t:1279_10: Devadattena paviddhasilato bhijjitvā gatasakkhalikāpi tathāgatassa pādantaṃ pahari,
tika-vin02t:1279_11: pharasunā pahaṭo viya pādo antolohitoyeva ahosi.
tika-vin02t:1279_12: Jīvako pana tathāgatassa ruciyā satthakena cammaṃ chinditvā tamhā ṭhānā duṭṭhalohitaṃ nīharitvā phāsumakāsi,
tika-vin02t:1280_0: Atha ye parinibbute tathāgate cetiyaṃ bhindanti,
tika-vin02t:1280_5: Sadhātukaṃ pana thūpaṃ vā paṭimaṃ vā bādhamānaṃ bodhisākhaṃ chindituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:1280_6: Sacepi tattha nilīnā sakuṇā cetiye vaccaṃ pātenti,
tika-vin02t:1280_9: Cetiyavatthuṃ bhinditvā gacchante bodhimūlepi chinditvā harituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:1280_15: Yasmiṃ pana āsanaghare dhātu nihitā hoti,
tika-vin02t:1280_17: Bodhijagganatthaṃ ojoharaṇasākhaṃ vā pūtiṭṭhānaṃ vā chindituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva,
tika-vin02t:1283_1: Ubhato byañjanamassa atthīti ubhatobyañjanakoti iminā asamānādhikaraṇavisayo bāhiratthasamāsoyaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1283_18: Itthiubhatobyañjanakassa hi yadā itthiyā rāgacittaṃ uppajjati,
tika-vin02t:1283_22: Yadi ca tesaṃ indriyaṃ dutiyabyañjanakāraṇaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-vin02t:1284_6: yadi paṭisandhiyaṃ itthiliṅganti ca paṭisandhiyaṃ liṅgasabbhāvo kurundiyaṃvutto,
tika-vin02t:1284_12: Na ca indriyameva liṅganti sakkā vattuṃ indriyaliṅgānaṃ bhinnasabhāvattā.
tika-vin02t:1285_3: Itthiliṅgādi pana itthindriyaṃ paṭicca pavatte samuṭṭhitaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1285_4: Yathā bīje sati bījaṃ paṭicca bījapaccayā rukkho vaḍḍhitvā sākhāviṭapasampanno hutvā ākāsaṃ pūretvā tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin02t:1285_5: evameva itthibhāvasaṅkhāte itthindriye sati itthiliṅgādīni honti.
tika-vin02t:1285_7: bījaṃ paṭicca vaḍḍhitvā ākāsaṃ pūretvā ṭhitarukkho viya itthindriyaṃ paṭicca itthiliṅgādīni pavatte samuṭṭhahanti.
tika-vin02t:1286_0: Tenevāha “tattha vicāraṇakkamo vitthārato aṭṭhasāliniyā dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāya veditabbo”ti.
tika-vin02t:1289_1: Sikkhāpadaṃ apaññattaṃ hotīti idheva paññattaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1289_5: Aññathā “puggalaṃ na parāmasatī”ti vuttakammavipattisambhavato kammaṃ kuppeyya,
tika-vin02t:1289_7: Yathā ca aparipuṇṇapattacīvarassa upasampādanakāle kammavācāya “paripuṇṇassa pattacīvara”nti asantavatthuṃ
tika-vin02t:1289_9: evaṃ “ayaṃ buddharakkhito āyasmato dhammarakkhitassa upasampadāpekkho”ti asantaṃ puggalaṃ kittetvā kevalaṃ
tika-vin02t:1289_10: santapadanīhārena kammavācāya katāya upasampadā ruhatiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1289_15: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti ettakameva vatvā “so ca puggalo anupasampanno”ti avuttattā kammavipattilakkhaṇassa ca asambhavato “taṃ na gahetabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1289_19: akammaṃ na ca karaṇīya”ntiādivacanato paṇḍakādīnampi ubhatobyañjanakapariyantānaṃ gaṇapūrakabhāveyeva kammaṃ kuppati,
tika-vin02t:1292_1: Aññe vā bhikkhū dātukāmā hontīti sambandho.
tika-vin02t:1292_3: Sāmaṇerabhāgasamako āmisabhāgoti ettha kiñcāpi sāmaṇerānaṃ āmisabhāgassa samakameva diyyamānattā visuṃ sāmaṇerabhāgo nāma natthi,
tika-vin02t:1292_4: heṭṭhā gacchantaṃ pana bhattaṃ kadāci mandaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-vin02t:1292_5: tasmā upari aggahetvā sāmaṇerapāḷiyāva gahetvā dātabboti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:1295_4: Etena ṭhapetvā mahāpurisaṃ cakkavattiñca itare sattā khujjapakkhikāti dasseti.
tika-vin02t:1295_5: Yebhuyyena hi sattā khandhe kaṭiyaṃ jāṇūsūti tīsu ṭhānesu namanti.
tika-vin02t:1295_7: itaresu dvīsu ṭhānesu namantā purato namanti.
tika-vin02t:1295_8: Dīghasarīrā pana ekena passena vaṅkā honti,
tika-vin02t:1295_9: eke mukhaṃ unnāmetvā nakkhattāni gaṇayantā viya caranti,
tika-vin02t:1296_12: yassa ca caṅkamato jāṇukā bahi gacchanti.
tika-vin02t:1300_1: Nissayapaṭisaṃyuttavatthūsu bhikkhūhi samāno sīlādiguṇabhāgo assāti bhikkhusabhāgo,
tika-vin02t:1300_3: Dve tīṇi divasāni vasitvā gantukāmena anissitena vasitabbanti ettha “yāva bhikkhusabhāgataṃ jānāmī”ti
tika-vin02t:1300_4: ābhogaṃ vināpi anissitena vasituṃ vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:1300_6: kiṃ me nissayenā”ti aruṇaṃ uṭṭhapetuṃ na labhati.
tika-vin02t:1300_7: “Purāruṇā uṭṭhahitvāva gamissāmī”ti ābhogena sayantassa sace aruṇo uggacchati, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:1300_8: “Sattāhaṃ vasissāmī”ti ālayaṃ karontena pana nissayo gahetabboti “sattāhamattaṃ vasissāmi,
tika-vin02t:1300_9: kiṃ bhikkhusabhāgatājānanenā”ti jānane dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā vasituṃ na labhati,
tika-vin02t:1302_6: tattha gantabbanti ettha sace so vassūpanāyikāya āsannāya gantukāmo suṇāti “asuko mahāthero āgamissatī”ti,
tika-vin02t:1302_11: Keci pana “sace so gacchanto jīvitantarāyaṃ brahmacariyantarāyaṃ vā passati,
tika-vin02t:1304_1: “Itthannāmo itthannāmassa āyasmato”ti nāmakittanassa anussāvanāya āgatattā “nāhaṃ ussahāmi therassa nāmaṃ gahetu”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1304_2: “āyasmato pippalissa upasampadāpekkho”ti evaṃ nāmaṃ gahetuṃ na ussahāmīti attho.
tika-vin02t:1304_5: “Konāmo te upajjhāyo”ti puṭṭhenapi gottameva nāmaṃ katvā vattabbanti siddhaṃ hoti,
tika-vin02t:1304_6: tasmā catubbidhesu nāmesu yena kenaci nāmena anussāvanā kātabbāti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:1304_10: atthato byañjanato ca abhinnāhi anussāvanāhi bhavitabbanti.
tika-vin02t:1304_11: Kiñcāpi “itthannāmo itthannāmassa āyasmato”ti pāḷiyaṃ “āyasmato”ti padaṃ pacchā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1304_12: kammavācāpāḷiyaṃ pana “ayaṃ buddharakkhito āyasmato dhammarakkhitassā”ti paṭhamaṃ likhitanti taṃ uppaṭipāṭiyā vuttanti na paccetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1304_14: tasmā pāḷiyaṃ avuttopi “ayaṃ buddharakkhito āyasmato dhammarakkhitassā”ti kammavācāpāḷiyaṃ payogo dassito.
tika-vin02t:1304_15: “Na me diṭṭho ito pubbe iccāyasmā sāriputto”ti ca “āyasmā sāriputto atthakusalo”ti ca paṭhamaṃ “āyasmā”ti payogassa dassanatoti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:1304_16: Katthaci “āyasmato buddharakkhitattherassā”ti vatvā katthaci kevalaṃ “buddharakkhitassā”ti sāveti,
tika-vin02t:1304_17: sāvanaṃ hāpetīti na vuccati nāmassa ahāpitattāti eke.
tika-vin02t:1304_18: Sace katthaci “āyasmato buddharakkhitassā”ti vatvā katthaci “buddharaakhatassāyasmato”ti sāveti,
tika-vin02t:1304_20: Byañjanabhedappasaṅgato anussāvanānaṃ taṃ na vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:1304_21: Sace pana sabbaṭṭhānepi eteneva pakārena vadati, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:1306_1: Ekānussāvaneti ettha ekato anussāvanaṃ etesanti ekānussāvanāti asamānādhikaraṇavisayo bāhiratthasamāsoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1306_6: aññena itarassā”tiādinā pubbe vuttanayena dvīhi vā tīhi vā ācariyehi ekena vā ekatoanussāvane kātuṃ.
tika-vin02t:1308_0: 126. Vajjāvajjaṃ upanijjhāyatīti upajjhāti iminā upajjhāyasaddasamānattho upajjhāsaddopīti dasseti.
tika-vin02t:1310_2: Anāpatti sambhoge saṃvāseti ettha ca ayamadhippāyo –
tika-vin02t:1310_3: yasmā ayaṃ osāraṇakammassa katattā pakatattaṭṭhāne ṭhito,
tika-vin02t:1310_4: tasmā na ukkhittakena saddhiṃ sambhogādipaccayā pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1310_5: nāpi alajjinā saddhiṃ paribhogapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ alajjīlakkhaṇānupapattito.
tika-vin02t:1310_6: Yo hi ucchurasakasaṭānaṃ sattāhakālikayāvajīvikattā vaṭṭati vikāle ucchu khāditunti saññaṃ uppādetvā
tika-vin02t:1310_7: taṃ khāditvā tappaccayā pācittiyaṃ na passati “vaṭṭatī”ti tathāsaññitāya,
tika-vin02t:1310_8: yo vā pana āpattimāpannabhāvaṃ paṭijānitvā “na paṭikaromī”ti abhinivisati, ayaṃ –
tika-vin02t:1313_0: Vuttalakkhaṇe apatanato alajjī nāma na hoti.
tika-vin02t:1313_1: Tasmā yathā pubbe yāva ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kataṃ,
tika-vin02t:1313_2: tāva tena saddhiṃ sambhoge saṃvāse ca anāpatti,
tika-vin02t:1313_3: evamidhāpīti sabbathā anāpattiṭṭhāneyeva anāpatti vuttāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1313_4: Na hi bhagavā alajjinā saddhiṃ sambhogapaccayā āpattisambhave sati “anāpatti sambhoge saṃvāse”ti vadati.
tika-vin02t:1313_5: Tato yamettha kenaci “anāpatti sambhoge saṃvāse”ti iminā pācittiyena anāpatti vuttā,
tika-vin02t:1313_6: “alajjīparibhogapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ pana āpajjatiyevā”ti vatvā bahudhā papañcitaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1318_1: Uposathakkhandhake taranti plavanti ettha bālāti titthaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1318_3: Taṃ kathentīti “imasmiṃ nāma divase muhutte vā idaṃ kattabba”ntiādinā kathenti.
tika-vin02t:1319_2: taṃ mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ vitthārato āgatamevāti na idha vitthārayissāma,
tika-vin02t:1320_1: Āpajjitvā vā vuṭṭhitoti ettha ārocitāpi āpatti asantī nāma hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1320_2: Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “yassa pana evaṃ anāpannā vā āpatti āpajjitvā ca pana vuṭṭhitā vā desitā vā ārocitā vā,
tika-vin02t:1320_3: tassa sā āpatti asantī nāma hotī”ti.
tika-vin02t:1320_4: Musāvādo nāma vacībhedapaccayā hotīti āha “na musāvādalakkhaṇenā”ti.
tika-vin02t:1320_5: Bhagavato pana vacanenāti sampajānamusāvāde kiṃ hoti?
tika-vin02t:1320_7: Vacīdvāre akiriyasamuṭṭhānā āpatti hotīti yasmā yassa bhikkhuno adhammikāya paṭiññāya tuṇhībhūtassa nisinnassa manodvāre āpatti nāma natthi,
tika-vin02t:1320_8: yasmā pana āvi kātabbaṃ na āvi akāsi,
tika-vin02t:1321_3: Giraṃ no ca pare bhaṇeyyāti “ime sossantī”ti parapuggale sandhāya saddampi na nicchāreyya.
tika-vin02t:1321_4: Āpajjeyya vācasikanti vācato samuṭṭhitaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjeyya.
tika-vin02t:1322_0: Antarāyakaroti vippaṭisāravatthutāya pāmojjādisambhavaṃ nivāretvā paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ adhigamāya antarāyakaro.
tika-vin02t:1322_1: Tassa bhikkhuno phāsu hotīti avippaṭisāramūlakānaṃ pāmojjādīnaṃ vasena tassa bhikkhuno sukhā paṭipadā sampajjatīti attho.
tika-vin02t:1325_3: Tasmāti yasmā ekena na vaṭṭati, tasmā.
tika-vin02t:1325_10: Parabhāge kittetuṃ vaṭṭatīti bahi nikkhamitvā ṭhitesu aṭṭhasu maggesu ekissā disāya ekaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1325_11: aparāya ekanti evaṃ catūsu ṭhānesu kittetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:1326_0: Yattha katthaci uttarantiyā bhikkhuniyā antaravāsako temiyatīti sikkhākaraṇīyaṃ āgatalakkhaṇena timaṇḍalaṃ
tika-vin02t:1326_1: paṭicchādetvā antaravāsakaṃ anukkhipitvā titthena vā atitthena vā uttarantiyā bhikkhuniyā ekadvaṅgulamattampi
tika-vin02t:1326_3: Bhikkhuniyā eva gahaṇañcettha bhikkhunīvibhaṅge bhikkhuniyā vasena nadīlakkhaṇassa pāḷiyaṃ āgatattā teneva nayena dassanatthaṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin02t:1326_4: Sīmaṃ bandhantānaṃ nimittaṃ hotīti ayaṃ vuttalakkhaṇā nadī samuddaṃ vā pavisatu taḷākaṃ vā,
tika-vin02t:1326_6: Ajjhottharitvā āvaraṇaṃ pavattatiyevāti āvaraṇaṃ ajjhottharitvā sandatiyeva.
tika-vin02t:1326_8: Āvaraṇañhi patvā nadiyā yattake padese udakaṃ asandamānaṃ santiṭṭhati,
tika-vin02t:1327_1: Mudiṅgasaṇṭhānāti mudiṅgabherī viya majjhe vitthatā ubhosu koṭīsu saṅkoṭitā hoti.
tika-vin02t:1327_2: Upacāraṃ ṭhapetvāti pacchā sīmaṃ bandhantānaṃ sīmāya okāsaṃ ṭhapetvā.
tika-vin02t:1327_3: Antonimittagatehi panāti ekassa gāmassa upaḍḍhaṃ anto kattukāmatāya sati sabbesaṃ āgamane payojanaṃ natthīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1327_7: Abaddhāya hi sīmāya nānāgāmakhettānaṃ nānāsīmasabhāvattā tesaṃ anāgamanepi vaggakammaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin02t:1327_9: Baddhāya pana sīmāya ekasīmabhāvato puna aññasmiṃ kamme kariyamāne anto sīmagatehi āgantabbamevāti āha “avippavāsasīmā…pe…
tika-vin02t:1327_11: Nimittakittanakāle asodhitāyapi sīmāya nevatthi doso nimittakittanassa apalokanādīsu aññatarābhāvato.
tika-vin02t:1328_1: Sukhakaraṇatthanti sabbesaṃ sannipātanaparissamaṃ pahāya appatarehi sukhakaraṇatthaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1328_2: Ekavīsati bhikkhū gaṇhātīti vīsativaggakaraṇīyaparamattā saṅghakammassa kammārahena saddhiṃ ekavīsati bhikkhū gaṇhāti.
tika-vin02t:1328_4: Heṭṭhimantato hi yattha ekavīsati bhikkhū nisīdituṃ sakkonti,
tika-vin02t:1328_6: Na sakkhissantīti avippavāsasīmāya baddhabhāvaṃ asallakkhetvā “samānasaṃvāsakameva samūhanissāmā”ti vāyamantā na sakkhissanti.
tika-vin02t:1328_7: Baddhāya hi avippavāsasīmāya taṃ asamūhanitvā “samānasaṃvāsakasīmaṃ samūhanissāmā”ti katāyapi kammavācāya asamūhatāva hoti sīmā.
