tika-vin02t:1328_8: Paṭhamañhi avippavāsaṃ samūhanitvā pacchā sīmā samūhanitabbā.
tika-vin02t:1328_9: Ekaratanappamāṇā suviññeyyatarā hotīti katvā vuttaṃ “ekaratanappamāṇā vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin02t:1329_2: āciṇṇakaraṇeneva ca sammoho na hotīti āha “khaṇḍasīmatova paṭṭhāya bandhitabbā”ti.
tika-vin02t:1329_6: Nimittaṃ na kātabbanti taṃ rājiṃ vā udukkhalaṃ vā nimittaṃ na kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1330_0: Heṭṭhā na otaratīti bhittito oraṃ nimittāni ṭhapetvā kittitattā heṭṭhā ākāsappadesaṃ na otarati.
tika-vin02t:1330_1: Heṭṭhāpi otaratīti sace heṭṭhā antobhittiyaṃ ekavīsatiyā bhikkhūnaṃ okāso hoti, otarati.
tika-vin02t:1330_4: Otaraṇānotaraṇaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbanti sace heṭṭhā ekavīsatiyā bhikkhūnaṃ okāso hoti, otarati. No ce,
tika-vin02t:1330_6: Sabbo pāsādo sīmaṭṭho hotīti uparimatalena saddhiṃ ekābaddhabhittiko vā hotu mā vā,
tika-vin02t:1331_1: So ca heṭṭhā mahanto hutvā anupubbena tanuko hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1331_2: Paṇavasaṇṭhāno majjhe tanuko hoti mūle agge ca vitthato.
tika-vin02t:1331_3: Heṭṭhā vā majjhe vāti mudiṅgasaṇṭhānassa heṭṭhā paṇavasaṇṭhānassa majjhe.
tika-vin02t:1331_5: Antoleṇaṃ hotīti pabbatassa anto leṇaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:1331_7: Mahāsīmaṃ sodhetvā vā kammaṃ kātabbanti mahāsīmagatā bhikkhū hatthapāsaṃ vā ānetabbā,
tika-vin02t:1331_9: Gaṇṭhipadesu pana “mahāsīmagatehi bhikkhūhi taṃ sākhaṃ vā pārohaṃ vā anāmasitvā ṭhātabbanti adhippāyo”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1331_12: Ukkhipāpetvā kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti khaṇḍasīmāya anto ṭhitattā rukkhassa tattha ṭhito hatthapāsaṃyeva ānetabboti ukkhipāpetvā kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:1332_4: Idhādhippetanāvāya pamāṇaṃ dassento āha “yā sabbantimena paricchedena…pe…
tika-vin02t:1332_6: Iminā ca vuttappamāṇato khuddakā nāvā vijjamānāpi idha asantapakkhaṃ bhajatīti dīpeti.
tika-vin02t:1332_10: Sabbanimittānaṃ anto ṭhite bhikkhū hatthapāsagate katvāti ettha sace ekaṃ gāmakhettaṃ hoti,
tika-vin02t:1332_11: ubhosu tīresu sabbanimittānaṃ anto ṭhite bhikkhū hatthapāsagate katvā sammannitabbā.
tika-vin02t:1332_15: Yasmā ubhosu tīresu nimittakittanamattena dīpako saṅgahito nāma na hoti,
tika-vin02t:1332_16: tasmā dīpakepi nimittāni visuṃ kittetabbānevāti āha “dīpakassa orimante ca pārimante ca nimittaṃ kittetabba”nti.
tika-vin02t:1335_1: Vatthuvasena vuttanti “mayañcamhā asammatāya bhūmiyā nisinnā pātimokkhaṃ assumhā”ti vatthumhi pātimokkhasavanassa āgatattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1335_3: Pāḷiyaṃ “paṭhamaṃ nimittā kittetabbā”ti ettakameva vatvā sīmāsammutiyaṃ viya “pabbatanimittaṃ pāsāṇanimitta”ntiādinā
tika-vin02t:1337_2: Dvepi sīmāyoti paṭhamaṃ vuttā avippavāsasīmā samānasaṃvāsakasīmā ca.
tika-vin02t:1337_3: Na kammavācaṃ vaggaṃ karontīti kammavācaṃ na bhindanti,
tika-vin02t:1337_6: Gāmañca gāmūpacārañca na ottharatīti “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā”ti vuttattā.
tika-vin02t:1337_8: Ekampi kulaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ vāti abhinavakatagehesu sabbapaṭhamaṃ ekampi kulaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ atthi.
tika-vin02t:1337_9: Agataṃ vāti porāṇakagāme aññesu gehāni chaḍḍetvā gatesu ekampi kulaṃ agataṃ atthi.
tika-vin02t:1338_0: Avippavāsasīmā na samūhantabbāti mahāsīmaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin02t:1338_1: Nirāsaṅkaṭṭhānesu ṭhatvāti cetiyaṅgaṇādīnaṃ khaṇḍasīmāya anokāsattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1338_2: Khaṇḍasīmañhi bandhantā tādisaṃ ṭhānaṃ pahāya aññasmiṃ vivitte okāse bandhanti.
tika-vin02t:1338_3: Appeva nāma samūhanituṃ sakkhissantīti avippavāsasīmaṃyeva samūhanituṃ sakkhissanti,
tika-vin02t:1338_5: Paṭibandhituṃ pana na sakkhissantevāti khaṇḍasīmāya aññātattā na sakkhissanti.
tika-vin02t:1338_6: Na samūhanitabbāti khaṇḍasīmaṃ ajānantehi na samūhanitabbā.
tika-vin02t:1338_7: Uposathassa visuṃ gahitattā avasesakammavasena samānasaṃvāsatā veditabbā.
tika-vin02t:1340_2: Yena kenaci khaṇitvā akatoti antamaso tiracchānenapi khaṇitvā akato.
tika-vin02t:1340_3: Tassa antohatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā ṭhito kammaṃ kopetīti iminā bahiparicchedato yattha katthaci ṭhito kammaṃ na kopetīti dīpeti.
tika-vin02t:1340_4: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “paricchedabbhantare hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā ṭhitopi paricchedato bahi
tika-vin02t:1340_5: aññaṃ tattakaṃyeva paricchedaṃ anatikkamitvā ṭhitopi kammaṃ kopeti,
tika-vin02t:1340_7: tattha “aññaṃ tattakaṃyeva paricchedaṃ anatikkamitvā ṭhitopi kammaṃ kopetī”ti idaṃ neva pāḷiyaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1340_9: Yadi cetaṃ dvinnaṃ saṅghānaṃ visuṃ uposathādikammakaraṇādhikāre vuttattā udakukkhepato bahi aññaṃ udakukkhepaṃ
tika-vin02t:1340_10: anatikkamitvā uposathādikaraṇatthaṃ ṭhito saṅgho sīmāsambhedasambhavato kammaṃ kopetīti iminā adhippāyena
tika-vin02t:1340_13: Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāya līnatthappakāsaniyaṃ vuttaṃ “aññaṃ tattakaṃyeva paricchedanti dutiyaṃ udakukkhepaṃ anatikkantopi kopeti. Kasmā?
tika-vin02t:1340_14: Attano udakukkhepasīmāya paresaṃ udakukkhepasīmāya ajjhotthaṭattā sīmāsambhedo hoti,
tika-vin02t:1340_16: “Idaṃ sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu sanniṭṭhāna”nti ca iminā adhippāyena vuttanti gahetabbaṃ sabbāsupi aṭṭhakathāsu sīmāsambhedassa anicchitattā.
tika-vin02t:1340_17: Teneva hi “attano ca aññesañca udakukkhepaparicchedassa antarā añño udakukkhepo sīmantarikatthāya ṭhapetabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1341_0: Sabbattha saṅgho nisīdatīti hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā nisīdati.
tika-vin02t:1341_1: Udakukkhepasīmākammaṃ natthīti yasmā sabbopi nadīpadeso bhikkhūhi ajjhotthaṭo,
tika-vin02t:1341_2: tasmā samantato nadiyā abhāvā udakukkhepe payojanaṃ natthi.
tika-vin02t:1341_4: sīmāsambhedasaṅkā na ca siyāti sāmīcidassanatthaṃ “añño udakukkhepo sīmantarikatthāya ṭhapetabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1341_9: Ūnakaṃ pana na vaṭṭatīti idampi udakukkhepasīmāya parisavasena vaḍḍhanato sīmāsambhedasaṅkā siyāti taṃnivāraṇatthameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1342_0: Gacchantiyā pana nāvāya kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti ettha udakukkhepamanatikkamitvā parivattamānāya kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1342_1: Sīmaṃ vā sodhetvāti ettha sīmasodhanaṃ nāma gāmasīmādīsu ṭhitānaṃ hatthapāsānayanādi.
tika-vin02t:1342_2: “Nadiṃ vināsetvā taḷākaṃ karontī”ti vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāveti “heṭṭhā pāḷi baddhā”ti,
tika-vin02t:1342_5: Deve avassanteti dubbuṭṭhikāle vassānepi deve avassante.
tika-vin02t:1342_7: Gāmanigamasīmaṃ ottharitvā pavattatīti vuttappakāre vassakāle cattāro māse abbocchinnā pavattati.
tika-vin02t:1343_0: Agamanapatheti yattha tadaheva gantvā paccāgantuṃ na sakkā hoti,
tika-vin02t:1343_1: tādise padese araññasīmāsaṅkhameva gacchatīti sattabbhantarasīmaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin02t:1343_3: Gamanapariyantassa oratoti gamanapariyantassa orimabhāge dīpakaṃ pabbatañca sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1344_2: Baddhā hotīti pacchimadisābhāge sīmaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1344_3: Tassā padesanti yattha ṭhatvā bhikkhūhi kammaṃ kātuṃ sakkā hoti,
tika-vin02t:1344_5: Yattha pana ṭhitehi kammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkā hoti,
tika-vin02t:1344_6: tādisaṃ padesaṃ antokaritvā bandhantā sīmāya sīmaṃ sambhindanti nāma.
tika-vin02t:1344_7: Dvinnaṃ sīmānaṃ nimittaṃ hotīti nimittassa sīmato bāhirattā sīmāsambhedo na hotīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1344_8: Sīmāsaṅkaraṃ karotīti vaḍḍhitvā sīmappadesaṃ paviṭṭhe dvinnaṃ sīmānaṃ gataṭṭhānassa duviññeyyattā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1344_9: na pana tattha kammaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti dassanatthaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1344_10: Na hi sīmā tattakena asīmā hoti,
tika-vin02t:1344_11: dve pana sīmā pacchā vaḍḍhitena rukkhena ajjhotthaṭattā ekābaddhā honti,
tika-vin02t:1344_12: tasmā ekattha ṭhatvā kammaṃ karontehi itaraṃ sodhetvā kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1347_1: Adhammena vaggaṃ uposathakammanti ettha yattha cattāro vasanti,
tika-vin02t:1347_3: Yattha dve vā tayo vā vasanti,
tika-vin02t:1347_5: Idha pana tathā akatvā catunnaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne pārisuddhiuposathassa katattā tiṇṇaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne ca pātimokkhassa uddiṭṭhattā “adhammenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1349_1: Evametaṃ dhārayāmīti “sutā kho panāyasmantehī”ti ettha “evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti vatvā “uddiṭṭhaṃ kho āyasmanto nidānaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1349_2: sutā kho panāyasmantehi cattāro pārājikā dhammā”ti vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1349_6: evametaṃ dhārayāmīti vatvā ‘uddiṭṭhaṃ kho āyasmanto nidāna’ntiādinā nayena avasese sutena sāvite uddiṭṭho hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1349_10: “Avasesaṃ sutena sāvetabba”nti vacanato nidānuddese aniṭṭhite sutena sāvetabbaṃ nāma natthīti āha “dutiyādīsu uddesesū”ti.
tika-vin02t:1349_12: tasmā nidāne uddiṭṭhe pārājikuddesādīsu yasmiṃ vippakate antarāyo uppajjati,
tika-vin02t:1350_1: Ettha ca atthaṃ bhaṇitukāmatāya suttassa osāraṇā osāraṇaṃ nāma.
tika-vin02t:1350_3: Suttassa tadatthassa vā sarena bhaṇanaṃ sarabhaññaṃ nāma.
tika-vin02t:1350_5: Osāretvā pana kathentenāti paṭhamaṃ ussāretvā pacchā atthaṃ kathentena.
tika-vin02t:1350_6: Manussānaṃ pana “bhaṇāhī”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti ettha uccatare nisinnenapi manussānaṃ bhaṇāhīti visesetvāyeva vattuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin02t:1350_8: Sajjhāyaṃ karontenāti yattha katthaci nisīditvā sajjhāyaṃ karontena.
tika-vin02t:1350_11: Aparo āgacchatīti aparo tatopi vuḍḍhataro āgacchati.
tika-vin02t:1353_2: Saṅghauposathādibhedena navavidhanti saṅghe uposatho gaṇe uposatho puggale uposathoti evaṃ kārakavasena tayo,
tika-vin02t:1353_3: suttuddeso pārisuddhiuposatho adhiṭṭhānuposathoti evaṃ kattabbākāravasena tayo,
tika-vin02t:1353_4: cātuddasiko pannarasiko sāmaggīuposathoti evaṃ divasavasena tayoti navavidhaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1353_8: dhammena samaggaṃ uposathakammanti evaṃ catubbidhampi uposathakammaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1353_9: Duvidhaṃ pātimokkhanti bhikkhupātimokkhaṃ bhikkhunīpātimokkhanti duvidhaṃ pātimokkhaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1353_11: bhikkhunīnaṃ ṭhapetvā aniyatuddesaṃ avasesā cattāroti navavidhaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1359_1: Yena kenaci aṅgapaccaṅgena viññāpetīti manasā cintetvā hatthappayogādinā yena kenaci viññāpeti.
tika-vin02t:1359_2: Saṅgho nappahotīti dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ antarā hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā paṭipāṭiyā ṭhātuṃ nappahoti.
tika-vin02t:1359_3: Itarā pana biḷālasaṅkhalikapārisuddhi nāmāti ettha keci vadanti “biḷālasaṅkhalikā baddhāva hoti antogehe eva sampayojanattā,
tika-vin02t:1359_7: Apare pana “yathā bahūhi manussehi ekassa biḷālassa attano attano saṅkhalikā gīvāya ābaddhā biḷāle gacchante gacchanti ābaddhattā,
tika-vin02t:1359_8: na aññasmiṃ biḷāle gacchante gacchanti anābaddhattā,
tika-vin02t:1359_9: evamevassa bhikkhussa bahūhi saṅkhalikasadisā chandapārisuddhi dinnā,
tika-vin02t:1359_10: sā tasmiṃ bhikkhusmiṃ gacchante gacchati tasmiṃ saṅkhalikā viya ābaddhattā,
tika-vin02t:1359_14: yathā saṅkhalikāya paṭhamavalayaṃ dutiyaṃyeva valayaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin02t:1359_17: tato aññattha na gacchatīti saṅkhalikasadisattā “biḷālasaṅkhalikā”ti vuttā.
tika-vin02t:1359_18: Biḷālasaṅkhalikagahaṇañcettha yāsaṃ kāsañci saṅkhalikānaṃ upalakkhaṇamattanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1363_2: pubbakaraṇato pacchā kātabbampi uposathakammato paṭhamaṃ kātabbattā pubbakiccanti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1363_3: Ubhayampi cetaṃ uposathakammato paṭhamaṃ kattabbattā katthaci pubbakiccamicceva voharīyati “kiṃ saṅghassa pubbakicca”ntiādīsu viya.
tika-vin02t:1364_1: Tasmiñhi sati idaṃ saṅghassa uposathakammaṃ pattakallaṃ nāma hoti, nāsati.
tika-vin02t:1364_5: Yāvatikā ca bhikkhū kammappattāti yattakā bhikkhū tassa uposathakammassa pattā yuttā anurūpā sabbantimena paricchedena cattāro bhikkhū pakatattā,
tika-vin02t:1364_6: te ca kho hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā ekasīmāyaṃ ṭhitā.
tika-vin02t:1364_7: Sabhāgāpattiyo ca na vijjantīti ettha yaṃ sabbo saṅgho vikālabhojanādinā sabhāgavatthunā lahukāpattiṃ āpajjati,
tika-vin02t:1364_9: Etāsu hi avijjamānāsu visabhāgāsu vijjamānāsupi pattakallaṃ hotiyeva.
tika-vin02t:1365_0: Vajjanīyā ca puggalā tasmiṃ na hontīti “na,
tika-vin02t:1365_4: bhikkhuniyā nisinnaparisāya pātimokkhaṃ uddisitabba”ntiādinā nayena vuttā bhikkhunī sikkhamānā sāmaṇero
tika-vin02t:1365_5: sāmaṇerī sikkhāpaccakkhātako antimavatthuajjhāpannako āpattiyā adassane ukkhittako āpattiyā appaṭikamme
tika-vin02t:1365_6: ukkhittako pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhittako paṇḍako theyyasaṃvāsako titthiyapakkantako tiracchānagato
tika-vin02t:1365_7: mātughātako pitughātako arahantaghātako bhikkhunīdūsako saṅghabhedako lohituppādako ubhatobyañjanakoti
tika-vin02t:1365_8: ime vīsati cāti ekavīsati puggalā vajjanīyā nāma,
tika-vin02t:1365_10: Etesu hi tividhe ukkhittake sati uposathaṃ karonto saṅgho pācittiyaṃ āpajjati,
tika-vin02t:1365_12: Ettha ca tiracchānagatoti yassa upasampadā paṭikkhittā,
tika-vin02t:1365_16: Evaṃ pattakallaṃ imehi catūhi aṅgehi saṅgahitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1366_1: saddena pāḷiyaṃ āgatanayeneva “ajja me uposatho”tipi vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpeti.
tika-vin02t:1366_2: Mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “ajja me uposatho cātuddasoti vā pannarasoti vā vatvā adhiṭṭhāmīti vattabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1369_5: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti evaṃ sāpattikassa uposathakaraṇe visuṃ paññattā āpatti na dissati,
tika-vin02t:1369_6: tasmā bhagavatā paññattaṃ “na sāpattikena uposatho kātabbo”ti idaṃ kasmā vuttanti āha “yassa siyā āpatti…pe…
tika-vin02t:1369_8: Kiñcāpi visuṃ paññattā āpatti na dissati,
tika-vin02t:1369_10: so āvikareyyā”tiādiṃ vadantena atthato paññattāyevāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:1370_0: Pārisuddhidānapaññāpanena cāti imināva “sāpattikena pārisuddhipi na dātabbā”ti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:1370_4: Tasmā pārisuddhiṃ dentena paṭhamaṃ santī āpatti desetabbā “ahaṃ, āvuso,
tika-vin02t:1370_7: tadā taṃ āpattiṃ paṭikarissāmī”ti vatvā uposatho kātabbo.
tika-vin02t:1370_8: “Pātimokkhaṃ sotabba”nti vacanato yāva nibbematiko na hoti,
tika-vin02t:1370_11: “Puna nibbematiko hutvā desetabbaṃ na cā”ti neva pāḷiyaṃ na aṭṭhakathāyaṃ atthi,
tika-vin02t:1370_13: “Ito vuṭṭhahitvā paṭikarissāmīti etthāpi eseva nayo”ti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1370_14: Yathā sabbo saṅgho sabhāgāpattiṃ āpajjitvā “suṇātu me bhante,
tika-vin02t:1370_16: paṭikarissatī”ti ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ labhati,
tika-vin02t:1370_19: Yadā aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ suddhaṃ anāpattikaṃ passissanti,
tika-vin02t:1370_20: tadā tassa santike taṃ āpattiṃ paṭikarissantī”ti gaṇañattiṃ ṭhapetvā,
tika-vin02t:1370_21: dvīhi aññamaññaṃ ārocetvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:1370_22: Ekenapi “parisuddhaṃ labhitvā paṭikarissāmī”ti ābhogaṃ katvā kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti ca vadanti.
tika-vin02t:1374_2: Tassa abhibhavo nāma tesaṃ laddhivissajjāpananti āha “taṃ diṭṭhiṃ na nissajjāpentīti attho”ti.
tika-vin02t:1376_1: Uposathādhiṭṭhānatthaṃ sīmāpi nadīpi na gantabbāti garukaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ vissajjetvā lahukassa akattabbattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1376_3: yattha vā saṅghapahonakā bhikkhū na santi,
tika-vin02t:1376_5: Tattha uposathaṃ katvāva gantabbanti tassa vasanaṭṭhāne saṅghuposathassa appavattanato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1378_1: Hatthapāsupagamanameva pamāṇanti bhikkhunīādayo ṭhitā vā hontu nisinnā vā,
tika-vin02t:1378_3: tasmā ekasīmāyampi hatthapāsaṃ jahāpetvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:1382_2: saddo nipātamattoti okāsaparidīpanassapi asambhavato atthantarassa abodhanato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1382_3: Aparajjugatāya assāti iminā asamānādhikaraṇavisayo bāhiratthasamāsoyanti dasseti.
tika-vin02t:1384_1: Anapekkhagamanena vā aññattha aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpanena vā āpatti veditabbāti ettha anapekkhagamanena upacārātikkame āpatti veditabbā,
tika-vin02t:1386_1: Tīṇi parihīnānīti bhikkhunīnaṃ vaccakuṭiādīnaṃ paṭikkhittattā pahīnāni.
tika-vin02t:1386_4: Na palujjatīti na vinassati na antaradhāyati.
tika-vin02t:1388_2: So pana yasmā bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ vasati,
tika-vin02t:1388_5: Animantitena gantuṃ na vaṭṭatīti ettha animantitattā sattāhakiccaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā gacchantassapi vassacchedo ceva dukkaṭañca hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1388_6: Yathāvuttañhi ratticchedakāraṇaṃ vinā tirovihāre vasitvā āgacchissāmīti gacchatopi vassacchedaṃ vadanti.
tika-vin02t:1388_8: Evaṃ gacchantena ca antoupacārasīmāyaṃ ṭhiteneva “antosattāhe āgacchissāmī”ti ābhogaṃ katvā gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1388_14: vaṭṭatīti ettha “ajjeva āgamissāmī”ti sāmantavihāraṃ gantvā puna āgacchantassa antarāmagge sace aruṇuggamanaṃ hoti,
tika-vin02t:1388_17: “Ācariyaṃ passissāmī”ti pana gantuṃ labhatīti “agilānampi ācariyaṃ upajjhāyaṃ vā passissāmī”ti sattāhakaraṇīyena gantuṃ labhati.
tika-vin02t:1388_18: Sace pana naṃ ācariyo “ajja mā gacchā”ti vadati,
tika-vin02t:1388_19: vaṭṭatīti evaṃ sattāhakaraṇīyena gataṃ antosattāheyeva puna āgacchantaṃ sace ācariyo upajjhāyo vā “ajja mā gacchā”ti vadati, vaṭṭati,
tika-vin02t:1388_21: vassacchedo pana hotiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ sattāhassa bahiddhā vītināmitattā.
tika-vin02t:1390_2: sattāhavārena aruṇo uṭṭhāpetabboti iminā vassacchedakāraṇe sati sattāhakaraṇīyena gantuṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpeti.
tika-vin02t:1392_1: “Idha vassaṃ upemī”ti tikkhattuṃ vattabbanti satthassāvihārattā “imasmiṃ vihāre”ti avatvā “idha vassaṃ upemī”ti ettakameva vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1392_2: Satthe pana vassaṃ upagantuṃ na vaṭṭatīti kuṭikādīnaṃ abhāve “idha vassaṃ upemī”ti vacībhedaṃ katvā upagantuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin02t:1392_5: Tīsu ṭhānesu natthi vassacchede āpattīti tehi saddhiṃ gacchantasseva natthi āpatti,
tika-vin02t:1394_1: Seyyathāpi pisācillikāti ettha pisācā eva pisācillikā,
tika-vin02t:1394_5: Idañca yebhuyyena vuttanti veditabbaṃ rukkhādīsu padaracchadanāyapi kuṭikāya vassūpagamanassa vuttattā. Na,
tika-vin02t:1394_7: asenāsanikena vassaṃ upagantabbanti vacībhedaṃ katvā vassūpagamanaṃ sandhāyeva paṭikkhepo,
tika-vin02t:1394_9: Pāḷiyaṃ pana avisesena vuttattā aṭṭhakathāyañca dutiyapārājikasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ “vassaṃ upagacchantena hi
tika-vin02t:1394_10: nālakapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannenapi pañcannaṃ chadanānaṃ aññatarena channeyeva sadvārabandhe senāsane upagantabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1394_16: na tveva asenāsanikena vassaṃ upagantabba”nti daḷhaṃ katvā vuttattā asenāsanikassa nāvādiṃ vinā aññattha ālayo na vaṭṭatīti amhākaṃ khanti.
tika-vin02t:1394_19: nāvāya vassaṃ upagantu”ntiādinā sati asati vā senāsane vassūpagamanassa visuṃ anuññātattā “na,
tika-vin02t:1394_21: asenāsanikena vassaṃ upagantabba”nti ayaṃ paṭikkhepo tattha na labbhatīti asati senāsane ālayavasenapi nāvādīsu upagamanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1394_22: Ṭaṅkitamañco nāma dīghe mañcapāde majjhe vijjhitvā aṭaniyo pavesetvā kato mañco.
tika-vin02t:1394_23: Tassa idaṃ upari idaṃ heṭṭhāti natthi,
tika-vin02t:1394_26: catunnaṃ pāsāṇānaṃ upari pāsāṇaṃ attharitvā kataṃ gehampi “ṭaṅkitamañco”ti vuccati.
tika-vin02t:1397_1: Tassā lakkhaṇaṃ mahāvibhaṅge vuttanti catutthapārājikasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ “yo imamhā āvāsā paṭhamaṃ pakkamissati,
tika-vin02t:1397_2: taṃ mayaṃ arahāti jānissāmā”ti ettha dassitaṃ adhammikakatikavattalakkhaṇaṃ sandhāya vadati,
tika-vin02t:1397_3: paratopi senāsanakkhandhakavaṇṇanāyaṃ adhammikaṃ katikavattaṃ āvi bhavissatiyeva.
tika-vin02t:1399_1: Yasmā nānāsīmāyaṃ dvīsu āvāsesu vassaṃ vasantassa dutiye “vasāmī”ti citte uppanne paṭhamasenāsanaggāho paṭippassambhati,
tika-vin02t:1399_2: puna paṭhameyeva “vasāmī”ti citte uppanne dutiyo paṭippassambhati,
tika-vin02t:1399_5: bhikkhuno purimikā ca na paññāyatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1399_6: Paṭissavassa visaṃvādanapaccayā hontampi dukkaṭaṃ satiyeva paṭissave hotīti āha “tassa tassa paṭissave dukkaṭa”nti.
tika-vin02t:1400_2: Yadi evaṃ “sattāhakaraṇīyena akaraṇīyo sakaraṇīyo”ti ca kasmā na vuttanti?
tika-vin02t:1400_3: “Akaraṇīyo”ti vuttepi sattāhakaraṇīyena sakaraṇīyākaraṇīyatā viññāyatīti katvā na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1400_4: Yadi evaṃ parato “sattāhakaraṇīyena pakkamatī”ti vāradvayepi “sakaraṇīyo pakkamatī”ti ettakameva kasmā na vuttanti? Vuccate –
tika-vin02t:1400_5: tattha “sattāhakaraṇīyenā”ti avatvā “sakaraṇīyo pakkamatī”ti vutte so taṃ sattāhaṃ bahiddhā vītināmetīti
tika-vin02t:1400_7: Evañhi vutte sattāhassa adhikatattā so taṃ sattāhaṃ bahi vītināmetīti sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-vin02t:1401_0: Ettha ca ādimhi cattāro vārā nirapekkhagamanaṃ sandhāya vuttā,
tika-vin02t:1401_1: tatthāpi purimā dve vārā vassaṃ anupagatassa vasena vuttā,
tika-vin02t:1401_2: pacchimā pana dve vārā vassaṃ upagatassa vasena,
tika-vin02t:1401_3: tato paraṃ dve vārā sāpekkhagamanaṃ sandhāya vuttā,
tika-vin02t:1401_4: tatthāpi paṭhamavāro sāpekkhassapi sattāhakaraṇīyena gantvā taṃ sattāhaṃ bahiddhā vītināmentassa vassacchedadassanatthaṃ vutto,
tika-vin02t:1401_5: itaro vuttanayeneva gantvā antosattāhe nivattantassa vassacchedābhāvadassanatthaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1401_6: “So sattāhaṃ anāgatāya pavāraṇāya sakaraṇīyo pakkamatī”ti ayaṃ pana vāro navamito paṭṭhāya gantvā sattāhaṃ
tika-vin02t:1401_8: Ettha ca “akaraṇīyo pakkamatī”ti dutiyavārassa anāgatattā navamito paṭṭhāya gacchantenapi satiyeva karaṇīye gantabbaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1401_10: Ime ca satta vārā bahiddhā katauposathikassa vasena āgatā,
tika-vin02t:1401_11: apare satta antovihāraṃ gantvā katauposathassa vasenāti evaṃ purimikāya vasena cuddasa vārā vuttā,
tika-vin02t:1401_12: tato paraṃ pacchimikāya vasena teyeva cuddasa vārā vuttāti evametesaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1402_0: Imehi pana sabbavārehi vuttamatthaṃ sampiṇḍetvā dassetuṃ “so tadaheva akaraṇīyotiādīsū”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1402_1: Ko pana vādo dvīhatīhaṃ vasitvā antosattāhe nivattantassāti vassaṃ upagantvā dvīhatīhaṃ vasitvā sattāhakaraṇīyena
tika-vin02t:1402_2: gantvā antosattāhe nivattantassa ko pana vādo,
tika-vin02t:1402_4: Asatiyā pana vassaṃ na upetīti “imasmiṃ vihāre imaṃ temāsaṃ vassaṃ upemī”ti vacībhedaṃ katvā na upeti.
tika-vin02t:1408_3: Piṇḍāya paṭikkameyyāti gāme piṇḍāya caritvā paccāgaccheyya.
tika-vin02t:1408_4: Avakkārapātiṃ dhovitvā upaṭṭhāpeyyāti atirekapiṇḍapātaṃ apanetvā ṭhapanatthāya ekaṃ samuggapātiṃ dhovitvā ṭhapeyya.
tika-vin02t:1408_7: yasmiṃ ṭhāne piṇḍapātajjhottharaṇena vinassanadhammāni tiṇāni natthi,
tika-vin02t:1408_9: Tena nittiṇañca mahātiṇagahanañca yattha sakaṭenapi chaḍḍite piṇḍapāte tiṇāni na vinassanti,
tika-vin02t:1408_14: Parittodake eva hi bhattapakkhepena āluḷite sukhumapāṇakā maranti,
tika-vin02t:1409_7: Atha vā vilaṅgheti desantaraṃ pāpeti etenāti vilaṅghako,
tika-vin02t:1409_11: Dve hi janā hatthena hatthaṃ saṃsibbetvā dvīsu hatthesu ṭhapetvā uṭṭhapentā hatthavilaṅghakena uṭṭhapenti nāma.
tika-vin02t:1412_2: pavāraṇā cātuddasikā ca pannarasikā cāti ettha purimavassaṃvutthānaṃ pubbakattikapuṇṇamā,
tika-vin02t:1412_3: tesaṃyeva sace bhaṇḍanakārakehi upaddutā pavāraṇaṃ paccukkaḍḍhanti,
tika-vin02t:1412_4: atha kattikamāsassa kāḷapakkhacātuddaso vā pacchimakattikapuṇṇamā vā,
tika-vin02t:1412_5: pacchimavassaṃvutthānañca pacchimakattikapuṇṇamā eva vāti ime tayo pavāraṇadivasāti veditabbā.
tika-vin02t:1412_7: tathārūpapaccaye pana sati dvinnaṃ kattikapuṇṇamānaṃ purimesu cātuddasesupi pavāraṇaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin02t:1412_8: teneva mahāvihāre bhikkhū cātuddasiyā pavāretvā pannarasiyā kāyasāmaggiṃ denti,
tika-vin02t:1414_1: Sace pana vuḍḍhataro hotīti sace pavāraṇadāyako bhikkhu vuḍḍhataro hoti.
tika-vin02t:1416_2: Avuṭṭhitāya parisāyāti pavāretvā pacchā aññamaññaṃ kathentiyā.
tika-vin02t:1416_3: Ekaccāya vuṭṭhitāyāti ekaccesu yathānisinnesu ekaccesu sakasakaṭṭhānaṃ gatesu.
tika-vin02t:1416_4: Puna pavāritabbanti punapi sabbehi samāgantvā pavāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1416_6: tesaṃ santike pavāretabbanti gate anānetvā nisinnānaññeva santike pavāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1416_8: tesaṃ santike pavāretabbanti yadi sabbe vuṭṭhahitvā gatā sannipātetuñca na sakkā,
tika-vin02t:1416_10: ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā kattabbasaṅghakammābhāvā vaggaṃ na hoti.
tika-vin02t:1418_3: na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”tiādinā sassatucchedasaṅkhātaṃ antaṃ gaṇhātīti antaggāhikā.
tika-vin02t:1420_1: Catutthe kate suṇantīti catutthe pannarasikuposathe kate amhākaṃ pavāraṇaṃ ṭhapessantīti suṇanti.
tika-vin02t:1420_2: Evampi dve cātuddasikā hontīti tatiyena saddhiṃ dve cātuddasikā honti.
tika-vin02t:1422_1: Ayaṃ pavāraṇāsaṅgaho ekassa dinnopi sabbesaṃ dinnova hotīti āha “ekassapi vasena dātabbo”ti.
tika-vin02t:1422_2: Āgantukā tesaṃ senāsanaṃ gahetuṃ na labhantīti sacepi saṭṭhivassabhikkhū āgacchanti,
tika-vin02t:1422_4: Pavāretvā pana antarāpi cārikaṃ pakkamituṃ labhantīti pavāraṇāsaṅgahe kate antarā pakkamitukāmā saṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā pavāretuṃ labhanti.
tika-vin02t:1428_1: Suttattho pana suttavaṇṇanātoyeva gahetabboti etthāyaṃ suttavaṇṇanā.
tika-vin02t:1428_3: Tasmiṃ kira paṭipāṭiyā pañca caṅkamanasatāni māpitāni,
tika-vin02t:1428_4: tesu thero attano sappāyaṃ caṅkamanaṃ gahetvā samaṇadhammaṃ karoti.
tika-vin02t:1428_5: Tassa āraddhavīriyassa hutvā caṅkamato pādatalāni bhijjiṃsu,
tika-vin02t:1428_8: Evaṃ āraddhavīriyo viharanto obhāsanimittamattakampi dassetuṃ nāsakkhi.
tika-vin02t:1428_9: Tassa vīriyena kilamitakāyassa caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ pāsāṇaphalake nisinnassa yo vitakko udapādi,
tika-vin02t:1428_12: Na anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccatīti “sace ahaṃ ugghaṭitaññū vā vipañcitaññū vā neyyo vā,
tika-vin02t:1428_15: yena me cittaṃ na muccatī”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā “saṃvijjanti kho panā”tiādīni cintesi.
tika-vin02t:1429_0: Pāturahosīti therassa cittācāraṃ ñatvā “ayaṃ soṇo ajja sītavane padhānabhūmiyaṃ nisinno imaṃ vitakkaṃ vitakketi,
tika-vin02t:1429_1: gantvāssa vitakkaṃ sahoḍḍhaṃ gaṇhitvā vīṇopamakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathessāmī”ti sītavane pāturahosi.
tika-vin02t:1429_2: Paññatte āsaneti padhānikabhikkhū attano vasanaṭṭhāne ovadituṃ āgatassa buddhassa bhagavato nisīdanatthaṃ
tika-vin02t:1429_4: aññaṃ alabhamānā purāṇapaṇṇāni saṅgharitvā upari saṅghāṭiṃ paññapenti.
tika-vin02t:1430_0: Taṃ kiṃ maññasīti satthā “imassa bhikkhuno avasesakammaṭṭhānena attho natthi,
tika-vin02t:1430_2: attano visaye kathiyamāne khippameva sallakkhessatī”ti vīṇopamaṃ kathetuṃ “taṃ kiṃ maññasī”tiādimāha.
tika-vin02t:1430_3: Vīṇāya tantissare kusalatā nāma vīṇāya vādanakusalatā,
tika-vin02t:1430_5: Mātāpitaro hissa “amhākaṃ putto aññaṃ sippaṃ sikkhanto kāyena kilamissati,
tika-vin02t:1430_6: idaṃ pana āsane nisinneneva sakkā uggaṇhitu”nti gandhabbasippameva uggaṇhāpesuṃ. Tassa –
tika-vin02t:1433_5: Same guṇe patiṭṭhitāti majjhime sare ṭhapetvā mucchitā.
tika-vin02t:1434_6: Indriyānañca samataṃ adhiṭṭhāhīti saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ samataṃ samabhāvaṃ adhiṭṭhāhi.
tika-vin02t:1434_10: samādhiñca vīriyena yojayatā indriyānaṃ samatā adhiṭṭhitā nāma hoti.
tika-vin02t:1434_13: Tañca pana nesaṃ yojanāvidhānaṃ visuddhimagge āgatanayena veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1434_14: Tattha ca nimittaṃ gaṇhāhīti tasmiñca samabhāve sati yena ādāse mukhabimbeneva nimittena uppajjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1434_15: taṃ samathanimittaṃ vipassanānimittaṃ magganimittaṃ phalanimittañca gaṇha nibbattehīti evamassa satthā arahatte pakkhipitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathesi.
tika-vin02t:1435_0: Tattha ca nimittaṃ aggahesīti samathanimittañca vipassanānimittañca aggahesi.
tika-vin02t:1435_2: Vūpakaṭṭhoti vatthukāmehi ca kilesakāmehi ca kāyena ceva cittena ca vūpakaṭṭho.
tika-vin02t:1435_6: Pahitattoti kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhatāya pesitatto vissaṭṭhaattabhāvo,
tika-vin02t:1435_10: Arahatanti bhagavato sāvakānaṃ arahantānaṃ abbhantaro eko mahāsāvako ahosīti attho.
tika-vin02t:1436_2: Katakaraṇīyoti catūhi maggehi kattabbaṃ katvā ṭhito.
tika-vin02t:1436_3: Ohitabhāroti khandhabhāraṃ kilesabhāraṃ abhisaṅkhārabhārañca otāretvā ṭhito.
tika-vin02t:1436_7: Sammadaññā vimuttoti sammā hetunā kāraṇena jānitvā vimutto.
tika-vin02t:1436_9: Adhimutto hotīti paṭivijjhitvā paccakkhaṃ katvā ṭhito hoti.
tika-vin02t:1437_0: Kevalaṃ saddhāmattakanti paṭivedharahitaṃ kevalaṃ paṭivedhapaññāya asammissaṃ saddhāmattakaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1437_2: Vītarāgattāti maggapaṭivedhena rāgassa vihatattāyeva nekkhammasaṅkhātaṃ arahattaṃ paṭivijjhitvā sacchikatvā ṭhito hoti,
tika-vin02t:1438_2: Pavivekādhimuttoti “paviveke adhimutto aha”nti evaṃ arahattaṃ byākarotīti attho.
tika-vin02t:1440_1: Nevassa cittaṃ pariyādiyantīti etassa khīṇāsavassa cittaṃ gahetvā ṭhātuṃ na sakkonti.
tika-vin02t:1440_2: Kilesā hi uppajjamānā cittaṃ gaṇhanti nāma.
tika-vin02t:1440_4: Kilesā hi ārammaṇena saddhiṃ cittaṃ missaṃ karonti,
tika-vin02t:1440_8: Vayañcassānupassatīti tassa cesa cittassa uppādampi vayampi passati.
tika-vin02t:1440_10: Neva naṃ saṅkampeyyāti ekabhāgena cāletuṃ na sakkuṇeyya.
tika-vin02t:1440_11: Na sampakampeyyāti thūṇaṃ viya sabbabhāgato kampetuṃ na sakkuṇeyya.
tika-vin02t:1440_12: Na sampavedheyyāti vedhetvā pavedhetvā pātetuṃ na sakkuṇeyya.
tika-vin02t:1441_3: Asammohañca cetasoti cittassa ca asammohaṃ adhimuttassa.
tika-vin02t:1441_4: Disvā āyatanuppādanti āyatanānaṃ uppādañca vayañca disvā.
tika-vin02t:1441_5: Sammā cittaṃ vimuccatīti sammā hetunā nayena imāya vipassanāya paṭipattiyā phalasamāpattivasena cittaṃ vimuccati,
tika-vin02t:1441_7: Atha vā iminā khīṇāsavassa pubbabhāgapaṭipadā kathitā.
tika-vin02t:1441_8: Tassa hi āyatanuppādaṃ disvā imāya vipassanāya adhigatassa ariyamaggassa ānubhāvena sabbakilesehi sammā cittaṃ vimuccati.
tika-vin02t:1446_0: 248. Abhijīvanti etenāti abhijīvanikaṃ. Kintaṃ? Sippaṃ. Tenāha “yena sippenā”tiādi.
tika-vin02t:1448_4: gāvīnaṃ visāṇesu gahetabbantiādīsu “mokkhādhippāyena visāṇādīsu gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1450_8: hatthavaṭṭaka”nti evaṃ paccekavākyaparisamāpanaṃ adhippetanti āha “purisayuttaṃ itthisārathi vā…pe…
tika-vin02t:1452_4: “Caturaṅgulādhikāni kira tassa lomānī”ti vacanato caturaṅgulato heṭṭhā vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:1452_7: Pakatitūlikāti rukkhatūlalatātūlapoṭakītūlasaṅkhātānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ tūlānaṃ aññatarapuṇṇā tūlikā.
tika-vin02t:1452_14: Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ panettha “ṭhapetvā tūlikaṃ sabbāneva gonakādīni ratanaparisibbitāni vaṭṭantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1452_15: Tattha “ṭhapetvā tūlika”nti etena ratanaparisibbanarahitāpi tūlikā na vaṭṭatīti dīpeti.
tika-vin02t:1452_17: tāni bhūmattharaṇavasena yathānurūpaṃ mañcādīsu ca upanetuṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1452_18: Ettha ca vinayapariyāyaṃ patvā garuke ṭhātabbattā idha vuttanayenevettha vinicchayo veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:1452_19: Suttantikadesanāyaṃ pana gahaṭṭhānampi vasena vuttattā tesaṃ saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ “ṭhapetvā tūlikaṃ…pe…
tika-vin02t:1453_9: Ettha ca kiñcāpi dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “alohitakāni dvepi vaṭṭantiyeva,
tika-vin02t:1453_11: dātuṃ asakkonto mañce tiriyaṃ attharitvā upari paccattharaṇaṃ datvā nipajjitumpi labhatī”ti avisesena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1453_12: senāsanakkhandhakavaṇṇanāyaṃ pana “agilānassa sīsupadhānañca pādupadhānañcāti dvayameva vaṭṭati,
tika-vin02t:1453_13: gilānassa bimbohanāni santharitvā upari paccattharaṇaṃ datvā nipajjitumpi vaṭṭatī”ti vuttattā gilānoyeva
tika-vin02t:1453_14: mañce tiriyaṃ attharitvā nipajjituṃ labhatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1458_5: koṭiagghanakassa kaṇṇapiḷandhanassa dhāraṇena “koṭikaṇṇo”ti ca vattabbe “kuṭikaṇṇo”ti evaṃ abhiññāto,
tika-vin02t:1458_7: Ayañhi āyasmato mahākaccānassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā sāsane abhippasanno saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhito
tika-vin02t:1458_8: papatake pabbate chāyūdakasampanne ṭhāne vihāraṃ kāretvā theraṃ tattha vasāpetvā catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhāti.
tika-vin02t:1459_0: So kālena kālaṃ therassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin02t:1459_3: So ekadā satthena saddhiṃ vāṇijjatthāya ujjeniṃ gacchanto antarāmagge aṭaviyaṃ satthe niviṭṭhe rattiyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1459_8: So pabhātāya rattiyā pabujjhitvā uṭṭhāya kañci apassanto satthena gatamaggaṃ gahetvā sīghaṃ sīghaṃ gacchanto ekaṃ vaṭarukkhaṃ upagañchi.
tika-vin02t:1459_9: Tattha addasa ekaṃ mahākāyaṃ virūpadassanaṃ bībhacchaṃ purisaṃ aṭṭhito muttāni attano maṃsāni sayameva khādantaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1459_14: Ahaṃ pubbe bhārukacchanagaravāsī kūṭavāṇijo hutvā paresaṃ santakaṃ vañcetvā khādiṃ,
tika-vin02t:1459_15: samaṇe ca bhikkhāya upagate “tumhākaṃ maṃsaṃ khādathā”ti akkosiṃ,
tika-vin02t:1459_16: tena kammena etarahi imaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavāmīti.
tika-vin02t:1459_17: Taṃ sutvā soṇo ativiya saṃvegaṃ paṭilabhi.
tika-vin02t:1460_0: Tato paraṃ gacchanto mukhato paggharitakāḷalohite dve petadārake passitvā tatheva pucchi,
tika-vin02t:1460_2: Te kira bhārukacchanagare dārakakāle gandhavāṇijjāya jīvikaṃ kappentā attano mātari khīṇāsave nimantetvā
tika-vin02t:1460_3: bhojentiyā gehaṃ gantvā “amhākaṃ santakaṃ kasmā samaṇānaṃ desi,
tika-vin02t:1460_4: tayā dinnaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjanakasamaṇānaṃ mukhato kāḷalohitaṃ paggharatū”ti akkosiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1460_5: Te tena kammena niraye paccitvā tassa vipākāvasesena petayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā tadā imaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavanti.
tika-vin02t:1460_6: Tampi sutvā soṇo ativiya saṃvegajāto ahosi.
tika-vin02t:1461_0: So ujjeniṃ gantvā taṃ karaṇīyaṃ tīretvā kuraragharaṃ paccāgato theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā katapaṭisanthāro tamatthaṃ ārocesi.
tika-vin02t:1461_1: Theropissa pavattinivattīsu ādīnavānisaṃse vibhāvento dhammaṃ desesi.
tika-vin02t:1461_2: So theraṃ vanditvā gehaṃ gato sāyamāsaṃ bhuñjitvā sayanaṃ upagato thokaṃyeva niddāyitvā pabujjhitvā sayanatale
tika-vin02t:1461_4: Tassa taṃ dhammaṃ paccavekkhato te ca petattabhāve anussarato saṃsāradukkhaṃ ativiya bhayānakaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāsi,
tika-vin02t:1461_6: So vibhātāya rattiyā sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā theraṃ upagantvā attano ajjhāsayaṃ ārocetvā pabbajjaṃ yāci.
tika-vin02t:1462_1: yena yena ākārena ayyo mahākaccāno dhammaṃ deseti ācikkhati paññapeti paṭṭhapeti vivarati vibhajati uttāniṃ karoti pakāseti,
tika-vin02t:1462_2: tena tena me upaparikkhato evaṃ hoti “yadetaṃ sikkhattayabrahmacariyaṃ ekampi divasaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1462_3: ekadivasampi kilesamalena amalīnaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparisuddhaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1462_5: idaṃ na sukaraṃ agāraṃ ajjhāvasatā agāramajjhe vasantena ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ…pe…
tika-vin02t:1463_0: Evaṃ attano parivitakkitaṃ soṇo upāsako therassa ārocetvā taṃ paṭipajjitukāmo “icchāmahaṃ bhante”tiādimāha.
tika-vin02t:1463_1: Thero pana “na tāvassa ñāṇaṃ paripākaṃ gata”nti upadhāretvā ñāṇaparipākaṃ āgamayamāno “dukkaraṃ kho”tiādinā pabbajjāchandaṃ nivāresi.
tika-vin02t:1463_5: eko nisīdatī”tiādinā nayena vuttaṃ catūsu iriyāpathesu kāyavivekaṃ dīpeti,
tika-vin02t:1463_7: Ekabhattanti “ekabhattiko hoti rattūparato virato vikālabhojanā”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ vikālabhojanā viratiṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin02t:1463_12: Buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ anuyuñjāti niccasīlauposathasīlaniyamādibhedaṃ pañcaṅgaṃ aṭṭhaṅgaṃ dasaṅgañca sīlaṃ tadanurūpañca samādhipaññābhāvanaṃ anuyuñja.
tika-vin02t:1463_13: Etañhi upāsakena pubbabhāge anuyuñjitabbaṃ buddhasāsanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin02t:1464_1: yathāvuttakāle vā tuyhaṃ anuyuñjantassa yuttaṃ patirūpaṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1464_3: Sabbametaṃ ñāṇassa aparipakkattā tassa kāmānaṃ duppahānatāya sammā paṭipattiyaṃ yogyaṃ kārāpetuṃ vadati,
tika-vin02t:1464_6: Paṭippassambhīti indriyānaṃ aparipakkattā saṃvegassa ca nātitikkhabhāvato vūpasami.
tika-vin02t:1464_8: therena vuttavidhiṃ pana anutiṭṭhanto kālena kālaṃ theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā payirupāsanto dhammaṃ suṇāti.
tika-vin02t:1464_9: Tassa vuttanayeneva dutiyampi pabbajjāya cittaṃ uppajji,
tika-vin02t:1464_12: Tatiyavāre pana ñāṇassa paripakkabhāvaṃ ñatvā “idāni naṃ pabbājetuṃ kālo”ti thero pabbājesi,
tika-vin02t:1464_13: pabbajitañca taṃ tīṇi saṃvaccharāni atikkamitvā gaṇaṃ pariyesitvā upasampādesi.
tika-vin02t:1465_1: Tadā kira bhikkhū yebhuyyena majjhimadeseyeva vasiṃsu,
tika-vin02t:1465_4: ekasmiṃ nigame dveti evaṃ visuṃ visuṃ vasiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1465_8: Therena hi katipaye bhikkhū ānetvā aññesu ānīyamānesu pubbe ānītā kenacideva karaṇīyena pakkamiṃsu,
tika-vin02t:1465_9: kañci kālaṃ āgametvā puna tesu ānīyamānesu itare pakkamiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1465_10: Evaṃ punappunaṃ ānayanena sannipāto cireneva ahosi.
tika-vin02t:1466_1: Ediso ca ediso cāti evarūpo ca evarūpo ca.
tika-vin02t:1466_3: evarūpāya dhammakāyasampattiyā samannāgato”ti sutoyeva me so bhagavā.
tika-vin02t:1466_4: Na ca mayā sammukhā diṭṭhoti ettha pana puthujjanasaddhāya eva āyasmā soṇo bhagavantaṃ daṭṭhukāmo ahosi.
tika-vin02t:1466_5: Aparabhāge pana satthārā saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasitvā paccūsasamayaṃ ajjhiṭṭho soḷasa aṭṭhakavaggiyāni
tika-vin02t:1466_6: satthu sammukhā aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi katvā sabbaṃ cetasā samannāharitvā atthadhammapaṭisaṃvedī hutvā bhaṇanto
tika-vin02t:1466_7: dhammupasañhitapāmojjādimukhena samāhito sarabhaññapariyosāne vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā saṅkhāre sammasanto
tika-vin02t:1466_9: Etadatthameva hissa bhagavatā attanā saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vāso āṇattoti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:1467_0: Keci panāhu “na ca mayā sammukhā diṭṭhoti idaṃ rūpakāyadassanameva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1467_1: Āyasmā hi soṇo pabbajitvā therassa santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā ghaṭento vāyamanto anupasampannova sotāpanno
tika-vin02t:1467_4: kimettha citta’nti uparimaggatthāya vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā antovasseyeva chaḷabhiñño hutvā visuddhipavāraṇāya pavāresi.
tika-vin02t:1467_5: Ariyasaccadassanena bhagavato dhammakāyo diṭṭho nāma hoti.
tika-vin02t:1468_3: attano sarīrappabhāya sampattiyā rūpakāyadassanabyāvaṭassa janassa sabbabhāgato pasādāvahaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1468_5: dhammakāyasampattiyā parikkhakajanassa pasādanīyaṃ pasīditabbayuttaṃ pasādakaṃ vā.
tika-vin02t:1468_8: Uttamadamathasamathaṃ anuppattanti lokuttarapaññāvimutticetovimuttisaṅkhātaṃ uttamaṃ damathaṃ samathañca anuppatvā adhigantvā ṭhitaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1468_9: Dantanti suparisuddhakāyasamācāratāya hatthapādakukkuccābhāvato davādiabhāvato ca kāyena dantaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1468_10: Guttanti suparisuddhavacīsamācāratāya niratthakavācābhāvato ravādiabhāvato ca vācāya guttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1468_11: Yatindriyanti suparisuddhamanosamācāratāya ariyiddhiyogena abyāvaṭaappaṭisaṅkhupekkhābhāvato ca manindriyavasena yatindriyaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1468_13: pahīnānaṃ rāgādikilesānaṃ apunāgamanato apaccāgamanato kassacipi āgussa sabbathāpi akaraṇato,
tika-vin02t:1468_14: punabbhavassa ca agamanatoti imehi kāraṇehi nāgaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1468_15: Ettha ca “pāsādika”nti iminā rūpakāyena bhagavato pamāṇabhūtataṃ dīpeti,
tika-vin02t:1468_18: tena catuppamāṇike lokasannivāse anavasesato sattānaṃ bhagavato pamāṇabhāvo pakāsitoti veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:1469_2: “Yasmā bhagavā āyasmato soṇassa samāpattisamāpajjanena paṭisanthāraṃ karonto sāvakasādhāraṇā sabbā samāpattiyo
tika-vin02t:1469_3: anulomapaṭilomaṃ samāpajjanto bahudeva rattiṃ ajjhokāse nisajjāya vītināmetvā pāde pakkhāletvā vihāraṃ pāvisi,
tika-vin02t:1469_4: tasmā āyasmāpi soṇo bhagavato adhippāyaṃ ñatvā tadanurūpaṃ sabbā tā samāpattiyo samāpajjanto bahudeva
tika-vin02t:1469_5: rattiṃ ajjhokāse nisajjāya vītināmetvā pāde pakkhāletvā vihāraṃ pāvisī”ti keci vadanti.
tika-vin02t:1469_6: Pavisitvā ca bhagavatā anuññāto cīvaraṃ tirokaraṇīyaṃ katvāpi bhagavato pādapasse nisajjāya vītināmesi.
tika-vin02t:1469_8: Paṭibhātu taṃ bhikkhu dhammo bhāsitunti bhikkhu tuyhaṃ dhammo bhāsituṃ upaṭṭhātu ñāṇamukhaṃ āgacchatu,
tika-vin02t:1470_0: Sabbāneva aṭṭhakavaggikānīti aṭṭhakavaggabhūtāni kāmasuttādīni soḷasa suttāni.
tika-vin02t:1470_6: Ekacco uggahaṇakāle sammā uggahetvāpi pacchā sajjhāyādivasena manasikaraṇakāle byañjanāni vā micchā ropeti,
tika-vin02t:1470_9: Iminā pana sammadeva yathuggahitaṃ manasi katāni.
tika-vin02t:1470_12: Atthe hi suṭṭhu upadhārite sakkā pāḷi sammā ussāretuṃ.
tika-vin02t:1470_13: Kalyāṇiyāpi vācāya samannāgatoti sithiladhanitādīnaṃ yathāvidhānaṃ vacanena parimaṇḍalapadabyañjanāya poriyā vācāya samannāgato.
tika-vin02t:1470_19: Atha vā anelagalāyāti anelāya ca agalāya ca,
tika-vin02t:1470_23: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kalyāṇavākkaraṇānaṃ yadidaṃ soṇo kuṭikaṇṇo”ti etadagge ṭhapesi.
tika-vin02t:1470_24: Atthassa viññāpaniyāti yathādhippetaṃ atthaṃ ñāpetuṃ samatthāya.
tika-vin02t:1471_0: Kativassoti so kira majjhimavayassa tatiye koṭṭhāse ṭhito ākappasampanno ca paresaṃ ciratarapabbajito viya khāyati.
tika-vin02t:1471_4: ettakaṃ kālaṃ kasmā pamādaṃ āpannosīti pana anuyuñjituṃ satthā “kativassosī”ti taṃ pucchi.
tika-vin02t:1471_5: Tenevāha “kissa pana tvaṃ bhikkhu evaṃ ciraṃ akāsī”ti.
tika-vin02t:1471_8: kena kāraṇena evaṃ cirakālaṃ pabbajjaṃ anupagantvā agāramajjhe vasīti attho.
tika-vin02t:1471_9: Ciraṃ diṭṭho meti cirena cirakālena mayā diṭṭho.
tika-vin02t:1471_12: Apicāti kāmesu ādīnave kenaci pakārena diṭṭhepi na tāvāhaṃ gharāvāsato nikkhamituṃ asakkhiṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin02t:1472_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti kāmesu yathābhūtaṃ ādīnavadassino cittaṃ cirāyitvāpi gharāvāse na pakkhandati,
tika-vin02t:1472_1: aññadatthu padumapalāse udakabindu viya vinivattatiyevāti etamatthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā.
tika-vin02t:1472_2: Imaṃ udānanti pavattiṃ nivattiñca sammadeva jānanto pavattiyaṃ taṃnimitte ca na kadācipi ramatīti idamatthadīpakaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
tika-vin02t:1473_0: Tattha disvā ādīnavaṃ loketi sabbasmimpi saṅkhāraloke “anicco dukkho vipariṇāmadhammo”tiādīnavaṃ dosaṃ paññācakkhunā passitvā.
tika-vin02t:1473_2: Ñatvā dhammaṃ nirūpadhinti sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggattā nirupadhiṃ nibbānadhammaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñatvā,
tika-vin02t:1473_4: “Disvā ñatvā”ti imesaṃ padānaṃ “ghataṃ pivitvā balaṃ hoti,
tika-vin02t:1473_6: paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontī”tiādīsu viya hetuatthatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-vin02t:1473_7: Ariyo na ramatī pāpeti kilesehi ārakattā ariyo sappuriso aṇumattepi pāpe na ramati. Kasmā?
tika-vin02t:1473_8: Pāpe na ramatī sucīti suvisuddhakāyasamācārāditāya suci suddhapuggalo rājahaṃso viya uccāraṭṭhāne pāpe saṃkiliṭṭhadhamme na ramati nābhinandati.
tika-vin02t:1473_11: pāpo puggalo suciṃ anavajjaṃ vodānadhammaṃ na ramati,
tika-vin02t:1473_12: aññadatthu gāmasūkarādayo viya uccāraṭṭhānaṃ asuciṃ saṃkilesadhammaṃyeva ramatīti paṭipakkhato desanaṃ parivatteti.
tika-vin02t:1475_0: 259. Kāḷasīhoti kāḷamukhavānarajāti. Sesamettha pāḷito aṭṭhakathāto ca suviññeyyamevāti.
tika-vin02t:1482_3: Tena ṭhapetvā gandhacuṇṇaṃ sabbaṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:1483_2: Añjanūpapisananti añjanatthāya upapisitabbaṃ yaṃ kiñci cuṇṇajātaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1484_1: Sāmaṃ gahetvāti ettha sappadaṭṭhassa atthāya aññena bhikkhunā gahitampi sāmaṃ gahitasaṅkhameva gacchatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1485_1: Gharadinnakābādho nāma vasīkaraṇatthāya gharaṇiyā dinnabhesajjasamuṭṭhito ābādho.
tika-vin02t:1485_3: saddo cettha abhedena gharaṇiyā vattamāno adhippeto.
tika-vin02t:1485_5: Kaṭākaṭenāti mugge pacitvā acāletvāva parissāvitena muggasūpenā”ti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1489_2: “bahumhi gahite aññesaṃ nappahotī”ti maññamānā appamattakaṃ gahetvā pavārentīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:1489_3: Paṭisaṅkhāpi paṭikkhipantīti “divā bhojanatthāya bhavissatī”ti sallakkhetvāpi paṭikkhipanti.
tika-vin02t:1491_0: 280. Ubhatopasannāti ubhayato pasannā. Māghātoti “mā ghātetha pāṇino”ti evaṃ māghātaghositadivaso.
tika-vin02t:1494_2: Paramparabhojanañhi pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarena nimantitassa taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññataraṃ bhuñjantassa hoti,
tika-vin02t:1494_4: pañcasu bhojanesu aññataranti āha “bhojjayāguyā hi pavāraṇā hotī”ti.
tika-vin02t:1494_5: Yasmā pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññataraṃ paṭikkhipantassa vuttā pavāraṇā bhojjayāguṃ paṭikkhipantassapi hotiyeva,
tika-vin02t:1497_2: Tassa kira gāmassa māpanadivase gāmaṅgaṇaṭṭhāne dve tayo pāṭalaṅkurā pathavito ubbhijjitvā nikkhamiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1497_6: Upāsakāti te kira bhagavato paṭhamadassanena keci saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhitā.
tika-vin02t:1497_8: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti pāṭaligāme kira ajātasattuno licchavirājūnañca manussā kālena kālaṃ gantvā
tika-vin02t:1497_9: gehasāmike gehato nīharitvā māsampi aḍḍhamāsampi vasanti.
tika-vin02t:1497_10: Tena pāṭaligāmavāsino manussā niccupaddutā “etesañceva āgatakāle vasanaṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatīti ekapasse issarānaṃ bhaṇḍapaṭisāmanaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1497_14: ekapasse gilānānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”ti sabbesaṃ aññamaññaṃ aghaṭṭetvā vasanappahonakaṃ nagaramajjhe mahatiṃ sālaṃ kāresuṃ,
tika-vin02t:1498_1: Te tattha gantvā iṭṭhakakammasudhākammacittakammādivasena supariniṭṭhitaṃ susajjitaṃ devavimānasadisaṃ
tika-vin02t:1498_2: dvārakoṭṭhakato paṭṭhāya oloketvā “idaṃ āvasathāgāraṃ ativiya manoramaṃ sassirikaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1498_3: kena nu kho paṭhamaṃ paribhuttaṃ amhākaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya assā”ti cintesuṃ,
tika-vin02t:1498_4: tasmiṃyeva ca khaṇe “bhagavā taṃ gāmaṃ anuppatto”ti assosuṃ,
tika-vin02t:1498_5: tena te uppannapītisomanassā “amhehi bhagavā gantvāpi ānetabbo siyā,
tika-vin02t:1498_7: ajja mayaṃ bhagavantaṃ idha vasāpetvā paṭhamaṃ paribhuñjāpessāma,
tika-vin02t:1498_9: bhikkhusaṅghe āgate tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ āgatameva bhavissati,
tika-vin02t:1498_12: iti tīhi ratanehi paribhutte pacchā amhākaṃ paresañca paribhogo bhavissati,
tika-vin02t:1498_13: evaṃ no dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissatī”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā etadatthameva bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1498_16: Tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti kiñcāpi taṃ divasameva pariniṭṭhitattā devavimānaṃ viya susajjitaṃ supaṭijaggitaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1498_20: tasmā bhagavato ruciṃ jānitvāva paññapessāmāti cintetvā te bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamiṃsu,
tika-vin02t:1498_21: idāni bhagavato ruciṃ jānitvā tathā paññāpetukāmā yenāvasathāgāraṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1498_22: Sabbasanthariṃ āvasathāgāraṃ santharitvāti ettha santharaṇaṃ santhari,
tika-vin02t:1498_30: Sabbapaṭhamaṃ tāva “gomayaṃ nāma sabbamaṅgalesu vaṭṭatī”ti sudhāparikammakatampi bhūmiṃ allagomayena
tika-vin02t:1498_31: opuñjāpetvā parisukkhabhāvaṃ ñatvā yathā akkantaṭṭhāne padaṃ paññāyati,
tika-vin02t:1498_32: evaṃ cātujjātiyagandhehi limpetvā upari nānāvaṇṇakaṭasārake santharitvā tesaṃ upari mahāpiṭṭhikakojave
tika-vin02t:1498_33: ādiṃ katvā hatthattharaṇādīhi nānāvaṇṇehi attharaṇehi santharitabbayuttakaṃ sabbokāsaṃ santharāpesuṃ.
tika-vin02t:1499_0: Āsanānīti majjhaṭṭhāne tāva maṅgalatthambhaṃ nissāya mahārahaṃ buddhāsanaṃ paññapetvā tattha yaṃ yaṃ mudukañca manoramañca paccattharaṇaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1499_1: taṃ taṃ attharitvā ubhatolohitakaṃ manuññadassanaṃ upadhānaṃ upadahitvā upari suvaṇṇarajatatārakavicittavitānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1499_2: bandhitvā gandhadāmapupphadāmapattādāmādīhi alaṅkaritvā samantā dvādasahatthe ṭhāne pupphajālaṃ kāretvā
tika-vin02t:1499_3: tiṃsahatthamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭasāṇiyā parikkhipāpetvā pacchimabhittiṃ nissāya bhikkhusaṅghassa pallaṅkapīṭhaapassayapīṭhamuṇḍapīṭhādīni
tika-vin02t:1499_4: paññapāpetvā upari setapaccattharaṇehi paccattharāpetvā sālāya pācīnapassaṃ attano nisajjāyoggaṃ kāresuṃ.
tika-vin02t:1500_1: Evaṃ bhagavā bhikkhusaṅgho ca yathāruciyā hatthapāde dhovissanti,
tika-vin02t:1500_2: mukhaṃ vikkhālessantīti tesu tesu ṭhānesu maṇivaṇṇassa udakassa pūretvā vāsatthāya nānāpupphāni ceva
tika-vin02t:1500_3: udakavāsacuṇṇāni ca pakkhipitvā kadalipaṇṇehi pidahitvā patiṭṭhapesuṃ.
tika-vin02t:1501_0: Telapadīpaṃ āropetvāti rajatasuvaṇṇādimayadaṇḍāsu daṇḍadīpikāsu yonakarūpakādīnaṃ hatthe ṭhapitasuvaṇṇarajatādimayakapallikāsu
tika-vin02t:1501_2: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti ettha pana te pāṭaligāmikaupāsakā na kevalaṃ āvasathāgārameva,
tika-vin02t:1501_3: atha kho sakalasmimpi gāme vīthiyo sajjāpetvā dhaje ussāpetvā gehadvāresu puṇṇaghaṭe ca kadaliādayo ca
tika-vin02t:1501_4: ṭhapāpetvā sakalagāmaṃ dīpamālāhi vippakiṇṇatārakaṃ viya katvā “khīrapake dārake khīraṃ pāyetha,
tika-vin02t:1501_8: buddhā nāma appasaddakāmā hontī”ti bheriṃ carāpetvā sayaṃ daṇḍadīpikā ādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1502_0: Atha kho bhagavā nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena yena āvasathāgāraṃ tenupasaṅkamīti “yassa dāni, bhante,
tika-vin02t:1502_1: bhagavā kālaṃ maññatī”ti evaṃ kira tehi kāle ārocite bhagavā lākhārasena tintarattakoviḷārapupphavaṇṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:1502_2: surattaṃ dupaṭṭaṃ kattariyā padumaṃ kantento viya,
tika-vin02t:1502_3: saṃvidhāya timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādento nivāsetvā suvaṇṇapāmaṅgena padumakalāpaṃ parikkhipanto viya,
tika-vin02t:1502_4: vijjulatāsassirikaṃ kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā rattakambalena gajakumbhaṃ pariyonandhanto viya,
tika-vin02t:1502_9: cittakūṭapabbatamatthakaṃ vijjulatājālena parikkhipanto viya ca sacakkavāḷasineruyugandharamahāpathaviṃ
tika-vin02t:1502_10: cāletvā gahitanigrodhapallavasamānavaṇṇaṃ rattavarapaṃsukūlaṃ pārupitvā vanagahanato kesarasīho viya,
tika-vin02t:1502_12: bālasūriyo viya ca attanā nisinnatarusaṇḍato nikkhami.
tika-vin02t:1503_0: Athassa kāyato meghamukhato vijjukalāpā viya rasmiyo nikkhamitvā suvaṇṇarasadhārāparisekapiñjarapattapupphaphalasākhāviṭape
tika-vin02t:1503_2: Tāvadeva attano attano pattacīvaramādāya mahābhikkhusaṅgho bhagavantaṃ parivāresi.
tika-vin02t:1503_3: Te ca naṃ parivāretvā ṭhitabhikkhū evarūpā ahesuṃ appicchā santuṭṭhā pavivittā asaṃsaṭṭhā āraddhavīriyā
tika-vin02t:1503_4: vattāro vacanakkhamā codakā pāpagarahino sīlasampannā samādhisampannā paññāsampannā vimuttisampannā vimuttiñāṇadassanasampannā.
tika-vin02t:1503_5: Tehi parivārito bhagavā rattakambalaparikkhitto viya suvaṇṇakkhandho,
tika-vin02t:1503_8: Mahākassapappamukhā pana mahātherā meghavaṇṇaṃ paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ pārupitvā maṇivammavammitā viya mahānāgā
tika-vin02t:1503_9: parivārayiṃsu vītarāgā bhinnakilesā vijaṭitajaṭā chinnabandhanā kule vā gaṇe vā alaggā.
tika-vin02t:1504_5: sayaṃ buddho anubuddhehi parivārito pattaparivāritaṃ viya kesaraṃ,
tika-vin02t:1504_12: tārāgaṇaparivuto viya puṇṇacando asamena buddhavesena aparimāṇena buddhavilāsena pāṭaligāmīnaṃ maggaṃ paṭipajji.
tika-vin02t:1505_0: Athassa puratthimakāyato suvaṇṇavaṇṇā ghanabuddharasmiyo uṭṭhahitvā asītihatthaṃ ṭhānaṃ aggahesuṃ,
tika-vin02t:1505_1: pacchimakāyato dakkhiṇapassato vāmapassato suvaṇṇavaṇṇā ghanarasmiyo uṭṭhahitvā asītihatthaṃ ṭhānaṃ aggahesuṃ,
tika-vin02t:1505_2: uparikesantato paṭṭhāya sabbakesāvattehi moragīvavaṇṇā ghanabuddharasmiyo uṭṭhahitvā gaganatale asītihatthaṃ ṭhānaṃ aggahesuṃ,
tika-vin02t:1505_3: heṭṭhāpādatalehi pavāḷavaṇṇā rasmiyo uṭṭhahitvā ghanapathaviyaṃ asītihatthaṃ ṭhānaṃ aggahesuṃ,
tika-vin02t:1505_5: nakhānañca maṃsavinimuttaṭṭhānato odātā ghanabuddharasmiyo uṭṭhahitvā asītihatthaṃ ṭhānaṃ aggahesuṃ,
tika-vin02t:1505_6: rattapītavaṇṇānaṃ sambhinnaṭṭhānato mañjiṭṭhavaṇṇā rasmiyo uṭṭhahitvā asītihatthaṃ ṭhānaṃ aggahesuṃ,
tika-vin02t:1505_8: Evaṃ samantā asītihatthamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ chabbaṇṇā buddharasmiyo vijjotamānā vipphandamānā vidhāvamānā kañcanadaṇḍadīpikāhi
tika-vin02t:1505_10: cātuddīpikamahāmeghato nikkhantavijjulatā viya ca disodisaṃ pakkhandiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1506_4: paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitānaṃ dvattiṃsacandānaṃ dvattiṃsasūriyānaṃ dvattiṃsacakkavattīnaṃ dvattiṃsadevarājānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1506_5: dvattiṃsamahābrahmānaṃ siriyā siriṃ abhibhavamānaṃ viya virocittha,
tika-vin02t:1506_6: yathā taṃ dasahi pāramīhi dasahi upapāramīhi dasahi paramatthapāramīhīti sammadeva paripūritāhi samatiṃsāya
tika-vin02t:1506_7: pāramīhi alaṅkataṃ kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni dinnena dānena rakkhitena sīlena katena
tika-vin02t:1506_8: kalyāṇakammena ekasmiṃ attabhāve samosaritvā vipākaṃ dātuṃ okāsaṃ alabhamānena sambādhappattena viya
tika-vin02t:1506_9: nibbattitaṃ nāvāsahassassa bhaṇḍaṃ ekaṃ nāvaṃ āropanakālo viya,
tika-vin02t:1506_10: sakaṭasahassassa bhaṇḍaṃ ekaṃ sakaṭaṃ āropanakālo viya,
tika-vin02t:1506_11: pañcavīsatiyā gaṅgānaṃ sambhijja mukhadvāre ekato rāsībhūtakālo viya ca ahosi.
tika-vin02t:1507_0: Imāya buddharasmiyā obhāsamānassapi bhagavato purato anekāni daṇḍadīpikāsahassāni ukkhipiṃsu,
tika-vin02t:1507_4: Pañcaṅgikatūriyanigghosā ceva buddhadhammasaṅghaguṇapaṭisaṃyuttā thutighosā ca sabbā disā pūrayamānā mukharā viya akaṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1507_6: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ṭhatvā padasahassehi gamanavaṇṇaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:1515_0: Unnatañca samaṃ hoti, pathavī ca acetanā.
tika-vin02t:1519_0: Aghaṭṭayanto niyyāti, ubho jāṇū ca gopphake.
tika-vin02t:1523_0: Na pekkhamāno so yāti, yugamattañhi pekkhati.
tika-vin02t:1528_1: Evaṃvidhesu kālesu bhagavato sarīravaṇṇe vā guṇavaṇṇe vā dhammakathikassa thāmoyeva pamāṇaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1528_6: tesaṃ buddhāpi anavasesato vaṇṇaṃ vattuṃ asamatthā.
tika-vin02t:1528_7: Sakalampi hi kappaṃ vadantā pariyosāpetuṃ na sakkonti,
tika-vin02t:1528_9: Iminā sirivilāsena alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ pāṭaligāmaṃ pavisitvā bhagavā pasannacittena janena pupphagandhadhūmavāsacuṇṇādīhi
tika-vin02t:1528_11: Tena vuttaṃ “atha kho bhagavā nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena yena āvasathāgāraṃ tenupasaṅkamī”ti.
tika-vin02t:1529_0: Pāde pakkhāletvāti yadipi bhagavato pāde rajojallaṃ na upalimpati,
tika-vin02t:1529_1: tesaṃ pana upāsakānaṃ kusalābhivuddhiṃ ākaṅkhanto paresaṃ diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjanatthaṃ bhagavā pāde pakkhālesi.
tika-vin02t:1529_2: Apica upādinnakasarīraṃ nāma sītikātabbampi hotīti tadatthampi bhagavā nahānapādadhovanāni karotiyeva.
tika-vin02t:1529_4: Tattha bhagavā bhikkhūnañceva upāsakānañca majjhe nisinno gandhodakena nahāpetvā dukūlacumbaṭena vodakaṃ
tika-vin02t:1529_5: katvā jātihiṅgulakena majjitvā rattakambalapaliveṭhite pīṭhe ṭhapitā rattasuvaṇṇaghanapaṭimā viya ativiya
tika-vin02t:1542_0: Pāṭaligāmike upāsake āmantesīti yasmā tesu upāsakesu bahū janā sīle patiṭṭhitā,
tika-vin02t:1542_1: tasmā paṭhamaṃ tāva sīlavipattiyā ādīnavaṃ pakāsetvā pacchā sīlasampadāya ānisaṃsaṃ dassetuṃ “pañcime gahapatayo”tiādinā dhammadesanatthaṃ āmantesi.
tika-vin02t:1542_6: Ettha ca “dussīlo”ti padena puggalassa sīlābhāvo vutto.
tika-vin02t:1542_7: So panassa sīlābhāvo duvidho asamādānena vā samādinnassa bhedena vāti.
tika-vin02t:1542_10: Yathādhippetādīnavanimittaṃ sīlābhāvaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya dassetuṃ “sīlavipanno”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1542_15: Gahaṭṭho hi yena yena sippaṭṭhānena jīvikaṃ kappeti yadi kasiyā yadi vaṇijjāya yadi gorakkhena.
tika-vin02t:1542_16: Pāṇātipātādivasena pamatto taṃ taṃ yathākālaṃ sampādetuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-vin02t:1542_18: Māghātakāle pāṇātipātaṃ pana adinnādānādīni ca karonto daṇḍavasena mahatiṃ bhogajāniṃ nigacchati.
tika-vin02t:1542_19: Pabbajito dussīlo pamādakāraṇā sīlato buddhavacanato jhānato sattaariyadhanato ca jāniṃ nigacchati.
tika-vin02t:1543_0: Pāpako kittisaddoti gahaṭṭhassa “asuko asukakule jāto dussīlo pāpadhammo pariccattaidhalokaparaloko salākabhattamattampi
tika-vin02t:1543_1: na detī”ti catuparisamajjhe pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
tika-vin02t:1543_2: Pabbajitassa “asuko nāma satthusāsane pabbajitvā nāsakkhi sīlāni rakkhituṃ,
tika-vin02t:1543_5: chahi agāravehi samannāgato”ti evaṃ pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
tika-vin02t:1544_0: Avisāradoti gahaṭṭho tāva “avassaṃ bahūnaṃ sannipātaṭṭhāne koci mama kammaṃ jānissati,
tika-vin02t:1544_7: atha me uposathampi pavāraṇampi ṭhapetvā sāmaññato cāvetvā nikkaḍḍhissantī”ti sabhayo upasaṅkamati,
tika-vin02t:1544_9: Ekacco pana dussīlopi samāno dappito viya vadati,
tika-vin02t:1545_0: Sammūḷho kālaṃ karotīti dussīlassa hi maraṇamañce nipannassa dussīlyakammānaṃ samādāya vattitaṭṭhānāni āpāthamāgacchanti.
tika-vin02t:1545_1: So ummīletvā attano puttadārādidassanavasena idhalokaṃ passati,
tika-vin02t:1545_4: Sattisatena pahariyamāno viya aggijālāya āliṅgiyamāno viya ca hoti.
tika-vin02t:1546_2: Atha vā kāyassa bhedāti jīvitindriyassa upacchedā.
tika-vin02t:1546_5: Nirayo hi saggamokkhahetubhūtā puññasaṅkhātā ayā apetattā,
tika-vin02t:1546_6: sukhānaṃ vā āyassa āgamanassa abhāvā apāyo.
tika-vin02t:1546_8: dosabahulatāya vā duṭṭhena kammunā nibbattā gatīti duggati.
tika-vin02t:1546_10: vinassantā vā ettha nipatanti saṃbhijjamānaṅgapaccaṅgāti vinipāto.
tika-vin02t:1547_4: So hi apāyo ceva duggati ca sugatito apetattā dukkhassa ca gatibhūtattā,
tika-vin02t:1547_8: So hi yathāvuttenatthena apāyo ceva duggati ca sabbasampattisamussayehi vinipātattā vinipātoti ca vuccati.
tika-vin02t:1547_9: Nirayaggahaṇena pana avīciādikaṃ anekappakāraṃ nirayameva dīpeti.
tika-vin02t:1548_3: Sīlasampannoti parisuddhaṃ paripuṇṇañca katvā sīlassa sampādanena sīlasampanno.
tika-vin02t:1548_5: Sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokanti ettha sugatiggahaṇena manussagatipi saṅgayhati,
tika-vin02t:1549_0: Pāṭaligāmike upāsake bahudeva rattiṃ dhammiyā kathāyāti aññāyapi pāḷimuttāya dhammakathāya ceva āvasathānumodanakathāya ca.
tika-vin02t:1549_1: Tadā hi bhagavā yasmā ajātasattunā tattha pāṭaliputtanagaraṃ māpentena aññāsu gāmanigamarājadhānīsu ye sīlācārasampannā kuṭumbikā,
tika-vin02t:1549_2: te ānetvā dhanadhaññāni gharavatthukhettavatthādīni ceva parihārañca dāpetvā nivesiyanti,
tika-vin02t:1549_3: tasmā pāṭaligāmikā upāsakā ānisaṃsadassāvitāya visesato sīlagarukāti sabbaguṇānañca sīlassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato
tika-vin02t:1549_4: tesaṃ paṭhamaṃ sīlānisaṃse pakāsetvā tato paraṃ ākāsagaṅgaṃ otārento viya pathavojaṃ ākaḍḍhanto viya
tika-vin02t:1549_5: mahājambuṃ matthake gahetvā cālento viya yojanappamāṇaṃ mahāmadhuṃ cakkayantena pīḷetvā sumadhurarasaṃ
tika-vin02t:1549_6: pāyamāno viya ca pāṭaligāmikānaṃ upāsakānaṃ hitasukhāvahaṃ pakiṇṇakakathaṃ kathentopi “āvāsadānaṃ nāmetaṃ
tika-vin02t:1549_10: mayā ca bhikkhusaṅghena ca paribhutte dhammaratanenapi paribhuttoyeva hoti,
tika-vin02t:1549_11: evaṃ tīhi ratanehi paribhutte aparimeyyova vipāko,
tika-vin02t:1549_12: apica āvāsadānasmiṃ dinne sabbadānaṃ dinnameva hoti,
tika-vin02t:1549_13: bhūmaṭṭhakapaṇṇasālāya vā sākhāmaṇḍapassa vā saṅghaṃ uddissa katassa ānisaṃso paricchindituṃ na sakkā.
tika-vin02t:1549_14: Āvāsadānānubhāvena hi bhave nibbattamānassapi sampīḷitagabbhavāso nāma na hoti,
tika-vin02t:1549_15: dvādasahattho ovarako viyassa mātukucchi asambādhova hotī”ti evaṃ nānānayavicittaṃ bahuṃ dhammakathaṃ kathetvā –
tika-vin02t:1551_0: Sarīsape ca makase, sisire cāpi vuṭṭhiyo.
tika-vin02t:1555_0: Tasmā hi paṇḍito poso, sampassaṃ atthamattano.
tika-vin02t:1560_0: Yaṃ so dhammaṃ idhaññāya, parinibbāti anāsavo”ti. –
tika-vin02t:1561_0: Evaṃ ayampi āvāsadāne ānisaṃso ayampi āvāsadāne ānisaṃsoti bahudeva rattiṃ atirekadiyaḍḍhayāmaṃ āvāsadānānisaṃsaṃ kathesi.
tika-vin02t:1562_1: Yassadāni tumhe kālaṃ maññathāti yassa gamanassa tumhe kālaṃ maññatha,
tika-vin02t:1562_6: Tiyāmarattiñhi nisīditvā vītināmentānaṃ tesaṃ sarīre ābādho uppajjeyya,
tika-vin02t:1563_0: Suññāgāranti pāṭiyekkaṃ suññāgāraṃ nāma tattha natthi.
tika-vin02t:1563_1: Te kira gahapatayo tasseva āvasathāgārassa ekapasse paṭasāṇiṃ parikkhipāpetvā kappiyamañcaṃ paññapetvā
tika-vin02t:1563_3: bandhitvā gandhatelapadīpaṃ āropayiṃsu “appeva nāma satthā dhammāsanato vuṭṭhāya thokaṃ vissametukāmo
tika-vin02t:1563_5: evaṃ no idaṃ āvasathāgāraṃ bhagavatā catūhi iriyāpathehi paribhuttaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissatī”ti.
tika-vin02t:1563_6: Satthāpi tadeva sandhāya tattha saṅghāṭiṃ paññapetvā sīhaseyyaṃ kappesi.
tika-vin02t:1563_8: Tattha pādadhovanaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya yāva dhammāsanā agamāsi,
tika-vin02t:1563_14: Upāsake uyyojetvā dhammāsanato oruyha yathāvutte ṭhāne sīhaseyyaṃ kappesi.
tika-vin02t:1563_15: Etaṃ ṭhānaṃ bhagavatā catūhi iriyāpathehi paribhuttaṃ ahosīti.
tika-vin02t:1566_1: Sunidhavassakārāti sunidho ca vassakāro ca dve brāhmaṇā.
tika-vin02t:1566_5: Pāṭaligāme nagaraṃ māpentīti pāṭaligāmantasaṅkhāte bhūmippadese nagaraṃ māpenti,
tika-vin02t:1566_6: pubbe “pāṭaligāmo”ti laddhanāmaṃ ṭhānaṃ idāni nagaraṃ katvā māpentīti attho.
tika-vin02t:1566_9: Cittāni namanti nivesanāni māpetunti rañño rājamahāmattānañca nivesanāni māpetuṃ vatthuvijjāpāṭhakānaṃ cittāni namanti.
tika-vin02t:1566_10: Te kira attano sippānubhāvena heṭṭhāpathaviyaṃ tiṃsahatthamatte ṭhāne “idha nāgānaṃ nivāsapariggaho,
tika-vin02t:1566_13: idha pāsāṇo vā khāṇuko vā atthī”ti jānanti,
tika-vin02t:1566_14: te tadā sippaṃ jappitvā tādisaṃ sārambhaṭṭhānaṃ pariharitvā anārambhe ṭhāne tāhi vatthupariggāhikāhi
tika-vin02t:1566_15: devatāhi saddhiṃ mantayamānā viya taṃtaṃgehāni māpenti.
tika-vin02t:1567_0: Atha vā nesaṃ sarīre devatā adhimuccitvā tattha tattha nivesanāni māpetuṃ cittaṃ nāmenti.
tika-vin02t:1567_1: Tā catūsu koṇesu khāṇuke koṭṭetvā vatthumhi gahitamatte paṭivigacchanti.
tika-vin02t:1567_2: Saddhānaṃ kulānaṃ saddhā devatā tathā karonti,
tika-vin02t:1567_5: Saddhānañhi evaṃ hoti “idha manussā nivesanaṃ māpentā paṭhamaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nisīdāpetvā maṅgalaṃ vadāpessanti,
tika-vin02t:1567_6: atha mayaṃ sīlavantānaṃ dassanaṃ dhammakathaṃ pañhavissajjanaṃ anumodanañca sotuṃ labhissāma,
tika-vin02t:1567_8: Assaddhā devatāpi “attano icchānurūpaṃ tesaṃ paṭipattiṃ passituṃ kathañca sotuṃ labhissāmā”ti tathā karonti.
tika-vin02t:1568_0: Tāvatiṃsehīti yathā hi ekasmiṃ kule ekaṃ paṇḍitaṃ manussaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1568_1: ekasmiñca vihāre ekaṃ bahussutaṃ bhikkhuṃ upādāya “asukakule manussā paṇḍitā,
tika-vin02t:1568_3: evamevaṃ sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ vissakammañca devaputtaṃ upādāya “tāvatiṃsā paṇḍitā”ti saddo abbhuggato.
tika-vin02t:1568_5: Seyyathāpītiādinā devehi tāvatiṃsehi saddhiṃ mantetvā viya sunidhavassakārā nagaraṃ māpentīti dasseti.
tika-vin02t:1569_0: Yāvatā ariyaṃ āyatananti yattakaṃ ariyamanussānaṃ osaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ nāma atthi.
tika-vin02t:1569_1: Yāvatā vaṇippathoti yattakaṃ vāṇijānaṃ āhaṭabhaṇḍassa rāsivaseneva kayavikkayaṭṭhānaṃ nāma,
tika-vin02t:1569_3: Idaṃ agganagaranti tesaṃ ariyāyatanavaṇippathānaṃ idaṃ nagaraṃ aggaṃ bhavissati jeṭṭhakaṃ pāmokkhaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1569_7: aññattha vikkayaṃ agacchantampi idha vikkayaṃ gacchissati,
tika-vin02t:1569_10: sabhāyaṃ ekanti evaṃ divase divase pañcasatasahassāni tattha uṭṭhahissanti,
tika-vin02t:1569_14: agginā ca udakena ca mithubhedena ca nassissatīti attho.
tika-vin02t:1569_15: Tassa hi eko koṭṭhāso agginā nassissati,
tika-vin02t:1569_19: amunā akathitaṃ imassa vadantānaṃ pisuṇavācānaṃ vasena bhinnānaṃ manussānaṃ aññamaññabhedena vinassissati.
tika-vin02t:1570_0: Evaṃ vatvā bhagavā paccūsakāle gaṅgātīraṃ gantvā katamukhadhovano bhikkhācārakālaṃ āgamayamāno nisīdi.
tika-vin02t:1570_2: so amhe upagate pucchissati ‘satthā kira pāṭaligāmaṃ agamāsi,
tika-vin02t:1570_7: ‘na nimantayimhā’ti ca vutte amhākaṃ dosaṃ āropetvā niggaṇhissati,
tika-vin02t:1570_9: samaṇassa kho pana gotamassa gatagataṭṭhāne kāḷakaṇṇisattā paṭikkamanti,
tika-vin02t:1570_10: taṃ mayaṃ nagaramaṅgalaṃ vācāpessāmā”ti cintetvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā nimantayiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1570_13: Nivāsetvāti gāmappavesananīhārena nivāsanaṃ nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā.
tika-vin02t:1570_14: Pattacīvaramādāyāti pattañca cīvarañca ādiyitvā kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ katvā,
tika-vin02t:1570_15: cīvaraṃ pārupitvā pattaṃ hatthena gahetvāti attho.
tika-vin02t:1571_2: Tāsaṃ dakkhiṇamādiseti saṅghassa dinne cattāro paccaye tāsaṃ gharadevatānaṃ ādiseyyapattiṃ dadeyya.
tika-vin02t:1571_3: Pūjitā pūjayantīti “ime manussā amhākaṃ ñātakāpi na honti,
tika-vin02t:1571_4: tathāpi no pattiṃ dentīti ārakkhaṃ susaṃvihitaṃ karothā”ti suṭṭhu ārakkhaṃ karonti.
tika-vin02t:1571_5: Mānitā mānayantīti kālānukālaṃ balikammakaraṇena mānitā “ete manussā amhākaṃ ñātakāpi na honti,
tika-vin02t:1571_6: tathāpi catumāsachamāsantare no balikammaṃ karontī”ti mānenti uppannaparissayaṃ haranti.
tika-vin02t:1571_7: Tato nanti tato naṃ paṇḍitajātikaṃ manussaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1572_0: Anumoditvāti tehi tadā pasutapuññassa anumodanavasena tesaṃ dhammakathaṃ katvā.
tika-vin02t:1572_2: tāsaṃ dakkhiṇamādise”ti bhagavato vacanaṃ sutvā devatānaṃ pattiṃ adaṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1572_3: Taṃ gotamadvāraṃ nāma ahosīti tassa nagarassa yena dvārena bhagavā nikkhami,
tika-vin02t:1572_5: Gaṅgāya pana uttaraṇatthaṃ anotiṇṇattā gotamatitthaṃ nāma nāhosi.
tika-vin02t:1572_10: Uḷumpanti pāragamanatthāya lahuke dārudaṇḍe gahetvā kavāṭaphalake viya aññamaññasambandhe kātuṃ āṇiyo koṭṭetvā nāvāsaṅkhepena kataṃ.
tika-vin02t:1572_11: Kullanti veḷunaḷādike saṅgharitvā valliādīhi kalāpavasena bandhitvā kataṃ.
tika-vin02t:1573_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ mahājanassa gaṅgudakamattassapi kevalaṃ tarituṃ asamatthataṃ,
tika-vin02t:1573_1: attano pana bhikkhusaṅghassa ca atigambhīravitthataṃ saṃsāramahaṇṇavaṃ taritvā ṭhitabhāvañca sabbākārato
tika-vin02t:1573_4: Tattha udakaṭṭhānassetaṃ adhivacananti yathāvuttassa yassa kassaci udakaṭṭhānassa etaṃ aṇṇavanti adhivacanaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1573_6: Saranti idha nadī adhippetā sarati sandatīti katvā.
tika-vin02t:1573_9: Visajjāti anāsajja appatvā eva pallalāni tesaṃ ataraṇato.
tika-vin02t:1573_10: Kullañhi jano bandhatīti kullaṃ bandhituṃ āyāsaṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin02t:1573_11: Vinā eva kullenāti īdisaṃ udakaṃ kullena īdisena vinā eva.
tika-vin02t:1573_12: Tiṇṇā medhāvino janāti ariyamaggañāṇasaṅkhātāya medhāya samannāgatattā medhāvino buddhā ca buddhasāvakā ca tiṇṇā paratīre patiṭṭhitā.
tika-vin02t:1576_2: patitassa pāsādassa thupikāya patiṭṭhitaṭṭhāne niviṭṭhagāmoti attho.
tika-vin02t:1576_9: Tattha yasmā anubodhapubbako paṭivedho anubodhena vinā na hoti,
tika-vin02t:1576_10: anubodhopi ekacco paṭivedhasambandho tadubhayābhāvahetukañca vaṭṭe saṃsaraṇaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1576_13: Tattha sandhāvitanti paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena bhavato bhavantarupagamanena sandhāvitaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1576_15: Mamañceva tumhākañcāti mayā ca tumhehi ca.
tika-vin02t:1576_16: Atha vā sandhāvitaṃ saṃsaritanti sandhāvanaṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ mamañceva tumhākañca ahosīti evamettha attho veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:1577_1: Bhavanetti samūhatāti dīgharajjuyā baddhasakuṇaṃ viya rajjuhattho puriso desantaraṃ,
tika-vin02t:1577_2: taṇhārajjuyā baddhasattasantānaṃ abhisaṅkhāro bhavantaraṃ neti etāyāti bhavanetti,
tika-vin02t:1577_3: sā bhavato bhavaṃ nayanasamatthā taṇhārajju ariyamaggasatthena suṭṭhu hatā chinnā appavattikatāti bhavanetti samūhatā.
tika-vin02t:1579_1: Yānassa bhūmīti yattha sakkā hoti yānaṃ āruyha yānena gantuṃ,
tika-vin02t:1579_3: Yānā paccorohitvāti vihārassa bahidvārakoṭṭhake yānato orohitvā.
tika-vin02t:1581_7: Te kira alaṅkārā suvaṇṇavicittāpi indanīlamaṇiobhāsehi ekanīlā viya khāyanti,
tika-vin02t:1581_8: rathāpi nesaṃ nīlamaṇikhacitā nīlavatthaparikkhittā nīladhajanīlavammikehi nīlābharaṇehi nīlaassehi yuttā,
tika-vin02t:1581_9: patodayaṭṭhiyopi nīlāyevāti iminā nayena sabbapadesu attho veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:1581_14: Sāhāranti ettha āharanti imasmā rājapurisā balinti āhāro,
tika-vin02t:1581_26: imaṃ licchavīparisaṃ tumhākaṃ cittena tāvatiṃsasadisaṃ upasaṃharatha upanetha allīyāpetha.
tika-vin02t:1581_28: evamime licchavīrājānopīti tāvatiṃsehi samake katvā passathāti attho.
tika-vin02t:1582_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā anekasatehi suttehi cakkhādīnaṃ rūpādīsu nimittaggāhaṃ paṭisedhetvā idha mahantena ussāhena nimittaggāhe niyojetīti?
tika-vin02t:1582_1: Hitakāmatāya tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yathā āyasmato nandassa hitakāmatāya saggasampattidassanatthaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1582_3: te sampattiyā palobhento “appamādena samaṇadhammaṃ karontānaṃ evarūpā issariyasampatti sulabhā”ti samaṇadhamme ussāhajananatthaṃ āha.
tika-vin02t:1582_5: kevalaṃ pana “dibbasampattisadisā etesaṃ rājūnaṃ issariyasampattī”ti anupubbikathāya sampattikathanaṃ viya daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1582_7: Na cirasseva hi sabbepime ajātasattussa vasena vināsaṃ pāpuṇissanti,
tika-vin02t:1582_8: atha nesaṃ rajjasirisampattiṃ disvā ṭhitabhikkhū “tathārūpāyapi nāma sirisampattiyā vināso paññāyissatī”ti
tika-vin02t:1582_9: aniccalakkhaṇaṃ bhāvetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇissantīti aniccalakkhaṇavibhāvanatthaṃ āha.
tika-vin02t:1583_0: Adhivāsetūti ambapāliyā nimantitabhāvaṃ ñatvāpi kasmā nimantentīti?
tika-vin02t:1583_2: Sā hi dhuttā itthī animantetvāpi “nimantesi”nti vadeyyāti tesaṃ ahosi.
tika-vin02t:1583_3: Dhammaṃ sutvā gamanakāle ca nimantetvā gamanaṃ nāma manussānaṃ vattameva.
tika-vin02t:1586_2: Santhāgāreti mahājanassa santhambhanāgāre vissamanatthāya kate agāre.
tika-vin02t:1586_5: catūhi disāhi āgatamanussā paṭhamaṃ tattha vissamitvā pacchā attano attano phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanti.
tika-vin02t:1586_7: Tattha hi nisīditvā licchavīrājāno rajjakiccaṃ santharanti karonti vicārenti.
tika-vin02t:1586_8: Sannisinnāti tesaṃ nisīdanatthaṃyeva paññattesu mahārahapaccattharaṇesu samussitasetacchattesu āsanesu sannisinnā.
tika-vin02t:1586_9: Anekapariyāyena buddhassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantīti rājakulakiccañceva lokatthakiriyañca vicāretvā anekehi kāraṇehi buddhassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti.
tika-vin02t:1586_10: Paṇḍitā hi te rājāno saddhāsampannā sotāpannāpi sakadāgāminopi anāgāminopi ariyasāvakā,
tika-vin02t:1586_11: te sabbepi lokiyajaṭaṃ bhinditvā buddhādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti.
tika-vin02t:1587_0: Tattha tividho buddhavaṇṇo nāma cariyavaṇṇo sarīravaṇṇo guṇavaṇṇoti.
tika-vin02t:1587_2: “dukkaraṃ vata kataṃ sammāsambuddhena kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni dasa pāramiyo dasa
tika-vin02t:1587_3: upapāramiyo dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūrentena ñātatthacariyaṃ lokatthacariyaṃ buddhatthacariyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1587_4: matthakaṃ pāpetvā pañca mahāpariccāge pariccajantenā”ti aḍḍhacchakkehi jātakasatehi buddhavaṇṇaṃ kathentā
tika-vin02t:1587_6: Dhammassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantā panete “bhagavatā dhammo desito,
tika-vin02t:1587_11: Saṅghassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantā “satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddhā kulaputtā bhogakkhandhañceva ñātiparivaṭṭañca
tika-vin02t:1587_14: setacchattaṃ pahāya pabbajitānaṃ bhaddiyamahārājamahākappinapukkusātiādirājapabbajitānaṃyeva buddhakāle asīti sahassāni ahesuṃ,
tika-vin02t:1587_15: anekakoṭidhanaṃ pahāya pabbajitānaṃ pana yasakulaputtasoṇaseṭṭhiputtaraṭṭhapālaputtādīnaṃ paricchedo natthi,
tika-vin02t:1587_16: evarūpā ca evarūpā ca kulaputtā satthu sāsane pabbajantī”ti pabbajjāsaṅkhepavasena saṅghaguṇaṃ kathayiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1588_1: Vesāliyañhi satta sahassāni satta satāni satta ca rājāno,
tika-vin02t:1588_2: te sabbepi sannipatitvā sabbesaṃ manaṃ gahetvā “raṭṭhaṃ vicāretuṃ samatthaṃ ekaṃ vicinathā”ti vicinantā
tika-vin02t:1588_3: sīharājakumāraṃ disvā “ayaṃ sakkhissatī”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā tassa rattamaṇivaṇṇakambalapariyonaddhaṃ
tika-vin02t:1588_11: Nisinno hotīti sesarājūnampi parisāya antare āsanāni paññāpayiṃsu,
tika-vin02t:1588_12: sīhassa pana majjhe ṭhāneti tasmiṃ paññatte mahārahe rājāsane nisinno hoti.
tika-vin02t:1588_14: Na hete yassa vā tassa vā appesakkhassa evaṃ anekasatehi kāraṇehi vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti.
tika-vin02t:1589_0: Yena nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto tenupasaṅkamīti nigaṇṭho kira nāṭaputto “sacāyaṃ sīho kassacideva samaṇassa gotamassa
tika-vin02t:1589_1: vaṇṇaṃ kathentassa sutvā samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamissati,
tika-vin02t:1589_2: mayhaṃ parihāni bhavissatī”ti cintetvā paṭhamataraṃyeva sīhaṃ senāpatiṃ etadavoca “senāpati imasmiṃ loke ‘ahaṃ buddho ahaṃ buddho’ti bahū vadanti,
tika-vin02t:1589_3: sace tvaṃ kañci dassanāya upasaṅkamitukāmo ahosi,
tika-vin02t:1589_7: So taṃ kathaṃ anussaritvā “sace maṃ pesessati,
tika-vin02t:1589_9: na gamissāmī”ti cintetvā yena nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto tenupasaṅkami.
tika-vin02t:1590_0: Athassa vacanaṃ sutvā nigaṇṭho mahāpabbatena viya balavasokena otthaṭo “yattha dānissāhaṃ gamanaṃ na icchāmi,
tika-vin02t:1590_2: hatohamasmī”ti anattamano hutvā “paṭibāhanupāyamassa karissāmī”ti cintetvā “kiṃ pana tva”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin02t:1590_3: Evaṃ vadanto carantaṃ goṇaṃ tuṇḍe paharanto viya jalamānaṃ padīpaṃ nibbāpento viya bhattabharitaṃ pattaṃ
tika-vin02t:1590_4: nikujjanto viya ca sīhassa uppannaṃ pītiṃ vināsesi.
tika-vin02t:1591_1: Imasmiñca vāre buddhassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantā tusitabhavanato paṭṭhāya yāva mahābodhipallaṅkā dasabalassa
tika-vin02t:1591_4: Dhammassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantā “ekapadepi ekabyañjanepi avakkhalitaṃ nāma natthī”ti sukathitavaseneva dhammaguṇaṃ kathayiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1591_5: Saṅghassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantā “evarūpaṃ yasasirivibhavaṃ pahāya satthu sāsane pabbajitā na kosajjapakatikā honti,
tika-vin02t:1591_6: terasasu pana dhutaguṇesu paripūrakārino hutvā sattasu anupassanāsu kammaṃ karonti,
tika-vin02t:1591_7: aṭṭhatiṃsa ārammaṇavibhattiyo vaḷañjentī”ti paṭipadāvasena saṅghaguṇe kathayiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1592_0: Tatiyavāre pana buddhassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsamānā “itipi so bhagavā”ti suttantapariyāyeneva buddhaguṇe kathayiṃsu,
tika-vin02t:1592_2: “suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho”tiādinā suttantapariyāyeneva saṅghaguṇe ca kathayiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1592_3: Tato sīho cintesi “imesaṃ licchavīrājakulānaṃ tatiyadivasato paṭṭhāya buddhadhammasaṅghaguṇe kathentānaṃ mukhaṃ nappahoti,
tika-vin02t:1592_5: imaṃ dāni uppannaṃ pītiṃ avijahitvāva ahaṃ ajja sammāsambuddhaṃ passissāmī”ti.
tika-vin02t:1592_6: Athassa “kiñhi me karissanti nigaṇṭhā”ti vitakko udapādi.
tika-vin02t:1592_7: Tattha kiñhi me karissantīti kiṃ nāma mayhaṃ nigaṇṭhā karissanti.
tika-vin02t:1592_8: Apalokitā vā anapalokitā vāti āpucchitā vā anāpucchitā vā.
tika-vin02t:1592_9: Na hi me te āpucchitā yānavāhanasampattiissariyayasavisesaṃ dassanti,
tika-vin02t:1593_0: Divā divassāti divassa divā majjhanhike atikkantamatte.
tika-vin02t:1593_1: Vesāliyā niyyāsīti yathā hi gimhakāle deve vuṭṭhe udakaṃ sandamānaṃ nadiṃ otaritvā thokameva gantvā tiṭṭhati nappavattati,
tika-vin02t:1593_2: evaṃ sīhassa paṭhamadivase “dasabalaṃ passissāmī”ti uppannāya pītiyā nigaṇṭhena paṭibāhitakālo,
tika-vin02t:1593_3: yathā dutiyadivase deve vuṭṭhe udakaṃ sandamānaṃ nadiṃ otaritvā thokaṃ gantvā vālikāpuñjaṃ paharitvā appavattaṃ hoti,
tika-vin02t:1593_4: evaṃ sīhassa dutiyadivase “dasabalaṃ passissāmī”ti uppannāya pītiyā nigaṇṭhena paṭibāhitakālo,
tika-vin02t:1593_5: yathā tatiyadivase deve vuṭṭhe udakaṃ sandamānaṃ nadiṃ otaritvā purāṇapaṇṇasukkhadaṇḍakanaḷakacavarādīni
tika-vin02t:1593_7: evaṃ sīho tatiyadivase tiṇṇaṃ vatthūnaṃ guṇakathaṃ sutvā uppanne pītipāmojje “aphalā nigaṇṭhā,
tika-vin02t:1593_10: gamissāmahaṃ satthu santika”nti gamanaṃ abhinīharitvā vesāliyā niyyāsi.
tika-vin02t:1593_11: Niyyanto ca “cirassāhaṃ dasabalassa santikaṃ gantukāmo jāto,
tika-vin02t:1593_12: na kho pana me yuttaṃ aññātakavesena gantu”nti “ye keci dasabalassa santikaṃ gantukāmo,
tika-vin02t:1593_13: sabbe nikkhamantū”ti ghosanaṃ kāretvā pañca rathasatāni yojāpetvā uttamarathe ṭhito tehi ceva pañcahi
tika-vin02t:1593_14: rathasatehi mahatiyā ca parisāya parivuto gandhapupphacuṇṇavāsādīni gāhāpetvā niyyāsi.
tika-vin02t:1594_0: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti ārāmaṃ pavisanto dūratova asītianubyañjanabyāmappabhādvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇāni
tika-vin02t:1594_1: chabbaṇṇā ghanabuddharasmiyo disvā “evarūpaṃ nāma purisaṃ evaṃ āsanne vasantaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ nāddasaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1594_3: alābhā vata me”ti cintetvā mahānidhiṃ disvā daliddapuriso viya sañjātapītipāmojjo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
tika-vin02t:1594_4: Dhammassa cānudhammaṃ byākarontīti bhotā gotamena vuttakāraṇassa anukāraṇaṃ kathenti.
tika-vin02t:1594_7: Kāraṇanti cettha tathāpavattassa saddassa attho adhippeto tassa pavattihetubhāvato.
tika-vin02t:1594_9: Anukāraṇanti ca so evaṃ parehi tathā vuccamāno.
tika-vin02t:1594_10: Sahadhammiko vādānuvādoti parehi vuttakāraṇena sakāraṇo hutvā tumhākaṃ vādo vā tato paraṃ tassa anuvādo
tika-vin02t:1594_11: vā koci appamattakopi viññūhi garahitabbaṃ ṭhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ na āgacchati.
tika-vin02t:1594_13: kiṃ sabbākārenapi tava vāde gārayhakāraṇaṃ natthīti.
tika-vin02t:1595_1: Atthi sīha pariyāyotiādīnaṃ attho verañjakaṇḍe āgatanayeneva veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:1595_3: Assāsāya dhammaṃ desetīti assāsanatthāya santhambhanatthāya dhammaṃ deseti.
tika-vin02t:1595_4: Iti bhagavā aṭṭhahaṅgehi sīhasenāpatissa dhammaṃ deseti.
tika-vin02t:1596_1: Anuviccakāranti anuviditvā cintetvā tulayitvā kātabbaṃ karohīti vutta hoti.
tika-vin02t:1596_3: Tumhādisasmiñhi maṃ disvā maṃ saraṇaṃ gacchante nigaṇṭhaṃ disvā nigaṇṭhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchante “kiṃ ayaṃ
tika-vin02t:1596_4: sīho diṭṭhadiṭṭhameva saraṇaṃ gacchatī”ti garahā uppajjati,
tika-vin02t:1596_6: Paṭākaṃ parihareyyunti te kira evarūpaṃ sāvakaṃ labhitvā “asuko nāma rājā vā rājamahāmatto vā seṭṭhi
tika-vin02t:1596_7: vā amhākaṃ saraṇaṃ gato sāvako jāto”ti paṭākaṃ ukkhipitvā nagare ghosentā āhiṇḍanti. Kasmā?
tika-vin02t:1596_9: sace panassa “kimahaṃ ete saraṇaṃ gato”ti vippaṭisāro uppajjeyya,
tika-vin02t:1596_10: tampi so “etesaṃ me saraṇagatabhāvaṃ bahū jānanti,
tika-vin02t:1596_11: dukkaraṃ dāni paṭinivattitu”nti vinodetvā na paṭikkamissatīti ca.
tika-vin02t:1596_15: Dātabbaṃ maññeyyāsīti pubbepi dasapi vīsatipi saṭṭhipi jane āgate disvā natthīti avatvā desi,
tika-vin02t:1596_16: idāni maṃ saraṇaṃ gatakāraṇamatteneva mā imesaṃ deyyadhammaṃ upacchindittha,
tika-vin02t:1596_18: Sutaṃ me taṃ bhanteti kuto sutaṃ?
tika-vin02t:1596_20: Te kira kulagharesu evaṃ pakāsenti “mayaṃ yassa kassaci sampattassa dātabbanti vadāma,
tika-vin02t:1596_22: na aññesaṃ sāvakānaṃ dinnaṃ mahapphala’nti evaṃ vadatī”ti.
tika-vin02t:1597_4: Thūlaṃ pasunti thūlaṃ mahāsarīraṃ gokaṇṇamahiṃsasūkarasaṅkhātaṃ pasuṃ.
tika-vin02t:1597_8: saddo kammasādhano atītakālikoti āha “attānaṃ paṭicca kata”nti.
tika-vin02t:1597_12: Paṭiccakammaṃ ettha atthīti maṃsaṃ paṭiccakammaṃ yathā “buddhaṃ etassa atthīti buddho”ti.
tika-vin02t:1597_13: Atha vā paṭicca kammaṃ phusatīti pāṭhaseso daṭṭhabbo,
tika-vin02t:1597_14: svāyaṃ etaṃ maṃsaṃ paṭicca taṃ pāṇavadhakakammaṃ phusatīti attho.
tika-vin02t:1597_20: Na ca pana teti ete āyasmantā dīgharattaṃ avaṇṇakāmā hutvā avaṇṇaṃ bhāsantāpi abbhācikkhantā na jiridanti,
tika-vin02t:1597_22: Atha vā lajjanatthe idaṃ jiridantīti padaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1600_2: Āmisakhādanatthāyāti tattha tattha chaḍḍitassa āmisassa khādanatthāya.
tika-vin02t:1600_5: Taṃ pana avatvāpīti andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃvuttanayena avatvāpi. Pi-
tika-vin02t:1600_11: Yato paṭṭhāyāti yato iṭṭhakato silato mattikāpiṇḍato vā paṭṭhāya.
tika-vin02t:1600_12: Paṭhamiṭṭhakādīnaṃ heṭṭhā na vaṭṭantīti bhittiyā paṭhamiṭṭhakādīnaṃ heṭṭhā bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpiyamānā
tika-vin02t:1600_13: iṭṭhakādayo bhūmigatikattā “kappiyakuṭiṃ karomā”ti vatvā patiṭṭhāpetuṃ na vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin02t:1600_14: Yadi evaṃ bhūmiyaṃ nikhaṇitvā patiṭṭhāpiyamānā thambhā kasmā tathā vatvā patiṭṭhāpetuṃ vaṭṭantīti āha “thambhā pana…pe…
tika-vin02t:1600_16: Saṅghasantakamevāti vāsatthāya kataṃ saṅghikasenāsanaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin02t:1600_17: Bhikkhusantakanti vāsatthāya eva kataṃ bhikkhussa puggalikasenāsanaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1603_1: Yena āpaṇaṃ tadavasarītiādīsu āpaṇanti ekassa nigamassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1603_2: Tasmiṃ kira nigame vīsati āpaṇamukhasahassāni vibhattāni ahesuṃ.
tika-vin02t:1603_3: Iti so āpaṇānaṃ ussannattā “āpaṇa”ntveva saṅkhaṃ gato.
tika-vin02t:1603_4: Tassa pana nigamassa avidūre nadītīre ghanacchāyo ramaṇīyabhūmibhāgo mahāvanasaṇḍo,
tika-vin02t:1603_9: dhanarakkhaṇatthāya pana tāpasapabbajjaṃ samādāya rañño paṇṇākāraṃ datvā bhūmibhāgaṃ gahetvā tattha assamaṃ
tika-vin02t:1603_10: kāretvā pañcahi sakaṭasatehi vaṇijjaṃ payojetvā kulasahassassa nissayo hutvā vasati.
tika-vin02t:1603_11: Assamepi cassa eko tālarukkho divase divase ekaṃ sovaṇṇamayaṃ phalaṃ muñcatīti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:1604_3: Mantapadanti mantasadde bahikatvā raho bhāsitabbaṭṭhena mantā eva taṃtaṃatthapaṭipattihetutāya padanti mantapadaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1604_5: Gītanti aṭṭhakādīhi dasahi porāṇabrāhmaṇehi udāttānudāttādisarasampattivasena sajjhāyitaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1604_9: iruvedayajuvedasāmavedādivasena tatthāpi paccekaṃ mantabrāhmaṇādivasena sajjhāyanavācakādivasena ca piṇḍaṃ katvā ṭhapitanti attho.
tika-vin02t:1604_10: Tadanugāyantīti etarahi brāhmaṇā taṃ tehi pubbe gītaṃ anugāyanti anusajjhāyanti.
tika-vin02t:1604_17: Te kira dibbacakkhuparibhaṇḍena yathākammūpagañāṇena sattānaṃ kammassakatādiṃ pubbenivāsañāṇena atītakappe
tika-vin02t:1604_18: brāhmaṇānaṃ mantajjhenavidhiñca oloketvā parūpaghātaṃ akatvā kassapasammāsambuddhassa bhagavato vaṭṭasannissitena
tika-vin02t:1604_20: Aparāpare pana okkākarājakālādīsu uppannabrāhmaṇā pāṇātipātādīni pakkhipitvā tayo vede bhinditvā buddhavacanena saddhiṃ viruddhe akaṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1604_23: Atikkante majjhanhike yāva sūriyatthaṅgamanā bhojanaṃ vikālabhojanaṃ nāma,
tika-vin02t:1604_25: Paṭiyādāpetvāti sappimadhusakkarādīhi ceva maricehi ca susaṅkhataṃ pānaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā.
tika-vin02t:1605_0: “Mahā kho keṇiya bhikkhusaṅgho”ti kasmā bhagavā punappunaṃ paṭikkhipi?
tika-vin02t:1605_3: yo nimantiyamānopi na sādiyatī”ti upanimantiyamānassa paṭikkhepe pasīdantīti keci,
tika-vin02t:1605_6: ayaṃ pana aḍḍhatelasāni bhikkhusatāni disvā ettakānaṃyeva bhikkhaṃ paṭiyādessati,
tika-vin02t:1605_7: sveva selo brāhmaṇo tīhi purisasatehi saddhiṃ pabbajissati,
tika-vin02t:1605_8: ayuttaṃ kho pana navake aññato pesetvā imeheva saddhiṃ gantuṃ,
tika-vin02t:1605_9: ime vā aññato pesetvā navakehi saddhiṃ gantuṃ.
tika-vin02t:1605_12: Tato bhikkhūsu piṇḍāya carantesu manussā ujjhāyissanti “cirassampi keṇiyo samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ nimantetvā yāpanamattaṃ dātuṃ nāsakkhī”ti,
tika-vin02t:1605_14: Paṭikkhepe pana kate “samaṇo gotamo punappunaṃ ‘tvañca brāhmaṇesu abhippasanno’ti brāhmaṇānaṃ nāmaṃ gaṇhātī”ti
tika-vin02t:1605_17: te tena nimantitā bhikkhū hutvā bhuñjissanti,
tika-vin02t:1605_18: evamassa saddhā anurakkhitā bhavissatīti punappunaṃ paṭikkhipi.
tika-vin02t:1605_19: Kiñcāpi kho bho gotamāti iminā idaṃ dīpeti “bho gotama,
tika-vin02t:1605_24: Ṭhapetvā dhaññaphalarasanti ettha taṇḍuladhovanodakampi dhaññarasoyevāti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:1605_27: ucchurasanti ettha nikkasaṭo ucchuraso sattāhakālikoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1606_0: Imāhi gāthāhīti imāhi keṇiyassa cittānukūlāhi gāthāhi.
tika-vin02t:1606_1: Tattha aggiparicariyaṃ vinā brāhmaṇānaṃ yaññābhāvato “aggihuttamukhā yaññā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1606_3: Brāhmaṇā hi “aggimukhā devā”ti aggijuhanapubbakaṃ yaññaṃ vidahanti.
tika-vin02t:1606_4: Vede sajjhāyantehi paṭhamaṃ sajjhāyitabbato sāvittī “chandaso mukha”nti vuttā,
tika-vin02t:1606_5: sāvittī vedassa pubbaṅgamāti attho taṃpubbakattā vedasavanassa.
tika-vin02t:1606_7: Ogāhantīnaṃ nadīnaṃ ādhārabhāvato gantabbaṭṭhānabhāvena paṭisaraṇato ca sāgaro “mukha”nti vutto.
tika-vin02t:1606_9: ajja rohiṇī”ti saññāyanato nakkhattāni abhibhavitvā ālokakaraṇato nakkhattehi ativisesasommabhāvato ca “nakkhattānaṃ mukhaṃ cando”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1606_10: “Dīpasikhā aggijālā asanivicakka”nti evamādīnaṃ tapantānaṃ vijjulatānaṃ aggattā ādicco “tapataṃ mukha”nti vutto.
tika-vin02t:1606_11: Dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ pana aggattā visesena tasmiṃ samaye buddhappamukhaṃ saṅghaṃ sandhāya “puññaṃ ākaṅkhamānānaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1606_13: Tena saṅgho puññassa āyamukhaṃ aggadakkhiṇeyyabhāvenāti dasseti.
tika-vin02t:1609_3: saṇikaṃ padappamāṇaṭṭhāne padaṃ nikkhipanto vattaṃ katvā susammaṭṭhaṃ muttādalasinduvārasantharasadisaṃ vālikaṃ avināsentoti attho.
