tika-vin02t:1609_7: Ākoṭehīti agganakhena īsakaṃ kuñcikachiddasamīpe koṭehīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:1609_10: tathā akoṭetvā majjhe chiddasamīpe manussā koṭenti,
tika-vin02t:1609_12: Vivari bhagavā dvāranti na bhagavā uṭṭhāya dvāraṃ vivari,
tika-vin02t:1609_14: Tato “bhagavā tumhehi anekāsu kappakoṭīsu dānaṃ dadamānehi na sahatthā dvāravivaraṇakammaṃ kata”nti sayameva dvāraṃ vivaṭaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1609_15: Taṃ pana yasmā bhagavato manena vivaṭaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1612_1: Ātumāvatthumhi aññataro vuḍḍhapabbajitoti subhaddo nāma aññataro bhikkhu vuḍḍhakāle pabbajitattā “vuḍḍhapabbajito”ti vutto.
tika-vin02t:1612_2: Dve dārakāti sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ ṭhitā dve puttā.
tika-vin02t:1612_4: Saṃhariṃsūti yasmā manussā te dārake mañjubhāṇine paṭibhānavante disvā kāretukāmāpi akāretukāmāpi kārentiyeva,
tika-vin02t:1612_6: Te vadanti “na amhākaṃ aññena kenaci attho,
tika-vin02t:1612_7: pitā pana no bhagavato āgatakāle yāgudānaṃ kātukāmo”ti.
tika-vin02t:1612_8: Taṃ sutvā manussā aparigaṇetvāva yaṃ te sakkonti harituṃ,
tika-vin02t:1612_12: Tasmā te dārakā bahuṃ loṇampi telampi sappimpi taṇḍulampi khādanīyampi saṃhariṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1613_2: Tattha kira mahantaṃ palālapuñjaṃ abbhantarato palālaṃ nikkaḍḍhitvā sālāsadisaṃ pabbajitānaṃ vasanayoggaṭṭhānasadisaṃ kataṃ,
tika-vin02t:1613_4: Atha bhagavati ātumaṃ āgantvā bhusāgārakaṃ paviṭṭhe subhaddo sāyanhasamayaṃ gāmadvāraṃ gantvā manusse
tika-vin02t:1613_5: āmantesi “upāsakā nāhaṃ tumhākaṃ santikā aññaṃ kiñci paccāsīsāmi,
tika-vin02t:1613_7: hatthakammamattaṃ me dethā”ti. Kiṃ, bhante, karomāti?
tika-vin02t:1613_8: “Idañcidañca gaṇhathā”ti sabbūpakaraṇāni gāhetvā vihāre uddhanāni kāretvā ekaṃ kāḷakaṃ kāsāvaṃ nivāsetvā tādisameva pārupitvā “idaṃ karotha,
tika-vin02t:1613_9: idaṃ karothā”ti sabbarattiṃ vicārento satasahassaṃ vissajjetvā bhojjayāguñca madhugoḷakañca paṭiyādāpesi.
tika-vin02t:1614_0: Atha bhagavā kālasseva sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto piṇḍāya carituṃ ātumagāmanagarābhimukho pāyāsi.
tika-vin02t:1614_1: Manussā tassa ārocesuṃ “bhagavā piṇḍāya gāmaṃ pavisati,
tika-vin02t:1614_3: So yathānivatthapāruteheva tehi kāḷakakāsāvehi ekena hatthena dabbiñca kaṭacchuñca gahetvā brahmā viya
tika-vin02t:1614_4: dakkhiṇajāṇumaṇḍalaṃ bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā vanditvā “paṭiggaṇhātu me, bhante,
tika-vin02t:1614_6: Tena vuttaṃ “atha kho so vuḍḍhapabbajito tassā rattiyā accayena bahutaraṃ yāguṃ paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavato upanāmesī”ti.
tika-vin02t:1615_2: Tenevāha “dasa koṭṭhāse katvā eko koṭṭhāso bhūmisāmikānaṃ dātabbo”ti.
tika-vin02t:1618_5: Pattuṇṇādīni tīṇi koseyyassa anulomāni pāṇakehi katasuttamayattā.
tika-vin02t:1618_7: Taṃ khomādīnaṃ aññataraṃ hotīti tesaṃyeva anulomaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1618_9: Taṃ kapparukkhe nibbattaṃ jālinīdevakaññāya anuruddhattherassa dinnavatthasadisaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1618_10: Tampi khomādīnaññeva anulomaṃ hoti tesu aññatarabhāvato.
tika-vin02t:1618_11: Dve paṭā desanāmeneva vuttāti tesaṃ sarūpadassanaparametaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1618_18: Pānakaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ hotīti ambapānādipānakaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin02t:1618_20: Tena tadahupaṭiggahitena saddhinti tena sattāhakālikena tadahupaṭiggahitena saddhiṃ.
tika-vin02t:1623_2: “Kathinanti pañcānisaṃse antokaraṇasamatthatāya thiranti attho”ti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1623_3: “So nesaṃ bhavissatī”ti yujjatīti “so tumhāka”nti avatvā “nesa”nti vacanaṃ yujjati.
tika-vin02t:1623_7: Anāmantetvā caraṇanti cārittasikkhāpade vuttanayena anāpucchitvā kulesu caraṇaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1624_0: Paṭhamapavāraṇāya pavāritāti idaṃ vassacchedaṃ akatvā vassaṃvutthabhāvasandassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ antarāyena
tika-vin02t:1624_2: Teneva “appavāritā vā”ti avatvā “chinnavassā vā pacchimikāya upagatā vā na labhantī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1624_3: Aññasmiṃ vihāre vutthavassāpi na labhantīti nānāsīmāya aññasmiṃ vihāre vutthavassā imasmiṃ vihāre kathinatthāraṃ na labhantīti attho.
tika-vin02t:1624_6: Akātuṃ na labbhatīti iminā anādariyena akarontassa dukkaṭanti dīpeti.
tika-vin02t:1624_7: Kammavācā pana ekāyeva vaṭṭatīti kathinatthārasāṭakassa dānakāle vuttā ekāyeva kammavācā vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:1624_8: Puna tassa aññasmiṃ vatthe diyyamāne kammavācāya dātabbakiccaṃ natthi,
tika-vin02t:1625_6: “Kucchicimilikaṃ katvā sibbitamattenāti thirajiṇṇānaṃ cimilikānaṃ ekato katvā sibbanassetaṃ adhivacana”nti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1628_2: Idha na vuttoti pāḷiyaṃ mātikāpadabhājane savanantikānantaraṃ na vutto.
tika-vin02t:1628_5: “Bahisīmāyaṃ cīvarakālasamayassa atikkantattā sīmātikkantiko”ti ayaṃ amhākaṃ khanti.
tika-vin02t:1628_7: evañca sati cīvarapalibodho paṭhamaṃ chijjatīti viññāyati,
tika-vin02t:1628_8: idha pana parivārapāḷiyañca “dve palibodhā apubbaṃ acarimaṃ chijjantī”ti vacanato taṃ na sameti,
tika-vin02t:1629_3: Keci pana “sabbaṃ attano parikkhāraṃ anavasesetvā pakkamanto ‘samādāya pakkamatī’ti vuccatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:1629_6: Pakkamanantiko hi kathinuddhāro niṭṭhitacīvarasseva vasena vutto “bhikkhu atthatakathino katacīvaraṃ ādāya pakkamatī”ti vuttattā,
tika-vin02t:1629_7: tasmā so vippakatacīvaro na sambhavatīti chaḷeva ubbhārā tattha dassitā.
tika-vin02t:1630_3: tato pakkamanantikaṃ vajjetvā vippakatacīvarassa ādāyasamādāyavāravasena dve chakkavārā,
tika-vin02t:1630_4: tato paraṃ niṭṭhānasanniṭṭhānanāsanantikānaṃ vasena tīṇi tikāni dassitāni.
tika-vin02t:1630_5: Tattha paṭhamattikaṃ antosīmāyaṃ “paccessaṃ na paccessa”nti imaṃ vidhiṃ anāmasitvā bahisīmāyameva “na paccessa”nti pavattaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1630_11: Anadhiṭṭhitenāti ca “paccessaṃ na paccessa”nti evaṃ anadhiṭṭhitena,
tika-vin02t:1630_13: Tatiyattikānantaraṃ catutthattikaṃ sambhavantaṃ antosīmāyaṃ “paccessa”nti vacanavisesena sambhavati.
tika-vin02t:1630_14: Tathā ca yojiyamānaṃ itarehi savanantikādīhi aviruddhaṃ hotīti catutthattikaṃ ahutvā chakkaṃ jātanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1630_15: Evaṃ tīṇi tikāni ekaṃ chakkañcāti paṭhamaṃ pannarasakaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1631_1: Tato idameva pannarasakaṃ upasaggavisesena dutiyaṃ samādāyapannarasakaṃ nāma kataṃ.
tika-vin02t:1631_3: “samādāyā”ti catutthaṃ pannarasakaṃ dassitanti evaṃ cattāri pannarasakāni veditabbāni.
tika-vin02t:1631_4: Tattha paṭhamadutiyesu pannarasakesu sabbena sabbaṃ akatacīvaraṃ adhippetaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1631_6: Tato paraṃ “cīvarāsāya pakkamatī”tiādinā nayena niṭṭhānasanniṭṭhānanāsanaāsāvacchedikavasena eko vāroti idamekaṃ catukkaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1631_7: tasmā pubbe vuttāni tikāni āsāvacchedikāni tīṇi ca tikānīti etaṃ anāsāyadvādasakanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1631_8: Tadanantare āsāyadvādasake kiñcāpi paṭhamaṃ dvādasakaṃ labbhati,
tika-vin02t:1631_9: tathāpi taṃ nibbisesanti tamekaṃ dvādasakaṃ avuttasiddhaṃ katvā visesato dassetuṃ ādito paṭṭhāya “antosīmāyaṃ paccessa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1631_10: Taṃ dutiyacatukke “so bahisīmagato suṇātī”tiādivacanassa tatiyacatukke savanantikādīnañca okāsakaraṇatthanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1631_11: Idaṃ pana dvādasakaṃ anāsāyavasenapi labbhamānaṃ iminā avuttasiddhaṃ katvā na dassitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1631_13: Karaṇīyadvādasakepi yathādassitaṃ anāsāyadvādasakaṃ avuttasiddhaṃ āsāyadvādasakañcāti dve dvādasakāni uddharitabbāni.
tika-vin02t:1632_1: Yasmā disaṃgamikanavake “disaṃgamiko pakkamatī”ti vacaneneva “na paccessa”nti idaṃ avuttasiddhameva,
tika-vin02t:1632_7: Tassa cīvaralābhe sati vassaṃvutthāvāse niṭṭhānasanniṭṭhānanāsanantikānaṃ vasena ekaṃ tikaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1632_9: gataṭṭhāne ekanti tiṇṇaṃ tikānaṃ vasena ekaṃ navakaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1640_1: Vicchikassa jātoti tassa kira mātuyā utusamaye sayanagatāya vicchiko nābhippadesaṃ āruḷho,
tika-vin02t:1642_2: saddo pana aniyamavacano dvikkhattuṃ vuccamāno yaṃkiñci-
tika-vin02t:1642_3: saddehi samānattho hotīti vuttaṃ “appagghenapi mahagghenapi yena kenacī”ti.
tika-vin02t:1642_4: Mahāpiṭṭhiyakojavanti hatthipiṭṭhīsu attharitabbatāya mahāpiṭṭhiyanti laddhasamaññaṃ caturaṅgulapupphaṃ kojavaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1644_2: Chaḍḍetvā gatāti kiñci avatvāyeva chaḍḍetvā gatā.
tika-vin02t:1644_3: So eva sāmīti akatāya katikāya yena gahitaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1646_2: Vihāramajjheyeva sammannitabbanti sabbesaṃ jānanatthāya vihāramajjheyeva nisinnehi sammannitabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1646_4: Vaṇṇāvaṇṇaṃ katvāti sabbakoṭṭhāse agghato samake katvā.
tika-vin02t:1646_9: Samapaṭivīso dātabboti karissāmāti yācantānaṃ paṭiññāmattenapi samakoṭṭhāso dātabbo.
tika-vin02t:1648_1: Rajanakumbhiyā majjhe ṭhapetvāti antorajanakumbhiyā majjhe ṭhapetvā evaṃ vaṭṭādhārake antorajanakumbhiyā pakkhitte majjhe udakaṃ tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin02t:1650_0: 346. Uddhaste aruṇeti uggate aruṇasīse. Nandimukhiyāti tuṭṭhamukhiyā.
tika-vin02t:1655_0: Taṃ bhagavā byākarissatīti “so bhikkhu sotāpanno sakadāgāmī”tiādinā tassa taṃ ñāṇagatiṃ,
tika-vin02t:1655_1: tato paraṃ “niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karissatī”tiādinā ñāṇābhisamparāyañca āvi karissati.
tika-vin02t:1657_1: Dukkhaṃ supatīti nānāvidhasupinaṃ passanto dukkhaṃ supati.
tika-vin02t:1657_2: Dukkhaṃ paṭibujjhatīti paṭibujjhantopi uttasitvā salomahaṃso dukkhaṃ paṭibujjhati.
tika-vin02t:1659_1: Aṭṭhapadakacchannena pattamukhaṃ sibbitunti aṭṭhapadaphalakākārena pattamukhe tattha tattha gabbhaṃ dassetvā sibbituṃ.
tika-vin02t:1659_2: Aggaḷaguttiyeva pamāṇanti imehi catūhi nikkhepakāraṇehi ṭhapentenapi aggaḷaguttivihāreyeva ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:1661_2: Vaḍḍhiṃ payojetvā ṭhapitaupanikkhepatoti vassāvāsikatthāya veyyāvaccakarehi vaḍḍhiṃ payojetvā ṭhapitaupanikkhepato.
tika-vin02t:1661_4: “Vassāvāsikalābhavasena vā matakacīvaravasena vā tatruppādavasena vā aññena vā kenaci ākārena saṅghaṃ uddissa uppannacīvaraṃ,
tika-vin02t:1661_6: anatthatakathinassa ekaṃ cīvaramāsaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti avisesato vatvāpi puna vassāvāsikalābhavasena uppanne
tika-vin02t:1661_10: Anatthatakathinassapi pañca māse pāpuṇātīti vassāvāsikalābhavasena uppannattā anatthatakathinassapi vutthavassassa pañca māse pāpuṇāti.
tika-vin02t:1661_15: saddena aniyametvāpi “vassaṃvutthasaṅghassa demā”ti vā “vassāvāsikaṃ demā”ti vā antohemante vassāvāsikalābhavasena
tika-vin02t:1661_16: dinnaṃ cīvaraṃ anatthatakathinassapi vutthavassassa pañca māse pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin02t:1661_17: teneva parato aṭṭhasu mātikāsu “vassaṃvutthasaṅghassa detī”ti imassa mātikāpadassa vinicchaye “cīvaramāsato paṭṭhāya yāva hemantassa pacchimo divaso,
tika-vin02t:1661_18: tāva vassāvāsikaṃ demāti vutte kathinaṃ atthataṃ vā hotu anatthataṃ vā,
tika-vin02t:1662_1: Piṭṭhisamaye uppannattā”ti idaṃ “udāhu anāgatavasse”ti imassānantaraṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1662_2: Gimhānassa paṭhamadivasato paṭṭhāya uppannameva hi piṭṭhisamaye uppannattā “kiṃ atītavasse idaṃ vassāvāsika”ntiādinā pucchitabbaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1662_3: teneva paratopi vakkhati “gimhānaṃ paṭhamadivasato paṭṭhāya vutte pana mātikā āropetabbā ‘atītavassāvāsassa pañca māsā atikkantā,
tika-vin02t:1662_8: Potthakesu pana “anatthatakathinassapi pañca māse pāpuṇātī”ti imassānantaraṃ “kasmā?
tika-vin02t:1662_11: Na hi piṭṭhisamaye uppannaṃ sandhāya “anatthatakathinassapi pañca māse pāpuṇātī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1662_12: na ca piṭṭhisamaye uppannaṃ vutthavassasseva pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin02t:1662_16: Sace pana gimhānaṃ paṭhamadivasato paṭṭhāya evaṃ vadati,
tika-vin02t:1663_0: Ṭhitikā pana na tiṭṭhatīti ettha aṭṭhitāya ṭhitikāya puna aññasmiṃ cīvare uppanne sace eko bhikkhu āgacchati,
tika-vin02t:1663_2: Ṭhitāya pana ṭhitikāya puna aññasmiṃ cīvare uppanne sace navakataro āgacchati,
tika-vin02t:1663_8: Duggahitāni hontīti ettha saṅghikāneva hontīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:1663_9: Gahitameva nāmāti “imassa idaṃ patta”nti kiñcāpi na viditaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1663_10: te pana bhāgā atthato tesaṃ pattāyevāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:1666_1: Sattāhavārena aruṇameva uṭṭhāpetīti etaṃ vacanamattameva ekasmiṃ vihāre sattāhakiccābhāvato.
tika-vin02t:1666_3: Nānālābhehītiādīsu nānā visuṃ visuṃ lābho etesūti nānālābhā,
tika-vin02t:1666_6: Nānā visuṃ visuṃ pākārādīhi paricchinno upacāro etesanti nānūpacārā,
tika-vin02t:1668_4: Samānācariyakoti ettha sacepi ekassa ācariyassa eko antevāsiko hoti,
tika-vin02t:1669_1: Bhesajjaṃ yojetuṃ asamattho hotīti vejjena “idañcidañca bhesajjaṃ gahetvā iminā yojetvā dātabba”nti vutte tathā kātuṃ asamatthoti attho.
tika-vin02t:1671_3: Tattha tattha saṅghassāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ vihāre saṅghassa.
tika-vin02t:1673_1: Yattha pana dakkhiṇodakaṃ pamāṇanti bhikkhū yasmiṃ raṭṭhe dakkhiṇodakapaaggahaṇamattenapi deyyadhammassa sāmino hontīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:1674_1: Matakacīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātīti ettha maggaṃ gacchanto tassa kālakiriyaṃ sutvā avihāraṭṭhāne ce dvādasaratanabbhantare
tika-vin02t:1674_2: aññesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abhāvaṃ ñatvā “idaṃ cīvaraṃ mayhaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti adhiṭṭhāti,
tika-vin02t:1676_1: Puggalādhiṭṭhānanayena vuttanti “sīmāyadāna”ntiādinā vattabbe “sīmāya detī”tiādi puggalādhiṭṭhānanayena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1676_2: Parikkhepārahaṭṭhānena paricchinnāti iminā aparikkhittassa vihārassa dhuvasannipātaṭṭhānādito paṭhamaleḍḍupātassa anto upacārasīmāti dasseti.
tika-vin02t:1676_3: Idāni dutiyaleḍḍupātassa antopi upacārasīmāyevāti dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1676_6: vidhānanti idaṃ sabbaṃ imissāyeva upacārasīmāya vasena veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1676_9: “avippavāsasīmāya dammī”ti dinnaṃ gāmaṭṭhānaṃ na pāpuṇāti. Kasmā?
tika-vin02t:1676_11: “Samānasaṃvāsakasīmāya dammī”ti dinnaṃ pana gāme ṭhitānampi pāpuṇātīti.
tika-vin02t:1678_3: Sacepi eko bhikkhu hoti ekā vā bhikkhunī,
tika-vin02t:1678_5: “Bhikkhusaṅghassa ca bhikkhunīnañca tuyhañcā”ti vutte pana puggalo visuṃ na labhatīti idaṃ aṭṭhakathāpamāṇeneva gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1678_7: Tathā hi “ubhatosaṅghassa ca tuyhañca dammī”ti vutte sāmaññavisesavacanehi saṅgahitattā yathā puggalo visuṃ labhati,
tika-vin02t:1678_8: evamidhāpi “bhikkhusaṅghassa ca tuyhañcā”ti sāmaññavisesavacanasabbhāvato bhavitabbameva visuṃ puggalapaṭivīsenāti viññāyati,
tika-vin02t:1678_10: Pāpuṇanaṭṭhānato ekameva labhatīti attano vassaggena pattaṭṭhānato ekameva koṭṭhāsaṃ labhati.
tika-vin02t:1678_14: Bhikkhusaṅghassa harāti vuttepi haritabbanti īdisaṃ gihiveyyāvaccaṃ na hotīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1679_3: sabbesaṃ pāpuṇātīti yattha katthaci vutthavassānaṃ sabbesaṃ pāpuṇātīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:1679_4: Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyampi “sace pana bahiupacārasīmāyaṃ ṭhito ‘vassaṃvutthasaṅghassā’ti vadati,
tika-vin02t:1679_5: yattha katthaci vutthavassānaṃ sabbesaṃ sampattānaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1679_6: Gaṇṭhipadesu pana “vassāvāsassa ananurūpe padese ṭhatvā vuttattā vassaṃvutthānaṃ avutthānañca sabbesaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1679_8: Na hi “vassaṃvutthasaṅghassa dammī”ti vutte avutthavassānaṃ pāpuṇāti.
tika-vin02t:1679_10: Uddesaṃ gahetuṃ āgatoti tassa santike uddesaṃ agahitapubbassapi uddesaṃ gaṇhissāmīti āgatakālato paṭṭhāya antevāsikabhāvūpagamanato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1684_2: Tassa hi nagarassa ārāmapokkharaṇīādīsu tesu tesu ṭhānesu campakarukkhāva ussannā ahesuṃ,
tika-vin02t:1684_4: Gaggarāya pokkharaṇiyā tīreti tassa campānagarassa avidūre gaggarāya nāma rājamahesiyā khaṇitattā “gaggarā”ti laddhavohārā pokkharaṇī atthi,
tika-vin02t:1684_5: tassā tīre samantato nīlādipañcavaṇṇakusumapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ mahantaṃ campakavanaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1684_9: tattha baddho pasuto ussukkaṃ āpannoti attho,
tika-vin02t:1686_2: Hāpanaṃ vā aññathā karaṇaṃ vā natthīti ñattikammassa ekāya eva ñattiyā kattabbattā tato hāpanaṃ na sambhavati,
tika-vin02t:1686_3: anussāvanāya abhāvato pacchā ñattiṭhapanavasena dvīhi ñattīhi karaṇavasena ca aññathā karaṇaṃ natthi.
tika-vin02t:1690_1: Appatto nissāraṇanti ettha nissāraṇakammaṃ nāma kuladūsakānaññeva anuññātaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1690_2: ayañca “bālo hoti abyatto”tiādinā niddiṭṭho kuladūsako na hoti,
tika-vin02t:1690_5: Bālaabyattatādiyuttassapi kammakkhandhake “ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho pabbājanīyakammaṃ kareyyā”ti vuttattā.
tika-vin02t:1691_1: sunissāritoti ettha adhippetassa pabbājanīyakammassa vasena atthaṃ dassetvā idāni yadi “tañce saṅgho
tika-vin02t:1691_3: tadā nissāraṇaṃ sampattoyeva tajjanīyādivasena sunissāritoti byatirekamukhena atthaṃ dassetuṃ puna “tañce
tika-vin02t:1691_5: Natthi etassa apadānaṃ avakhaṇḍanaṃ āpattipariyantoti anapadāno.
tika-vin02t:1691_6: Ekekenapi aṅgena nissāraṇā anuññātāti kammakkhandhake anuññātā.
tika-vin02t:1696_2: desessāmīti subbacatāya sikkhākāmatāya ca āpattiṃ passi.
tika-vin02t:1696_3: Natthi āpattīti anāpattipakkhopi ettha sambhavatīti adhippāyenāha.
tika-vin02t:1697_2: “Akāraṇe tumhehi so bhikkhu ukkhitto”ti vadeyyāti yasmā pubbe vinayadharassa vacanena “sace āpatti hoti,
tika-vin02t:1697_4: idānipi tasseva vacanena “asañcicca assatiyā katattā natthettha āpattī”ti anāpattisaññī,
tika-vin02t:1697_5: tasmā “akāraṇe tumhehi so bhikkhu ukkhitto”ti ukkhepake bhikkhū yadi vadeyyāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:1697_6: Ukkhittānuvattake vā “tumhe āpattiṃ āpannā”ti vadeyyāti yasmā vatthujānanacittenāyaṃ sacittakā āpatti,
tika-vin02t:1697_8: tasmā sāpattikasseva “tumhe chandāgatiṃ gacchathā”ti adhippāyena “tumhe āpattiṃ āpannā”ti ukkhittānuvattake vadeyya.
tika-vin02t:1698_4: akammaṃ na ca karaṇīya”ntiādivacanato sace saṅgho taṃ gaṇapūrakaṃ katvā kammaṃ kareyya,
tika-vin02t:1698_5: ayaṃ tattha nisinnopi taṃ kammaṃ kopetīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:1698_6: Upacāraṃ muñcitvāti ettha upacāro nāma aññamaññaṃ hatthena pāpuṇanaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1699_3: hatthaparāmāsādivasena matthakaṃ patto kalaho jāto etesanti kalahajātā,
tika-vin02t:1699_13: tasmāssa etadahosi “yathā ime bhikkhū vivādaṃ āraddhā,
tika-vin02t:1699_16: appeva nāma sadevake loke aggapuggalo bhagavā sayaṃ vā gantvā attano vā santikaṃ pakkosāpetvā etesaṃ
tika-vin02t:1699_17: bhikkhūnaṃ khantimettāpaṭisaṃyuttaṃ sāraṇīyadhammadesanaṃ kathetvā sāmaggiṃ kareyyā”ti atthakāmatāya
tika-vin02t:1699_21: Ye pana tadā satthu vacanaṃ na gaṇhiṃsu,
tika-vin02t:1699_22: te kiñci avatvā tuṇhībhūtā maṅkubhūtā aṭṭhaṃsu,
tika-vin02t:1702_1: Atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesītiādīsu bhūtapubbanti idaṃ bhagavā pathavīgataṃ nidhiṃ uddharitvā purato
tika-vin02t:1702_2: rāsiṃ karonto viya bhavapaṭicchannaṃ purāvutthaṃ dassento āha.
tika-vin02t:1702_4: Yo koci attano santakena vibhavena aḍḍho hoti,
tika-vin02t:1702_6: mahaddhano mahatā aparimāṇasaṅkhena dhanena samannāgatoti āha “mahaddhano”ti.
tika-vin02t:1702_7: Bhuñjitabbato paribhuñjitabbato visesato kāmā bhogā nāma,
tika-vin02t:1702_8: tasmā pañcakāmaguṇavasena mahantā uḷārā bhogā assāti mahābhogo.
tika-vin02t:1702_15: nidahitvā ṭhapitena dhanena paripuṇṇakoso dhaññānañca paripuṇṇakoṭṭhāgāroti attho.
tika-vin02t:1703_0: Atha vā catubbidho koso hatthī assā rathā pattīti.
tika-vin02t:1703_1: Yathā hi asino tikkhabhāvaparipālako paricchado “koso”ti vuccati,
tika-vin02t:1703_2: evaṃ rañño tikkhabhāvaparipālakattā caturaṅginī senā “koso”ti vuccati.
tika-vin02t:1703_5: Caturaṅginiṃ senanti hatthiassarathapattisaṅkhātehi catūhi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ senaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1704_1: Vaggabhāvena vā puthu nānā saddo assāti puthusaddo.
tika-vin02t:1704_4: Ahaṃ bāloti na maññitthāti bālalakkhaṇe ṭhitopi “ahaṃ bālo”ti na maññi.
tika-vin02t:1704_5: Bhiyyo cāti attano bālabhāvassa ajānanato bhiyyo ca bhaṇḍanassa upariphoṭo viya saṅghabhedassa attano
tika-vin02t:1705_2: Na taṃ jānantīti taṃ kalahaṃ na jānanti.
tika-vin02t:1705_3: Kalahaṃ karonto ca taṃ na jānanto nāma natthi.
tika-vin02t:1705_6: ayaṃ kalaho nāma attano paresañca atthahāpanato anatthuppādanato diṭṭheva dhamme samparāye ca sādīnavo sadosoti attho.
tika-vin02t:1705_7: Taṃ na jānantīti taṃ kalahaṃ na jānanti.
tika-vin02t:1705_8: Kathaṃ na jānantīti āha “evaṃ sādīnavo aya”nti,
tika-vin02t:1705_9: “evaṃ sādīnavo ayaṃ kalaho”ti evaṃ taṃ kalahaṃ na jānantīti attho.
tika-vin02t:1706_2: Ajinīti kūṭasakkhiotāraṇena vā vādapaṭivādena vā karaṇuttariyakaraṇena vā ajesi.
tika-vin02t:1706_3: Ahāsīti mama santakaṃ pattādīsu kiñcideva avahari.
tika-vin02t:1706_4: Ye ca tanti ye keci devā vā manussā vā gahaṭṭhā vā pabbajitā vā taṃ “akkocchi ma”ntiādivatthukaṃ kodhaṃ
tika-vin02t:1706_5: sakaṭadhuraṃ viya naddhinā pūtimacchādīni viya ca kusādīhi punappunaṃ veṭhentā upanayhanti upanāhavasena
tika-vin02t:1706_7: tesaṃ sakiṃ uppannaṃ veraṃ na sammatīti attho.
tika-vin02t:1707_0: Ye ca taṃ nupanayhantīti assatiyā amanasikāravasena vā kammapaccavekkhaṇādivasena vā ye taṃ akkosādivatthukaṃ
tika-vin02t:1707_1: kodhaṃ “tayāpi koci niddoso purimabhave akkuṭṭho bhavissati,
tika-vin02t:1707_4: kassaci te pasayha kiñci acchinnaṃ bhavissati,
tika-vin02t:1707_5: tasmā niddoso hutvāpi akkosādīni pāpuṇāsī”ti evaṃ na upanayhanti,
tika-vin02t:1707_6: tesu pamādena uppannampi veraṃ iminā anupanayhanena nirindhano viya jātavedo upasammati.
tika-vin02t:1708_0: Na hi verena verānīti yathā hi kheḷasiṅghāṇikādiasucimakkhitaṃ ṭhānaṃ teheva asucīhi dhovanto suddhaṃ niggandhaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-vin02t:1708_1: atha kho taṃ ṭhānaṃ bhiyyoso mattāya asuddhatarañca duggandhatarañca hoti,
tika-vin02t:1708_2: evameva akkosantaṃ paccakkosanto paharantaṃ paṭipaharanto verena veraṃ vūpasametuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-vin02t:1708_4: Iti verāni nāma verena kismiñcipi kāle na sammanti,
tika-vin02t:1708_6: Averena ca sammantīti yathā pana tāni kheḷādīni asucīni vippasannena udakena dhoviyamānāni nassanti,
tika-vin02t:1708_8: evameva averena khantimettodakena yonisomanasikārena paṭisaṅkhānena paccavekkhaṇena verāni vūpasammanti paṭippassambhanti abhāvaṃ gacchanti.
tika-vin02t:1708_9: Esa dhammo sanantanoti esa averena verūpasamanasaṅkhāto porāṇako dhammo sabbesaṃ buddhapaccekabuddhakhīṇāsavānaṃ gatamaggo.
tika-vin02t:1709_0: Na jānantīti aniccasaññaṃ na paccupaṭṭhāpentīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:1709_1: Tato sammanti medhagāti tato tasmā kāraṇā medhagā kalahā sammanti vūpasamaṃ gacchanti.
tika-vin02t:1709_3: Tattha evañhi te jānantāti te paṇḍitā “mayaṃ maccusamīpaṃ gacchāmā”ti evaṃ jānantā yonisomanasikāraṃ
tika-vin02t:1709_5: atha nesaṃ tāya paṭipattiyā te medhagā sammantīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:1710_0: Tesampi hoti saṅgatīti ye mātāpitūnaṃ aṭṭhīni chindanti,
tika-vin02t:1710_3: evaṃ raṭṭhaṃ vilumpamānānaṃ tesampi saṅgati hoti,
tika-vin02t:1710_4: kimaṅgaṃ pana tumhākaṃ na siyāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:1711_1: paṇḍitasahāyānaṃ pana idaṃ na siyā”ti paṇḍitasahāyassa bālasahāyassa ca vaṇṇāvaṇṇadīpanatthaṃ vuttā.
tika-vin02t:1711_4: Pākaṭaparissaye ca paṭicchannaparissaye ca abhibhavitvāti sīhabyagghādayo pākaṭaparissaye ca rāgabhayadosabhayādayo
tika-vin02t:1712_0: Ekakā cariṃsūti “idaṃ rajjaṃ nāma mahantaṃ pamādaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1712_1: kiṃ amhākaṃ rajjena kāritenā”ti raṭṭhaṃ pahāya tato mahāaraññaṃ pavisitvā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā catūsu iriyāpathesu ekakā cariṃsūti attho.
tika-vin02t:1713_0: Ekassa caritaṃ seyyoti pabbajitassa pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya ekībhāvābhiratassa ekakasseva caritaṃ seyyoti attho.
tika-vin02t:1713_1: Natthi bāle sahāyatāti cūḷasīlaṃ majjhimasīlaṃ mahāsīlaṃ dasa kathāvatthūni terasa dhutaguṇā vipassanāñāṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:1713_2: cattāro maggā cattāri phalāni tisso vijjā cha abhiññā amatamahānibbānanti ayaṃ sahāyatā nāma,
tika-vin02t:1713_3: sā bālaṃ nissāya adhigantuṃ na sakkāti natthi bāle sahāyatā.
tika-vin02t:1713_7: saddeneva hatthibhāvassa vuttattā nāgavacanaṃ tassa mahattavibhāvanatthanti āha “nāgoti mahantādhivacanameta”nti.
tika-vin02t:1716_2: Tenupasaṅkamīti dhammasenāpatimahāmoggallānattheresu vā asītimahāsāvakesu vā antamaso dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṃ
tika-vin02t:1716_3: ānandattherampi kañci anāmantetvā sayameva pattacīvaramādāya anīkanissaṭo hatthī viya yūthanissaṭo kāḷasīho
tika-vin02t:1716_4: viya vātacchinno valāhako viya ca ekakova upasaṅkami.
tika-vin02t:1716_6: Gaṇe kirassa ādīnavaṃ disvā ekavihāriṃ bhikkhuṃ passitukāmatā udapādi,
tika-vin02t:1716_7: tasmā sītādipīḷito uṇhādiṃ patthayamāno viya upasaṅkami.
tika-vin02t:1716_8: Atha vā bhagavatā so ādīnavo pageva pariññāto,
tika-vin02t:1716_10: tasmiṃ pana antovasse keci buddhaveneyyā nāhesuṃ,
tika-vin02t:1716_11: tena aññattha gamanaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ damanupāyoti pālileyyakaṃ uddissa gacchanto ekavihāriṃ āyasmantaṃ bhaguṃ sampahaṃsetuṃ tattha gato.
tika-vin02t:1716_12: Evaṃ gate ca satthari pañcasatā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āhaṃsu “āvuso ānanda satthā ekakova gato,
tika-vin02t:1716_14: yadā bhagavā sāmaṃ senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya anāmantetvā upaṭṭhāke anapaloketvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ adutiyo gacchati,
tika-vin02t:1716_17: tasmā na imesu divasesu bhagavā anugantabbo”ti nivāresi,
tika-vin02t:1719_7: evameva bhagavato kosambake bhikkhū aññamaññaṃ vivādāpanne asamaggavāsaṃ vasante,
tika-vin02t:1719_8: samaggavāsaṃ vasante āvajjentassa ime tayo kulaputtā āpāthamāgamiṃsu,
tika-vin02t:1719_9: atha nesaṃ paggaṇhitukāmo upasaṅkami “evāyaṃ paṭipattianukkamena kosambakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vinayanūpāyo hotī”ti.
tika-vin02t:1720_1: So araññaṃ yathā icchiticchitappadesena manussā pavisitvā tattha pupphaṃ vā phalaṃ vā niyyāsaṃ vā dabbasambhāraṃ vā na haranti,
tika-vin02t:1720_2: evaṃ vatiyā parikkhittassa araññassa yojite dvāre nisīditvā araññaṃ rakkhati,
tika-vin02t:1720_4: Attakāmarūpā viharantīti attano hitaṃ kāmayamānasabhāvā hutvā viharanti.
tika-vin02t:1720_5: Yo hi imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitvāpi vejjakammadūtakammapahiṇagamanādīnaṃ vasena ekavīsatianesanāhi jīvikaṃ kappeti,
tika-vin02t:1720_7: Yo pana imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitvā ekavīsatianesanaṃ pahāya catupārisuddhisīle patiṭṭhāya buddhavacanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1720_8: uggaṇhitvā sappāyadhutaṅgaṃ adhiṭṭhāya aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu cittaruciyaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā gāmantaṃ
tika-vin02t:1720_9: pahāya araññaṃ pavisitvā samāpattiyo nibbattetvā vipassanāya kammaṃ kurumāno vicarati,
tika-vin02t:1721_0: Mā tesaṃ aphāsumakāsīti tesaṃ aphāsukaṃ mā akāsīti bhagavantaṃ vāresi.
tika-vin02t:1721_1: Evaṃ kirassa ahosi “ime kulaputtā samaggā viharanti,
tika-vin02t:1721_5: kadāci ayampi evaṃ karonto imesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ samaggavāsaṃ bhindeyya,
tika-vin02t:1721_6: pāsādiko ca panesa suvaṇṇavaṇṇo rasagiddho maññe,
tika-vin02t:1721_7: gatakālato paṭṭhāya paṇītadāyakānaṃ attano upaṭṭhākānaṃ vaṇṇakathanādīhi imesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ appamādavihāraṃ bhindeyya,
tika-vin02t:1721_8: vasanaṭṭhānāni cāpi etesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ nibaddhāni paricchinnāni tissova paṇṇasālā tayo caṅkamā tīṇi divāṭṭhānāni tīṇi mañcapīṭhāni,
tika-vin02t:1721_9: ayaṃ pana samaṇo mahākāyo vuḍḍhataro maññe bhavissati,
tika-vin02t:1721_10: so akāle ime kulaputte senāsanā vuṭṭhapessati,
tika-vin02t:1721_12: Taṃ anicchanto “mā tesaṃ aphāsumakāsī”ti bhagavantaṃ vāreti.
tika-vin02t:1722_0: Kiṃ panesa jānanto vāresi ajānantoti? Ajānanto.
tika-vin02t:1722_1: Sammāsambuddho hi nāma yadā anekabhikkhusahassaparivāro byāmappabhāya asītianubyañjanehi dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇasiriyā
tika-vin02t:1722_4: Tadā pana bhagavā “māssu koci mama buddhānubhāvaṃ aññāsī”ti tathārūpena iddhābhisaṅkhārena sabbampi taṃ
tika-vin02t:1722_5: buddhānubhāvaṃ cīvaragabbhena viya paṭicchādetvā valāhakagabbhena paṭicchanno puṇṇacando viya sayameva
tika-vin02t:1723_0: Etadavocāti thero kira “mā samaṇā”ti dāyapālassa kathaṃ sutvā cintesi “mayaṃ tayo janā idha viharāma,
tika-vin02t:1723_2: ayañca dāyapālo pabbajitena viya saddhiṃ katheti,
tika-vin02t:1723_3: ko nu kho bhavissatī”ti divāṭṭhānato uṭṭhāya dvāre ṭhatvā maggaṃ olokento bhagavantaṃ addasa.
tika-vin02t:1723_4: Bhagavāpi therassa saha dassaneneva sarīrobhāsaṃ muñci,
tika-vin02t:1723_6: Thero “ayaṃ dāyapālo phaṇakataāsīvisaṃ gīvāya gahetuṃ hatthaṃ pasārento viya loke aggapuggalena saddhiṃ kathentova na jānāti,
tika-vin02t:1723_7: aññatarabhikkhunā viya saddhiṃ kathetī”ti nivārento etaṃ “māvuso,
tika-vin02t:1724_0: Tenupasaṅkamīti kasmā bhagavato paccuggamanaṃ akatvāva upasaṅkami?
tika-vin02t:1724_1: Evaṃ kirassa ahosi “mayaṃ tayo janā samaggavāsaṃ vasāma,
tika-vin02t:1724_6: evaṃ sahāyānampi me piyo”ti tehi saddhiṃ paccuggamanaṃ kātukāmo sayaṃ akatvā upasaṅkami.
tika-vin02t:1724_7: Keci pana “tesaṃ therānaṃ paṇṇasāladvāre caṅkamanakoṭiyā bhagavato āgamanamaggo hoti,
tika-vin02t:1724_8: tasmā thero tesaṃ saññaṃ dadamānova gato”ti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:1724_10: Pāde pakkhālesīti vikasitapadumasannibhehi jālahatthehi maṇivaṇṇaṃ udakaṃ gahetvā suvaṇṇavaṇṇesu piṭṭhipādesu
tika-vin02t:1724_11: udakaṃ āsiñcitvā pādena pādaṃ ghaṃsento pakkhālesi.
tika-vin02t:1724_12: Buddhānaṃ kāye rajojallaṃ nāma na upalimpati,
tika-vin02t:1724_15: Amhehi abhihaṭena udakena bhagavā pāde pakkhālesi,
tika-vin02t:1724_16: paribhogaṃ akāsīti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ balavasomanassavasena cittaṃ pīṇitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin02t:1725_0: Āyasmantaṃ anuruddhaṃ bhagavā etadavocāti so kira tesaṃ vuḍḍhataro,
tika-vin02t:1725_1: tassa saṅgahe kate sesānaṃ katova hotīti theraññeva etaṃ “kacci vo anuruddhā”tiādivacanaṃ avoca.
tika-vin02t:1725_2: Anuruddhāti vā ekasesanayena vuttaṃ virūpekasesassapi icchitabbattā,
tika-vin02t:1725_3: evañca katvā bahuvacananiddeso ca samatthito hoti.
tika-vin02t:1725_13: sampatte vo disvā manussā uḷuṅkayāguṃ vā kaṭacchubhikkhaṃ vā dātabbaṃ maññantīti bhikkhācāravattaṃ pucchati. Kasmā?
tika-vin02t:1725_14: Yasmā paccayena akilamantena sakkā samaṇadhammo kātuṃ,
tika-vin02t:1726_0: Atha tena paṭivacane dinne “anuruddhā tumhe rājapabbajitā mahāpuññā,
tika-vin02t:1726_1: manussā tumhākaṃ araññe vasantānaṃ adatvā kassa aññassa dātabbaṃ maññissanti,
tika-vin02t:1726_2: tumhe pana etaṃ bhuñjitvā kiṃ nu kho migapotakā viya aññamaññaṃ ghaṭṭentā viharatha,
tika-vin02t:1726_3: udāhu sāmaggibhāvo vo atthī”ti sāmaggirasaṃ pucchanto “kacci pana vo anuruddhā samaggā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin02t:1726_4: Tattha khīrodakībhūtāti yathā khīrañca udakañca aññamaññaṃ saṃsandati,
tika-vin02t:1726_7: kacci evaṃ sāmaggivasena ekattupagatacittuppādā viharathāti pucchati.
tika-vin02t:1726_8: Piyacakkhūhīti mettacittaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā olokanato piyabhāvadīpakāni cakkhūni piyacakkhūni nāma,
tika-vin02t:1726_9: “kacci tathārūpehi cakkhūhi aññamaññaṃ passantā viharathā”ti pucchati.
tika-vin02t:1726_12: Yathā kathaṃ panāti ettha yathāti nipātamattaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1726_16: taṃ me kāraṇaṃ brūhīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:1727_1: Āvi ceva raho cāti sammukhā ceva parammukhā ca.
tika-vin02t:1727_6: Yañhi saheva vasantesu ekena mañcapīṭhaṃ vā dārubhaṇḍaṃ vā mattikābhaṇḍaṃ vā bahi dunnikkhittaṃ hoti,
tika-vin02t:1727_7: taṃ disvā “kenidaṃ vaḷañjita”nti avaññaṃ akatvā attanā dunnikkhittaṃ viya gahetvā paṭisāmentassa paṭijaggitabbayuttaṃ
tika-vin02t:1727_8: vā pana ṭhānaṃ paṭijaggantassa sammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin02t:1727_9: Ekasmiṃ pakkante tena dunnikkhittaṃ senāsanaparikkhāraṃ tatheva nikkhipantassa paṭijaggitabbayuttaṃ vā
tika-vin02t:1727_10: pana ṭhānaṃ paṭijaggantassa parammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin02t:1727_11: Sahavasantassa pana therehi saddhiṃ madhuraṃ sammodanīyakathaṃ paṭisanthārakathaṃ sāraṇīyakathaṃ dhammakathaṃ
tika-vin02t:1727_12: sarabhaññaṃ sākacchaṃ pañhapucchanaṃ pañhavissajjananti evamādikaraṇe sammukhā mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin02t:1727_13: Theresu pana pakkantesu “mayhaṃ piyasahāyo nandiyatthero kimilatthero evaṃ sīlasampanno evaṃ ācārasampanno”tiādiguṇakathane
tika-vin02t:1727_15: “Mayhaṃ piyamitto nandiyatthero kimilatthero avero hotu abyāpajjo sukhī”ti evaṃ samannāharato pana sammukhāpi parammukhāpi mettaṃ manokammaṃ hotiyeva.
tika-vin02t:1728_0: Nānā hi kho no bhante kāyāti ayañhi kāyo piṭṭhaṃ viya mattikā viya ca omadditvā ekato kātuṃ na sakkā.
tika-vin02t:1728_1: Ekañca pana maññe cittanti cittaṃ pana no attano viya aññamaññassa hitabhāvena avirodhabhāvena bhedābhāvena samaggabhāvena ekamevāti dasseti.
tika-vin02t:1728_2: Kathaṃ panete sakaṃ cittaṃ nikkhipitvā itaresaṃ cittavasena vattiṃsūti?
tika-vin02t:1728_8: pacituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vutte itare “mayhaṃ cīvaraṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ dhovitabbaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1728_9: mayhaṃ paribhaṇḍaṃ kātabba”nti avatvā araññaṃ pavisitvā dārūni āharitvā bhinditvā pattakaṭāhe bahalatanumattikāhi
tika-vin02t:1728_10: lepaṃ katvā pattaṃ pacitvā tato paraṃ cīvaraṃ vā dhovanti,
tika-vin02t:1728_14: paribhaṇḍaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti paṭhamataraṃ ārocitepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin02t:1729_0: Idāni tesaṃ appamādalakkhaṇaṃ pucchanto “kacci pana vo anuruddhā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin02t:1729_5: Piṇḍāya paṭikkamatīti gāme piṇḍāya caritvā paccāgacchati.
tika-vin02t:1729_6: Avakkārapātinti atirekapiṇḍapātaṃ apanetvā ṭhapanatthāya ekaṃ samuggapātiṃ dhovitvā ṭhapeti.
tika-vin02t:1729_7: Yo pacchāti te kira therā na ekatova bhikkhācāraṃ pavisanti.
tika-vin02t:1729_8: Phalasamāpattiratā hete pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā vattapaṭipattiṃ pūretvā senāsanaṃ pavisitvā kālaparicchedaṃ
tika-vin02t:1729_10: Tesu yo paṭhamataraṃ nisinno attano kālaparicchedavasena paṭhamataraṃ uṭṭhāti,
tika-vin02t:1729_11: so piṇḍāya caritvā paṭinivatto bhattakiccaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā jānāti “dve bhikkhū pacchato,
tika-vin02t:1729_13: Atha pattaṃ pidahitvā āsanapaññāpanādīni katvā yadi patte paṭivīsamattameva hoti,
tika-vin02t:1729_17: katabhattakicco pattaṃ dhovitvā vodakaṃ katvā thavikāya osāpetvā pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisati.
tika-vin02t:1730_2: So sace patte bhattaṃ pamāṇameva hoti, bhuñjati.
tika-vin02t:1730_6: avakkārapātiyaṃ pakkhipitvā pamāṇameva bhuñjitvā purimatthero viya vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisati.
tika-vin02t:1730_9: Sopi dutiyatthero viya bhuñjitvā katabhattakicco pattaṃ dhovitvā vodakaṃ katvā thavikāya osāpetvā āsanāni ukkhipitvā paṭisāmeti,
tika-vin02t:1730_10: pānīyaghaṭe vā paribhojanīyaghaṭe vā avasesaudakaṃ chaḍḍetvā ghaṭe nikujjitvā avakkārapātiyaṃ sace avasesabhattaṃ hoti,
tika-vin02t:1730_11: taṃ vuttanayena jahitvā pātiṃ dhovitvā paṭisāmeti,
tika-vin02t:1730_13: so kacavaraṃ chaḍḍetvā sammajjaniṃ ukkhipitvā upacikāhi muttaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā pattacīvaramādāya vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisati.
tika-vin02t:1730_14: Idaṃ therānaṃ bahivihāre araññe bhattakiccakaraṇaṭṭhāne bhojanasālāya vattaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1731_0: Yo passatītiādi pana nesaṃ antovihāre vattanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1731_6: Te kira pānīyaghaṭādīsu yaṃkiñci tucchakaṃ gahetvā pokkharaṇiṃ gantvā anto ca bahi ca dhovitvā udakaṃ
tika-vin02t:1731_7: parissāvetvā tīre ṭhapetvā aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ hatthavikārena āmantenti,
tika-vin02t:1731_8: odissa vā anodissa vā saddaṃ na karonti.
tika-vin02t:1731_14: Tato dvīhi kattabbakamme tatiyassa kammacchedo bhaveyya.
tika-vin02t:1731_15: Saṃyatapadasaddo pana hutvā aparassa bhikkhuno divāṭṭhānasantikaṃ gantvā tena diṭṭhabhāvaṃ ñatvā hatthasaññaṃ karoti,
tika-vin02t:1731_17: tato dve janā hatthena hatthaṃ saṃsibbantā dvīsu hatthesu ṭhapetvā uṭṭhāpenti.
tika-vin02t:1731_18: Taṃ sandhāyāha “hatthavikārena dutiyaṃ āmantetvā hatthavilaṅghakena upaṭṭhāpemā”ti.
tika-vin02t:1732_0: Pañcāhikaṃ kho panāti cātuddase pannarase aṭṭhamiyanti idaṃ tāva pakatidhammassavanameva,
tika-vin02t:1732_1: taṃ akhaṇḍaṃ katvā pañcame pañcame divase dve therā nātivikāle nahāyitvā anuruddhattherassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanti.
tika-vin02t:1732_2: Tattha tayopi nisīditvā tiṇṇaṃ piṭakānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ aññamaññaṃ pañhaṃ pucchanti,
tika-vin02t:1732_6: Ettāvatā therena bhagavatā appamādalakkhaṇaṃ pucchitena pamādaṭṭhānesuyeva appamādalakkhaṇaṃ vissajjitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:1732_7: Aññesañhi bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhācārapavisanakālo nikkhamanakālo nivāsanaparivattanaṃ cīvarapārupanaṃ antogāme
tika-vin02t:1732_8: piṇḍāya caraṇaṃ dhammakathanaṃ anumodanaṃ antogāmato nikkhamitvā bhattakiccakaraṇaṃ pattadhovanaṃ pattaosāpanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1732_10: Tasmā thero “amhākaṃ ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ muñcitvā vissaṭṭhakathāpavattanena kammaṭṭhāne pamajjanaṭṭhānāni,
tika-vin02t:1732_12: kammaṭṭhānaviruddhaṃ na paṭipajjāmā”ti aññesaṃ pamādaṭṭhānesuyeva sikhāppattaṃ attano appamādalakkhaṇaṃ vissajjesi.
tika-vin02t:1732_13: Imināva etāni ṭhānāni muñcitvā aññattha vihārasamāpattīnaṃ avaḷañjanavasena pamādakālo nāma amhākaṃ natthīti dīpeti.
tika-vin02t:1735_2: Anupubbena cārikaṃ caramānoti anukkamena gāmanigamapaṭipāṭiyā cārikaṃ caramāno.
tika-vin02t:1735_3: Yena pālileyyakaṃ tadavasarīti ekakova yena pālileyyakagāmo,
tika-vin02t:1735_5: Pālileyyakagāmavāsinopi paccuggantvā bhagavato dānaṃ datvā pālileyyakagāmassa avidūre rakkhitavanasaṇḍo nāma atthi,
tika-vin02t:1735_6: tattha bhagavato paṇṇasālaṃ katvā “ettha bhagavā vasatū”ti yācitvā vāsayiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1735_7: Bhaddasāloti pana tattheko manāpo laṭṭhiko sālarukkho.
tika-vin02t:1735_8: Bhagavā taṃ gāmaṃ upanissāya vanasaṇḍe paṇṇasālāya samīpe tasmiṃ rukkhamūle vihāsi.
tika-vin02t:1736_0: Atha kho bhagavato rahogatassātiādi bhagavato vivekasukhapaccavekkhaṇadassanaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1736_1: Ākiṇṇo na phāsu vihāsinti sambādhappatto ākiṇṇo vihāsiṃ.
tika-vin02t:1736_2: Kiṃ pana bhagavato sambādho atthi saṃsaggo vāti? Natthi.
tika-vin02t:1736_3: Na hi koci bhagavantaṃ anicchāya upasaṅkamituṃ sakkoti.
tika-vin02t:1736_4: Durāsadā hi buddhā bhagavanto sabbattha ca anupalittā,
tika-vin02t:1736_5: hitesitāya pana sattesu anukampaṃ upādāya “mutto mocessāmī”ti paṭiññānurūpaṃ caturoghanittharaṇatthaṃ
tika-vin02t:1736_6: aṭṭhannaṃ parisānaṃ attano santikaṃ kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamanaṃ adhivāseti,
tika-vin02t:1736_7: sayañca mahākaruṇāsamussāhito kālaññū hutvā tattha upasaṅkamīti idaṃ sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1736_9: idha pana tehi kalahakārakehi kosambakabhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ekavihāre vāsaṃ vihāsi,
tika-vin02t:1736_10: tadā vinetabbābhāvato ākiṇṇavihāraṃ katvā vuttaṃ “ahaṃ kho pubbe ākiṇṇo na phāsu vihāsi”nti.
tika-vin02t:1738_1: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti so kira hatthināgo yūthavāse ukkaṇṭhito taṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ paviṭṭho.
tika-vin02t:1738_2: Tattha bhagavantaṃ disvā ghaṭasahassena nibbāpitasantāpo viya nibbuto hutvā pasannacitto bhagavato santike aṭṭhāsi,
tika-vin02t:1738_3: tato paṭṭhāya vattasīse ṭhatvā bhaddasālassa paṇṇasālāya ca samantato appaharitaṃ katvā sākhābhaṅgena sammajjati,
tika-vin02t:1738_7: araññato madhurāni phalāphalāni āharitvā satthu upaneti.
tika-vin02t:1738_9: Tena vuttaṃ “soṇḍāya bhagavato pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpetī”tiādi.
tika-vin02t:1738_10: So kira soṇḍāya dārūni āharitvā aññamaññaṃ ghaṃsitvā aggiṃ uṭṭhāpetvā dārūni jālāpetvā tattha pāsāṇakhaṇḍāni
tika-vin02t:1738_11: tāpetvā tāni daṇḍakehi vaṭṭetvā soṇḍiyaṃ khipitvā udakassa tattabhāvaṃ ñatvā bhagavato santikaṃ upagantvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin02t:1738_12: Bhagavā “hatthināgo mama nahānaṃ icchatī”ti tattha gantvā nahānakiccaṃ karoti.
tika-vin02t:1738_15: Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “soṇḍāya bhagavato pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpetī”ti.
tika-vin02t:1739_0: Attano ca pavivekaṃ viditvāti kehici anākiṇṇabhāvaladdhaṃ kāyavivekaṃ jānitvā.
tika-vin02t:1739_1: Itare pana vivekā bhagavato sabbakālaṃ vijjantiyeva.
tika-vin02t:1739_2: Imaṃ udānaṃ udānesīti imaṃ attano hatthināgassa ca vivekābhiratiyā samānajjhāsayabhāvadīpanaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
tika-vin02t:1740_1: etaṃ īsādantassa rathaīsāsadisadantassa hatthināgassa cittaṃ nāgena buddhanāgassa cittena sameti saṃsandati.
tika-vin02t:1740_4: yasmā buddhanāgo “ahaṃ kho pubbe ākiṇṇo vihāsi”nti purimaṃ ākiṇṇavihāraṃ jigucchitvā vivekaṃ upabrūhayamāno
tika-vin02t:1740_5: idāni yathā eko adutiyo vane araññe ramati abhiramati,
tika-vin02t:1740_6: evaṃ ayampi hatthināgo pubbe attano hatthiādīhi ākiṇṇavihāraṃ jigucchitvā idāni eko asahāyo vane ekavihāraṃ ramati abhinandati,
tika-vin02t:1740_8: tassa cittena sametīti katvā ekībhāvaratiyā ekasadisaṃ hotīti attho.

tika-vin02t:1755_3: vā paṇḍukalohitakanissitā paṇḍukalohitakasaddena vuttāti āha “tesaṃ nissitakāpi paṇḍukalohitakātveva
tika-vin02t:1757_1: Tīhi aṅgehi samannāgatanti paccekaṃ samuditehi vā tīhi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ.

tika-vin02t:1758_0: Nanu ca “adesanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṃ hotī”ti idaṃ parato “tīhi,
tika-vin02t:1758_2: aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho tajjanīyakammaṃ kareyya,
tika-vin02t:1758_5: Tattha keci vadanti “tajjanīyakammassa hi visesena bhaṇḍanakārakattaṃ aṅga’nti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1758_7: tasmā sabbatikesupi bhaṇḍanaṃ āropetvā bhaṇḍanapaccayā āpannāpattivasena idaṃ kammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1758_8: Tasmā ‘adhisīle sīlavipanno’ti etthāpi pubbabhāge vā parabhāge vā codanāsāraṇādikāle bhaṇḍanapaccayā āpannāpattivaseneva kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1758_10: Apare pana vadanti “adesanāgāminiyāti idaṃ pārājikāpattiṃyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1758_12: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ‘adesanāgāminiyāti pārājikāpattiyā vā saṅghādisesāpattiyā vā’ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1758_14: ‘adhisīle sīlavipanno’ti ca idaṃ saṅghādisesaṃyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1758_16: Tasmā pārājikāpattipaccayā na tajjanīyakammaṃ kātabbaṃ payojanābhāvā,
tika-vin02t:1758_18: Sukkapakkhe ‘desanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṃ hotī’ti iminā virujjhatīti ce?

tika-vin02t:1766_2: Tattha kira citto gahapati pañcavaggiyānaṃ abbhantaraṃ mahānāmattheraṃ piṇḍāya caramānaṃ disvā tassa
tika-vin02t:1766_3: iriyāpathe pasīditvā pattaṃ ādāya gehaṃ pavesetvā bhojetvā bhattakiccāvasāne dhammakathaṃ suṇanto sotāpattiphalaṃ
tika-vin02t:1766_4: patvā acalasaddho hutvā ambāṭakavanaṃ nāma attano uyyānaṃ saṅghārāmaṃ kātukāmo therassa hatthe udakaṃ
tika-vin02t:1766_6: Tasmiṃ khaṇe “patiṭṭhitaṃ buddhasāsana”nti udakapariyantaṃ katvā mahāpathavī kampi,
tika-vin02t:1766_9: Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “āyasmā sudhammo macchikāsaṇḍe cittassa gahapatino āvāsiko hotī”tiādi.
tika-vin02t:1767_0: Aparena samayena cittassa guṇakathaṃ sutvā bhikkhusahassena saddhiṃ dve aggasāvakā tassa saṅgahaṃ kattukāmā macchikāsaṇḍaṃ agamaṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1767_1: Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “tena kho pana samayena sambahulā therā”tiādi.
tika-vin02t:1767_2: Citto gahapati tesaṃ āgamanaṃ sutvā addhayojanamattaṃ paccuggantvā te ādāya attano vihāraṃ pavesetvā āgantukavattaṃ katvā “bhante,
tika-vin02t:1767_6: apica thokaṃ suṇāhī”ti tassa dhammakathaṃ kathesi.
tika-vin02t:1767_7: Tena vuttaṃ “ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho cittaṃ gahapatiṃ āyasmā sāriputto dhammiyā kathāya sandassesī”tiādi.
tika-vin02t:1767_8: So therassa dhammakathaṃ suṇantova anāgāmiphalaṃ pāpuṇi.
tika-vin02t:1768_1: Nāsakkhi cittaṃ gahapatiṃ khamāpetunti so tattha gantvā “gahapati,
tika-vin02t:1768_3: khamāhi me”ti vatvāpi “nāhaṃ khamāmī”ti tena paṭikkhitto maṅkubhūto taṃ khamāpetuṃ nāsakkhi.
tika-vin02t:1768_5: Satthā “nāssa upāsako khamissatī”ti jānantopi “mānathaddho esa tiṃsayojanaṃ gantvāva paccāgacchatū”ti khamanupāyaṃ anācikkhitvāva uyyojesi.
tika-vin02t:1768_6: Athassa puna āgatakāle nihatamānassa anudūtaṃ datvā “gaccha,
tika-vin02t:1768_7: iminā saddhiṃ gantvā upāsakaṃ khamāpehī”ti vatvā “samaṇena nāma ‘mayhaṃ vihāro,
tika-vin02t:1768_10: mayhaṃ upāsikā’ti mānaṃ vā issaṃ vā kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:1768_11: Evaṃ karontassa hi icchāmānādayo kilesā vaḍḍhantī”ti ovadanto –

tika-vin02t:1781_9: tisso pādaghaṃsaniyo sakkharaṃ kathalaṃ samuddapheṇaka”nti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1781_11: “Mā maṃ gāmappavesanaṃ āpucchathā”ti vutte anāpucchāpi gāmaṃ pavisituṃ vaṭṭati.

tika-vin02t:1790_4: Vuttanayeneva saṅghamajjhe nikkhipitabbanti pārivāsikakkhandhake vuttanayena “mānattaṃ nikkhipāmi,
tika-vin02t:1790_5: vattaṃ nikkhipāmī”ti imehi dvīhi ekena vā nikkhipitabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1790_6: Tassa ārocetvā nikkhipitabbanti anārocanena vattabhedadukkaṭaparimocanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1790_7: Dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvāti bhikkhūnaṃ sajjhāyanasaddasavanūpacāravijahanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1790_9: gumbena vā vatiyā vā paṭicchannaṭṭhāneti dassanūpacāravijahanatthaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1790_10: Anikkhittavattena antoupacāragatānaṃ sabbesampi ārocetabbattā “ayaṃ nikkhittavattassa parihāro”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1790_11: Tattha nikkhittavattassāti vattaṃ nikkhipitvā parivasantassāti attho.
tika-vin02t:1790_13: vattaṃ nikkhipitvā parivasantassa upacāragatānaṃ sabbesaṃ ārocanakiccaṃ natthi,
tika-vin02t:1792_3: Antarāyikassa pana anantarāyikasaññāya chādayato acchannāvā”tipi pāṭho.
tika-vin02t:1793_0: Sukkavissaṭṭhīti vatthu ceva gottañcāti sukkavissaṭṭhīti idaṃ asucimocanalakkhaṇassa vītikkamassa pakāsanato vatthu ceva hoti,
tika-vin02t:1793_1: sajātiyasādhāraṇavijātiyavinivattasabhāvāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā eva pakāsanato gottañca hotīti attho.

tika-vin02t:1795_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ ekāhapaṭicchannaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1795_2: so saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhapaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāci.
tika-vin02t:1795_3: Saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhapaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi.
tika-vin02t:1795_5: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1795_6: so saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ sañcetanikānaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhīnaṃ paṭicchannāya ca appaṭicchannāya ca chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācati.
tika-vin02t:1795_8: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ sañcetanikānaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhīnaṃ paṭicchannāya ca appaṭicchannāya ca chārattaṃ mānattaṃ dadeyya,
tika-vin02t:1796_3: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1796_5: Saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ sañcetanikānaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhīnaṃ paṭicchannāya ca appaṭicchannāya ca chārattaṃ mānattaṃ deti.
tika-vin02t:1796_6: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ sañcetanikānaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhīnaṃ paṭicchannāya
tika-vin02t:1796_7: ca appaṭicchannāya ca chārattaṃ mānattassa dānaṃ,

tika-vin02t:1802_0: Attano sīmaṃ sodhetvā vihārasīmāyāti vihāre baddhasīmameva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1802_1: Vihārūpacāratopi dve leḍḍupātā atikkamitabbāti bhikkhuvihāraṃ sandhāya vadati gāmūpacārātikkameneva bhikkhunīvihārūpacārātikkamassa siddhattā.
tika-vin02t:1802_3: Gāmassāti na vuttanti gāmassa upacāraṃ muñcituṃ vaṭṭatīti na vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1803_0: Tattheva ṭhānaṃ paccāsīsantīti bhikkhūnaṃ ṭhānaṃ paccāsīsanti.
tika-vin02t:1803_2: Yuttataraṃ dissatīti iminā anikkhittavattabhikkhunā viya bhikkhuniyāpi antoupacārasīmagatānaṃyeva ārocetabbaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1803_3: na gāme ṭhitānampi gantvā ārocetabbanti dīpeti.
tika-vin02t:1803_4: Tasmiṃ gāmeti yasmiṃ gāme bhikkhunupassayo hoti,
tika-vin02t:1803_6: Bahi upacārasīmāya ṭhatvāti upacārasīmato bahi ṭhatvā.
tika-vin02t:1803_7: Sammannitvā dātabbāti ettha sammannitvā dinnāya sahavāsepi ratticchedo na hoti.
tika-vin02t:1805_1: Visuṃ mānattaṃ caritabbanti mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ akatvā visuṃ kammavācāya mānattaṃ gahetvā caritabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1808_2: ekā āpatti dvīhappaṭicchannā”tiādinā vuttanayaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin02t:1808_4: dve āpattiyo dvīhappaṭicchannā”tiādinā vuttaṃ āpattivaḍḍhanakanayaṃ sandhāya.

tika-vin02t:1820_6: Ettha pana yo bhikkhu satthari dharamāne tīsu kālesu upaṭṭhānaṃ na yāti,
tika-vin02t:1820_14: parinibbute vā pana cetiyaṃ vandituṃ na gacchati,
tika-vin02t:1820_15: cetiyassa paññāyanaṭṭhāne satthudassanaṭṭhāne vuttaṃ sabbaṃ karoti,
tika-vin02t:1820_18: sammāsambuddhassa nāma lajjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vutte “tuṇhī hohi,
tika-vin02t:1821_0: Yo pana dhammasavane saṅghuṭṭhe sakkaccaṃ na gacchati,
tika-vin02t:1821_8: Yo pana therena bhikkhunā anajjhiṭṭho dhammaṃ deseti uddisati pañhaṃ katheti,
tika-vin02t:1821_9: vuḍḍhe bhikkhū ghaṭṭento gacchati tiṭṭhati nisīdati,
tika-vin02t:1821_18: Ekabhikkhusmimpi hi agārave kate saṅghe katoyeva hoti.
tika-vin02t:1821_19: Tisso sikkhā pana apūrayamāno sikkhāya na paripūrakārī nāma.
tika-vin02t:1822_0: Ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānanti ekasmiṃ vihāre dvinnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ uppannavivādo kathaṃ devamanussānaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattati?
tika-vin02t:1822_1: Kosambakakkhandhake viya hi dvīsu bhikkhūsu vivādaṃ āpannesu tasmiṃ vihāre tesaṃ antevāsikā vivadanti,
tika-vin02t:1822_4: atha manussānaṃ ārakkhadevatā dve koṭṭhāsā honti.
tika-vin02t:1822_8: Evaṃ paramparāya yāva brahmalokā ṭhapetvā ariyasāvake sabbe devamanussā dve koṭṭhāsā honti.
tika-vin02t:1822_11: taṃ taccha”nti dhammaṃ vissajjetvā bahutarā adhammaṃ gaṇhanti.
tika-vin02t:1822_12: Te adhammaṃ purakkhatvā viharantā apāyesu nibbattanti.
tika-vin02t:1822_13: Evaṃ ekasmiṃ vihāre dvinnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ uppanno vivādo bahūnaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya hoti.
tika-vin02t:1822_14: Ajjhattaṃ vāti attani vā attano parisāya vā.
tika-vin02t:1822_15: Bahiddhā vāti parasmiṃ vā parassa parisāya vā.
tika-vin02t:1823_10: Duppaṭinissaggīti na sakkā hoti gahitaṃ nissajjāpetuṃ.
tika-vin02t:1823_11: Ettha ca kodhano hoti upanāhītiādinā puggalādhiṭṭhānanayena kodhūpanāhādayo akusaladhammā vivādamūlānīti dassitāni,
tika-vin02t:1823_13: Aduṭṭhacittā vivadantītiādinā ca alobhādayo vivādamūlānīti dassitāni.
tika-vin02t:1825_1: Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ kusalaṃ akusalaṃ abyākatanti vivādādhikaraṇaṃ kiṃ kusalaṃ akusalaṃ udāhu abyākatanti pucchati.
tika-vin02t:1825_6: Kathaṃ pana so cittuppādo adhikaraṇaṃ nāmāti āha “samathehi ca adhikaraṇīyatāya adhikaraṇa”nti,
tika-vin02t:1825_8: Vivādahetubhūtassa hi cittuppādassa vūpasamena tappabhavassa saddassapi vūpasamo hotīti cittuppādassa samathehi adhikaraṇīyatā pariyāyo sambhavati.
tika-vin02t:1826_1: Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ siyā akusalaṃ siyā abyākatanti ayaṃ vikappo paññattivajjaṃyeva sandhāya vutto,
tika-vin02t:1826_3: Kasmā panettha sandhāyabhāsitavasena attho veditabboti āha “yasmiṃ hī”tiādi.
tika-vin02t:1826_6: Yo vinaye apakataññutāya vattasīsena sammuñjaniādinā pathavīkhaṇanādīni karoti,
tika-vin02t:1826_7: tadā tassuppannacittaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “kusalacittaṃ aṅgaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-vin02t:1826_8: Aṅgaṃ hotīti ca vattasīsena karontassapi “imaṃ pathaviṃ khaṇāmī”tiādinā vītikkamajānanavasena pavattattā taṃ kusalacittaṃ āpattādhikaraṇaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1826_10: Na hi vītikkamaṃ ajānantassa pathavīkhaṇanādīsu āpatti sambhavati.
tika-vin02t:1826_11: Tasmiṃ satīti tasmiṃ kusalacitte āpattibhāvena gahite satīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:1826_12: Tasmāti yasmā kusalacitte āpattibhāvena gahite sati “natthi āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kusala”nti na sakkā vattuṃ, tasmā.
tika-vin02t:1826_13: Nayidaṃ aṅgappahonakacittaṃ sandhāya vuttanti “āpattādhikaraṇaṃ siyā akusalaṃ siyā abyākataṃ,
tika-vin02t:1826_14: natthi āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kusala”nti idaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhāpakabhāvena aṅgappahonakaṃ āpattiyā kāraṇabhūtaṃ cittaṃ sandhāya na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1826_15: Kiṃ pana sandhāya vuttanti āha “idaṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-vin02t:1826_16: Bhikkhumhi kammaṭṭhānagatacittena nipanne niddāyante vā mātugāmo ce seyyaṃ kappeti,
tika-vin02t:1826_20: Tasmiñhi khaṇe uṭṭhātabbe jāte anuṭṭhānato tadākārapavatto rūpakkhandhova āpatti.
tika-vin02t:1827_0: “Āpattiṃ āpajjanto kusalacitto vā āpajjati akusalābyākatacitto vā”ti vacanato kusalampi āpattādhikaraṇaṃ siyāti ce? Na.
tika-vin02t:1827_2: so tīsu cittesu aññataracittasamaṅgī hutvā āpajjati,
tika-vin02t:1827_5: pathavīkhaṇanādīsu kusalacittakkhaṇe vītikkamādivasena pavattarūpasambhavato kusalacitto vā tathāpavattarūpasaṅkhātaṃ abyākatāpattiṃ āpajjati,
tika-vin02t:1827_6: tathā abyākatacitto vā abyākatarūpasaṅkhātaṃ abyākatāpattiṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin02t:1827_9: Supinante ca pāṇātipātādiṃ karonto sahaseyyādivasena āpajjitabbāpattiṃ āpajjanto akusalacitto abyākatāpattiṃ āpajjatīti.
tika-vin02t:1828_0: Kusalacittaṃ āpajjeyyāti eḷakalomaṃ gahetvā kammaṭṭhānamanasikārena tiyojanaṃ atikkamantassa paññattiṃ
tika-vin02t:1828_1: ajānitvā padaso dhammaṃ vācentassa ca āpajjitabbāpattiyā kusalacittaṃ āpajjeyya.
tika-vin02t:1828_2: Na ca tattha vijjamānampi kusalacittaṃ āpattiyā aṅganti tasmiṃ vijjamānampi kusalacittaṃ āpattiyā aṅgaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin02t:1828_7: Aññatarameva aṅganti kāyavācānaṃ aññatarameva āpattīti attho.
tika-vin02t:1829_2: nirayaṃ vā vadāmi tiracchānayoniṃ vā”ti vacanato abyākatassapi vipākadhammatā āpajjeyyāti?
tika-vin02t:1829_4: Asañcicca āpannā hi āpattiyo yāva so na jānāti,
tika-vin02t:1829_6: jānitvā chādento pana chādanappaccayā aññaṃ dukkaṭasaṅkhātaṃ akusalamāpattādhikaraṇamāpajjati,
tika-vin02t:1829_7: tañca akusalasabhāvattā saggamokkhānaṃ antarāyakaraṇanti sāpattikassa apāyagāmitā vuttā.
tika-vin02t:1829_8: Abyākataṃ pana āpattādhikaraṇaṃ avipākadhammamevāti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1829_9: Teneva porāṇagaṇṭhipadesupi “puthujjano kalyāṇaputhujjano sekkho arahāti cattāro puggale dassetvā tesu arahato āpattādhikaraṇaṃ abyākatameva,
tika-vin02t:1829_13: Yasmā cassa sañcicca vītikkamakāle akusalameva hoti,
tika-vin02t:1829_15: Sabbattha evaṃ abyākatanti vipākābhāvamattaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1829_18: Yathā hi ariyūpavādakammaṃ akusalampi samānaṃ accayaṃ desetvā khamāpanena payogasampattipaṭibāhitattā avipākadhammataṃ āpannaṃ ahosikammaṃ hoti,
tika-vin02t:1829_19: evamidampi desitaṃ vuṭṭhitaṃ vā payogasampattipaṭibāhitattā avipākadhammatāya ahosikammabhāvena anantarāyakaraṃ jātaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1829_22: nirayaṃ vā vadāmi tiracchānayoniṃ vā”ti sāpattikasseva apāyagāmitā vuttā.
tika-vin02t:1834_0: 231. Ubbāhikāya khīyanake pācitti na vuttā tattha chandadānassa natthitāya.
tika-vin02t:1835_0: 236. Tassa kho tanti ettha kho tanti nipātamattaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1836_2: “Kā ca tassapāpiyasikā”ti evaṃ panettha pāṭho veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:1837_1: Kiccādhikaraṇaṃ ekena samathena sammatīti ettha “kiccameva kiccādhikaraṇa”nti vacanato apalokanakammādīnametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1837_2: Taṃ vivādādhikaraṇādīni viya samathehi sametabbaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin02t:1837_4: tasmā sammatīti ettha sampajjatīti attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin02t:1845_4: yathā tassa uṇṇapāvārassa bahiddhā lomāni dissanti,
tika-vin02t:1846_1: Imāni cattāri ahirājakulānīti idaṃ daṭṭhavise sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1846_3: sabbe te imesaṃ catunnaṃ ahirājakulānaṃ abbhantaragatāva honti.
tika-vin02t:1846_6: Attaparittaṃkātunti attano parittāṇatthāya attaparittaṃ nāma kātuṃ anujānāmīti attho.
tika-vin02t:1847_5: etehi saha mayhaṃ mittabhāvoti vuttaṃ hoti apādakehīti apādakasattehi.
tika-vin02t:1847_7: Sabbe sattāti ito pubbe ettakena ṭhānena odissakamettaṃ kathetvā idāni anodissakamettaṃ kathetuṃ idamāraddhaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1847_8: Tattha sattā pāṇā bhūtāti sabbānetāni puggalavevacanāneva.
tika-vin02t:1847_10: Mā kañci pāpamāgamāti kañci sattaṃ pāpakaṃ lāmakaṃ mā āgacchatu.
tika-vin02t:1848_0: Appamāṇo buddhoti ettha buddhoti buddhaguṇā veditabbā,
tika-vin02t:1848_6: Katā me rakkhā kataṃ me parittanti mayā ettakassa janassa rakkhā ca parittāṇañca kataṃ.
tika-vin02t:1848_7: Paṭikkamantu bhūtānīti sabbepi me kataparittāṇā sattā apagacchantu,
tika-vin02t:1848_9: Sohanti yassa mama etehi sabbehipi mettaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1848_11: vipassīādīnañca sattannaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ namo karomīti sambandho.
tika-vin02t:1849_1: Tādisaṃ vā dukkhanti muṭṭhiādīhi dukkhaṃ uppādentassa.
tika-vin02t:1850_1: Jālāni parikkhipāpetvāti parissayamocanatthañceva pamādena gaḷitānaṃ ābharaṇādīnaṃ rakkhaṇatthañca jālāni karaṇḍakākārena parikkhipāpetvā.
tika-vin02t:1850_2: Candanagaṇṭhi āgantvā jāle laggāti eko kira rattacandanarukkho gaṅgāya uparitīre jāto gaṅgodakena dhotamūlo
tika-vin02t:1850_3: patitvā tattha tattha pāsāṇesu sambhijjamāno vippakiri.
tika-vin02t:1850_4: Tato ekā ghaṭappamāṇā ghaṭikā pāsāṇesu ghaṃsiyamānā udakaūmīhi pothiyamānā maṭṭhā hutvā anupubbena vuyhamānā
tika-vin02t:1851_3: So kira aññatarassa kulassa ekūnadāsasataṃ pūrayamāno jāto.
tika-vin02t:1851_9: So paṇṇena vā tiṇena vā paṭicchādetumpi ajānanto jātarūpeneva ekaṃ gāmaṃ pāvisi.
tika-vin02t:1851_10: Manussā taṃ disvā “ayaṃ samaṇo arahā appiccho,
tika-vin02t:1851_11: natthi iminā sadiso”ti pūvabhattādīni gahetvā upasaṅkamanti.
tika-vin02t:1851_12: So “mayhaṃ sāṭakaṃ anivatthabhāvena idaṃ uppanna”nti tato paṭṭhāya sāṭakaṃ labhitvāpi na nivāsesi,
tika-vin02t:1851_14: Tassa santike aññepi aññepīti pañcasatā manussā pabbajiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1851_15: Evamayaṃ gaṇācariyo hutvā “satthā”ti loke pākaṭo ahosi.
tika-vin02t:1852_2: Taṃ kira sakaddamāya bhūmiyā telaghaṭaṃ gahetvā gacchantaṃ “tāta mā khalī”ti sāmiko āha.
tika-vin02t:1852_3: So pamādena khalitvā patitvā sāmikassa bhayena palāyituṃ āraddho.
tika-vin02t:1852_5: so sāṭakaṃ chaḍḍetvā acelako hutvā palāyi.
tika-vin02t:1853_3: Tattha kesakambalo nāma manussānaṃ kesehi katakambalo.
tika-vin02t:1853_11: sīte sīto uṇhe uṇho dubbaṇṇo duggandho dukkhasamphasso”ti.
tika-vin02t:1854_5: uṇhodakaṃ vā kañjiyaṃ vā labhitvā karoti,
tika-vin02t:1854_6: nadiṃ vā maggodakaṃ vā atikkamma “sīlaṃ me bhinna”nti vālikathūpaṃ katvā sīlaṃ adhiṭṭhāya gacchati.
tika-vin02t:1856_0: Piṇḍolabhāradvājoti piṇḍaṃ ulamāno pariyesamāno pabbajitoti piṇḍolo.
tika-vin02t:1856_1: So kira parijiṇṇabhogo brāhmaṇo hutvā mahantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa lābhasakkāraṃ disvā piṇḍatthāya nikkhamitvā pabbajito.
tika-vin02t:1856_11: Taṃ gacchante gacchante kāle ghaṃsanena parikkhīṇaṃ nāḷikodanamattasseva gaṇhanakaṃ jātaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1856_14: Thero aparena samayena indriyabhāvanaṃ bhāvento aggaphale arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
tika-vin02t:1856_15: Iti so pubbe savisesaṃ piṇḍatthāya ulatīti piṇḍolo.
tika-vin02t:1856_16: Gottena pana bhāradvājoti ubhayaṃ ekato katvā “piṇḍolabhāradvājo”ti vuccati.
tika-vin02t:1857_10: gehe bhamaṃ yojetvā pattaṃ likhāpetvā sikkāya ṭhapetvā veḷuparamparāya saṭṭhihatthamatte ākāse olambāpetvā ‘sace arahā atthi,
tika-vin02t:1857_14: So cintitaniyāmeneva pattaṃ likhāpetvā veḷuparamparāya ussāpetvā “yo imasmiṃ loke arahā,
tika-vin02t:1857_15: so ākāsena āgantvā imaṃ pattaṃ gaṇhātū”ti āha.
tika-vin02t:1858_3: Chaṭṭhe divase nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto antevāsike pesesi “gacchatha seṭṭhiṃ evaṃ vadetha ‘amhākaṃ ācariyasseva anucchaviko,
tika-vin02t:1858_4: mā appamattakassa kāraṇā ākāsena āgamanaṃ kari,
tika-vin02t:1858_8: Nāṭaputto sayaṃ gantukāmo hutvā antevāsikānaṃ saññaṃ adāsi “ahaṃ ekaṃ hatthañca pādañca ukkhipitvā uppatitukāmo viya bhavissāmi,
tika-vin02t:1858_10: dārumayapattassa kāraṇā paṭicchannaṃ arahattaguṇaṃ mahājanassa mā dassayitthā’ti vatvā maṃ hatthesu ca
tika-vin02t:1858_11: pādesu ca gahetvā ākaḍḍhantā bhūmiyaṃ pāteyyāthā”ti.
tika-vin02t:1858_12: So tattha gantvā seṭṭhiṃ āha “mahāseṭṭhi ayaṃ patto aññesaṃ nānucchaviko,
tika-vin02t:1858_13: mā te appamattakassa kāraṇā mama ākāse uppatanaṃ rucci,
tika-vin02t:1858_16: Tato nāṭaputto “tena hi apetha apethā”ti antevāsike apanetvā “ākāse uppatissāmī”ti ekaṃ hatthañca pādañca ukkhipi.
tika-vin02t:1858_19: chavassa dārumayapattassa kāraṇā paṭicchannaguṇena tumhehi mahājanassa dassitena ko attho”ti taṃ hatthapādesu gahetvā ākaḍḍhitvā bhūmiyaṃ pātesuṃ.
tika-vin02t:1858_24: Evaṃ titthiyā cha divasāni vāyamitvāpi pattaṃ na labhiṃsuyeva.
tika-vin02t:1859_0: Atha sattame divase āyasmato ca moggallānassa āyasmato ca piṇḍolabhāradvājassa “rājagahe piṇḍāya carissāmā”ti
tika-vin02t:1859_1: gantvā ekasmiṃ piṭṭhipāsāṇe ṭhatvā cīvaraṃ pārupanakāle dhuttakā kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “hambho pubbe cha
tika-vin02t:1859_3: rājagahaseṭṭhino pana ajja sattamo divaso pattaṃ ussāpetvā ṭhapayato ‘sace arahā atthi,
tika-vin02t:1859_6: ajja no loke arahantānaṃ natthibhāvo ñāto”ti.
tika-vin02t:1859_7: Taṃ kathaṃ sutvā āyasmā mahāmoggallāno āyasmantaṃ piṇḍolabhāradvājaṃ āha “sutaṃ te,
tika-vin02t:1859_16: tayi pana aggaṇhante ahaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti āha.
tika-vin02t:1859_18: Iti te lokassa arahantehi asuññabhāvadassanatthaṃ evamāhaṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1860_0: Tikkhattuṃ rājagahaṃ anupariyāyīti tikkhattuṃ rājagahaṃ anugantvā paribbhami.
tika-vin02t:1860_2: Thero kira abhiññāpādakaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā uṭṭhāya tigāvutaṃ piṭṭhipāsāṇaṃ antantena paricchindanto
tika-vin02t:1860_3: tūlapicu viya ākāse uṭṭhāpetvā rājagahanagarassa upari sattakkhattuṃ anupariyāyi.
tika-vin02t:1860_4: So tigāvutappamāṇassa nagarassa apidhānaṃ viya paññāyi.
tika-vin02t:1860_5: Nagaravāsino “pāsāṇo no avattharitvā gaṇhātī”ti bhītā suppādīni matthake katvā tattha tattha nilīyiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1860_6: Sattame vāre thero piṭṭhipāsāṇaṃ bhinditvā attānaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin02t:1860_13: Taṃ disvā seṭṭhi urena nipajjitvā “otara sāmī”ti vatvā ākāsato otiṇṇaṃ theraṃ nisīdāpetvā pattaṃ gahetvā catumadhurapuṇṇaṃ katvā therassa adāsi.
tika-vin02t:1860_18: So tesaṃ tesaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ dassento vihāraṃ agamāsi.
tika-vin02t:1860_19: Satthā taṃ anubandhitvā unnādentassa mahājanassa saddaṃ sutvā “ānanda,
tika-vin02t:1861_0: Vikubbaniddhiyā pāṭihāriyaṃ paṭikkhittanti ettha vikubbaniddhi nāma “so pakativaṇṇaṃ vijahitvā kumārakavaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti nāgavaṇṇaṃ vā,
tika-vin02t:1861_1: vividhampi senābyūhaṃ dassetī”ti evamāgatā pakativaṇṇavijahanavikāravasena pavattā iddhi.
tika-vin02t:1861_2: Adhiṭṭhāniddhi pana “pakatiyā eko bahukaṃ āvajjati sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā satasahassaṃ vā,
tika-vin02t:1861_3: āvajjitvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhāti ‘bahuko homī”’ti evaṃ vibhajitvā dassitā adhiṭṭhānavasena nipphannā iddhi.
tika-vin02t:1862_4: Dāruādhārakadaṇḍādhārakesūti ekadārunā kataādhārake bahūhi daṇḍakehi kataādhārake vāti attho,
tika-vin02t:1862_5: tīhi daṇḍehi kato pana na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:1862_6: Bhūmiyaṃ pana nikkujjitvā ekameva ṭhapetabbanti ettha dve ṭhapentena upari ṭhapitapattaṃ ekena passena bhūmiyaṃ phusāpetvā ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:1862_8: Parivattitvā tattheva patiṭṭhātīti ettha “parivattitvā tatiyavāre tattheva miḍḍhiyā patiṭṭhātī”ti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1862_9: Paribhaṇḍaṃ nāma gehassa bahi kuṭṭapādassa thirabhāvatthaṃ katā tanukamiḍḍhikā vuccati.
tika-vin02t:1862_14: ādhāraka”nti hi vacanato miḍḍhādīsu yattha katthaci ādhārakaṃ ṭhapetvā tattha pattaṃ ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati ādhārake ṭhapanokāsassa aniyamitattāti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:1862_15: “Pattamāḷo nāma vaṭṭetvā pattānaṃ agamanatthaṃ vaṭṭaṃ vā caturassaṃ vā iṭṭhakādīhi parikkhipitvā kato”ti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1863_2: Tāvakālikaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti sakideva gahetvā tena āmisaṃ paribhuñjitvā chaḍḍetuṃ vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:1863_4: Abhuṃ meti ettha bhavatīti bhū, vaḍḍhi.
tika-vin02t:1863_10: abhedepi vā bhedūpacārenāyaṃ vohāro “silāputtakassa sarīra”ntiādīsu viya.
tika-vin02t:1864_1: Ekaṃ udakagaṇḍusaṃ gahetvāti vāmahattheneva pattaṃ ukkhipitvā mukhena gaṇḍusaṃ gahetvā.
