tika-vin02t:1902_7: buddhārammaṇāya pītiyā samuṭṭhāpito vipassanobhāsasadiso sātisayo cittapaccayautusamuṭṭhāno āloko pāturahosi.
tika-vin02t:1902_10: Ehi sudattāti so kira seṭṭhi gacchamānova cintesi “imasmiṃ loke bahū pūraṇakassapādayo titthiyā ‘mayaṃ buddhā,
tika-vin02t:1902_12: kathaṃ nu kho ahaṃ satthu buddhabhāvaṃ jāneyya”nti.
tika-vin02t:1902_13: Athassa etadahosi “mayhaṃ guṇavasena uppannaṃ nāmaṃ mahājano jānāti,
tika-vin02t:1902_14: kuladattiyaṃ pana me nāmaṃ aññatra mayā na koci jānāti,
tika-vin02t:1907_2: Atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesīti tehi bhikkhūhi attano attano rucivasena aggāsanādirahānaṃ kathitakāle “na,
tika-vin02t:1907_4: mayhaṃ sāsane aggāsanādīni patvā khattiyakulā pabbajito pamāṇaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1907_13: imasmiṃ sāsane yathāvuḍḍhaṃ abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ kattabbaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1907_19: sāriputto mayhaṃ aggasāvako anudhammacakkappavattako mamānantarasenāsanaṃ laddhuṃ arahati.
tika-vin02t:1907_20: So imaṃ rattiṃ senāsanaṃ alabhanto rukkhamūle vītināmesi.
tika-vin02t:1907_22: gacchante gacchante kāle kinti katvā viharissathā”ti vatvā atha nesaṃ ovādadānatthāya “pubbe,
tika-vin02t:1907_25: yaṃ mayaṃ aññamaññaṃ agāravā appatissā asabhāgavuttino vihareyyāma,
tika-vin02t:1907_26: amhesu mahallakataraṃ jānitvā tassa abhivādanādīni karissāmā’ti sādhukaṃ vīmaṃsitvā ‘ayaṃ mahallako’ti
tika-vin02t:1907_27: ñatvā tassa abhivādanādīni katvā devapathaṃ pūrayamānā gatā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āharitvā dassetuṃ bhikkhū āmantesi.
tika-vin02t:1908_0: Ye vuḍḍhamapacāyantīti jātivuḍḍho vayovuḍḍho guṇavuḍḍhoti tayo vuḍḍhā.
tika-vin02t:1908_4: Tesu guṇasampanno vayovuḍḍho imasmiṃ ṭhāne vuḍḍhoti adhippeto.
tika-vin02t:1908_9: Samparāye ca suggatīti samparetabbe imaṃ lokaṃ hitvā gantabbe paralokepi tesaṃ sugatiyeva hotīti attho.
tika-vin02t:1908_12: khattiyā vā hontu brāhmaṇā vā vessā vā suddā vā gahaṭṭhā vā pabbajitā vā tiracchānagatā vā,
tika-vin02t:1908_13: ye keci sattā jeṭṭhāpacitikamme chekā kusalā guṇasampannānaṃ vayovuḍḍhānaṃ apacitiṃ karonti,
tika-vin02t:1908_14: te imasmiñca attabhāve jeṭṭhāpacitikārakāti pasaṃsaṃ vaṇṇanaṃ thomanaṃ labhanti,
tika-vin02t:1911_4: Atisamīpaṃ agantvāti bhikkhūnaṃ āsannataraṃ ṭhānaṃ agantvā.
tika-vin02t:1913_1: Paccayeneva hi taṃ paṭijagganaṃ labhissatīti tasmiṃ senāsane mahātherā tassa paccayassa kāraṇā aññattha
tika-vin02t:1913_4: attano attano parikkhāre gahetvā tattha tattha vicarissantīti attho.
tika-vin02t:1913_8: Jambudīpe panāti ariyadese bhikkhū sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1913_10: Na gocaragāmo ghaṭṭetabboti vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāveti “na tattha manussā vattabbā”tiādinā.
tika-vin02t:1913_11: Vitakkaṃ chinditvāti “iminā nīhārena gacchantaṃ disvā nivāretvā paccaye dassantī”ti evarūpaṃ vitakkaṃ anuppādetvā.
tika-vin02t:1913_12: Tesu ce ekoti tesu manussesu eko paṇḍitapuriso.
tika-vin02t:1914_2: Hammiyavedikāti ca cetiyassa upari caturassavediyo vuccati.
tika-vin02t:1914_4: Upanikkhepanti khettaṃ vā nāḷikerādiārāmaṃ vā kahāpaṇādīni vā ārāmikādīnaṃ niyyātetvā “ito uppannā vaḍḍhi vassāvāsikatthāya hotū”ti dinnaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1914_5: Vattaṃ katvāti tasmiṃ senāsane kattabbavattaṃ katvā.
tika-vin02t:1915_0: Puggalavaseneva kātabbanti parato vakkhamānanayena “bhikkhū cīvarena kilamanti,
tika-vin02t:1915_1: ettakaṃ nāma taṇḍulabhāgaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cīvaraṃ kātuṃ ruccatī”tiādinā puggalaparāmāsavaseneva kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1915_2: “saṅgho cīvarena kilamatī”tiādinā pana saṅghaparāmāsavasena na kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1915_5: Kasmā evaṃ vuttanti āha “evañhi navako vuḍḍhatarassa,
tika-vin02t:1915_7: yasmā attanāva attano pāpetuṃ na sakkā,
tika-vin02t:1915_9: vuḍḍho ca navakassāti ubho aññamaññaṃ gāhessantīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:1915_10: Sammatasenāsanaggāhāpakassa āṇattiyā aññena gāhitepi gāho ruhatiyevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1915_11: Aṭṭhapi soḷasapi jane sammannituṃ vaṭṭatīti kiṃ visuṃ visuṃ sammannituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin02t:1915_14: Niggahakammameva hi saṅgho saṅghassa na karoti,
tika-vin02t:1915_15: sammutidānaṃ pana bahūnampi ekato kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin02t:1915_16: teneva sattasatikakkhandhake ubbāhikasammutiyaṃ aṭṭhapi janā ekato sammatāti.
tika-vin02t:1916_6: Pakkhipitvāti ettha pakkhipanaṃ nāma tesu vasantānaṃ ito uppannavassāvāsikadānaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1916_7: Pavisitabbanti aññehi bhikkhūhi tasmiṃ mahālābhe pariveṇe vasitvā cetiye vattaṃ katvāva lābho gahetabboti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:1917_2: Upanibandhitvā gāhetabbanti “imasmiṃ rukkhe vā maṇḍape vā vasitvā cetiye vattaṃ katvā gaṇhathā”ti evaṃ upanibandhitvā gāhetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1917_5: kattha vā paccayo bhavissatī”ti evaṃ uppannena vitakkena caratīti vitakkacāriko.
tika-vin02t:1917_6: Araññavihāresu parissayavijānanatthaṃ icchitabbattā “pañca pañca ukkā koṭṭetabbā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1918_2: Sodhetvā pabbājethāti bhabbe ācārakulaputte upaparikkhitvā pabbājetha.
tika-vin02t:1918_3: Dasavatthukakathā nāma appicchakathā santuṭṭhikathā pavivekakathā asaṃsaggakathā vīriyārambhakathā sīlakathā
tika-vin02t:1919_1: Caturārakkhaṃ ahāpentāti buddhānussati mettā asubhaṃ maraṇassatīti imaṃ caturārakkhaṃ aparihāpentā.
tika-vin02t:1919_2: Dantakaṭṭhakhādanavattaṃ ācikkhitabbanti ettha dantakaṭṭhakhādanavattaṃ yo devasikaṃ saṅghamajjhe osarati,
tika-vin02t:1919_3: tena sāmaṇerādīhi āharitvā bhikkhūnaṃ yathāsukhaṃ paribhuñjanatthāya dantakaṭṭhamāḷake nikkhittesu dantakaṭṭhesu
tika-vin02t:1919_6: padhānaghare vasitvā dhammassavane vā uposathagge vā dissati,
tika-vin02t:1919_7: tena pamāṇaṃ sallakkhetvā cattāri pañca dantakaṭṭhāni attano vasanaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā khāditabbāni.
tika-vin02t:1919_8: Tesu khīṇesu sace punapi dantakaṭṭhamāḷake bahūni hontiyeva,
tika-vin02t:1919_18: maggaṃ gacchantenapi ekaṃ vā dve vā thavikāya pakkhipitvā gantabbanti.
tika-vin02t:1920_1: Tesaṃ chinnavassattā “sādiyantāpi hi te neva vassāvāsikassa sāmino”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1920_2: paṭhamaṃyeva katikāya katattā khīyantāpi ca āvāsikā neva adātuṃ labhantīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1920_3: Bhatiniviṭṭhanti bhatiṃ katvā viya niviṭṭhaṃ pariyiṭṭhaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1920_4: Saṅghikaṃ pana apalokanakammaṃ katvā gāhitanti tatruppādaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1920_5: Paccayavasena gāhitanti dāyakānaṃ vassāvāsikapaccayavasena gāhitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. “Idha,
tika-vin02t:1923_2: idha muttaṃ hotīti yaṃ tayā tattha gāmakāvāse pacchā senāsanaṃ gahitaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1923_3: taṃ te gaṇhanteneva idha sāvatthiyaṃ paṭhamagahitasenāsanaṃ muttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:1923_6: imasmiṃ gāmakāvāse gahitasenāsanaṃ muñcāmī”ti vadantena tatrāpi gāmakāvāse gahitasenāsanaṃ muttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1924_1: Dīghāsanaṃ nāma mañcapīṭhavinimuttaṃ yaṃ kiñci ekato sukhaṃ nisīdituṃ pahoti.
tika-vin02t:1924_4: so ca hatthikumbhe patiṭṭhito”ti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1926_3: “Vaṭṭacāṭi viya hutvā thokaṃ dīghamukho majjhe paricchedaṃ dassetvā kato”ti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1927_0: Thāvarena ca thāvaraṃ garubhaṇḍena ca garubhaṇḍanti ettha pañcasu koṭṭhāsesu purimadvayaṃ thāvaraṃ,
tika-vin02t:1927_3: Kappiyamañcā sampaṭicchitabbāti “saṅghassa demā”ti dinnaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1927_7: parivattetuṃ vaṭṭantīti iminā athāvarena thāvarampi athāvarampi parivattetuṃ vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin02t:1927_8: Thāvarena athāvarameva hi parivattetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:1927_9: Akappiyaṃ vā mahagghaṃ kappiyaṃ vāti ettha akappiyaṃ nāma suvaṇṇamayamañcādi akappiyabhisibimbohanāni ca.
tika-vin02t:1927_10: Mahagghaṃ kappiyaṃ nāma dantamayamañcādi pāvārādikappiyaattharaṇādīni ca.
tika-vin02t:1928_0: Pārihāriyaṃ na vaṭṭatīti attano santakaṃ viya gahetvā pariharituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:1928_1: “Gihivikatanīhāreneva paribhuñjitabba”nti iminā sace ārāmikādayo paṭisāmetvā paṭidenti,
tika-vin02t:1929_0: “Aḍḍhabāhūti kapparato paṭṭhāya yāva aṃsakūṭa”nti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1929_4: Muñjapabbajānaṃyeva pāḷiyaṃ visuṃ āgatattā “muñjaṃ pabbajañca ṭhapetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1929_6: Ghaṭṭanaphalakaṃ nāma yattha ṭhapetvā rajitacīvaraṃ hatthena ghaṭṭenti.
tika-vin02t:1929_10: Bhūmattharaṇaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti akappiyacammaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1929_11: Paccattharaṇagatikanti iminā mañcapīṭhepi attharituṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpeti.
tika-vin02t:1931_1: Kiñcideva samādapetvā kāressatīti sāmikoyeva kañci bhikkhuṃ samādapetvā kāressati.
tika-vin02t:1931_2: Utukāle paṭibāhituṃ na labhatīti hemantagimhesu aññe sampattabhikkhū paṭibāhituṃ na labhati.
tika-vin02t:1931_4: Sace saddhivihārikānaṃ dātukāmo hotīti sace so saṅghassa bhaṇḍakaṭhapanaṭṭhānaṃ vā navakānaṃ vā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ dātuṃ na icchati,
tika-vin02t:1931_6: Etañhi saddhivihārikānaṃ dātuṃ labhatīti etaṃ tatiyabhāgaṃ upaḍḍhabhāgaṃ vā dātuṃ labhati.
tika-vin02t:1933_1: Cakkalikanti kambalādīhi veṭhetvā cakkasaṇṭhānena pādapuñchanayoggaṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin02t:1933_2: Paribhaṇḍakatā bhūmi nāma saṇhamattikāhi katā kāḷavaṇṇādibhūmi.
tika-vin02t:1933_4: Tatheva vaḷañjetuṃ vaṭṭatīti aññehi āvāsikabhikkhūhi paribhuttanīhārena paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:1935_1: Uddesabhattaṃ nimantananti imaṃ vohāraṃ pattānīti ettha iti-
tika-vin02t:1935_4: Tampi anto katvāti āyatiṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kukkuccavinodanatthāya tampi saṅghabhattaṃ anto katvā.
tika-vin02t:1937_0: Attano vihāradvāreti vihārassa dvārakoṭṭhakasamīpaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1937_2: “Dinnaṃ panā”ti vatvā yathā so dāyako deti,
tika-vin02t:1937_5: Antoupacāragatānanti ettha gāmadvāravīthicatukkesu dvādasahatthabbhantaraṃ antoupacāro nāma.
tika-vin02t:1937_6: Antaragharassa upacāre pana labbhamānavisesaṃ dassetuṃ “gharūpacāro cetthā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin02t:1937_9: Lajjī pesalo agatigamanaṃ vajjetvā medhāvī ca upaparikkhitvā uddisissatīti āha “pesalo lajjī medhāvī icchitabbo”ti.
tika-vin02t:1937_11: Ticīvaraparivāranti ettha “udakapattalābhī viya aññopi uddesabhattaṃ alabhitvā vatthādimanekappakārakaṃ labhati ce,
tika-vin02t:1937_13: Attano rucivasena yaṃ kiñci vatvā āharituṃ vissajjitattā vissaṭṭhadūto nāma.
tika-vin02t:1937_14: Yaṃ icchatīti “uddesapattaṃ dethā”tiādīni vadanto yaṃ icchati.
tika-vin02t:1938_0: “Ekā kūṭaṭṭhitikā nāma hotī”ti vatvā tameva ṭhitikaṃ vibhāvento “rañño vā hī”tiādimāha.
tika-vin02t:1938_1: Aññehi uddesabhattehi amissetvā visuṃyeva ṭhitikāya gahetabbattā “ekacārikabhattānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1938_4: “Manussānaṃ vacanaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti gacchantīti “manussānaṃ vacanaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti tena bhikkhunā vuttā gacchanti.
tika-vin02t:1938_6: “Sabbo saṅgho paribhuñjatū”ti vutteti ettha “paṭhamameva ‘sabbaṃ saṅghikaṃ pattaṃ dethā’ti vatvā pacchā
tika-vin02t:1938_7: ‘sabbo saṅgho paribhuñjatū’ti avuttepi bhājetvāva paribhuñjitabba”nti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1940_0: “Ettake bhikkhū saṅghato uddisitvā dethā”tiādīni avatvā “ettakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vatvā dinnaṃ saṅghikaṃ nimantanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin02t:1940_15: yattakā pana bhikkhū tasmiṃ āvāse vasanti, te sabbe.
tika-vin02t:1940_16: Ekasmiṃ divase gahitabhikkhū aññadā aggahetvā yāva ekavāraṃ sabbe bhikkhū bhojitā honti,
tika-vin02t:1942_8: Phātikammameva bhavantīti vihārarakkhaṇatthāya saṅghena dātabbaatirekalābhā honti.
tika-vin02t:1942_9: Saṅghanavakena laddhakāleti divase divase ekekassa pāpitāni dve tīṇi ekacārikabhattāni teneva niyāmena
tika-vin02t:1942_11: Yassa kassaci sammukhībhūtassa pāpetvāti ettha “yebhuyyena ce bhikkhū bahisīmagatā honti,
tika-vin02t:1942_12: sammukhībhūtassa yassa kassaci pāpetabbaṃ sabhāgattā ekena laddhaṃ sabbesaṃ hoti,
tika-vin02t:1942_13: tasmimpi asati attano pāpetvā dātabba”nti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1943_0: “Saṅghato nirāmisasalākāpi vihāre pakkabhattampi vaṭṭatiyevā”ti sādhāraṇaṃ katvā visuddhimagge vuttattā “evaṃ gāhite sāditabbaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1943_1: evaṃ na sāditabba”nti visesetvā avuttattā ca bhesajjādisalākāyo cettha kiñcāpi piṇḍapātikānampi vaṭṭanti,
tika-vin02t:1943_2: salākavasena gāhitattā pana na sāditabbāti ettha adhippāyo vīmaṃsitabbo.
tika-vin02t:1943_3: Yadi hi bhesajjādisalākā salākavasena gāhitā na sāditabbā siyā,
tika-vin02t:1943_5: “atirekalābho saṅghabhattaṃ uddesabhatta”ntiādivacanato “atirekalābhaṃ paṭikkhipāmī”ti salākavasena gāhetabbaṃ bhattameva paṭikkhittaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1943_7: Saṅghabhattādīni hi cuddasa bhattāniyeva tena na sāditabbānīti vuttāni,
tika-vin02t:1943_8: khandhakabhāṇakānaṃ vā matena idha evaṃ vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1943_10: Laddhā vā aladdhā vāti labhitvā vā alabhitvā vā.
tika-vin02t:1943_11: Nibaddhāya aggabhikkhāya appamattikāya eva sambhavato labhitvāpi punadivase gaṇhituṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1944_0: Salākabhattaṃ nāma vihāreyeva uddisīyati vihārameva sandhāya diyyamānattāti āha “vihāre apāpitaṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-vin02t:1944_2: Vihāraṃ ānetvā gāhetabbanti tathā vatvā tasmiṃ divase dinnabhattaṃ vihārameva ānetvā ṭhitikāya gāhetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1944_4: Taṃ gahetvāti taṃ vāragāmasalākaṃ attanā gahetvā.
tika-vin02t:1944_5: Tenāti yo attano pattaṃ vāragāmasalākaṃ disaṃgamikassa adāsi, tena.
tika-vin02t:1944_6: Anatikkanteyeva tasmiṃ tassa salākā gāhetabbāti yasmā upacārasīmaṭṭhasseva salākā pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin02t:1944_7: tasmā tasmiṃ disaṃgamike upacārasīmaṃ anatikkanteyeva tassa disaṃgamikassa pattasalākā attano pāpetvā gahetabbā.
tika-vin02t:1945_0: Anāgatadivaseti ettha kathaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āgatānāgatabhāvo viññāyatīti ce?
tika-vin02t:1945_1: Yasmā tato tato āgatā bhikkhū tasmiṃ gāme āsanasālāya sannipatanti,
tika-vin02t:1945_4: Bhuñjituṃ āgacchantīti “mahāthero ekakova vihāre ohīno avassaṃ sabbasalākā attano pāpetvā ṭhito”ti maññamānā āgacchanti.
tika-vin02t:1947_4: Sve pakkhoti “ajja pakkhikaṃ na gāhetabba”nti pakkhikassa aniyamattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1947_5: “Sve amhākaṃ ghare lūkhabhattaṃ bhavissatī”ti potthakesu likhanti,
tika-vin02t:1947_9: Gāhetvā bhuñjitabbanti tasmiṃ senāsane vasantehi ṭhitikāya gāhetvā bhuñjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1947_13: Pattaṃ pūretvā thaketvā dinnanti “guḷakabhattaṃ demā”ti dinnaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1951_1: Saṅghabhedakakkhandhake anupiyāyantiādīsu “anupiyā nāmā”ti vattabbe ākārassa rassattaṃ anunāsikassa ca āgamaṃ katvā “anupiyaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1951_3: Na heṭṭhā pāsādā orohatīti uparipāsādato heṭṭhimatalaṃ na orohati,
tika-vin02t:1951_14: Bhusikā uddharāpetabbāti gunnaṃ khuraggehi sañchinnā bhusasaṅkhātā nāḷadaṇḍā apanetabbā.
tika-vin02t:1952_1: Yaṃ na nivattoti yasmā na nivatto.
tika-vin02t:1952_2: Suññāgāragatoti “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca avasesaṃ arañña”nti (pārā.92) vuttaṃ araññaṃ rukkhamūlañca
tika-vin02t:1952_3: ṭhapetvā aññaṃ pabbatakandarādi pabbajitasāruppaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ janasambādhābhāvato idha “suññāgāra”nti
tika-vin02t:1952_5: Atha vā jhānakaṇṭakānaṃ saddānaṃ abhāvato vivittaṃ yaṃ kiñci agārampi “suññāgāra”nti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1952_8: Udānaṃ udānesīti so hi āyasmā araññe divāvihāraṃ upagatopi rattivāsūpagatopi yebhuyyena phalasamāpattisukhena nirodhasamāpattisukhena ca vītināmesi,
tika-vin02t:1952_9: tasmā taṃ sukhaṃ sandhāya pubbe attanā anubhūtaṃ sabhayaṃ sapariḷāhaṃ rajjasukhaṃ jigucchitvā “aho sukhaṃ
tika-vin02t:1952_11: Te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocunti te sambahulā bhikkhū ullumpanasabhāvasaṇṭhitā tassa anuggaṇhanādhippāyena bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ,
tika-vin02t:1952_15: Te kira bhikkhū puthujjanā tassa āyasmato vivekasukhaṃ sandhāya udānaṃ ajānantā evamāhaṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1953_6: “Abhikkhaṇaṃ ‘aho sukhaṃ aho sukha’nti imaṃ udānaṃ udānesī”ti yathā te bhikkhū vadanti,
tika-vin02t:1953_7: taṃ evaṃ tathevāti attano udānaṃ paṭijānāti.
tika-vin02t:1953_8: “Kiṃ pana tvaṃ bhaddiyā”ti kasmā bhagavā pucchati,
tika-vin02t:1953_11: teneva pana tamatthaṃ vadāpetvā te bhikkhū saññāpetuṃ pucchati.
tika-vin02t:1954_0: Antopi antepureti itthāgārassa sañcaraṇaṭṭhānabhūte rājagehassa abbhantare,
tika-vin02t:1954_2: Rakkhā susaṃvihitāti ārakkhādikatapurisehi gutti suṭṭhu samantato vihitā.
tika-vin02t:1954_3: Bahipi antepureti aṭṭakaraṇaṭṭhānādike antepurato bahibhūte rājagehe.
tika-vin02t:1954_4: Evaṃ rakkhito gopito santoti evaṃ rājageharājadhānīrajjadesesu anto bahi ca anekesu ṭhānesu anekasatehi
tika-vin02t:1954_5: susaṃvihitarakkhāvaraṇaguttiyā mameva nibbhayatthaṃ phāsuvihāratthaṃ rakkhito gopito samāno.
tika-vin02t:1954_8: Ubbiggoti sakarajjepi pakatikkhobhato uppajjanakabhayubbegena ubbiggo calito.
tika-vin02t:1954_9: Ussaṅkīti “raññā nāma sabbakālaṃ avissatthena bhavitabba”nti vacanato sabbattha avissāsanavasena tesaṃ
tika-vin02t:1954_10: tesaṃ kiccakaraṇīyānaṃ accayato uppajjanakaparisaṅkāya ca uddhamuddhaṃ saṅkamāno.
tika-vin02t:1954_11: Utrāsīti “santikāvacarehipi ajānantasseva me kadāci anattho bhaveyyā”ti uppannena sarīrakampampi uppādanasamatthena tāsena utrāsi.
tika-vin02t:1955_4: Bhayādinimittassa pariggahassa taṃnimittassa ca kilesagahanassa abhāvenevassa abhītāditāti etena cittavivekaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin02t:1955_10: Migabhūtena cetasāti vissatthavihāritāya migassa viya jātena cittena.
tika-vin02t:1955_11: Migo hi amanussapathe araññe vasamāno vissattho tiṭṭhati nisīdati nipajjati yenakāmañca pakkamati appaṭihatacāro,
tika-vin02t:1960_1: atthavasanti bhagavā yadidaṃ mama etarahi paramaṃ vivekasukhaṃ phalasamāpattisukhaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1960_4: Etamatthanti etaṃ bhaddiyattherassa puthujjanavisayātītaṃ vivekasukhasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā.
tika-vin02t:1960_5: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ sahetukabhayasokavigamānubhāvadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
tika-vin02t:1961_0: Yassantarato na santi kopāti yassa ariyapuggalassa antarato abbhantare attano citte cittakālussiyakaraṇato
tika-vin02t:1961_1: cittappakopā rāgādayo āghātavatthuādikāraṇabhedato anekabhedā dosakopā eva vā na santi,
tika-vin02t:1961_4: saddo kiñcāpi “mañca tvañca kimantara”ntiādīsu kāraṇe dissati,
tika-vin02t:1961_6: “antarā ca jetavanaṃ antarā ca sāvatthi”ntiādīsu vivare,
tika-vin02t:1962_2: saddena atthuddhāre kāraṇamāha “vibhavoti ca abhavoti ca atthato eka”nti. Iti-
tika-vin02t:1962_5: Ettha ca “yassā”ti idaṃ yo vītivattoti vibhattivipariṇāmavasena yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1962_6: Taṃ vigatabhayanti taṃ evarūpaṃ yathāvuttaguṇasamannāgataṃ khīṇāsavaṃ cittakopābhāvato itibhavābhavasamatikkamanato ca bhayahetuvigamena vigatabhayaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1962_9: Devā nānubhavanti dassanāyāti adhigatamagge ṭhapetvā sabbepi upapattidevā vāyamantāpi cittacāradassanavasena
tika-vin02t:1962_10: dassanāya daṭṭhuṃ nānubhavanti na abhisambhuṇanti na sakkonti,
tika-vin02t:1962_12: Sekkhāpi hi puthujjanā viya arahato cittappavattiṃ na jānanti.
tika-vin02t:1962_13: Tassa dassanaṃ devānampi dullabhanti etthāpi cittacāradassanavasena tassa dassanaṃ devānampi dullabhaṃ alabbhanīyaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1962_14: devehipi taṃ dassanaṃ na sakkā pāpuṇitunti evamattho gahetabbo.
tika-vin02t:1963_2: Tassa pana pamāṇaṃ dassetuṃ “pañca ca thālipākasatānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1963_3: Tattha eko thālipāko dasannaṃ purisānaṃ bhattaṃ gaṇhāti.
tika-vin02t:1963_10: Dve vā tīṇi vā māgadhakāni gāmakhettānīti ettha māgadhakaṃ gāmakhettaṃ atthi khuddakaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1963_20: khuddakena ca majjhimena ca dve gāmakhettāni tassa attabhāvo.
tika-vin02t:1966_1: Nāsāya pittaṃ bhindeyyunti acchapittaṃ vā macchapittaṃ vā nāsāpuṭe pakkhipeyyuṃ.
tika-vin02t:1966_5: sā gabbhaṃ gaṇhitvā kāle sampatte vijāyituṃ na sakkoti,
tika-vin02t:1966_7: athassā cattāro pāde catūsu khāṇukesu bandhitvā kucchiṃ phāletvā potakaṃ nīharanti,
tika-vin02t:1969_4: Kathaṃ taṃ dukkhanti āha “na hi nāgahatassā”tiādi.
tika-vin02t:1969_5: Nāgahatassa sugatipaṭikkhepena buddhanāgassa ghāto duggatidukkhakāraṇanti dasseti.
tika-vin02t:1969_8: Ito paraṃ yatoti ito paraṃ gacchantassāti vā attho.
tika-vin02t:1971_2: tiṇṇaṃ ekato paṭiggahetvā bhuñjituṃ paññapessāmīti attho.
tika-vin02t:1971_4: Āyukappanti ekaṃ mahākappaṃ asītibhāgaṃ katvā tato ekabhāgamattaṃ kālaṃ antarakappasaññitaṃ kālaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1972_0: Āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavocāti devadatto sabbaṃ saṅghabhedassa pubbabhāgaṃ nipphādetvā “ekaṃseneva ajja
tika-vin02t:1972_1: āveṇikaṃ uposathaṃ saṅghakammañca karissāmī”ti cintetvā etaṃ “ajjatagge”tiādivacanaṃ avoca.
tika-vin02t:1972_2: Tattha aññatreva bhagavatāti vinā eva bhagavantaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1972_4: Aññatra bhikkhusaṅghā uposathaṃ karissāmi saṅghakammāni cāti bhagavato ovādakārakaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ vinā
tika-vin02t:1972_5: maṃ anuvattantehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ āveṇikaṃ uposathaṃ saṅghakammāni ca karissāmi.
tika-vin02t:1972_7: devadatto saṅghaṃ bhindissatīti bhedakārakānaṃ sabbesaṃ devadattena sajjitattā “ekaṃseneva devadatto ajja saṅghaṃ bhindissatī”ti maññamāno evamāha.
tika-vin02t:1973_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ avīcimahānirayuppattisaṃvattaniyaṃ kappaṭṭhiyaṃ atekicchaṃ devadattena nibbattiyamānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1973_2: Imaṃ udānanti kusalākusalesu yathākkamaṃ sappurisāsappurisānaṃ sukarā paṭipatti,
tika-vin02t:1973_3: na pana nesaṃ akusalakusalesūti idamatthavibhāvanaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
tika-vin02t:1974_0: Tattha sukaraṃ sādhunā sādhūti attano paresañca hitaṃ sādhetīti sādhu,
tika-vin02t:1974_2: Tena sādhunā sāriputtādinā sāvakena paccekasambuddhena sammāsambuddhena aññena vā lokiyasādhunā sādhu
tika-vin02t:1974_3: sundaraṃ bhaddakaṃ attano paresañca hitasukhāvahaṃ sukaraṃ sukhena kātuṃ sakkā.
tika-vin02t:1974_4: Sādhu pāpena dukkaranti tadeva pana vuttalakkhaṇaṃ sādhu pāpena devadattādinā pāpapuggalena dukkaraṃ kātuṃ na sakkā,
tika-vin02t:1974_5: na so taṃ kātuṃ sakkotīti attho.
tika-vin02t:1974_6: Pāpaṃ pāpena sukaranti pāpaṃ asundaraṃ attano paresañca anatthāvahaṃ pāpena yathāvuttapāpapuggalena sukaraṃ sukhena kātuṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1974_7: Pāpamariyehi dukkaranti ariyehi pana buddhādīhi taṃ pāpaṃ dukkaraṃ durabhisambhavaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1976_1: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto ādesanāpāṭihāriyānusāsaniyātiādīsu parassa cittaṃ ñatvā kathanaṃ ādesanāpāṭihāriyaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1976_4: Tattha iddhipāṭihāriyena saddhiṃ anusāsanīpāṭihāriyaṃ mahāmoggallānattherassa āciṇṇaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1976_6: Tena vuttaṃ “āyasmā sāriputto ādesanāpāṭihāriyānusāsaniyā bhikkhū dhammiyā kathāya ovadī”tiādi.
tika-vin02t:1976_7: Tadā hi dvīsu aggasāvakesu dhammasenāpati tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cittacāraṃ ñatvā dhammaṃ desesi,
tika-vin02t:1976_9: pāḷiyañcettha dvinnampi therānaṃ desanāya dhammacakkhupaṭilābhova dassito.
tika-vin02t:1976_10: Dīghabhāṇakā pana evaṃ vadanti “bhagavatā pesitesu dvīsu aggasāvakesu dhammasenāpati tesaṃ cittacāraṃ ñatvā dhammaṃ desesi,
tika-vin02t:1976_11: therassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pañcasatāpi bhikkhū sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1976_12: Atha nesaṃ mahāmoggallānatthero vikubbanaṃ dassetvā dhammaṃ desesi,
tika-vin02t:1976_14: Devadattaṃ uṭṭhāpesīti jaṇṇukena hadayamajjhe paharitvā uṭṭhāpesi.
tika-vin02t:1978_2: Gantumarahatīti dūteyyasaṅkhātaṃ sāsanaṃ harituṃ dhāretvā harituṃ arahati.
tika-vin02t:1978_5: Sāvetāti taṃ uggaṇhitvā “idaṃ nāma tumhehi vutta”nti paṭisāvetā.
tika-vin02t:1978_11: idaṃ asahita”nti evaṃ sahitāsahitassa kusalo upagatānupagatesu cheko sāsanaṃ ārocento sahitāsahitaṃ sallakkhetvā āroceti.
tika-vin02t:1978_12: Na byathatīti na vedhati na chambhati.
tika-vin02t:1979_5: Pariyādinnacittoti khepitacitto lābhādihetukena icchācārena mānamadādinā ca khayaṃ pāpitakusalacitto.
tika-vin02t:1979_7: vuttappakārena akusalakoṭṭhāsena yathā kusalacittassa uppattivāro na hoti,
tika-vin02t:1979_11: Ekaṃ antarakappaṃ paripuṇṇameva katvā tattha tiṭṭhatīti kappaṭṭho.
tika-vin02t:1979_12: Atekicchoti buddhehipi anivattanīyattā avīcinibbattiyā tikicchābhāvato atekiccho,
tika-vin02t:1979_16: Lābhañhi nissāya idhekacce puggalā pāpicchā icchāpakatā icchācāre ṭhatvā “lābhaṃ nibbattessāmā”ti anekavihitaṃ
tika-vin02t:1979_17: anesanaṃ appatirūpaṃ āpajjitvā ito cutā apāyesu nibbattanti.
tika-vin02t:1979_18: Apare yathālābhaṃ labhitvā taṃnimittaṃ mānātimānamadamacchariyādivasena pamādaṃ āpajjitvā ito cutā apāyesu nibbattanti,
tika-vin02t:1979_23: Asakkārenāti hīḷetvā paribhavitvā parehi attani pavattitena asakkārena,
tika-vin02t:1979_25: Asantaguṇasambhāvanādhippāyena pavattā pāpā icchā etassāti pāpiccho,
tika-vin02t:1979_28: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pariharissāmī”ti hi tassa icchā uppannā.
tika-vin02t:1979_29: Kokālikādayo pāpā lāmakā mittā etassāti pāpamitto,
tika-vin02t:1981_3: Oramattakena visesādhigamena antarā vosānaṃ āpādīti ettha pana ayamattho.
tika-vin02t:1981_7: Vosānaṃ āpādīti akatakiccova samāno “katakiccomhī”ti maññamāno samaṇadhammato vigamaṃ āpajji.
tika-vin02t:1981_9: jhānābhiññāhi uttarikaraṇīye adhigantabbe maggaphale anadhigate satiyeva taṃ anadhigantvā samaṇadhammato vigamaṃ āpajjīti.
tika-vin02t:1981_10: Iti bhagavā iminā suttena visesato puthujjanabhāve ādīnavaṃ pakāseti “bhāriyo puthujjanabhāvo,
tika-vin02t:1981_11: yatra hi nāma jhānābhiññāpariyosānā sampattiyo nibbattetvāpi anekānatthāvahaṃ nānāvidhadukkhahetuasantaguṇasambhāvanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1981_12: asappurisasaṃsaggaṃ ālasiyānuyogañca avijahanto avīcisaṃvattanikaṃ kappaṭṭhiyaṃ atekicchaṃ kibbisaṃ pasavatī”ti.
tika-vin02t:1982_5: imasmiṃ sattaloke koci puggalo ekaṃsena pāpiccho mā hotūti.
tika-vin02t:1982_7: pāpicchānaṃ yathā gatīti pāpicchānaṃ puggalānaṃ yathāgati yādisī nibbatti yādiso abhisamparāyoti imināpi
tika-vin02t:1983_5: devadattoti vissutoti attano kittiyā parivārena ca jalanto viya obhāsanto viya ṭhito devadattoti evaṃ vissuto pākaṭo ahosi.
tika-vin02t:1983_8: katipāheneva atathābhūtattā tassa taṃ paṇḍiccādisavanamattamevāti attho.
tika-vin02t:1984_1: āsajja naṃ tathāgatanti so evaṃbhūto devadatto “buddhopi sākiyaputto,
tika-vin02t:1984_10: ahampi te jānāmī”ti attano pamāṇaṃ ajānitvā sammāsambuddhaṃ attanā samasamaṭṭhapanena pamādaṃ āpajjanto “idānāhaṃ buddho bhavissāmi,
tika-vin02t:1984_11: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pariharissāmī”ti abhimārapayojanādinā tathāgataṃ āsajja āsādetvā viheṭhetvā.
tika-vin02t:1984_14: pamādaṃ vuttanayena pamajjanto pamādaṃ nissāya bhagavatā saddhiṃ yugaggāhacittuppādena saheva jhānābhiññāhi anujiṇṇo parihīnoti.
tika-vin02t:1984_16: catudvāraṃ bhayānakanti jālānaṃ tattha uppannasattānaṃ vā nirantaratāya “avīcī”ti laddhanāmaṃ catūsu
tika-vin02t:1984_17: passesu catumahādvārayogena catudvāraṃ atibhayānakaṃ mahānirayaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena patto.
tika-vin02t:1989_2: Tameva pāpaṃ phusatīti tameva aduṭṭhadubbhiṃ pāpapuggalaṃ pāpaṃ nihīnaṃ pāpaphalaṃ phusati pāpuṇāti abhibhavati.
tika-vin02t:1989_7: Vādo tamhi na rūhatīti tasmiṃ tathāgate parena āropiyamāno doso na ruhati na tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin02t:1989_8: visakumbho viya samuddassa na tassa vikāraṃ janetīti attho.
tika-vin02t:1990_0: Evaṃ chahi gāthāhi pāpicchatādisamannāgatassa nirayūpagabhāvadassanena dukkhato aparimuttiṃ dassetvā
tika-vin02t:1990_1: idāni tappaṭipakkhadhammasamannāgatassa dukkhakkhayaṃ dassento “tādisaṃ mitta”nti osānagāthamāha.
tika-vin02t:1990_3: yassa sammā paṭipannassa maggānugo paṭipattimaggaṃ anugato sammā paṭipanno appicchatādiguṇasamannāgamena
tika-vin02t:1990_5: tādisaṃ buddhaṃ buddhasāvakaṃ vā paṇḍito sappañño attano mittaṃ kubbetha tena mettiṃ kareyya,
tika-vin02t:1991_0: Kiṃ panetaṃ suttaṃ devadattassa nirayūpapattito pubbe bhāsitaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1992_0: “Devadatte hi avīcimahānirayaṃ paviṭṭhe devadattapakkhikā aññatitthiyā ‘samaṇena gotamena abhisapito devadatto pathaviṃ paviṭṭho’ti abbhācikkhiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1992_1: Taṃ sutvā sāsane anabhippasannā manussā ‘siyā nu kho etadevaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1992_8: attano kammeneva nirayaṃ paviṭṭho’ti vatvā tesaṃ micchāgāhaṃ paṭisedhento imāya aṭṭhuppattiyā idaṃ suttaṃ abhāsī”ti –
tika-vin02t:1993_1: tasmā tesaṃ matena tassa nirayūpapattito pacchāpi bhagavā idaṃ suttamabhāsīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1993_2: Idha pana tassa nirayūpapattito paṭhamameva uppanne vatthumhi bhāsitaṃ pāḷiāruḷhanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1993_3: Teneva “avīcinirayaṃ patto”ti idaṃ pana āsaṃsāyaṃ atītavacananti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1993_5: Avassambhāviniñhi atthasiddhimapekkhitvā anāgatampi bhūtaṃ viya voharanti,
tika-vin02t:1997_1: Aṭṭhārasabhedakaravatthumhi dasa akusalakammapathā saṃkiliṭṭhadhammatāya vodānadhammapaapakkhattā “adhammo”ti dassitā,
tika-vin02t:1997_4: bhagavatā pana desitākārena hāpetvā vaḍḍhetvā vā kathanaṃ yathādhammaṃ akathananti katvā adhammabhāvoti dassento āha “tayo satipaṭṭhānā”tiādi.
tika-vin02t:1997_5: Niyyānikanti sapāṭihīraṃ appaṭihataṃ hutvā pavattatīti attho.
tika-vin02t:1997_7: Kātabbaṃ kammaṃ dhammo nāmāti yathādhammaṃ karaṇato dhammo nāma,
tika-vin02t:1998_1: ayaṃ vinayo nāmāti rāgādīnaṃ vinayanato saṃvaraṇato pajahanato paṭisaṅkhānato ca vinayo nāma,
tika-vin02t:1999_1: Āpāyikotiādigāthāsu saṅghassa bhedasaṅkhāte vagge ratoti vaggarato.
tika-vin02t:1999_2: Adhammikatāya adhamme bhedakaravatthumhi saṅghabhedasaṅkhāte eva ca adhamme ṭhitoti adhammaṭṭho.
tika-vin02t:1999_4: catūhipi yogehi anupaddutattā yogakkhemaṃ nāma arahattaṃ nibbānañca,
tika-vin02t:1999_7: tato eva ekakammādividhānayogena samaggaṃ sahitaṃ bhinditvā pubbe vuttalakkhaṇena saṅghabhedena bhinditvā.
tika-vin02t:2000_0: Sukhā saṅghassa sāmaggīti sukhassa paccayabhāvato sāmaggī “sukhā”ti vuttā yathā “sukho buddhānamuppādo”ti.
tika-vin02t:2000_1: Samaggānañcanuggahoti samaggānaṃ sāmaggianumodanena anuggaṇhanaṃ sāmaggianurūpaṃ vā,
tika-vin02t:2000_4: Samaggaṃ katvānāti bhinnaṃ saṅghaṃ saṅgharājippattaṃ vā samaggaṃ sahitaṃ katvā.
tika-vin02t:2000_6: Saggamhi modatīti kāmāvacaradevaloke aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi abhibhavitvā dibbasukhaṃ anubhavanto icchitanibbattiyā ca modati pamodati laḷati kīḷati.
tika-vin02t:2001_3: ākārehi saṅgho bhijjati kammena uddesena voharanto anussāvanena salākaggāhenā”ti evaṃ parivāre āgatampi

tika-vin02t:2054_1: tato aparanti evaṃ āpattivassaṃ kilesavassaṃ ativiya vassati.
